别,只,能,想,自,己,，,想,你,周,围,的,人,。,还,有,你,，,如,果,你,是,一,个,家,庭,的,爸,爸,，,你,多,想,自,己,的,孩,子,；,如,果,你,是,青,少,年,你,多,想,自,己,的,未,来,；,那,你,可,以,禁,烟,了,。	C-AD,C-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,M-VV,M-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-PN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,M-AD,C-VV,M-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,M-AD,C-VV,M-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,M-VV,C-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
若,父,母,主,动,和,孩,子,平,起,平,坐,，,倾,心,交,谈,，,互,相,充,分,理,解,对,方,，,会,能,够,大,幅,减,少,互,相,抱,怨,的,情,况,。	C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
到,底,是,健,康,重,要,，,还,是,粮,食,产,生,量,重,要,呢,？,对,这,个,问,题,的,我,的,意,见,是,产,生,量,更,重,要,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
对,于,“,安,乐,死,”,的,看,法,，,向,来,都,是,一,个,极,具,争,议,性,的,题,目,，,因,为,毕,竟,每,个,人,对,于,死,亡,的,观,念,都,不,一,样,，,怎,样,的,情,况,下,去,判,断,，,也,自,然,产,生,出,很,多,主,观,和,客,观,的,理,论,。,每,个,人,都,有,着,生,存,的,权,利,，,也,代,表,着,每,个,人,都,能,去,决,定,如,何,结,束,自,己,的,生,命,的,权,利,。,在,我,的,个,人,观,点,中,，,如,果,一,个,长,期,受,着,病,魔,折,磨,的,人,，,会,是,十,分,痛,苦,的,事,，,不,仅,是,病,人,本,身,，,以,致,病,者,的,家,人,和,朋,友,，,都,是,一,件,难,受,的,事,。	C-P,C-P,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-VV,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,M-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-CC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,M-PU,C-VV,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU

妈,妈,对,爸,爸,劝,戒,烟,的,原,因,就,是,我,的,健,康,。,非,吸,烟,者,比,吸,烟,者,得,病,率,更,高,，,这,个,所,有,的,人,知,道,。	C-NN,C-NN,R-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU
在,这,个,故,事,中,出,现,的,第,一,个,和,尚,就,是,这,样,的,心,理,中,解,决,问,题,；,再,如,在,一,个,地,方,只,有,两,个,人,，,并,且,有,一,件,该,做,的,事,情,，,这,时,候,那,两,个,人,怎,么,想,呢,？,只,有,两,个,人,的,地,方,，,如,果,自,己,不,做,，,而,别,一,人,也,不,做,的,话,，,明,显,地,看,出,来,那,事,情,没,有,做,完,。,所,以,和,像,这,个,故,事,一,样,两,个,人,都,会,做,。	C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,M-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,S-DT,C-CD,M-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

我,十,五,岁,的,时,候,，,跟,车,上,撞,住,院,的,事,情,。	C-PN,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-NN,M-NN,M-LC,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,也,如,果,得,了,不,治,之,症,，,也,一,样,对,妻,子,要,求,的,。	C-PN,R-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,W-VA,W-VA,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
根,据,一,件,事,情,来,说,，,这,位,妻,子,知,道,了,自,己,得,了,一,种,不,治,之,症,。	C-P,C-P,S-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
像,我,对,不,吸,烟,者,来,说,，,这,是,很,不,愉,快,的,事,情,。,因,为,他,们,抽,完,烟,之,后,，,把,烟,头,儿,随,便,扔,掉,，,这,引,起,环,境,污,染,问,题,。,许,多,人,想,要,抽,烟,就,随,便,抽,烟,，,这,些,大,人,的,不,品,德,的,行,动,，,是,不,是,会,影,响,到,青,少,年,的,养,成,吗,？	C-P,W-PN,W-P,M-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,M-NN,C-NN,S-SP,C-PU
虽,然,父,母,那,样,说,，,但,我,仍,然,最,喜,欢,的,中,国,城,市,是,北,京,，,以,后,有,机,会,再,想,去,。,下,次,我,再,研,究,北,京,的,历,史,、,文,化,、,政,治,，,我,看,的,北,京,会,变,另,外,一,个,城,市,，,而,会,更,喜,欢,北,京,的,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-DEC,W-NR,W-NR,W-NN,W-NN,C-VC,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,M-DEC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEC,C-PU

我,认,为,相,比,较,而,言,，,虽,然,挨,饿,就,不,能,生,存,，,但,如,果,吃,了,含,有,农,药,、,化,肥,的,物,质,，,虽,可,暂,时,的,填,饱,肚,子,，,后,果,是,给,人,的,健,康,造,成,更,大,的,不,利,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,R-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
此,外,，,在,医,院,或,各,单,位,等,候,排,队,时,也,能,手,持,一,书,而,充,份,的,利,用,时,间,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-CD,C-NN,C-MSP,S-AD,S-AD,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,看,到,这,个,信,息,之,前,吸,烟,是,只,有,不,好,的,方,面,可,是,知,道,了,这,个,信,息,以,后,我,想,了,吸,烟,不,只,是,有,不,好,的,方,面,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,M-VV,C-VV,R-VC,C-AD,C-VE,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PN,S-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,此,，,我,认,为,为,了,大,家,的,健,康,，,不,得,不,利,用,强,迫,的,方,法,施,行,禁,烟,的,措,施,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

还,有,一,点,我,觉,得,除,了,需,要,理,解,，,还,要,需,要,宽,容,心,包,容,心,，,认,证,别,人,的,想,法,与,看,法,很,重,要,互,相,给,予,充,分,的,认,同,，,那,么,父,母,就,会,把,儿,女,的,超,前,行,为,当,作,一,种,新,观,念,，,而,子,女,也,反,过,来,把,父,母,有,点,落,伍,的,想,法,与,行,为,当,作,自,己,的,经,验,与,教,训,来,看,待,，,那,么,“,代,沟,”,一,词,从,何,说,起,呢,？	C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
但,为,了,这,些,人,我,们,续,继,生,产,那,些,而,化,肥,和,农,药,生,产,的,食,品,，,更,多,的,人,会,得,到,各,种,各,样,的,疾,病,，,将,比,现,在,挨,饿,的,问,题,严,重,。	C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,S-VV,S-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,S-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
无,论,什,么,时,代,、,什,么,地,区,都,难,免,代,沟,问,题,，,因,为,两,代,人,具,有,不,同,历,史,经,验,，,两,代,人,应,该,增,进,相,互,对,话,与,历,史,常,识,并,以,真,诚,的,态,度,关,心,对,方,。	C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-P,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU
还,起,鸡,毛,皮,。,最,后,我,昏,倒,下,去,了,。,我,刚,醒,来,的,时,候,，,就,有,点,疯,疯,颠,颠,地,躺,在,床,上,，,然,后,慢,慢,地,觉,醒,过,来,了,。	C-AD,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-AD,C-VE,C-M,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU

因,为,我,们,俩,从,小,就,是,形,影,不,离,的,一,对,所,以,她,特,意,的,请,我,当,她,的,伴,娘,。	C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-CD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-DEG,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,觉,得,代,沟,问,题,很,严,大,，,而,且,世,界,各,国,都,有,这,个,问,题,。,我,曾,经,跟,外,国,朋,友,们,讲,过,代,沟,问,题,，,我,觉,得,他,们,的,问,题,比,我,严,大,，,他,们,不,想,跟,父,母,一,起,住,，,甚,至,不,要,跟,父,母,讲,话,，,那,么,怎,么,解,决,这,个,问,题,呢,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,S-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-VA,S-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

使,用,农,药,的,作,得,多,，,但,价,钱,更,便,宜,。,绿,色,食,品,作,得,少,，,价,钱,更,贵,。,价,钱,成,二,极,化,。,买,卖,绿,色,食,品,后,的,利,益,全,部,使,用,开,发,新,的,农,作,品,费,用,。,一,直,研,究,对,人,类,没,有,影,响,的,，,收,获,量,更,多,的,农,作,品,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,S-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
比,如,在,饭,馆,儿,，,在,公,司,，,在,学,校,，,在,公,共,场,所,，,在,这,种,地,方,里,有,吸,烟,的,人,和,不,吸,烟,的,人,，,如,果,在,这,里,吸,烟,的,话,，,一,定,会,影,响,不,吸,烟,者,。,所,以,吸,烟,者,一,定,考,虑,在,公,共,场,所,里,吸,烟,的,时,候,不,吸,烟,的,人,的,权,力,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-CC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
但,“,人,多,了,”,一,方,面,也,有,麻,烦,。	C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-VA,C-AS,C-PU,R-AD,R-AD,R-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
它,的,主,要,部,分,是,第,一,部,您,可,以,从,漫,画,图,或,者,一,篇,短,短,的,文,章,，,选,一,篇,比,较,容,易,看,得,懂,的,文,章,。,如,果,一,旦,您,喜,欢,了,这,种,读,文,章,的,习,惯,后,，,那,您,就,会,自,动,去,书,店,或,图,书,馆,看,书,，,这,样,一,来,自,然,而,然,会,加,深,您,的,词,汇,的,知,识,。,其,次,是,我,们,应,该,天,天,读,文,章,，,不,可,以,如,果,心,情,好,才,读,，,这,样,它,的,效,力,不,大,。	C-PN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-OD,C-OD,S-M,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,R-CD,R-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DER,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-CS,S-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
因,这,一,现,象,的,存,在,，,使,得,“,代,沟,”,问,题,在,人,们,的,生,活,中,越,来,越,明,显,化,。	C-P,C-DT,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU

第,一,，,抽,烟,者,不,能,随,便,抽,烟,，,所,以,会,保,持,市,容,整,洁,，,提,高,人,们,的,环,保,意,识,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

您,在,那,封,信,里,面,写,的,内,容,露,出,了,您,对,我,的,深,深,的,爱,情,。,可,是,，,我,终,于,没,给,你,写,答,信,。,因,为,我,还,是,觉,得,不,好,意,思,，,不,想,说,我,的,真,真,心,。	C-PN,C-P,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,S-VV,S-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU

我,们,人,类,是,在,地,球,上,最,有,智,慧,的,动,物,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

这,种,代,沟,一,定,对,我,们,社,会,引,起,不,良,的,影,响,。,如,果,两,代,人,之,间,没,有,什,么,沟,通,和,交,流,，,我,们,肯,定,失,去,两,代,人,的,优,势,。,例,如,，,长,辈,们,的,道,德,观,念,与,深,深,的,思,考,方,式,，,我,们,值,得,保,持,和,实,践,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,M-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VE,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,S-VA,S-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-PN,W-PN,W-VV,W-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
，,它,的,叶,绿,色,在,和,使,用,过,农,药,与,化,肥,的,农,作,物,下,相,比,也,较,为,鲜,绿,，,相,对,地,，,在,使,用,过,农,药,与,化,肥,之,后,的,农,作,物,，,它,的,叶,绿,色,与,本,身,支,杆,的,颜,色,都,成,长,至,偏,较,暗,沉,的,色,彩,。,绿,色,不,仅,对,人,类,的,视,力,有,帮,助,，,专,家,也,说,过,亮,的,绿,色,可,以,在,人,看,见,之,后,，,带,给,人,心,情,上,的,开,朗,与,思,想,上,的,乐,观,，,也,是,一,种,大,自,然,景,观,的,美,化,连,结,至,人,们,心,灵,上,的,正,面,作,用,。	C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NN,M-NN,C-NN,R-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,R-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-PN,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-VV,S-JJ,S-CC,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,S-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-CC,C-CC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,C-VV,R-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,是,吸,烟,者,，,因,此,吸,烟,会,给,我,带,来,一,种,轻,松,、,清,醒,、,舒,服,等,感,情,上,比,较,快,乐,的,享,受,。,可,是,这,个,吸,烟,也,会,带,来,反,面,的,恶,化,作,用,。,众,所,周,知,，,吸,烟,者,的,早,期,死,亡,率,比,没,有,吸,烟,者,的,高,很,多,。	C-PN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-ETC,S-NN,S-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-DT,R-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-JJ,S-JJ,S-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,S-VE,S-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU

总,之,，,我,觉,得,从,大,小,挫,折,中,你,得,吸,取,一,定,的,教,训,，,用,它,加,强,你,的,志,意,力,，,用,它,加,强,你,的,生,活,力,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
每,逢,到,假,期,，,我,就,想,到,青,岛,。	C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU
据,调,查,表,明,，,吸,烟,者,患,抑,郁,症,的,概,率,比,不,吸,烟,者,小,得,多,，,然,而,，,当,代,最,恐,怖,的,疾,病,-,-,-,-,癌,症,，,特,别,是,肺,癌,的,患,者,的,绝,大,部,分,都,是,每,天,吸,烟,量,超,过,二,十,根,以,上,的,“,烟,鬼,”,们,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-DER,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-PU,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-PU
安,乐,死,是,有,自,己,的,同,意,下,做,安,乐,死,的,。,所,以,政,府,应,该,要,改,变,法,律,，,改,成,安,乐,死,是,无,法,的,。,现,在,的,情,况,之,下,，,帮,忙,安,乐,死,的,人,受,到,犯,罪,。,安,乐,死,死,亡,的,人,们,也,不,希,望,帮,忙,的,人,受,到,犯,罪,吧,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-VE,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-SP,C-PU

据,目,前,的,很,多,调,查,和,研,究,，,化,肥,和,农,药,被,表,明,为,导,致,环,境,污,染,的,重,大,因,素,。,于,是,如,果,坚,持,使,用,这,些,化,肥,和,农,药,，,那,后,果,是,不,可,设,想,的,。	C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-SB,S-VV,S-VV,S-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-AD,S-AD,S-AD,S-VV,C-SP,C-PU

要,是,我,们,想,谈,这,三,个,字,的,意,思,那,就,怕,一,天,都,不,够,，,但,是,我,还,是,想,表,达,我,个,人,意,见,。	C-VV,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,S-AD,S-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU

由,我,起,开,始,做,。	C-P,C-PN,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,C-PU
许,多,年,青,人,为,此,不,爱,在,家,与,父,母,长,辈,沟,通,，,一,有,余,间,，,就,外,出,与,朋,友,间,游,打,交,道,，,尽,量,避,免,与,长,辈,们,在,一,起,。	C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,S-NN,S-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-LC,S-VV,R-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU
我,重,新,决,心,从,今,天,不,应,该,对,您,们,发,脾,气,。,我,也,自,己,觉,得,我,真,不,好,。,我,已,经,长,大,了,不,过,不,尊,重,父,却,是,这,样,做,我,还,不,是,成,人,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,M-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,R-PN,R-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,S-AD,S-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,种,依,赖,性,非,但,未,曾,减,少,，,反,而,与,日,俱,增,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

因,经,济,上,有,困,难,，,我,童,年,不,能,像,其,他,的,孩,子,一,样,，,尽,情,地,的,玩,乐,。,常,常,放,学,回,家,以,后,，,就,拿,着,糕,饼,或,是,香,烟,，,沿,街,叫,卖,虽,然,生,活,苦,，,但,是,还,是,乐,在,其,中,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

如,果,我,们,只,想,现,在,的,幸,福,和,安,定,的,话,，,就,未,来,没,有,。,环,境,污,染,越,来,越,严,重,，,环,境,和,人,们,是,一,个,，,环,境,污,染,就,是,我,们,人,家,的,损,失,。,如,果,现,在,不,预,防,，,我,们,肯,定,十,年,以,后,比,现,在,更,缺,少,粮,食,，,更,多,人,挨,饿,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,W-NT,W-NT,W-VE,W-VE,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,M-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,W-PN,W-AD,W-AD,W-CD,W-M,W-LC,W-LC,W-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
如,果,任,何,地,方,都,允,许,抽,烟,的,话,，,会,街,上,有,被,扔,的,烟,太,多,了,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-VE,C-SB,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
虽,然,“,绿,色,食,品,”,很,贵,，,但,是,大,家,越,来,越,选,买,“,绿,色,食,品,”,。,比,如,说,，,现,在,在,韩,国,很,流,行,“,绿,色,食,品,”,，,不,但,在,家,庭,爱,用,，,而,且,食,堂,、,饭,店,等,越,来,越,多,的,地,方,用,绿,色,食,品,。,它,们,自,己,的,店,前,边,写,着,自,己,店,用,了,绿,色,食,品,，,那,客,人,们,觉,得,这,个,店,可,以,相,信,，,所,以,客,人,也,很,多,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,M-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
在,公,共,场,所,，,有,很,多,孩,子,们,和,不,抽,烟,的,人,们,，,从,我,看,来,，,抽,烟,者,容,易,忘,记,这,么,简,单,的,事,情,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-P,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
虽,这,么,说,，,但,有,许,多,例,外,的,。,可,是,，,如,果,女,生,就,因,男,生,在,班,上,淘,气,而,学,不,好,，,这,也,说,明,了,她,们,以,后,遇,到,问,题,可,就,麻,烦,了,！	C-CS,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,M-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,R-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-MSP,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
可,惜,完,全,不,轻,松,，,却,更,重,了,。,因,为,他,们,让,他,杀,死,的,时,候,，,一,直,看,他,还,有,意,识,，,呼,吸,的,样,子,。,这,个,印,象,一,定,不,会,消,除,他,们,的,脑,子,里,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,S-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,R-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,M-PN,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,W-VV,W-VV,M-PN,W-PN,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,W-LC,C-PU
两,代,人,在,一,个,时,代,的,人,，,虽,然,代,沟,有,，,但,是,会,解,决,这,代,沟,问,题,。,除,了,上,面,写,的,几,个,条,件,以,外,有,很,多,条,件,。	C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEC,R-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,W-NN,W-NN,W-VE,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,M-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
在,世,界,上,有,几,亿,人,因,缺,少,粮,食,而,挨,饿,，,我,们,应,该,多,帮,助,在,困,缺,少,粮,食,和,挨,饿,中,生,长,的,他,们,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU
所,以,，,先,辈,和,晚,辈,如,果,想,互,相,了,解,，,他,们,就,该,开,门,见,山,得,互,相,讲,话,、,互,相,谈,话,。,这,样,才,能,解,决,“,代,沟,”,问,题,了,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-DER,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,R-SP,C-PU
吸,烟,是,对,人,的,身,体,和,公,众,利,益,的,最,不,好,的,影,响,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,W-AD,W-AD,W-VA,W-DEC,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU
我,认,为,吃,对,人,体,有,点,害,处,的,食,品,解,饿,总,比,饿,死,好,多,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-P,C-NN,C-VV,C-CD,M-CD,C-PU
甚,至,说,吸,烟,跟,青,少,年,的,犯,罪,率,也,有,相,关,。	M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,R-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
而,且,，,从,公,共,礼,仪,的,角,度,看,，,这,项,规,定,也,会,造,成,使,相,当,于,该,规,定,对,象,的,吸,烟,者,学,会,在,公,共,场,所,的,道,德,的,机,会,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,R-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,为,从,食,物,取,得,的,营,养,和,家,人,的,健,康,有,极,大,的,关,系,。	C-P,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,的,心,里,面,并,列,在,外,向,性,和,内,向,心,，,我,的,外,向,性,有,劲,的,话,出,去,外,面,，,去,旅,游,这,祥,的,行,动,热,烈,。,我,的,内,向,性,占,我,精,神,的,时,候,，,一,个,星,期,都,房,间,里,，,安,慰,身,体,和,精,神,。	C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,S-VV,S-VV,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-VA,C-VA,S-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VA,S-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,R-VA,R-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-PN,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,认,为,这,是,因,为,经,济,飞,跃,发,展,及,科,学,文,明,发,达,的,原,因,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
我,有,兴,趣,鲁,迅,出,生,的,地,方,—,—,绍,兴,。,我,先,到,南,京,，,然,后,去,上,海,，,哪,个,城,市,都,有,特,色,的,气,氛,。,比,如,说,南,京,具,有,古,都,的,气,氛,，,到,处,可,见,名,胜,古,迹,。	C-PN,W-VE,W-NN,W-NN,M-NR,W-NR,W-VV,W-VV,W-DEC,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-AD,W-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU
随,着,社,会,发,展,出,现,了,很,多,不,好,的,商,品,和,习,惯,。,吸,烟,也,是,一,个,不,好,得,习,惯,，,还,有,在,公,共,场,所,抽,吸,是,更,不,好,得,一,种,习,惯,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
其,实,，,抽,烟,是,一,个,公,民,的,基,本,权,利,，,有,的,时,候,尤,其,烦,恼,的,时,候,，,一,条,烟,就,是,好,像,药,品,一,样,，,能,解,决,我,们,生,活,中,的,烦,恼,。,而,且,，,国,家,通,过,香,烟,拍,卖,，,获,得,财,政,收,入,。,就,是,可,以,说,吸,烟,带,来,的,受,利,者,之,一,。,但,是,，,只,是,抽,烟,者,当,人,的,压,力,越,来,越,大,。,根,据,上,述,的,内,容,，,吸,烟,者,可,能,批,评,市,政,府,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,S-M,C-NN,C-AD,R-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-AD,W-VC,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,R-AD,R-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,样,的,态,度,在,现,实,生,活,也,是,每,天,看,见,的,：,皇,帝,认,为,他,是,主,公,，,别,人,都,得,给,他,打,工,。,家,里,的,丈,夫,认,为,夫,人,不,应,该,给,别,人,打,工,，,而,且,应,该,给,他,做,饭,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
最,恐,怕,的,是,即,使,你,不,吸,烟,，,但,如,果,旁,边,的,人,吸,烟,，,也,有,不,好,的,影,响,。,这,意,味,着,吸,烟,的,烟,本,身,有,坏,处,。	C-AD,S-AD,S-AD,C-DEC,C-VC,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,M-AD,C-VE,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,R-VV,R-DEC,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
可,能,对,某,些,富,有,阶,层,来,说,，,这,个,问,题,是,隔,岸,观,火,，,只,有,自,己,吃,饱,才,行,。,不,过,这,些,想,法,是,不,应,当,采,取,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-SP,C-PU
我,这,样,的,看,法,主,要,有,三,点,。,第,一,在,公,共,场,所,抽,烟,的,人,不,只,是,害,自,己,的,身,体,，,而,也,影,响,别,的,不,抽,烟,的,人,的,健,康,。,第,二,吸,烟,者,也,会,严,重,的,影,响,城,市,的,卫,生,。	C-PN,R-PN,R-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,种,方,法,哪,里,潜,伏,丈,夫,的,犯,罪,心,理,呢,？,我,十,分,可,以,理,解,他,的,心,理,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,S-AD,S-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
内,容,是,采,访,一,对,夫,妻,的,战,病,生,活,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,还,去,了,长,白,山,，,西,安,，,重,庆,，,上,海,等,你,们,等,下,一,封,信,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-ETC,M-PN,C-PN,C-ETC,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,M-PU
有,的,家,庭,里,的,代,沟,问,题,是,不,太,严,重,。,但,是,如,果,代,沟,问,题,很,严,重,的,话,，,这,就,变,成,社,会,问,题,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,R-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
“,安,乐,死,”,在,国,际,间,带,来,了,许,多,争,议,，,有,人,说,“,安,乐,死,”,应,该,让,病,人,自,己,决,定,，,有,人,说,“,安,乐,死,”,是,一,种,不,道,德,的,意,念,，,应,该,加,已,打,击,。	C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
妈,妈,，,你,放,心,，,我,现,在,可,以,说,得,上,懂,事,的,人,，,我,已,经,找,到,在,这,个,竟,争,时,代,里,怎,么,掌,握,立,足,之,路,的,方,法,。,通,过,在,中,国,留,学,的,很,辛,苦,的,经,验,，,我,很,可,能,成,为,很,有,耐,心,，,跟,谁,都,能,随,和,的,人,，,离,开,家,庭,，,独,自,住,在,一,个,陌,生,的,国,家,，,我,觉,得,真,值,得,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DER,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-P,C-PN,C-AD,S-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU

我,相,信,，,在,不,远,的,未,来,，,我,们,的,科,学,肯,定,会,发,明,了,又,卫,生,、,既,产,量,多,的,“,绿,色,食,品,”,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,S-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU

这,是,不,抽,烟,的,人,觉,得,好,消,息,，,因,为,不,抽,烟,的,人,觉,得,烟,香,儿,也,不,好,，,空,气,也,不,好,，,身,体,也,不,好,影,象,了,。,所,以,新,规,定,是,不,抽,烟,的,人,觉,得,好,消,息,。	W-PN,W-VC,W-JJ,W-JJ,W-NN,W-DEC,W-NN,W-VV,W-VV,C-VA,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,S-NN,C-NN,R-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,M-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,M-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,R-VV,R-VV,R-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-JJ,W-NN,W-NN,W-VC,W-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-DEC,W-NN,W-VV,W-VV,C-VA,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

据,我,来,理,解,，,我,们,应,该,把,挫,折,看,作,生,活,的,刺,激,。,没,有,它,们,，,平,生,会,变,的,没,有,意,思,，,也,学,不,会,什,么,知,识,、,积,累,不,了,丰,富,多,彩,的,经,验,。,总,结,人,会,问,自,己,，,我,在,此,生,活,有,什,么,意,义,、,有,什,么,用,？	C-P,C-PN,R-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-VE,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-DEC,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-VV,R-VV,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-PU

我,过,的,很,好,，,爸,妈,不,用,担,心,。	C-PN,C-VV,S-DER,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
社,会,分,工,是,在,人,们,进,行,某,些,活,动,，,特,别,是,有,关,生,产,方,面,的,工,作,时,，,从,现,代,化,的,工,场,考,察,，,必,不,可,少,的,一,部,分,，,它,的,最,大,作,用,是,提,高,生,产,效,率,，,而,提,高,效,率,是,经,济,学,最,测,重,的,范,畴,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-AD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-VV,S-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
某,市,政,府,有,一,项,规,定,，,在,公,共,场,所,里,边,走,边,烟,的,人,将,被,罚,款,，,这,是,迄,今,为,止,对,吸,烟,者,最,严,厉,的,惩,罚,措,施,。	C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,M-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-SB,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,为,每,一,个,人,的,看,法,，,观,念,和,价,值,观,念,都,不,一,样,，,怎,么,父,母,和,子,女,的,想,法,可,以,一,致,呢,。,所,以,发,生,代,沟,的,问,题,发,生,父,母,和,子,女,之,间,的,矛,盾,。	C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,W-AD,W-AD,W-NN,W-NN,W-CC,W-NN,W-NN,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-VV,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
所,以,如,果,我,们,看,有,不,认,识,的,汉,字,，,不,用,查,词,典,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,R-VV,C-VE,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
况,且,我,了,解,之,后,，,给,日,本,人,介,绍,的,话,，,他,们,也,更,能,理,解,中,国,菜,的,深,奥,，,有,时,候,发,现,中,日,饮,食,文,化,的,相,异,，,恐,怕,他,们,更,想,知,道,中,国,的,饮,食,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,是,从,小,学,时,候,就,开,始,学,英,语,的,。	C-PN,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
总,而,言,之,，,吸,烟,对,人,们,的,身,体,无,有,好,处,。,所,以,，,政,府,也,需,要,实,行,法,律,上,的,措,施,，,而,且,人,们,也,从,自,己,实,践,为,大,家,健,康,的,不,吸,烟,运,动,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,M-VC,C-PN,C-PN,M-VA,C-VA,R-DEV,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,对,“,安,乐,死,”,同,意,。	C-PN,R-P,W-PU,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-PU,W-VV,W-VV,C-PU

我,可,能,是,从,学,者,的,角,度,来,看,这,个,问,题,的,，,学,生,在,学,校,上,课,、,生,活,时,，,如,果,教,室,里,只,有,跟,自,己,同,性,的,学,生,，,这,样,的,学,习,环,境,就,会,给,学,生,产,生,很,大,的,影,响,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VE,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
如,果,我,们,人,类,不,保,护,地,球,，,总,有,一,天,在,世,界,上,没,有,人,类,的,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,M-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
在,这,里,进,行,缓,和,病,人,的,痛,苦,的,处,置,（,有,时,候,这,些,处,置,导,致,这,病,人,的,死,亡,）,，,而,绝,对,不,进,行,病,人,不,愿,意,的,延,命,处,置,。	C-P,C-PN,C-PN,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,R-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,S-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-JJ,S-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU
在,世,界,上,，,研,究,绿,色,食,品,的,所,有,的,科,学,家,应,该,对,既,生,产,量,多,，,又,对,身,体,没,有,影,响,的,绿,色,食,品,认,真,地,加,以,考,虑,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,W-VV,W-VV,W-JJ,W-JJ,W-NN,W-NN,W-DEG,W-DT,W-DT,W-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
而,这,一,代,的,人,就,不,同,了,，,他,们,生,长,在,二,十,世,纪,的,环,境,中,，,他,们,要,什,么,都,有,，,吃,的,穿,的,各,种,贵,的,名,牌,的,物,质,样,样,都,有,。,他,们,的,生,活,就,不,苦,了,，,想,要,电,脑,就,买,，,还,可,以,电,腦,中,买,东,西,，,不,用,出,门,去,买,。,所,以,呢,，,两,代,的,意,见,和,思,想,就,完,全,不,一,样,，,孩,子,也,不,听,老,前,輩,的,話,老,前,輩,呢,也,不,懂,这,一,代,的,思,想,和,观,念,。	C-AD,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,R-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VE,C-PU,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-SP,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-JJ,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-SP,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

不,是,他,们,的,一,种,嗜,好,吗,？,我,要,说,，,吸,烟,者,不,给,被,吸,烟,者,不,偷,快,地,事,，,被,吸,烟,者,也,可,以,理,解,他,们,的,。,还,吸,烟,者,可,以,遵,守,禁,止,吸,烟,的,规,则,的,话,，,没,有,很,大,的,问,题,，,但,他,们,的,健,康,是,对,自,己,来,说,最,大,的,问,题,。	M-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-SB,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-VA,S-DEV,C-NN,C-PU,C-LB,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-PU,S-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-VE,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
在,农,作,物,的,生,长,过,程,中,，,如,果,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,的,话,，,产,量,就,会,大,大,提,高,，,但,农,作,物,品,会,受,到,不,同,程,度,的,化,学,污,染,，,吃,了,这,种,食,品,会,有,害,于,健,康,。,如,果,不,用,化,肥,和,农,药,，,农,作,物,的,产,量,会,大,大,降,低,，,而,现,在,世,界,大,约,几,亿,人,口,缺,少,粮,食,而,饥,饿,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU

吸,烟,是,对,人,们,的,身,体,毫,无,有,益,，,不,仅,对,吸,烟,者,的,健,康,还,对,周,围,的,人,也,受,到,危,害,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,S-VA,S-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,样,会,减,少,那,些,饿,死,的,人,。,人,的,生,命,是,最,重,要,的,，,而,因,为,农,药,和,化,肥,直,接,影,响,死,的,人,并,不,多,，,还,是,继,续,利,用,好,吧,！,如,果,到,某,一,年,，,不,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,也,可,以,满,足,全,部,人,的,话,，,不,使,用,吧,！	C-AD,C-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-DT,W-DT,W-VV,W-VV,W-DEC,W-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,S-P,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,M-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,M-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,看,了,段,文,，,就,觉,得,很,遗,憾,。,因,为,妻,子,得,了,严,重,的,病,，,丈,夫,就,让,大,夫,帮,助,死,杀,，,我,觉,得,丈,夫,从,心,里,真,的,爱,妻,子,？	C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,M-M,M-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,W-VV,W-VV,M-PU,S-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,M-PU

也,许,前,生,有,太,多,债,未,清,，,事,情,发,生,两,年,后,，,我,又,让,另,不,同,的,小,孩,用,尖,锐,的,东,西,刺,伤,眼,睛,，,导,至,我,右,眼,视,力,较,差,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,S-AD,S-VA,S-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
因,为,我,觉,的,看,小,孩,子,的,作,文,很,有,一,种,亲,切,感,，,因,他,们,年,纪,小,，,写,出,来,的,作,文,很,天,真,，,完,全,不,做,作,。	C-P,C-P,C-PN,S-VV,S-DEC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
９,６,年,我,在,武,汉,大,学,留,学,的,时,候,，,两,个,月,的,暑,假,期,间,里,去,了,国,内,的,许,多,城,市,—,—,厦,门,、,广,州,、,桂,林,、,昆,明,、,大,理,、,丽,江,、,成,都,、,北,京,和,丝,绸,之,路,的,几,座,城,市,等,等,。,当,时,到,中,国,来,才,过,了,几,个,月,的,对,我,来,说,这,个,旅,游,计,划,是,一,种,冒,险,的,。,刚,开,始,旅,游,的,时,候,，,碰,到,了,很,多,语,言,上,的,问,题,，,有,的,时,候,连,火,车,票,也,不,能,买,了,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,R-LC,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-CC,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,R-DEG,C-P,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,R-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-SP,C-PU
如,果,我,们,只,吃,这,些,绿,色,食,品,，,恐,怕,有,些,病,就,消,失,。,但,如,果,只,生,产,绿,色,食,品,，,这,就,收,作,物,可,少,了,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-M,C-NN,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-PN,S-AD,S-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
以,前,的,生,活,是,农,业,为,主,的,社,会,，,所,以,家,里,需,要,很,多,人,，,平,均,三,代,甚,至,四,代,的,家,旅,员,一,起,生,活,了,。,这,样,的,情,况,下,，,人,们,自,然,地,体,会,到,上,下,辈,之,间,的,交,流,方,式,。,但,是,现,在,这,样,的,大,家,庭,很,难,找,到,，,规,模,越,来,越,小,，,经,验,对,方,时,代,的,生,活,方,式,，,思,想,等,的,机,会,自,然,小,了,一,些,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,M-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU

总,之,，,为,了,大,家,的,健,康,，,我,们,应,该,宣,传,吸,烟,的,危,害,，,政,府,应,该,采,取,关,于,戒,烟,的,措,施,，,如,扩,大,禁,止,吸,烟,地,区,等,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-P,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-PU
他,们,还,在,长,生,的,过,程,中,，,如,果,从,年,轻,开,始,影,响,吸,烟,，,就,不,好,了,。,因,此,，,我,认,为,国,家,政,府,对,吸,烟,者,开,始,严,厉,的,惩,罚,措,施,是,对,的,。,吸,烟,者,不,该,害,别,人,的,健,康,。,他,们,没,有,资,格,害,人,的,身,体,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-P,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,W-VV,W-VV,M-VV,W-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,M-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
“,安,乐,死,”,如,果,从,丈,夫,的,角,度,来,分,析,，,丈,夫,的,所,作,所,为,是,确,实,，,他,只,是,不,想,看,妻,子,的,痛,苦,而,这,样,做,，,也,是,完,成,她,妻,子,的,心,愿,。,但,我,们,不,可,以,采,取,别,的,方,法,，,例,如,妻,子,可,以,到,医,院,去,问,医,生,有,没,有,可,以,减,少,痛,苦,的,药,。,或,者,妻,子,也,要,振,作,一,点,找,好,的,方,法,去,解,决,，,不,要,只,考,虑,自,杀,就,能,了,结,自,己,的,心,愿,，,而,且,伤,害,到,自,己,的,亲,人,。	C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-AD,S-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-AD,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

据,说,，,我,们,选,的,路,线,是,最,艰,难,的,，,但,我,们,很,有,信,心,过,这,一,难,关,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

”,我,认,为,虽,然,年,龄,不,少,，,可,是,他,很,努,力,跟,上,社,会,的,发,展,。,还,有,我,跟,小,小,学,说,话,的,时,候,，,他,们,经,跟,我,问,在,电,脑,上,玩,的,游,戏,。	C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,S-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-P,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,S-P,S-PN,S-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

”,我,不,能,回,答,考,不,上,的,事,。	C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU
我,知,道,，,被,吸,烟,者,比,吸,烟,者,的,害,处,更,厉,害,。,比,如,，,在,你,的,家,庭,有,人,吸,烟,，,在,旁,边,坐,的,不,抽,烟,的,人,受,到,的,害,更,严,重,了,。,这,样,偶,然,的,话,还,好,可,在,家,里,每,天,不,免,碰,到,不,抽,的,家,里,人,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-LB,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-VA,S-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,M-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,R-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-VA,S-VA,M-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,C-VV,M-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
在,庙,里,先,只,有,一,个,和,尚,，,他,只,好,自,己,去,山,下,挑,水,喝,，,后,来,和,尚,多,，,谁,都,不,愿,意,去,干,，,结,果,没,有,水,喝,了,。,这,故,事,意,味,着,假,如,有,别,人,就,想,依,靠,的,别,人,人,的,一,种,心,理,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-CS,C-CS,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
现,在,在,世,界,上,，,国,与,国,之,间,的,交,流,很,多,，,人,与,东,西,的,往,来,都,非,常,多,，,更,多,的,是,信,息,的,来,往,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU,C-NN,C-CC,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
政,府,马,上,提,出,一,条,法,律,，,犯,罪,的,人,被,罚,款,。,第,二,，,升,上,香,烟,的,价,格,。,现,在,在,欧,美,等,发,展,国,家,把,香,烟,的,价,格,越,来,越,高,。	C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-CD,C-M,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,M-SB,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,R-ETC,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
因,为,每,个,年,龄,代,的,人,经,历,的,经,验,、,生,活,的,条,件,、,每,个,家,庭,情,况,、,各,个,时,代,社,会,情,况,都,不,一,样,，,所,以,人,们,的,行,为,方,式,、,生,活,态,度,以,及,价,值,观,念,都,不,一,样,。	C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,S-NN,S-NN,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
但,是,为,了,自,己,而,大,家,的,健,康,，,这,样,的,现,象,应,该,坚,持,下,去,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,S-MSP,C-JJ,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
我,对,“,绿,色,食,品,”,的,看,法,是,先,应,该,解,决,人,们,的,温,饱,问,题,，,然,后,再,考,虑,使,用,不,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,来,生,产,粮,食,。,因,为,对,挨,饿,的,面,前,，,提,倡,搞,“,绿,色,食,品,”,是,没,用,的,。,还,是,按,老,百,姓,的,方,面,来,考,虑,处,理,问,题,是,对,的,。	C-PN,C-P,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,W-AD,W-VV,W-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,S-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
国,家,之,间,的,经,济,水,平,的,差,也,越,来,越,高,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VA,C-PU
为,了,很,快,研,究,出,这,种,技,术,，,各,个,国,家,应,该,多,投,资,这,种,研,究,。,不,过,，,现,在,很,多,国,光,顾,自,己,国,家,的,经,济,发,展,。,我,觉,得,应,该,世,界,各,个,国,家,先,关,心,这,个,方,面,，,然,后,为,了,解,决,这,种,情,况,，,增,加,努,力,合,作,研,究,新,技,术,。	C-P,C-P,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-CD,C-CD,S-NN,C-NN,C-VV,M-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,W-DT,W-DT,W-NN,W-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,R-VV,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

去,青,岛,是,没,办,法,的,一,次,“,度,假,”,理,所,当,然,心,情,就,不,那,么,的,好,。	C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-VC,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VA,C-PU

对,经,常,吸,烟,的,人,来,说,，,“,在,公,共,场,所,边,走,边,抽,烟,的,人,将,被,罚,款,”,的,这,个,消,息,是,很,严,格,的,，,而,是,太,过,分,的,事,。	C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-SB,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DEC,C-DT,C-DT,S-NN,S-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,R-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU
吃,过,丰,富,的,晚,饭,后,，,我,们,一,家,人,就,坐,在,饭,厅,里,长,谈,直,到,深,夜,。	C-VV,C-AS,S-VA,S-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

有,一,些,科,学,家,说,被,动,吸,烟,比,吸,烟,不,好,，,吸,烟,的,人,不,应,该,在,公,共,场,所,随,便,吸,烟,。,我,真,不,明,白,的,是,吸,烟,是,对,身,体,不,好,的,，,但,有,时,候,在,电,视,里,出,现,烟,的,广,告,，,有,的,时,候,不,让,人,们,吸,烟,内,容,的,公,益,广,告,。	C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,S-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,根,本,原,因,因,为,食,品,的,分,配,不,合,理,造,成,的,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,M-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
我,之,所,以,这,么,说,是,因,为,吸,烟,者,自,己,本,身,做,了,一,个,选,择,，,他,们,选,择,吸,烟,，,也,知,道,这,项,选,择,可,能,会,造,成,对,他,们,身,体,健,康,不,良,的,影,响,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-P,W-PN,W-PN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,也,在,公,共,场,所,，,如,果,有,人,所,边,走,边,抽,烟,的,话,，,一,定,会,很,讨,厌,。	C-PN,C-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,R-MSP,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

可,是,，,另,一,方,面,，,世,界,贫,困,地,区,的,人,们,连,菜,都,没,有,，,只,一,天,死,几,亿,人,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-PU,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,M-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-PU
另,外,，,我,还,没,找,到,我,的,对,象,。,但,是,，,我,已,经,懂,事,，,所,以,我,一,定,要,找,到,对,我,适,合,的,男,朋,友,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-PN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-P,W-PN,W-VV,W-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
烟,民,无,论,知,道,吸,烟,对,身,体,有,害,健,康,，,为,什,么,还,抽,烟,呢,？,就,这,个,问,题,很,明,确,。,吸,烟,时,的,烟,里,含,着,尼,古,丁,，,它,让,人,上,瘾,。	C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,R-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,R-VV,R-VV,R-LC,R-DEG,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
要,过,很,长,时,间,以,来,才,能,取,成,功,的,。	M-VV,C-AS,C-AD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,S-LC,S-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU

爸,爸,不,要,担,心,×,×,，,我,会,如,同,你,们,照,顾,她,一,样,的,保,护,她,，,爱,她,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VA,C-VA,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU
由,于,有,伤,所,以,不,会,自,己,干,的,话,，,可,以,别,人,的,帮,助,下,施,行,。,但,是,应,该,注,意,一,点,：,自,杀,之,前,一,定,把,自,己,的,想,法,和,施,行,的,人,不,是,故,意,的,这,种,事,情,写,在,发,誓,书,上,，,签,名,。,不,然,跟,这,个,文,章,的,丈,夫,一,样,以,后,让,别,人,怀,疑,。	C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,M-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,M-BA,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-NN,M-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

我,们,可,以,从,两,方,面,减,少,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,生,产,的,农,作,物,对,人,体,的,有,害,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU

他,们,自,然,而,然,会,害,羞,而,不,会,再,犯,过,错,。,只,有,这,样,做,才,能,令,随,地,吐,东,西,的,人,改,过,自,新,不,再,犯,过,错,。,这,么,一,来,国,家,一,年,就,可,以,节,省,了,很,多,清,理,费,，,国,家,才,会,成,为,一,个,文,明,的,国,家,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
去,年,，,在,美,国,纽,约,施,行,同,样,措,施,，,它,里,面,规,定,在,纽,约,市,内,公,共,场,所,（,包,括,餐,厅,、,酒,吧,等,饮,食,场,所,）,全,面,禁,烟,。,在,欧,洲,某,一,个,国,家,也,施,行,同,样,措,施,，,它,里,面,也,规,定,在,公,共,场,所,全,面,禁,止,，,所,以,现,在,我,们,在,该,国,家,看,不,到,当,地,人,在,酒,吧,里,一,边,看,球,一,边,抽,烟,的,景,色,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,M-JJ,C-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-DT,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-JJ,C-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
健,康,对,大,多,数,人,是,非,常,重,要,的,。	C-VA,C-VA,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,M-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
被,验,人,只,要,那,个,房,间,里,睡,大,觉,。,几,个,小,时,，,他,过,得,好,轻,松,，,不,过,，,过,了,半,天,，,他,觉,得,很,不,舒,服,，,就,会,疯,狂,了,。	C-LB,C-VV,C-NN,C-CS,R-CS,M-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,M-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-DER,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-SP,C-PU

随,着,科,学,发,展,提,高,，,我,国,科,学,家,也,提,过,，,自,然,环,境,的,确,是,个,人,生,的,生,活,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,S-VC,S-NN,S-NN,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,前,几,天,在,上,网,看,报,纸,的,时,候,看,过,一,个,关,于,一,个,明,星,人,的,善,行,的,内,容,，,她,是,一,名,歌,手,，,她,以,前,也,帮,助,过,孤,儿,当,了,他,们,的,姐,姐,，,还,这,次,她,又,决,定,帮,助,南,非,洲,的,一,个,女,孩,子,。,因,为,是,战,争,父,母,都,失,去,了,以,后,那,个,女,孩,儿,来,养,她,的,弟,弟,听,起,来,觉,得,很,难,帮,她,似,的,但,是,你,有,心,意,帮,她,们,就,很,容,易,，,一,个,月,送,她,一,点,的,钱,，,有,时,间,写,信,等,等,那,些,钱,也,是,一,个,月,只,是,两,百,块,左,右,的,。	C-PN,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-P,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,R-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-LC,C-LC,C-DT,C-DT,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
长,辈,常,常,认,为,下,一,辈,的,人,没,有,礼,貌,，,不,听,话,，,反,而,晚,辈,认,为,上,一,辈,的,人,总,是,很,顽,固,。,因,为,不,同,世,代,的,人,们,之,间,常,常,发,生,这,样,的,现,象,，,所,以,我,们,有,解,决,这,个,问,题,的,必,要,性,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-P,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
虽,然,，,我,意,识,到,这,种,食,品,对,人,的,身,体,有,害,，,但,是,，,为,了,满,足,现,在,世,界,上,几,亿,人,缺,少,粮,食,而,挨,饿,，,我,们,不,得,不,用,化,肥,和,农,药,来,生,长,食,物,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-P,S-VV,S-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
第,一,，,我,们,要,积,极,开,发,对,身,体,、,环,境,影,响,少,的,农,药,和,化,肥,，,并,推,动,他,的,使,用,。,第,二,，,要,提,高,农,民,的,对,农,药,、,化,肥,的,意,识,，,因,为,有,的,农,民,只,顾,经,济,效,率,、,不,顾,使,用,以,后,的,后,果,。,还,有,最,重,要,的,事,，,化,肥,、,农,药,的,质,量,方,面,，,使,用,方,面,制,定,一,个,法,来,给,他,的,生,产,企,业,和,农,民,进,行,比,较,强,制,性,的,控,制,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,S-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-MSP,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,R-AD,R-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
为,我,们,的,后,代,，,农,业,从,事,者,和,科,学,家,一,起,合,作,把,我,们,的,社,会,变,成,更,好,的,社,会,。	S-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-BA,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

妈,出,院,后,，,领,导,老,人,家,就,开,始,向,妈,“,报,告,”,，,但,我,很,幸,运,，,继,母,并,不,像,别,人,所,说,的,会,虐,待,继,子,，,相,反,，,她,老,人,家,开,始,接,近,我,，,辅,导,我,、,培,植,我,。	C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PU

家,长,们,不,应,自,己,家,长,的,身,份,去,破,坏,孩,子,们,的,人,生,。,谁,有,有,爱,和,被,爱,的,权,力,，,就,连,学,生,也,应,有,这,样,的,权,力,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,M-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,R-VV,C-VE,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
在,学,校,里,彻,底,地,告,诉,她,们,女,子,最,需,要,的,是,品,德,，,所,以,她,们,学,作,法,和,传,统,的,礼,仪,等,等,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VA,S-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-CC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU
不,能,因,饥,饿,而,曲,折,，,要,努,力,开,发,，,为,社,会,做,贡,献,。	C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,S-VA,S-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
总,之,，,代,沟,问,题,呢,，,通,过,我,所,说,的,方,式,来,的,话,并,不,是,难,为,的,。,“,对,话,”,这,就,是,关,健,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,M-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-PN,R-AD,C-VC,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-PU

我,觉,得,男,女,分,班,无,论,对,男,生,或,对,女,生,都,有,极,大,的,益,处,，,因,为,我,也,是,自,幼,在,男,女,合,班,的,情,况,下,学,习,的,，,男,女,合,班,会,造,成,很,多,不,必,要,的,麻,烦,，,比,如,说,，,觉,得,早,恋,，,女,生,早,孕,，,男,女,乱,伦,等,种,种,麻,烦,。,因,为,我,曾,经,听,说,中,国,大,陆,有,多,名,女,因,为,男,女,合,班,的,情,况,下,和,男,生,有,过,乱,伦,，,所,造,成,不,可,收,拾,的,严,重,后,果,，,我,也,相,信,这,样,的,事,件,在,异,国,异,岛,也,有,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,R-VV,R-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-P,R-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,S-CD,S-M,C-JJ,S-P,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-PU
每,个,人,都,是,一,样,的,，,谁,也,没,有,跟,谁,差,别,，,无,论,男,还,是,女,都,一,样,。,如,果,进,行,了,男,女,分,班,，,当,然,有,男,女,分,别,、,男,女,不,平,等,等,问,题,。,我,们,应,让,他,们,在,同,班,学,习,，,教,他,们,互,相,帮,助,，,而,不,分,别,男,女,。,目,前,，,孩,子,们,就,有,这,样,男,女,分,别,的,想,法,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-P,W-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,S-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,C-VE,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-AD,C-DEV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
但,好,好,想,一,想,，,边,走,边,吸,烟,多,么,危,险,呢,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,R-SP,C-PU
私,己,主,义,，,就,很,难,解,决,。	S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

虽,然,每,个,人,的,欲,望,不,同,而,它,的,程,度,也,不,同,，,但,我,想,世,界,上,没,有,一,个,人,没,有,欲,望,的,。,大,家,想,做,自,己,想,做,的,事,，,谁,都,不,愿,意,做,麻,烦,的,事,，,像,这,文,章,里,的,举,子,也,一,样,，,但,要,注,意,的,一,点,是,他,那,个,和,尚,平,时,一,个,人,在,山,上,时,自,己,去,下,山,挑,水,，,不,知,他,对,这,个,挑,水,是,否,觉,得,麻,烦,，,而,如,果,有,那,种,感,觉,的,话,是,什,么,样,程,度,，,但,他,一,个,人,去,挑,水,与,跟,别,人,一,起,去,挑,水,时,一,定,有,不,同,的,感,觉,，,还,有,人,太,多,时,候,也,有,不,同,的,感,觉,。,我,想,人,一,个,人,时,没,有,依,靠,的,东,西,，,不,想,做,的,事,也,要,做,，,没,有,其,他,人,就,没,办,法,了,，,然,后,人,有,了,几,个,人,可,以,合,作,，,可,以,一,起,做,事,，,那,时,有,协,调,的,感,觉,，,能,考,虑,到,别,人,的,心,里,，,为,了,别,人,自,己,做,麻,烦,的,活,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-MSP,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,R-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,S-NN,S-AD,R-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-VC,C-PN,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-VE,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,S-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-CD,M-CD,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,R-VE,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU

这,种,行,为,不,仅,对,市,容,整,洁,不,利,而,且,有,可,能,发,生,火,灾,的,隐,患,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,C-CC,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEC,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU
我,读,这,篇,文,章,后,，,想,到,了,目,前,人,们,开,始,关,注,的,天,然,资,源,有,限,的,问,题,。	C-PN,C-VV,M-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
改,善,化,肥,和,农,药,，,产,生,对,人,体,无,害,的,粮,食,，,这,就,是,未,来,的,科,技,化,农,业,。,在,这,样,的,科,技,发,展,中,及,能,完,全,避,免,化,学,的,污,染,。,这,是,并,不,分,割,的,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-VV,S-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,R-CC,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,S-AD,S-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-SP,C-PU
因,为,第,一,：,人,们,都,知,道,人,的,至,少,的,权,利,是,什,么,呀,？	C-P,C-P,C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,S-AD,S-AD,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-SP,C-PU
随,着,时,代,的,推,移,、,经,济,生,活,的,不,断,发,展,，,人,类,所,面,临,的,生,活,节,奏,越,来,越,快,，,仿,佛,在,某,种,机,械,里,不,停,的,运,转,，,还,有,人,在,旁,边,计,时,的,感,觉,，,从,这,个,角,度,来,说,，,许,多,人,为,了,摆,脱,这,种,压,力,而,走,向,“,死,亡,之,路,”,是,无,可,厚,非,的,。	C-P,C-P,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
看,很,多,书,若,不,加,于,思,考,，,你,会,觉,得,看,了,很,多,书,，,且,有,满,腹,诗,书,的,自,豪,感,。,但,在,看,书,的,同,时,加,以,思,考,，,才,会,觉,得,自,己,看,的,书,并,多,，,多,只,在,于,数,量,而,不,在,于,质,量,。,所,以,，,有,效,的,阅,读,则,应,以,不,断,的,思,考,。	C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-CS,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,M-VA,C-PU,C-AD,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,C-VV,S-P,C-VA,C-VA,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
那,事,以,后,父,亲,不,做,游,泳,了,。,知,道,这,事,以,前,我,不,了,解,他,了,热,的,时,候,为,什,么,不,去,游,泳,池,了,。,以,前,想,他,的,教,观,特,别,不,好,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-P,C-JJ,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,R-AS,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-SP,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

您,俩,特,别,是,母,亲,对,我,的,就,业,问,题,太,担,心,着,呢,。	C-PN,C-CD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU
所,以,“,安,乐,死,”,这,个,问,题,的,解,决,方,法,只,有,一,个,，,要,自,杀,的,本,身,和,他,家,族,以,外,还,要,第,三,者,的,证,言,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,S-DEC,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-OD,C-OD,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,此,，,当,我,和,妹,妹,与,父,母,说,话,时,并,无,须,说,完,整,的,汉,话,。,只,要,有,任,何,词,我,们,想,不,起,来,，,我,们,很,自,然,地,便,会,用,英,语,或,广,东,语,来,代,替,原,本,想,要,表,达,的,意,思,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,R-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,印,象,最,深,的,假,期,是,高,中,生,的,那,三,年,。	C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,R-DEG,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,M-PU
别,说,中,长,年,男,人,，,甚,至,青,少,年,和,女,人,的,吸,烟,率,也,快,速,增,加,。,他,们,为,了,消,除,在,工,作,方,面,或,生,活,方,面,的,苦,闷,而,抽,烟,，,或,者,有,些,人,从,小,时,候,开,始,吸,烟,，,已,习,惯,了,只,好,继,续,抽,烟,。,但,如,今,，,从,很,多,研,究,结,果,表,明,：,吸,烟,对,个,人,健,康,和,公,众,利,益,没,有,好,处,。	C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,R-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

以,上,是,我,对,阅,读,有,关,书,籍,的,选,择,问,题,，,不,至,于,让,时,间,流,于,无,意,义,的,阅,读,上,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VC,C-PN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU

作,家,是,德,国,人,，,一,位,有,名,的,心,理,学,家,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-PU,M-CD,C-M,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
按,着,文,章,的,两,个,不,同,的,情,况,，,我,有,两,个,看,法,。	S-VV,S-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
另,一,篇,散,文,《,上,海,人,》,写,出,了,“,上,海,人,”,，,这,个,在,中,国,近,代,史,上,扮,演,了,一,个,先,驱,者,的,角,色,，,作,者,认,为,第,一,个,上,海,人,为,徐,光,启,，,徐,光,启,生,在,明,代,，,虽,然,已,作,了,官,，,但,他,并,不,排,斥,西,方,传,入,之,宗,教,、,科,学,、,算,术,、,历,法,及,天,文,知,识,。	C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,R-PN,R-PN,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NR,C-NR,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
在,我,们,目,前,的,社,会,上,，,学,校,已,成,为,每,个,人,的,必,经,之,路,了,。	C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
但,是,这,代,沟,问,题,一,定,需,要,解,决,，,就,有,很,幸,福,和,美,和,的,家,庭,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,S-VA,S-CC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,为,许,多,人,同,意,安,乐,死,，,所,以,说,起,安,乐,死,，,几,乎,把,全,国,成,为,两,半,，,社,会,就,议,论,纷,纷,。	C-P,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
很,多,人,对,运,动,员,的,高,收,入,不,理,解,，,有,意,见,，,那,么,，,我,本,人,的,想,法,到,底,是,什,么,？,我,认,为,运,动,是,一,件,非,常,不,容,易,的,事,，,运,动,员,的,生,活,是,非,常,艰,苦,的,，,他,们,从,小,就,开,始,段,练,。	C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,M-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-M,S-VV,C-PU
”,这,种,说,话,，,真,出,乎,意,料,的,。,他,说,我,从,来,没,照,顾,父,母,和,弟,弟,，,还,有,生,病,的,奶,奶,。	C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
发,达,国,家,已,经,有,这,样,情,况,，,我,希,望,不,久,中,国,也,会,实,现,这,样,情,况,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU
所,以,这,样,看,来,，,沟,代,的,问,题,是,当,然,的,现,象,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-NN,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

有,效,阅,读,都,带,给,我,们,不,管,在,生,活,上,、,学,习,上,很,大,的,影,响,及,帮,助,，,我,觉,得,我,应,该,保,持,爱,阅,读,的,好,习,惯,，,也,希,望,大,家,也,会,如,我,同,感,。	W-AD,W-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-AD,W-VV,W-P,W-PN,W-PN,W-AD,W-AD,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-PU,W-NN,W-NN,W-LC,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,R-VV,S-P,C-PN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU

庙,里,的,水,缸,没,有,了,水,已,然,过,了,三,天,，,大,家,渴,死,了,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-AS,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,M-VA,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU
人,类,是,最,重,的,因,素,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,S-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
快,乐,的,时,间,已,经,过,去,了,，,我,回,到,上,海,已,经,过,了,一,段,时,间,，,但,是,我,一,辈,子,不,会,忘,记,那,天,的,美,好,的,时,刻,。,我,体,验,的,潜,水,，,使,我,理,解,人,间,和,动,物,之,间,的,关,系,而,会,体,会,到,大,自,然,。,如,果,有,机,会,，,我,一,定,要,去,潜,水,，,再,解,放,自,己,。	C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,C-AD,R-VV,W-AS,W-CD,W-M,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,M-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU

一,个,原,因,是,声,音,的,对,人,家,的,效,果,。	C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-P,S-NN,S-NN,M-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
可,是,，,自,从,工,业,化,以,来,，,这,样,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,是,虽,然,增,加,了,农,业,生,产,量,，,但,是,不,仅,污,染,土,地,和,水,质,，,而,且,威,胁,人,们,的,健,康,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,R-VC,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
当,时,我,要,学,汉,语,的,目,的,是,交,新,朋,友,，,把,自,己,的,生,活,变,有,意,思,一,点,，,方,便,一,点,。,后,来,，,随,着,我,汉,语,水,平,的,提,高,，,我,对,中,国,人,和,中,国,的,民,俗,的,兴,趣,越,来,越,大,，,所,以,我,现,在,要,学,汉,语,的,目,的,不,仅,是,交,更,多,的,朋,友,或,者,去,买,东,西,方,便,一,点,，,而,是,我,要,更,深,入,地,了,解,中,国,，,汉,语,水,平,高,的,话,对,工,作,有,利,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-BA,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,M-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-NN,C-VA,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-CC,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-AD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-VA,C-VA,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-VA,C-VA,C-PU
总,之,，,我,认,为,这,个,世,界,是,不,管,穷,人,还,是,富,人,都,共,同,生,存,创,造,下,去,的,地,方,，,所,以,首,先,要,求,每,个,人,吃,饱,，,再,用,多,余,的,粮,食,和,时,间,去,生,产,“,绿,色,食,品,”,来,满,足,需,求,的,人,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU
结,果,造,成,误,会,，,不,得,不,互,相,感,情,不,好,，,互,相,不,能,了,解,甚,至,打,架,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-AD,R-AD,R-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

还,有,我,汉,语,的,目,的,，,那,是,我,想,跟,中,国,朋,友,一,起,聊,天,。,我,有,一,个,中,国,朋,友,，,我,和,他,刚,刚,认,识,的,时,候,，,两,个,人,都,没,有,沟,通,。,后,来,我,开,始,学,汉,语,，,现,在,我,说,的,汉,语,一,点,进,步,了,，,所,以,现,在,我,们,能,沟,通,。,还,有,一,个,我,学,汉,语,的,理,由,，,那,是,我,想,跟,所,有,的,中,国,人,一,起,说,话,。,因,为,如,果,我,能,跟,所,有,的,中,国,人,一,起,说,话,的,话,，,很,容,易,理,解,中,国,的,情,况,、,新,闻,等,等,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,M-VC,C-PN,C-VV,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-AD,S-VE,S-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,W-AD,W-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-CD,C-CD,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,M-VC,C-PN,C-VV,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-VV,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU

人,类,吃,了,这,样,的,产,品,，,越,来,越,对,身,体,有,影,响,了,。,反,正,现,代,人,很,想,吃,绿,色,食,品,可,是,这,种,的,东,西,产,量,很,少,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU

如,果,不,解,决,这,个,，,尤,其,是,“,吃,”,问,题,，,那,么,引,起,严,重,的,后,果,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-PU,C-VV,C-PU,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

这,天,北,京,天,气,特,别,冷,，,一,直,在,上,海,生,活,的,我,真,受,不,了,，,因,此,吃,热,一,点,东,西,才,能,活,动,。,第,二,天,去,长,城,。,俗,话,说,“,不,到,长,城,非,好,汉,”,，,有,的,朋,友,以,前,开,玩,笑,得,说,“,你,还,没,去,过,长,城,！	C-PN,C-PN,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,C-CD,C-M,M-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-VV,M-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU
总,而,言,之,，,男,女,分,班,不,该,实,行,因,为,它,在,存,在,许,多,好,处,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-PN,R-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
我,看,过,有,一,个,因,很,长,时,间,吸,烟,而,终,于,死,亡,的,人,。	C-PN,S-VV,C-AS,R-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-P,C-AD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU
来,中,国,之,前,，,我,学,过,汉,语,，,这,是,必,要,说,的,，,因,为,在,本,国,学,习,汉,语,的,机,会,没,有,。,我,不,是,特,意,来,中,国,学,汉,，,我,的,夫,人,来,中,国,上,班,所,以,我,们,一,起,到,中,国,来,。,到,中,国,之,后,我,没,找,到,比,较,方,便,的,工,作,，,主,要,的,原,因,因,为,我,不,会,说,汉,语,，,也,不,认,认,汉,字,。	C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,W-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,W-DEC,W-NN,W-NN,W-AD,W-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NR,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-PU,M-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-LC,C-LC,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,S-VA,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,R-P,C-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,C-NN,C-PU
那,么,变,成,我,们,没,有,吃,的,东,西,。	C-AD,C-AD,R-VV,R-VV,C-PN,C-PN,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,认,为,，,吸,烟,不,仅,对,个,人,起,到,很,大,的,影,响,，,而,且,对,公,众,利,益,的,影,响,也,同,样,是,很,大,的,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
我,在,中,学,的,时,候,，,我,的,班,是,男,女,混,班,的,，,没,分,什,么,性,别,的,。,我,提,出,我,在,中,学,读,书,的,那,个,时,候,是,因,为,我,觉,得,跟,男,生,一,起,读,书,也,有,好,处,。,因,为,世,界,上,不,是,只,有,一,个,性,别,，,人,在,社,会,应,该,互,相,学,习,和,了,解,对,方,的,性,别,。,我,理,解,家,长,们,想,让,孩,子,进,去,分,性,别,的,学,校,，,就,是,怕,自,己,的,孩,子,早,恋,。	C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,R-SP,C-PU,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,S-PN,S-PN,S-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU
去,年,五,·,一,节,的,时,候,，,我,用,了,一,个,星,期,的,时,间,去,过,北,京,旅,游,了,。,我,是,跟,一,个,朋,友,去,北,京,的,，,但,在,北,京,偶,然,遇,到,了,几,个,朋,友,，,因,此,跟,他,们,去,过,了,很,多,地,方,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,R-AS,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,R-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
最,重,要,的,是,互,相,理,解,，,互,相,帮,助,的,。,如,我,先,进,行,听,老,人,的,话,，,晚,辈,会,听,我,的,话,。,如,我,先,要,理,解,晚,辈,，,他,们,会,理,解,我,。	C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,R-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU

虽,然,是,一,种,传,统,，,但,是,我,认,为,在,公,共,场,所,放,弃,抽,烟,不,算,一,个,那,么,大,的,要,求,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,S-AD,S-AD,S-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
绿,色,食,品,生,产,量,的,问,题,是,不,是,很,大,的,。,十,分,利,用,现,在,的,高,科,技,可,以,做,良,好,的,种,子,，,也,可,以,发,明,自,然,性,的,化,肥,。	C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-VC,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
可,是,现,在,我,想,还,是,当,时,我,该,当,老,师,，,因,为,通,过,这,个,经,验,，,我,得,了,很,多,利,益,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,W-VV,W-AD,W-VC,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,S-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-PN,S-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
我,被,闹,鬼,。,但,妈,解,释,道,：,不,是,闹,鬼,，,而,是,妈,在,厨,房,里,晒,衣,服,，,忘,记,收,这,衣,服,。,那,沙,沙,声,就,是,衣,服,被,风,吹,时,响,来,的,。	C-PN,C-SB,W-VV,W-VV,M-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-SB,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,S-VV,S-VV,S-SP,C-PU
不,是,说,“,绿,色,食,品,”,对,人,类,来,说,是,个,不,需,要,的,东,西,，,但,是,对,挨,饿,的,几,亿,人,来,说,明,明,是,不,需,要,的,东,西,。	C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VC,C-M,C-JJ,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,S-AD,S-AD,C-DEV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
现,在,，,我,来,北,京,以,后,已,经,三,年,多,了,。,这,三,年,中,，,我,对,中,国,的,历,史,文,化,以,及,各,个,方,面,的,知,识,比,过,去,更,深,。,我,学,汉,语,不,仅,了,解,中,国,的,文,化,历,史,，,我,认,为,将,来,汉,语,在,各,个,方,面,有,很,大,的,好,处,这,是,对,自,己,，,自,己,的,未,来,带,来,很,大,的,利,益,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,R-LC,R-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-SP,C-PU,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,M-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,M-VE,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-VC,S-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
不,只,是,在,中,国,流,行,过,这,种,未,经,济,污,染,的,农,产,品,加,工,食,品,的,绿,色,食,品,，,在,世,界,上,的,国,家,流,行,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,M-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,们,有,时,间,和,余,地,考,虑,绿,色,食,品,，,那,一,定,有,余,地,考,虑,帮,助,别,的,国,家,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,代,表,我,们,生,活,条,件,的,限,制,，,即,要,付,出,功,夫,去,达,到,目,的,。,第,一,个,和,尚,当,另,一,个,和,尚,来,挑,水,时,合,作,抬,水,喝,，,但,后,来,第,三,个,和,尚,来,临,时,有,了,偷,懒,的,想,法,，,希,望,别,的,人,替,他,去,挑,水,，,却,没,有,想,办,法,轮,着,去,，,于,是,，,人,多,了,，,反,而,没,有,水,喝,了,。,这,是,在,人,类,生,活,中,常,发,生,的,事,情,，,我,认,为,每,个,人,在,条,件,不,允,许,的,情,况,下,还,是,做,一,些,努,力,试,图,克,服,面,前,的,难,题,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,R-VV,R-VV,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-VA,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VC,M-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

童,年,时,期,，,每,天,我,和,好,朋,友,步,行,十,里,路,到,镇,上,唯,一,的,学,校,去,上,课,，,下,放,后,我,们,不,必,急,着,赶,回,家,，,有,时,到,山,丘,野,花,，,有,时,去,小,河,捉,小,鱼,。,到,了,春,天,的,时,节,，,利,用,星,期,天,的,休,息,日,，,爸,妈,带,领,我,们,四,姐,弟,去,踏,青,，,那,时,我,们,都,兴,奋,极,了,，,争,先,恐,后,地,往,山,顶,跑,，,看,谁,是,第,一,名,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-CC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-VV,S-VV,C-LC,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-VC,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-PU
