这,三,个,和,尚,谁,也,不,想,去,山,下,抬,水,，,大,家,都,希,望,别,人,去,山,下,抬,水,，,大,家,都,很,渴,了,，,不,过,谁,也,不,敢,说,想,喝,水,这,种,话,，,他,们,三,个,人,都,觉,得,去,山,下,抬,水,这,项,工,作,让,人,很,累,，,他,们,庙,里,一,共,有,三,个,人,除,了,自,己,，,另,两,个,人,抬,水,去,就,行,了,，,大,家,这,么,想,。,真,是,太,懒,的,和,尚,！	C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,S-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

所,以,，,日,本,等,其,它,国,家,也,渐,渐,的,承,认,“,安,乐,死,”,。,但,是,我,还,是,认,为,丈,夫,亲,自,给,妻,子,动,手,是,不,应,该,的,，,一,来,过,程,不,透,明,，,所,以,很,容,易,导,致,犯,罪,行,为,；,二,来,从,人,道,主,义,的,角,度,来,说,也,是,的,。,因,此,如,果,必,须,只,好,选,择,“,安,乐,死,”,的,时,候,，,我,们,必,须,具,备,以,下,二,个,条,件,：,一,是,必,须,得,到,患,者,的,同,意,以,免,发,生,犯,罪,行,为,；,二,是,必,须,按,照,法,律,所,规,定,的,办,法,来,进,行,，,具,体,来,说,在,亲,人,的,陪,同,下,医,生,进,行,“,安,乐,死,”,行,为,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-ETC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,R-AD,R-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-CD,S-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

所,以,单,靠,“,绿,色,食,品,”,是,源,源,不,够,的,。,所,为,“,绿,色,食,品,”,是,未,经,污,染,的,农,产,品,加,工,的,食,品,。,可,是,在,农,作,物,的,生,长,过,程,中,，,如,果,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,，,产,量,是,大,大,提,高,，,但,农,作,物,会,受,到,不,同,程,度,的,化,学,污,染,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,S-AD,S-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,C-MSP,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,们,的,父,母,或,者,爷,爷,奶,奶,比,我,们,过,的,时,间,长,得,多,，,而,且,他,们,的,成,长,过,程,也,是,跟,我,们,不,一,样,。,所,以,连,同,一,件,事,儿,也,互,相,会,有,不,同,的,看,法,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-DER,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,R-VC,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-P,C-P,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,C-VV,C-VE,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,们,学,校,，,抓,吸,烟,喝,酒,管,的,特,别,严,，,可,能,是,我,们,学,校,以,前,发,生,过,什,么,事,，,但,我,总,是,能,看,见,一,些,坏,学,生,在,卫,生,间,里,吸,烟,，,我,也,不,敢,说,什,么,，,他,们,都,比,我,大,，,弄,不,好,会,被,打,。,有,些,学,生,因,抽,烟,被,主,任,、,校,等,被,很,多,老,师,发,现,，,也,给,了,有,大,有,小,的,处,分,，,但,不,知,为,什,么,，,他,们,改,不,了,这,个,习,惯,，,可,能,抽,上,瘾,了,，,戒,不,掉,了,。,还,有,几,个,人,，,因,抽,烟,，,学,习,成,绩,下,降,，,精,神,不,集,中,，,还,有,些,人,，,没,钱,，,但,特,别,想,抽,，,所,以,偷,父,母,的,钱,，,偷,同,学,，,甚,至,老,师,的,钱,也,偷,，,真,是,不,敢,相,信,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-SB,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-SB,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,S-ETC,S-SB,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,S-VE,S-JJ,S-VE,S-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

随,着,人,们,生,活,水,平,的,提,高,，,随,着,人,们,对,食,品,质,量,的,更,高,要,求,，,人,们,开,始,更,加,注,重,别,具,一,格,的,绿,色,食,品,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,W-AD,W-JJ,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
其,次,是,有,养,的,食,品,直,接,对,人,出,现,问,题,。,如,果,一,生,中,就,吃,农,药,养,的,食,品,的,话,，,以,后,健,康,就,有,问,题,。,因,为,这,样,的,食,品,好,好,洗,也,洗,不,了,农,药,，,所,以,吃,洗,没,干,完,的,食,品,的,人,体,内,化,学,成,分,就,越,来,越,多,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,R-VE,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,W-VV,W-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
我,也,还,上,大,学,，,而,且,晚,上,还,有,工,作,，,回,到,家,我,只,能,睡,觉,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
因,为,吸,烟,有,独,特,的,特,点,：,一,个,人,的,吸,烟,给,其,他,的,人,不,好,的,影,响,。,吸,烟,的,人,损,害,健,康,是,当,然,的,，,但,是,只,在,吸,烟,的,人,的,旁,边,也,不,知,不,觉,受,得,吸,烟,的,不,好,的,影,响,。,因,为,发,生,有,害,的,烟,。	C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-DER,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,S-VV,S-VV,M-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU

人,有,东,西,吃,，,肚,子,就,不,会,挨,饿,，,这,样,就,能,保,存,他,生,命,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,R-NN,R-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,刚,开,始,工,作,的,时,候,，,每,天,早,点,儿,来,把,大,家,的,桌,子,擦,了,干,净,，,后,来,来,了,一,个,新,人,，,他,和,我,一,起,擦,了,桌,子,，,洗,了,大,家,的,杯,子,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-MSP,C-BA,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,R-AS,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,R-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,R-AS,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,们,买,“,绿,色,食,品,的,同,时,，,应,该,考,虑,到,非,洲,或,我,们,亚,洲,的,孩,子,每,年,上,千,万,的,数,字,因,饥,饿,而,死,。,综,上,所,述,目,前,的,现,况,，,对,我,们,没,有,经,验,过,饥,饿,的,人,来,说,，,是,一,件,难,以,想,象,的,，,但,是,我,们,不,能,忽,略,他,们,，,固,然,健,康,很,重,要,，,但,是,人,的,生,命,更,重,要,。,我,们,带,着,“,从,我,做,起,”,的,精,神,面,对,这,个,问,题,吧,！	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-CC,C-PN,C-PN,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,M-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-VE,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,W-AD,W-AD,W-NN,W-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
如,何,解,决,代,沟,的,问,题,，,本,人,的,看,法,是,经,常,利,用,假,日,休,息,日,，,父,母,与,子,女,常,出,外,旅,游,，,出,国,也,好,，,国,内,也,好,，,这,是,有,利,于,家,人,团,聚,、,解,，,沟,通,的,途,径,，,这,是,再,好,不,过,的,一,种,方,法,，,父,母,子,女,不,沟,通,的,原,因,也,在,于,很,少,团,圆,在,一,起,叙,叙,心,里,话,。,这,种,方,法,一,旦,实,行,，,可,以,达,到,奏,效,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-NR,S-NR,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-PU

我,认,为,“,有,机,食,品,”,是,比,“,绿,色,食,品,还,进,步,的,概,念,，,如,果,扩,大,普,及,这,一,方,法,，,可,以,完,全,解,决,眼,下,全,球,面,临,的,粮,食,不,足,的,问,题,，,同,时,，,可,减,少,农,药,引,起,的,有,害,性,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VC,C-P,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,R-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

可,是,很,有,意,思,了,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-PU
我,认,为,现,在,世,界,上,几,亿,人,所,面,对,的,饥,饿,问,题,并,不,完,全,是,因,为,农,作,物,的,产,量,低,，,当,中,有,牵,涉,到,其,他,的,因,素,，,例,如,气,候,灾,害,、,战,乱,和,国,家,政,局,动,荡,不,安,等,情,况,，,都,会,带,来,粮,食,短,缺,的,问,题,，,和,食,用,绿,色,食,品,没,有,多,大,关,系,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,R-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-ETC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,们,到,发,明,这,样,“,无,害,化,肥,”,，,只,好,考,虑,下,去,“,绿,色,食,品,”,和,不,挨,饿,两,个,矛,盾,的,问,题,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-PU,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
如,何,解,决,饥,饿,问,题,，,帮,助,在,因,饥,饿,而,死,亡,的,人,，,该,世,界,各,个,国,家,一,起,考,虑,，,快,速,行,动,的,。,我,认,为,国,家,让,各,个,省,、,市,做,个,对,策,，,最,后,让,每,个,市,民,负,责,这,个,问,题,，,从,不,要,乱,做,菜,，,点,菜,，,开,始,为,了,帮,助,饥,饿,人,捐,款,，,等,等,。,还,有,最,重,要,的,是,从,小,时,候,开,始,的,教,育,方,法,，,在,学,校,里,要,教,育,食,物,的,重,要,性,，,拿,爱,心,来,帮,助,困,难,的,人,的,义,务,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,R-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,S-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,R-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-DT,R-DT,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,R-VV,R-VV,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VC,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU

以,前,经,验,了,没,有,喝,水,，,所,以,我,们,重,视,节,约,。	C-NT,C-NT,S-NN,S-NN,C-SP,C-VE,C-VE,W-VV,W-VV,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-PN,S-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

可,是,我,想,这,是,人,云,亦,云,的,，,人,们,应,该,有,自,己,的,个,性,和,主,见,。,有,人,说,吸,烟,在,紧,张,的,时,候,有,很,多,帮,助,。,不,可,，,吸,烟,毕,竟,对,人,体,健,康,不,太,好,因,为,这,样,的,原,因,而,国,家,提,倡,禁,烟,，,这,是,为,了,大,众,和,公,众,利,益,应,当,做,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-SP,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-P,W-VA,W-VA,W-DEC,W-NN,W-NN,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-MSP,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-PN,W-VC,W-P,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-CC,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
代,沟,是,指,两,代,人,之,间,发,生,的,一,种,生,活,、,文,化,等,观,念,差,异,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
长,期,吸,咽,的,人,中,，,有,些,人,有,不,眠,症,，,有,些,人,的,咽,喉,有,了,空,空,的,洞,。,那,些,录,象,提,醒,我,们,，,让,我,们,产,生,警,惕,心,。,我,还,看,到,一,根,烟,引,起,大,规,模,的,灾,难,，,而,且,看,有,的,人,把,烟,扔,到,地,里,的,时,候,，,可,以,知,道,一,根,烟,可,以,对,公,众,利,益,影,响,很,坏,。	M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-AS,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-BA,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,R-VV,R-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
在,韩,国,礼,仪,是,历,史,以,来,非,常,被,人,们,重,视,的,。,所,以,长,辈,对,晚,辈,说,了,一,句,，,晚,辈,就,觉,得,好,像,王,的,命,令,一,样,去,做,的,。	C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-NN,S-NN,S-LC,S-LC,C-AD,C-AD,S-LB,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,M-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-SP,C-PU

对,人,来,说,水,是,不,可,没,有,的,。,如,果,有,一,个,和,尚,不,去,抬,水,，,影,响,到,另,外,两,个,人,的,生,活,，,而,自,己,也,过,得,不,好,。	C-P,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,S-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-SP,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-CC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU

虽,然,说,含,农,药,和,化,肥,的,农,作,物,会,害,于,人,的,健,康,，,但,是,现,代,的,生,活,环,境,中,害,于,人,的,健,康,不,只,是,吃,农,药,还,有,空,气,污,染,等,环,境,。,从,这,个,角,度,来,说,，,为,了,保,护,身,体,健,康,忽,略,大,家,的,生,存,只,重,视,绿,色,食,品,是,不,太,正,确,的,解,决,问,题,。,因,为,要,是,只,做,绿,色,食,品,的,话,，,产,生,量,会,降,低,，,会,供,不,应,求,，,像,这,样,的,情,况,下,一,般,的,市,场,经,济,道,理,来,讲,，,只,有,有,钱,人,会,享,受,到,这,些,好,处,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-VC,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,M-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

你,也,知,道,我,不,像,姐,姐,那,么,让,人,觉,得,亲,切,的,人,嘛,，,可,是,我,对,您,的,爱,情,比,任,何,人,更,深,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,R-DEC,R-NN,R-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,C-VA,C-PU

首,先,，,我,觉,得,多,年,来,男,女,混,合,班,对,我,都,没,有,什,么,反,面,的,影,响,，,亦,對,自,己,的,成,绩,滿,意,。,的,确,，,某,些,时,候,有,些,学,生,会,过,于,希,望,在,异,性,面,前,表,现,自,己,或,经,常,留,意,着,异,性,而,不,集,中,上,课,而,导,致,成,绩,不,理,想,。,但,我,认,为,男,女,混,合,班,能,够,让,学,生,有,更,多,学,习,或,比,较,对,象,，,甚,至,有,锻,炼,学,生,控,制,自,己,思,想,能,力,的,作,用,，,绝,对,可,以,在,学,业,方,面,给,予,学,生,不,同,种,类,的,作,用,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-VV,M-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-CC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-CC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-AD,C-AD,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU

不,过,，,在,生,产,绿,色,农,作,物,的,情,况,上,，,有,很,大,的,问,题,，,它,就,是,绿,色,农,作,物,的,产,量,不,如,用,农,药,的,产,量,。,现,在,世,界,上,的,饥,饿,问,题,也,不,亚,于,环,境,问,题,，,因,此,有,的,人,由,于,缺,少,粮,食,而,挨,饿,的,问,题,而,提,出,先,提,高,该,增,加,农,作,物,产,量,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VE,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,S-P,S-P,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,R-VV,R-VV,W-DT,W-VV,W-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
有,专,门,为,抽,烟,的,人,，,找,到,那,个,地,方,了,就,进,去,抽,，,没,找,到,那,等,到,下,一,站,，,这,谁,也,不,会,麻,烦,谁,，,再,说,市,里,很,干,净,，,对,青,少,年,们,也,不,会,有,很,大,的,印,象,也,不,会,害,谁,，,再,说,这,样,来,看,的,话,谁,也,不,会,被,罚,款,。,总,之,来,说,我,觉,得,在,中,国,在,北,京,上,海,，,广,州,等,这,些,又,大,又,好,的,城,市,提,供,这,样,的,条,件,。	C-VE,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VE,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-SB,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-LC,R-LC,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-ETC,C-DT,C-DT,C-AD,C-VA,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
吸,烟,不,是,给,一,个,人,不,好,的,影,响,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VC,S-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
像,爷,爷,、,奶,奶,那,一,时,代,时,最,重,要,的,问,题,是,温,饱,问,题,。,像,爸,爸,、,妈,妈,那,一,时,代,时,最,重,要,的,问,题,是,小,康,问,题,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DT,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DT,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,样,我,们,的,词,汇,量,就,会,日,渐,的,丰,富,起,来,，,文,化,修,养,就,会,日,益,老,练,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VA,C-VA,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,S-VA,S-VA,C-PU
这,样,想,的,理,由,是,，,为,了,解,决,饥,饿,问,题,，,把,化,肥,和,农,药,一,直,使,用,下,去,的,话,，,那,么,将,来,农,地,的,性,质,一,定,变,坏,。,这,样,的,话,，,一,且,解,决,的,饥,饿,问,题,又,出,来,，,而,且,会,更,复,杂,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VA,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,S-CD,S-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
为,了,现,在,在,这,样,的,情,况,下,的,人,，,法,院,决,定,安,乐,死,规,定,。	C-P,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU
但,是,我,们,一,般,不,参,加,旅,游,团,，,而,背,着,一,个,旅,行,袋,自,己,出,国,旅,游,。,我,们,可,用,的,钱,不,多,，,所,以,为,了,省,钱,住,在,小,小,的,旅,社,、,吃,在,普,通,的,饭,馆,行,在,当,地,人,坐,的,火,车,或,汽,车,。,这,样,旅,游,虽,然,很,辛,苦,，,但,能,得,到,的,东,西,也,有,很,多,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU
“,代,沟,”,的,问,题,，,在,我,的,生,活,上,也,经,常,发,生,过,。,我,对,这,个,问,题,的,看,法,是,如,何,。	C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-VC,S-VA,S-VA,C-PU
如,果,人,们,没,有,粮,食,的,话,，,就,会,导,致,死,亡,的,。,对,此,，,我,们,可,以,看,到,非,洲,的,一,些,国,家,因,此,经,常,造,成,了,国,际,化,问,题,。,人,的,生,命,是,高,贵,的,，,我,还,认,为,吃,绿,色,食,品,的,问,题,就,是,解,决,饥,饿,问,题,以,后,考,虑,到,的,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,M-VV,C-VV,R-VV,C-DEC,C-PU
可,是,有,机,会,我,去,朝,鲜,的,一,个,山,旅,游,。,他,们,就,像,我,们,韩,国,一,人,样,，,有,了,一,种,同,质,感,。,但,世,界,各,国,的,人,都,知,道,朝,鲜,人,民,当,中,好,多,小,孩,儿,、,妇,女,饿,死,他,们,的,的,饥,饿,现,象,特,别,严,重,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-CD,S-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NR,C-NR,C-CD,R-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
但,在,现,在,的,情,况,而,言,，,如,果,想,提,高,食,物,的,生,产,量,，,就,得,用,一,些,化,学,用,品,。	C-AD,S-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
目,前,我,已,当,了,四,个,孩,子,的,爸,爸,了,，,记,得,我,孩,子,小,时,，,每,当,我,带,他,们,逛,百,货,商,店,时,，,替,孩,子,买,玩,具,时,，,看,他,们,满,脸,喜,悦,而,又,天,真,活,泼,之,表,情,，,各,自,选,择,自,己,最,喜,爱,之,玩,具,时,，,情,不,自,禁,回,忆,到,我,童,年,的,生,活,里,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-PU
我,和,我,的,父,母,亲,、,祖,父,母,亲,都,想,得,不,一,样,。	C-PN,C-CC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,S-DER,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
农,作,物,一,半,的,用,有,一,点,的,农,药,，,一,半,自,然,养,成,。,然,后,一,般,人,吃,自,然,养,成,的,，,给,挨,饿,的,人,用,化,肥,的,农,作,物,。	W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-CD,W-CD,W-DEG,C-P,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-P,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
晚,上,，,当,大,家,从,外,面,回,来,，,各,人,都,有,各,人,的,忙,处,，,比,如,：,父,亲,要,完,成,明,天,在,公,司,必,须,用,的,文,件,，,孩,子,们,也,要,做,完,学,校,的,功,课,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-DT,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,认,为,人,生,的,弯,曲,是,无,法,逃,避,的,，,不,管,乐,观,主,义,者,或,悲,观,主,义,者,都,会,遭,到,不,幸,。,不,争,取,将,问,题,或,困,难,解,决,是,不,会,成,功,的,人,生,观,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,R-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU
吸,烟,不,仅,是,自,己,有,影,响,，,而,且,给,他,人,影,响,。,从,个,人,上,来,讲,，,首,先,，,吸,烟,伤,害,个,人,的,健,康,，,经,常,吸,烟,的,人,比,不,吸,烟,的,人,容,易,得,肺,癌,，,尤,其,是,对,女,性,更,不,好,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-LC,C-MSP,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-M,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-P,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DER,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
所,以,这,“,代,沟,”,问,题,是,不,能,避,开,的,，,一,定,要,以,极,积,的,态,度,去,当,面,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-AD,C-VV,S-DEC,S-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,S-SP,S-PU
因,为,吸,烟,对,人,的,健,康,的,危,害,中,，,最,可,怕,的,是,对,下,一,代,的,影,响,。	C-P,C-P,M-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VC,C-P,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,而,人,们,的,知,识,除,在,学,年,龄,还,可,以,从,教,师,受,到,教,诲,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-P,C-P,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
哪,种,叫,健,康,食,品,？,有,很,多,种,类,其,中,以,绿,色,食,品,我,要,谈,谈,。	C-DT,C-M,M-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
”,我,们,一,听,老,师,的,那,句,话,，,觉,得,特,别,难,受,，,小,黑,在,原,来,的,家,时,，,一,位,大,爷,养,它,，,家,里,他,一,个,人,，,当,然,他,不,能,不,关,心,它,，,但,是,来,我,们,班,后,，,虽,然,班,里,有,这,么,多,人,，,但,没,有,一,个,人,一,直,关,心,他,。,最,后,我,们,决,定,每,天,二,个,人,给,它,吃,东,西,。,过,了,两,个,星,期,，,小,黑,跟,原,来,的,样,子,一,样,胖,胖,了,。	C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-JJ,C-NN,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,M-PN,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,S-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-NN,C-CC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,S-SP,C-PU
因,此,任,何,人,均,都,没,有,把,自,己,的,生,命,亲,手,来,结,束,的,权,利,，,而,更,没,有,把,自,己,的,生,命,委,托,别,人,来,结,束,的,权,力,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-BA,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-BA,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,点,是,我,都,希,望,的,部,分,。,所,以,应,该,我,们,都,把,中,国,变,成,绿,色,的,国,家,和,绿,色,食,品,的,农,业,产,品,国,家,。	C-DT,C-M,C-VC,C-PN,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-PN,W-PN,C-AD,C-BA,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

但,是,，,在,现,代,社,会,上,，,代,沟,问,题,比,以,前,的,社,会,更,严,重,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

还,有,的,父,母,说,今,天,的,晚,辈,非,常,不,听,话,，,难,以,管,教,但,这,个,问,题,在,于,父,母,的,手,里,。,因,为,父,母,工,作,忙,，,没,有,时,间,，,所,以,没,有,和,子,女,谈,和,的,时,间,。,如,果,父,母,工,作,回,来,以,后,呢,，,给,子,女,多,一,点,话,，,关,心,子,女,的,作,业,等,等,，,这,样,的,话,可,以,解,决,代,沟,问,题,，,子,女,和,父,母,的,关,系,好,一,点,儿,。,没,有,父,母,的,苦,不,能,得,到,家,里,的,财,富,。,子,女,也,好,好,儿,听,听,父,母,话,没,有,存,在,这,样,的,问,题,。	C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-CC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,R-SP,C-PU,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,M-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-VA,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-AD,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,对,安,乐,死,有,二,个,赞,同,的,原,因,，,还,有,对,法,律,有,一,个,意,见,。,赞,同,安,乐,死,的,原,之,一,是,现,在,的,医,疗,对,不,治,之,症,的,治,疗,办,法,只,用,药,来,减,少,病,人,的,痛,苦,而,已,。,这,个,治,疗,过,程,中,病,人,受,到,药,的,副,作,用,而,为,了,抑,制,副,作,用,再,吃,药,。,这,样,，,病,人,受,到,药,物,的,负,担,而,且,失,去,身,体,健,康,。,减,少,、,抑,制,痛,苦,的,药,刚,开,始,吃,药,的,时,候,，,效,果,很,好,，,但,是,过,了,一,段,时,间,后,，,这,个,效,果,慢,慢,的,减,少,。	C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,S-CD,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-CD,C-VC,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-VV,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-DT,M-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,S-NN,S-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,S-VV,C-VV,C-PU

吸,烟,的,问,题,被,人,们,逐,渐,受,重,视,的,原,因,是,，,第,一,：,一,支,烟,不,但,伤,害,抽,烟,的,本,人,而,且,伤,害,旁,边,的,不,抽,烟,的,“,无,辜,”,的,人,们,健,康,，,甚,至,影,响,到,腹,中,胎,儿,。,第,二,：,抽,烟,问,题,带,来,了,在,人,们,生,活,中,很,大,的,麻,烦,而,且,有,时,候,造,成,严,重,的,危,险,。,比,如,说,在,公,共,场,所,很,多,人,抽,烟,以,后,乱,扔,烟,头,和,烟,灰,引,起,了,环,境,问,题,，,特,别,是,在,人,口,密,集,的,商,业,中,心,容,易,常,常,因,吸,烟,者,乱,扔,的,烟,头,引,起,了,很,大,的,火,灾,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LB,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-DEG,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,W-VV,W-VV,W-AS,S-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-LC,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
所,以,他,们,应,该,商,量,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU

我,觉,得,跟,食,品,和,不,挨,饿,相,比,，,绿,色,食,品,是,第,一,位,的,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,R-P,S-NN,S-NN,C-CC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-SP,C-PU
总,之,，,我,认,为,政,府,执,行,严,禁,吸,烟,的,方,式,来,保,护,公,众,的,健,康,是,很,正,确,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
我,认,为,吃,“,绿,色,食,品,”,和,不,挨,饿,当,中,，,更,重,要,的,是,不,挨,饿,，,因,为,人,们,只,有,决,解,最,基,本,的,问,题,才,有,更,高,一,层,的,追,求,，,如,果,没,有,东,西,吃,的,话,，,谁,都,不,会,考,虑,到,健,康,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,S-NN,S-VV,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-AD,C-JJ,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
”,您,一,面,对,挫,折,的,时,候,也,试,一,试,用,这,样,的,方,式,去,看,待,它,，,也,许,要,先,持,有,这,样,的,态,度,才,能,把,失,败,变,成,成,功,！	C-PU,C-PN,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,R-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
当,你,还,是,过,单,人,的,世,界,我,并,觉,得,无,所,谓,，,你,要,伤,害,自,己,就,伤,害,自,己,吧,。,但,是,当,你,结,了,婚,，,有,了,孩,子,以,后,，,你,就,要,负,责,其,人,生,的,命,名,。,你,抽,烟,时,，,你,旁,边,的,人,也,会,吸,到,烟,雾,，,而,且,烟,雾,为,二,手,吸,烟,者,更,有,伤,害,性,。	C-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,W-VV,W-VV,M-NN,S-NN,S-VV,W-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,S-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

首,先,，,从,个,人,健,康,的,角,度,看,，,其,实,很,多,人,已,经,知,道,，,吸,烟,不,仅,会,引,起,肺,癌,，,而,且,还,会,导,致,各,种,各,样,疾,病,，,甚,至,造,成,因,过,多,的,吸,烟,而,死,亡,的,结,果,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-VV,C-VA,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

绿,色,食,品,，,也,有,一,个,好,处,，,就,是,绿,色,食,品,是,没,有,受,到,任,何,一,个,农,药,的,对,健,康,没,有,害,的,食,品,，,所,以,，,有,人,为,了,健,康,，,就,买,这,些,食,品,。	C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,M-DEG,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

用,个,人,电,脑,的,所,谓,“,个,人,电,脑,（,计,算,机,）,网,络,”,天,天,能,联,络,了,。	M-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-AD,W-AD,W-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU

”,这,句,话,对,我,非,常,大,的,负,担,。,但,现,在,我,认,为,我,是,个,大,女,儿,，,所,以,我,可,以,当,责,任,感,和,独,立,心,很,强,的,人,。,我,对,你,们,非,常,努,力,给,我,良,好,的,教,育,环,境,和,机,会,。,有,时,候,你,们,的,热,情,感,动,我,的,心,，,让,我,更,认,真,地,学,习,了,。,以,你,们,的,帮,助,下,，,我,可,以,通,过,很,好,的,经,验,。	C-PU,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,M-AD,C-AD,R-VA,R-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VC,C-M,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,M-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,M-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-PU,S-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-P,S-P,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

这,寒,假,，,我,下,决,心,去,老,挝,旅,游,。,对,我,来,说,这,寒,假,可,能,是,学,生,时,代,最,后,的,长,期,假,期,，,所,以,放,假,之,前,想,来,想,去,怎,么,过,，,那,时,几,个,老,挝,朋,友,跟,我,说,他,们,要,回,国,，,和,他,们,一,块,去,老,挝,看,看,。	C-DT,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DT,M-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,S-JJ,S-JJ,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-CD,C-M,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,M-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

所,以,我,决,不,反,对,“,安,乐,死,”,的,合,法,化,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

第,二,天,，,我,们,到,玄,武,湖,游,玩,，,但,人,实,在,太,多,，,最,后,跟,几,位,朋,友,分,散,了,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-PU

如,果,允,许,在,公,共,场,所,随,便,吸,烟,的,话,，,会,引,起,社,会,的,问,题,，,例,如,健,康,、,教,育,、,城,市,环,境,等,。,吸,烟,提,供,的,好,点,与,坏,点,比,较,起,来,，,坏,点,比,好,点,很,多,，,所,以,这,项,规,定,非,常,合,理,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,M-PU,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,S-JJ,S-NN,C-CC,S-JJ,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-JJ,S-NN,C-VV,S-VV,S-M,M-CD,C-CD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
我,认,为,这,个,最,大,的,问,题,是,人,们,的,意,识,还,差,，,我,们,应,该,从,小,就,开,始,教,到,抽,烟,的,影,响,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

现,在,全,世,界,上,有,减,少,吸,烟,人,数,的,社,会,趋,势,，,我,的,国,家,日,本,也,不,例,外,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

我,认,为,国,家,让,各,个,省,、,市,做,个,对,策,，,最,后,让,每,个,市,民,负,责,这,个,问,题,，,从,不,要,乱,做,菜,，,点,菜,，,开,始,为,了,帮,助,饥,饿,人,捐,款,，,等,等,。,还,有,最,重,要,的,是,从,小,时,候,开,始,的,教,育,方,法,，,在,学,校,里,要,教,育,食,物,的,重,要,性,，,拿,爱,心,来,帮,助,困,难,的,人,的,义,务,。,我,认,为,，,每,个,人,不,团,结,起,来,考,虑,这,个,问,题,的,话,，,饥,饿,问,题,永,远,不,能,解,决,的,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-DT,R-DT,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,R-VV,R-VV,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VC,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-SP,C-PU
对,于,选,择,书,籍,阅,读,，,也,可,分,为,几,项,。,如,选,择,近,代,文,学,，,我,们,应,该,选,择,一,些,较,易,懂,的,、,轻,松,的,，,一,看,就,了,解,文,章,内,所,讲,的,内,容,又,能,启,发,我,们,对,现,化,社,会,的,发,展,进,行,分,析,和,了,解,，,也,能,提,高,我,们,自,己,对,阅,读,的,能,力,。,不,要,选,择,那,一,些,只,谈,理,论,，,对,我,们,所,不,能,接,受,的,哲,学,书,籍,。	R-P,R-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-MSP,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,R-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-MSP,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

首,先,，,诸,如,保,持,市,容,整,洁,等,问,题,只,要,每,一,个,吸,烟,者,不,要,乱,扔,烟,应,该,能,解,决,的,。,其,次,，,青,少,年,是,否,会,养,成,吸,烟,这,样,一,个,坏,习,惯,，,不,是,取,决,于,社,会,是,否,在,公,共,场,所,允,许,人,们,吸,烟,，,而,更,重,要,的,是,能,否,给,他,们,以,正,确,的,知,识,，,让,他,们,知,道,吸,烟,无,害,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-ETC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CS,C-CS,C-DT,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-PU

女,朋,友,很,多,，,不,管,有,什,么,事,、,什,么,问,题,不,必,犹,豫,，,就,直,接,大,声,说,也,可,以,，,不,用,怕,会,有,别,人,听,见,女,生,的,秘,密,。,于,是,我,和,朋,友,们,什,么,秘,密,都,没,有,。,但,不,是,我,全,世,界,只,有,女,人,，,那,是,不,可,能,的,。,因,为,我,们,学,校,只,有,女,性,，,想,做,某,些,活,动,非,有,男,性,不,可,，,于,是,我,们,学,校,就,跟,附,近,的,男,生,学,校,合,作,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,R-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-PN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,R-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

我,都,知,道,当,时,你,对,我,没,什,么,表,示,可,是,因,为,我,你,们,多,么,伤,了,心,。,这,次,给,你,们,写,信,我,想,告,诉,你,们,我,要,重,新,开,始,更,加,努,力,学,好,汉,语,以,便,找,到,我,理,想,的,工,作,。,尊,敬,的,爸,爸,妈,妈,你,们,继,续,关,心,我,吧,。,不,久,我,会,带,来,好,的,消,息,让,你,们,高,高,兴,兴,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,R-AS,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU

谁,敢,否,认,吸,烟,对,人,们,带,来,的,危,险,性,呢,？,我,估,计,几,乎,没,人,能,代,辩,吸,烟,的,无,害,。,迄,今,为,止,，,对,吸,烟,的,问,题,上,没,有,过,严,厉,的,措,施,，,那,现,在,需,不,需,要,有,关,吸,烟,问,题,的,措,施,呢,？	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,S-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,C-VE,C-AS,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

病,人,也,看,了,家,里,人,整,天,为,自,己,和,自,己,的,家,庭,牺,牲,的,样,子,，,一,定,觉,得,很,痛,苦,的,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,M-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-CC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
除,了,这,些,之,外,从,国,家,或,社,会,层,次,的,配,套,工,作,也,非,常,重,要,。,比,如,说,开,设,一,些,上,一,辈,人,们,参,与,而,了,解,现,代,科,技,，,电,脑,等,的,训,练,班,。,此,外,使,他,们,知,道,休,闲,的,重,要,性,以,了,解,年,轻,人,的,生,活,及,价,值,观,。	C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-LC,C-LC,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,M-DT,C-CD,C-M,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
第,一,，,虽,然,用,化,肥,和,农,药,，,但,是,不,要,用,得,过,多,，,因,为,还,是,想,人,们,的,健,康,，,人,的,身,体,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DER,C-VV,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-VC,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
总,之,，,我,们,应,该,吃,绿,色,食,品,，,不,能,放,弃,我,们,的,健,康,的,生,活,，,不,能,留,在,现,在,的,生,活,水,平,。,我,们,应,该,想,我,们,的,后,代,。,用,农,药,的,农,作,物,的,恶,果,特,别,可,怕,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
他,们,的,理,由,是,因,为,明,知,人,家,已,经,不,可,能,起,来,，,当,了,植,物,人,，,何,必,浪,费,金,钱,、,时,间,、,力,气,、,病,床,？	C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

但,我,相,信,人,类,的,智,慧,和,人,类,聪,明,而,可,以,意,识,到,这,些,问,题,的,脑,子,。,无,论,如,何,，,人,类,一,旦,意,识,到,问,题,就,可,以,解,决,问,题,的,。	C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,M-VA,C-VA,R-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-SP,C-PU

我,也,是,一,个,非,吸,烟,者,，,所,以,我,每,次,遇,到,困,难,。,对,我,来,说,，,如,果,我,的,身,边,有,一,个,抽,烟,的,人,的,话,，,我,不,能,随,便,说,话,。,不,但,我,，,一,般,非,吸,烟,者,的,人,都,是,这,样,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,M-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEC,R-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

调,查,必,须,要,做,采,访,居,民,，,所,以,我,想,了,两,种,办,法,。,第,一,是,，,我,常,去,调,查,地,，,跟,居,民,成,朋,友,；,第,二,是,，,我,跟,苏,州,大,学,的,会,说,同,里,话,的,朋,友,一,起,去,采,访,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,R-VC,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,R-VC,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

通,过,这,些,事,实,，,我,们,可,以,知,道,，,吸,烟,造,的,病,不,是,一,下,子,出,现,，,而,且,会,给,影,响,后,代,和,其,他,人,。,爱,好,是,爱,好,，,但,是,不,能,给,公,众,利,益,的,影,响,因,为,，,公,众,也,有,他,们,的,权,益,，,我,们,应,当,保,护,。	C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,R-VV,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,W-P,W-P,W-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

小,孩,子,不,知,道,，,碰,到,烟,根,怎,么,办,呢,？,由,此,可,见,，,吸,烟,有,害,没,有,利,益,。,如,果,吸,烟,者,考,虑,到,这,点,，,没,人,的,地,方,抽,烟,，,没,人,批,评,。,就,是,吸,烟,的,问,题,在,于,吸,烟,者,的,不,礼,貌,行,为,上,。,人,们,要,相,互,协,调,，,做,更,好,的,生,活,环,境,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-VE,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-M,C-PU,M-VE,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VE,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,R-AD,R-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,时,呢,，,我,们,做,父,母,的,不,能,老,一,套,的,强,迫,孩,子,不,愿,做,的,事,，,父,母,应,该,开,通,一,点,，,改,变,一,下,自,己,的,立,场,看,法,，,然,后,在,旁,帮,助,推,动,孩,子,。,好,让,他,们,有,信,心,而,成,功,地,完,成,他,的,事,业,。,另,一,方,面,呢,，,做,孩,子,的,也,不,能,太,过,冲,击,父,母,，,一,点,都,听,不,进,或,不,接,受,父,母,的,劝,告,，,因,为,父,母,心,都,是,为,子,女,着,想,的,，,不,太,过,伤,害,父,母,的,心,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-AD,C-VV,M-JJ,C-CD,C-M,R-DEG,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,R-MSP,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-SP,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,S-VV,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-CC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU
他,们,的,农,作,物,可,以,容,易,伤,害,，,不,得,不,用,化,肥,和,农,药,。,如,果,农,作,物,成,长,不,好,的,话,就,没,有,办,法,出,销,。,还,有,到,目,前,为,之,消,费,者,的,需,要,适,合,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,R-VV,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,S-P,S-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

若,孩,子,不,能,跟,他,们,沟,通,，,岂,不,孤,立,了,我,的,子,女,吗,？,间,接,的,减,少,了,他,们,的,生,活,兴,趣,，,这,个,问,题,不,可,小,看,。	C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-AS,R-PN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU

原,因,是,人,和,人,的,问,题,，,所,以,可,以,说,大,的,问,题,。,如,果,父,母,与,子,女,之,间,对,话,，,再,说,双,方,的,行,为,方,式,、,生,活,态,度,不,了,解,的,话,，,那,个,家,庭,有,一,天,，,一,定,有,后,果,的,。,家,庭,是,国,家,的,基,本,，,所,以,这,样,家,庭,消,失,的,话,，,国,家,也,有,一,天,消,失,的,。,这,么,一,来,，,如,何,解,决,代,沟,问,题,？	C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,W-PN,W-PN,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-PU,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,M-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,W-NN,W-NN,W-AD,W-VE,W-CD,W-M,M-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

现,在,回,想,，,这,是,很,危,险,的,想,法,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,认,为,做,农,作,物,的,时,候,，,不,用,化,肥,和,农,药,生,产,的,食,品,就,是,绿,色,食,品,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
还,有,现,代,的,生,活,当,中,媳,妇,跟,婆,婆,的,问,题,很,大,，,以,前,我,母,亲,的,时,代,一,定,要,对,婆,婆,要,孝,顺,恭,恭,敬,敬,地,对,待,才,对,，,现,在,的,女,性,不,太,喜,欢,跟,丈,夫,的,父,母,一,起,住,也,不,喜,欢,他,们,干,涉,。,上,一,代,的,人,们,跟,下,一,代,的,人,们,互,相,努,力,，,尽,量,了,解,对,方,和,对,方,的,生,活,方,式,跟,生,活,验,对,，,还,有,年,青,人,特,别,尊,重,年,老,的,人,。,老,人,到,现,在,经,历,了,很,多,的,东,西,所,以,不,能,看,不,起,那,种,经,验,这,样,互,相,了,解,下,去,代,沟,的,问,题,会,可,以,解,决,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-JJ,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-CC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VA,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

为,了,解,决,这,件,现,象,，,我,觉,得,首,先,父,母,应,该,对,孩,子,的,爱,好,、,学,习,、,娱,乐,等,等,很,关,心,。,因,为,父,母,不,知,道,现,在,孩,子,们,最,兴,趣,的,，,所,以,在,家,庭,中,引,起,这,样,的,代,沟,现,象,。,一,来,，,父,母,用,这,样,的,关,心,要,跟,孩,子,尝,试,聊,天,儿,。,这,样,做,的,话,，,肯,定,孩,子,们,又,关,心,父,母,、,又,会,了,解,父,母,的,想,法,。	C-P,C-P,C-VV,R-VV,C-DT,S-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,R-P,R-PN,R-PN,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,C-VV,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,W-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,W-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
两,个,人,觉,得,很,累,。,我,一,下,子,就,睡,着,了,，,而,女,朋,友,还,先,想,看,书,。,过,五,分,钟,，,她,大,声,的,叫,起,来,了,。	C-CD,C-M,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,M-CD,C-M,C-M,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU

按,照,这,样,的,情,况,下,，,如,果,不,用,化,肥,和,农,药,，,农,作,物,的,产,量,又,会,大,大,降,低,；,而,现,在,世,界,上,还,有,几,亿,人,因,缺,少,粮,食,而,挨,饿,。	C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-CC,C-CC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

父,母,应,做,个,好,作,风,，,为,子,女,做,个,好,榜,样,，,什,么,都,要,以,身,作,则,。,符,合,时,代,发,展,把,子,女,当,成,朋,友,多,接,近,了,解,他,们,所,面,的,困,难,，,不,光,在,学,业,上,，,人,事,上,、,社,会,上,应,尽,力,与,他,们,共,同,寻,找,解,决,的,途,经,。,并,种,下,多,方,面,的,基,础,，,既,使,与,他,们,处,於,朋,友,关,系,，,他,们,就,会,公,开,的,聊,天,，,无,私,地,将,自,己,的,问,题,提,出,并,求,寻,正,确,的,答,案,。,若,能,达,到,此,境,界,，,两,代,人,之,交,流,顺,利,，,长,辈,不,会,再,抱,怨,有,关,晚,辈,不,听,话,，,难,以,管,教,等,话,了,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,R-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-MSP,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-CC,S-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-BA,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,S-VV,S-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-P,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-ETC,R-NN,C-SP,C-PU

你,你,收,到,我,来,信,后,，,请,准,备,我,的,衣,服,。,这,封,信,的,多,半,儿,都,是,我,的,问,题,。	C-PN,S-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,M-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU

这,样,学,生,便,能,在,简,单,的,情,况,下,专,心,心,学,习,及,发,挥,因,他,们,性,别,与,生,俱,来,的,优,点,和,潜,力,。,教,师,们,亦,能,觉,得,方,便,地,进,行,教,学,。,这,些,便,好,像,男,生,是,专,长,于,技,术,工,程,和,军,事,操,练,；,女,生,是,专,长,于,美,容,艺,术,和,教,养,小,孩,等,等,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,S-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU

是,的,，,现,在,很,多,国,家,以,家,以,空,前,绝,后,的,速,度,发,展,，,但,是,，,朝,鲜,、,伊,拉,克,等,一,些,国,家,正,在,停,滞,，,而,且,连,东,西,也,缺,少,。,因,此,很,多,先,进,国,家,帮,他,们,提,供,食,粮,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,R-P,R-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-ETC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,S-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,认,为,人,如,果,在,太,安,静,的,地,方,，,那,个,人,会,感,觉,到,不,安,感,、,恐,怖,感,和,不,满,感,。,在,工,业,区,生,活,的,人,经,常,为,工,厂,的,噪,音,而,为,难,，,他,心,里,想,要,的,就,是,安,静,，,如,果,他,从,吵,闹,的,地,方,转,移,到,安,静,的,地,方,，,可,以,享,受,到,既,放,松,又,幸,福,的,感,觉,，,但,如,果,太,安,静,了,，,就,造,成,各,种,不,满,感,，,是,因,为,人,体,感,觉,不,到,时,间,和,状,况,的,变,化,。,对,一,般,人,来,说,，,状,况,的,变,变,，,例,如,汽,车,走,过,去,、,有,的,人,把,门,关,上,了,等,，,是,当,然,的,现,象,，,所,以,这,样,的,现,象,突,然,消,失,了,，,人,们,会,觉,得,一,种,的,精,神,压,力,，,真,是,令,人,无,所,适,从,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-CC,C-AD,C-VV,R-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,M-VC,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-ETC,C-PU,C-VC,S-AD,S-AD,C-DEV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-CD,C-M,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
总,之,，,吸,烟,要,施,加,一,些,限,制,的,，,但,限,制,措,施,有,几,个,不,同,的,目,的,。,最,好,按,照,各,个,目,的,进,行,各,种,措,施,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,M-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
每,次,你,给,我,打,电,话,的,时,候,，,常,常,对,我,说,：,“,×,×,×,加,油,，,你,什,么,事,情,也,会,做,到,，,你,是,我,家,里,的,老,大,”,。,我,一,听,你,对,我,说,的,这,样,的,话,，,我,就,得,到,勇,气,，,好,象,什,么,事,情,也,能,成,功,。,我,人,生,中,遇,到,苦,难,的,时,候,，,我,常,常,想,你,和,你,的,话,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-PN,C-CC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU

我,们,生,长,的,条,件,，,教,育,程,度,都,比,不,上,他,们,好,。,还,有,我,们,从,来,没,经,验,过,战,争,的,痛,苦,，,从,来,没,担,心,没,有,吃,的,，,穿,的,。,就,这,样,我,们,和,上,一,辈,之,间,有,解,除,也,解,除,不,了,的,壁,，,只,有,互,相,了,解,，,我,们,才,解,决,代,沟,的,问,题,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-LC,C-VE,S-VV,S-VV,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,当,然,把,吃,绿,色,食,品,放,在,第,一,位,，,因,为,据,说,如,果,长,时,吃,过,用,化,肥,和,农,药,的,农,作,物,的,话,，,这,种,化,肥,和,农,药,不,能,排,出,体,外,，,就,在,体,内,积,累,着,终,于,得,了,用,现,在,的,医,术,不,能,治,疗,的,病,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-BA,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-P,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-VA,C-LC,C-VV,R-AS,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU
吸,烟,不,仅,是,一,个,人,的,生,命,的,问,题,，,而,是,他,周,围,的,很,多,人,的,生,命,和,健,康,的,问,题,，,也,可,以,说,是,一,种,社,会,问,题,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-VC,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,们,做,大,人,的,是,过,来,人,我,们,是,从,没,有,到,有,的,新,时,代,，,而,孩,子,们,是,在,新,时,代,出,世,的,！,他,们,根,本,不,知,道,以,前,的,世,界,是,怎,样,的,形,象,？,他,们,只,知,道,在,现,代,的,世,界,就,是,很,现,代,化,的,世,界,是,本,来,就,是,现,有,的,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-DEC,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,S-VC,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU
感,概,万,千,。	C-VV,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU
日,本,也,有,这,个,化,肥,和,农,药,问,题,，,可,是,我,觉,得,日,本,的,化,学,污,染,的,情,况,比,中,国,的,情,况,好,，,我,第,一,次,访,问,中,国,朋,友,家,的,时,候,，,看,他,洗,蔬,菜,洗,得,很,久,时,间,。,在,日,本,，,没,有,这,么,严,重,，,因,为,日,本,有,“,农,业,协,同,组,合,”,，,“,农,协,”,常,常,给,农,民,教,育,农,药,和,化,肥,的,使,用,法,。	C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-DER,C-AD,S-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VE,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

“,烟,”,作,为,一,个,食,品,，,受,到,很,多,人,的,欢,迎,。,人,们,一,旦,吸,烟,就,过,瘾,，,很,不,容,易,戒,掉,。,但,是,它,的,含,量,成,分,都,有,害,无,益,。	C-PU,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,S-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,S-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

如,果,人,多,了,，,也,共,通,努,力,，,一,起,来,做,，,或,分,担,事,务,，,他,们,采,取,这,些,方,法,的,话,，,这,是,最,好,的,。,可,是,大,家,都,希,望,别,人,去,做,，,不,想,只,有,自,己,去,劳,动,，,想,自,己,的,劳,动,比,别,人,少,一,点,的,话,，,他,们,就,没,有,进,步,了,。,表,面,上,他,们,的,劳,动,比,别,人,少,，,得,到,了,好,处,，,可,是,其,实,，,他,们,一,点,儿,都,没,有,得,到,好,处,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-VA,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,R-AD,R-VE,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-AD,R-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

因,为,，,虽,然,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,的,作,物,肯,定,对,身,体,不,好,，,但,是,，,人,没,有,吃,的,而,面,临,饿,死,的,时,候,，,不,能,考,虑,这,种,问,题,。	C-P,C-P,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
不,吸,烟,者,也,尊,重,吸,烟,者,，,比,如,做,一,个,吸,烟,室,，,吸,烟,者,一,定,在,固,定,的,室,里,边,，,总,的,来,说,自,己,责,任,，,互,相,尊,重,。	C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,M-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,M-NN,C-NN,C-LC,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
起,初,，,一,个,和,尚,他,一,个,人,生,活,的,时,候,，,为,了,自,己,喝,水,，,每,天,亲,自,去,挑,水,，,然,后,跟,另,外,两,个,和,尚,生,活,在,一,起,的,时,候,，,他,们,三,个,人,都,有,一,种,感,情,，,就,是,希,望,别,人,去,抬,水,，,想,依,靠,别,人,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-CC,C-AD,C-PN,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
一,年,当,中,，,跟,前,夫,和,儿,子,见,面,时,，,我,们,虽,然,生,活,不,在,一,起,，,但,心,情,比,以,前,好,得,多,。	C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-CS,C-CS,W-NN,W-NN,W-AD,W-VV,W-AD,W-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
因,为,它,给,我,们,带,了,安,心,和,安,全,的,感,觉,，,所,以,买,东,西,的,时,候,也,一,下,子,买,它,的,东,西,。,关,于,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,的,事,我,个,人,认,为,这,么,想,。,虽,然,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,对,人,们,的,身,体,和,影,响,不,太,好,，,但,是,如,果,不,使,用,的,话,，,种,植,和,农,作,的,时,候,太,多,的,虫,子,来,吃,种,植,物,的,，,后,果,肯,定,糟,糕,，,而,且,要,不,然,我,们,以,后,也,见,不,到,绿,色,食,品,。	C-P,C-P,C-PN,W-P,W-PN,W-PN,W-VV,C-AS,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,R-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-CC,R-NN,R-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-AD,R-AD,R-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
潮,州,比,汕,头,名,胜,古,迹,多,。	C-NR,C-NR,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-PU
在,我,们,所,生,存,的,这,地,球,上,，,虽,然,同,一,样,的,生,命,、,同,一,样,的,人,但,都,生,活,得,不,同,，,那,一,角,落,上,很,多,人,没,有,饭,吃,而,死,亡,，,那,一,角,落,上,很,多,人,想,不,到,饥,饿,问,题,过,得,好,。,随,着,科,学,的,发,展,人,们,生,活,水,平,也,逐,渐,提,高,，,生,活,水,平,提,高,了,也,想,到,健,康,的,问,题,，,吃,什,么,样,的,更,使,人,健,康,生,活,。	C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,M-P,R-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,R-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DER,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-DT,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-VV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DER,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,W-AD,W-VV,W-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU
是,一,个,控,制,出,生,孩,子,，,就,是,目,前,中,国,实,行,的,计,划,子,女,一,样,，,虽,然,有,无,法,控,制,的,地,方,，,但,是,关,键,是,有,控,制,的,，,中,国,已,经,有,效,果,。	M-VC,R-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU,C-AD,S-VC,C-NT,C-NT,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VE,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU
因,为,如,果,不,解,决,这,个,问,题,肯,定,会,永,远,存,在,的,。,先,把,那,个,问,题,解,决,。,当,然,那,样,的,话,，,爱,吃,“,绿,色,食,品,”,的,人,的,不,满,也,越,来,越,大,吧,，,那,时,候,我,给,他,们,说,明,为,什,么,要,做,这,样,。	C-P,C-P,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,W-VV,W-PN,W-PN,C-PU
所,以,如,果,烟,民,对,我,提,出,不,满,我,也,无,话,可,说,。,但,是,烟,民,们,一,定,要,记,住,，,因,为,自,己,的,吸,烟,，,害,了,很,多,人,的,健,康,，,连,自,己,也,包,含,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU
我,认,为,这,种,安,乐,死,法,是,可,取,的,，,那,是,因,为,如,果,得,到,某,种,不,治,之,症,，,例,如,爱,滋,病,，,那,是,一,种,无,法,根,治,的,顽,疾,，,只,能,勉,强,用,药,物,控,制,，,可,是,一,种,药,又,不,能,用,太,久,，,而,且,世,界,还,没,有,发,明,出,什,么,特,效,药,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,S-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,想,这,个,问,题,得,这,样,解,决,，,应,该,把,生,产,地,给,扩,大,不,打,农,药,，,那,的,话,也,能,吃,得,饱,，,也,能,保,持,自,已,的,健,康,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DER,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

除,此,之,外,，,我,们,每,天,吃,得,东,西,也,是,一,样,发,展,了,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-DER,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,R-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU

这,几,年,，,在,日,本,提,倡,“,绿,色,食,品,”,渐,渐,历,害,，,去,年,夏,天,来,上,海,以,后,也,是,在,商,店,，,常,常,看,这,四,个,字,，,而,且,买,这,样,食,品,的,人,越,来,越,多,。,但,是,，,我,想,不,要,太,重,视,完,全,的,绿,色,食,品,，,这,里,面,也,许,有,细,菌,，,吃,这,食,品,的,话,，,有,人,发,病,，,如,果,传,染,性,的,病,的,话,怎,么,办,，,这,也,是,深,刻,的,问,题,。	C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-AD,R-AD,R-AD,R-VV,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,M-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,S-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,S-VA,S-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,认,为,的,男,子,学,校,的,好,处,是,会,自,然,地,自,觉,自,己,是,男,人,，,就,是,说,，,会,理,解,男,人,是,什,么,。,还,有,，,没,有,女,人,的,情,况,下,，,没,有,和,同,学,客,气,的,必,要,，,就,可,以,开,兴,地,过,日,子,。,我,觉,得,这,样,的,好,处,是,好,不,容,易,得,到,的,，,在,男,女,混,合,的,情,况,下,的,话,，,恐,怕,得,不,到,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-AD,S-AD,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,R-DEG,R-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU
说,起,这,个,假,期,，,对,我,而,言,是,“,忙,碌,假,期,”,。,这,七,天,中,，,我,把,大,部,分,时,间,放,在,阅,读,书,本,与,材,料,。,我,现,在,是,四,年,级,，,面,临,着,长,达,５,０,０,０,字,的,一,篇,论,文,，,因,此,阅,读,材,料,是,不,可,不,作,的,一,件,事,情,。,不,象,其,它,同,学,，,对,回,国,探,望,家,属,或,到,中,国,各,地,旅,行,来,说,，,假,期,是,极,好,的,机,会,，,而,我,呢,？,我,在,中,国,的,时,间,已,有,４,年,多,了,，,去,旅,行,的,兴,趣,随,着,时,间,而,减,少,，,对,我,来,说,上,海,也,是,很,有,吸,引,力,的,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-BA,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-P,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-VC,C-OD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,W-AD,W-VV,W-CD,W-CD,W-CD,W-CD,W-M,W-DEG,W-CD,W-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,S-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-SP,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
但,至,到,一,九,六,六,年,的,四,月,的,某,一,天,，,我,第,二,次,哭,了,，,这,次,哭,的,不,只,是,我,，,还,包,括,了,我,的,父,母,亲,和,弟,妹,们,。	C-AD,R-VV,R-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-PN,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
吃,“,绿,色,食,品,”,是,很,重,要,，,但,是,不,吃,“,绿,色,食,品,”,也,对,身,体,或,某,些,方,面,不,大,造,成,有,什,么,严,重,问,题,有,些,人,连,饭,都,吃,不,饱,根,本,就,谈,不,上,什,么,“,绿,色,食,品,”,。,现,在,的,人,无,论,是,男,女,还,是,老,少,很,多,人,都,在,喝,酒,和,吸,烟,。,我,想,喝,酒,和,吸,烟,比,不,吃,“,绿,色,食,品,”,所,造,成,的,问,题,是,大,的,多,了,。	C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,R-CC,R-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VA,S-DEV,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU

我,们,兄,弟,妹,妹,共,有,六,人,，,可,想,而,知,，,母,亲,的,负,担,有,多,大,，,但,母,亲,还,是,照,顾,我,们,到,现,在,，,无,论,吃,衣,住,行,从,没,有,一,天,缺,乏,过,，,如,果,是,别,人,母,亲,，,没,有,丈,夫,的,存,在,，,就,会,把,儿,女,托,付,在,亲,戚,身,边,或,丢,弃,在,路,上,无,依,无,靠,，,想,想,是,多,么,的,可,悲,。,所,以,，,母,亲,在,我,的,脑,海,中,已,印,上,了,深,刻,的,记,号,，,也,深,深,的,体,会,到,了,母,亲,的,伟,大,，,母,亲,留,下,给,我,们,的,精,神,，,然,后,深,深,的,影,响,了,我,往,后,的,一,生,，,也,使,我,知,道,不,管,做,什,么,事,都,让,母,亲,安,心,、,快,乐,，,孝,顺,父,母,和,兄,弟,姐,妹,相,亲,相,爱,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,M-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-AD,R-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

我,真,希,望,，,国,家,政,府,今,后,能,够,推,已,施,人,，,而,会,允,许,“,安,乐,死,”,的,时,候,要,快,来,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,M-VV,C-PU
我,衷,心,希,望,未,婚,的,男,女,，,不,要,太,在,乎,用,什,么,方,式,去,相,识,终,生,伴,侣,，,而,多,花,些,时,间,去,研,究,夫,妻,相,处,之,道,，,那,么,，,他,们,婚,后,能,享,有,美,满,幸,福,的,婚,姻,生,活,的,机,会,更,高,，,对,个,人,、,家,庭,成,员,和,社,会,的,得,益,更,大,！	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU

我,得,出,去,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU
２,１,世,纪,现,代,人,民,的,生,活,水,平,越,来,越,提,高,，,找,绿,色,食,品,的,消,费,者,也,越,来,越,增,加,但,不,一,定,是,这,个,地,球,上,的,每,一,个,人,都,可,以,得,到,这,么,幸,福,的,生,活,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
而,昔,日,的,成,年,人,，,也,工,作,的,忙,碌,中,，,头,发,渐,渐,地,白,了,。,以,前,的,人,，,生,活,在,简,单,的,环,境,中,，,对,于,发,生,在,身,边,的,事,情,，,以,最,简,单,，,最,单,纯,的,眼,光,去,观,看,，,去,分,析,，,最,后,以,最,简,单,的,方,式,去,解,决,。,然,而,，,如,今,的,社,会,是,竞,争,的,社,会,，,是,复,杂,的,社,会,，,人,与,人,之,间,的,交,情,、,交,往,也,不,像,以,前,那,样,能,以,最,简,单,的,方,式,去,体,会,、,解,决,，,因,此,，,在,上,代,人,看,来,，,后,一,辈,人,的,行,为,方,式,、,生,活,态,度,以,及,他,们,的,价,值,观,念,在,上,一,辈,人,看,来,，,完,全,不,一,样,。	C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEV,C-VA,C-VA,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-P,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,R-NN,R-NN,R-NN,R-VV,R-VV,R-PU,R-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

然,后,我,们,上,船,后,，,一,路,经,过,鬼,城,、,白,帝,城,、,小,三,峡,、,巫,峡,十,二,峰,到,宜,昌,，,在,其,中,我,最,喜,欢,的,是,小,三,峡,与,巫,峡,十,二,峰,了,。,小,三,峡,水,流,很,急,，,我,们,一,团,人,不,时,大,声,叫,喊,，,非,常,刺,激,，,而,在,大,船,上,观,赏,十,二,峰,，,感,觉,自,己,也,化,到,这,美,丽,的,图,画,中,去,了,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,R-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-JJ,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,M-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NR,C-NR,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-CD,S-M,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-DT,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU

跟,着,我,，,我,周,围,的,人,都,开,始,喜,欢,听,流,行,歌,曲,，,都,感,觉,到,了,听,歌,曲,的,那,种,无,法,用,语,言,形,容,的,滋,味,。	S-P,S-P,C-PN,M-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
最,后,一,天,我,们,去,万,里,长,城,的,时,候,他,对,我,说,“,钱,也,买,不,到,好,朋,友,”,，,我,听,那,句,话,的,时,候,非,常,感,动,了,。,我,认,识,他,们,后,已,经,过,了,五,年,，,但,是,今,年,过,年,的,时,候,他,从,台,湾,来,上,海,，,我,再,他,了,。,我,认,为,这,样,的,友,情,是,对,我,的,人,生,非,常,贵,重,的,。	C-JJ,C-JJ,C-CD,C-M,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,M-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,R-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,R-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,M-PU,C-PN,S-AD,C-PN,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,W-VC,W-P,W-PN,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,M-AD,C-AD,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU
按,照,我,的,例,子,说,的,话,，,可,能,不,仅,仅,是,第,一,任,老,师,，,而,是,“,一,辈,子,的,老,师,”,对,你,的,影,响,最,大,的,。	C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,M-PU
第,一,是,不,能,吃,得,太,多,，,如,果,吃,太,多,了,对,自,己,身,体,有,害,而,可,能,置,于,死,亡,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-AS,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

我,下,车,的,车,站,刚,好,没,有,车,到,厦,门,和,集,美,的,，,所,以,我,一,定,要,到,别,的,汽,车,站,坐,车,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,W-NN,W-VV,W-NR,W-NR,W-CC,W-NR,W-NR,W-DEG,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU

这,个,法,律,是,应,合,实,际,上,的,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,R-AD,C-SP,C-PU
关,于,这,件,事,我,认,为,言,不,而,喻,。,对,老,人,们,来,说,，,公,园,是,最,重,要,的,交,往,的,地,方,，,但,是,，,来,公,园,的,人,都,会,抽,烟,，,而,且,边,走,边,抽,的,样,子,，,你,觉,得,怎,么,样,？,肯,园,的,影,响,不,太,好,，,而,且,游,人,也,不,想,再,去,公,园,，,所,以,为,保,持,环,境,，,我,认,为,在,公,共,场,所,里,应,该,禁,止,边,走,边,抽,烟,的,行,为,。	C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-AD,S-MSP,S-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,M-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

人,流,从,开,始,到,现,在,，,歌,曲,一,直,跟,我,们,在,一,起,。	S-NN,S-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU
像,我,一,样,学,中,国,话,的,人,来,说,，,流,行,歌,曲,不,只,是,一,首,歌,，,还,可,以,当,学,中,文,的,工,具,。	M-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,也,以,为,“,父,母,是,孩,子,的,第,一,任,老,师,”,因,为,我,父,母,的,兴,趣,爱,好,都,给,我,的,影,响,很,大,。,若,我,父,母,以,外,的,别,人,养,我,，,可,能,现,在,我,的,看,法,、,思,想,观,念,比,今,日,不,一,样,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-CS,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

我,对,这,份,工,作,的,热,爱,，,也,由,于,可,以,借,这,份,工,作,到,处,旅,游,，,了,解,各,地,的,风,土,民,情,，,至,于,薪,金,方,面,并,不,特,别,要,求,，,希,望,贵,公,司,能,接,纳,我,为,贵,公,司,服,务,，,则,无,甚,感,激,，,顺,信,附,上,我,的,大,学,文,凭,本,，,身,份,证,地,址,等,等,需,文,件,，,敬,请,查,阅,。	C-PN,C-P,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-AD,S-VE,S-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,S-VV,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

在,外,面,，,碰,到,钉,子,，,心,里,产,生,了,自,卑,心,，,每,次,都,回,到,家,来,，,对,您,们,泻,怒,。,特,别,是,最,近,，,我,最,近,对,我,从,事,的,工,作,单,位,相,当,不,满,，,希,望,移,职,。,可,是,，,我,没,有,大,胆,地,向,上,司,讲,好,我,的,处,境,及,我,的,想,法,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,R-VA,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

饿,得,要,命,。	M-VV,C-DER,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

但,我,们,都,学,过,地,理,，,世,界,上,有,人,挨,饿,，,不,是,因,为,粮,食,不,够,，,而,是,因,为,地,区,粮,食,分,布,不,均,衡,，,有,许,多,西,欧,国,民,，,他,们,不,仅,食,用,“,绿,色,食,品,”,而,且,还,有,剩,余,粮,食,发,展,畜,牧,业,，,荷,兰,就,是,种,植,业,服,从,畜,牧,业,的,典,型,国,家,，,之,所,以,西,欧,国,家,有,剩,余,粮,食,，,是,因,为,他,们,的,气,候,条,件,好,，,人,口,又,不,多,，,而,世,界,上,饥,饿,人,口,最,多,的,非,洲,，,他,们,的,气,候,不,适,合,种,植,，,土,地,里,有,金,等,资,源,，,而,那,些,资,源,被,强,国,掠,走,了,。,非,洲,人,虽,然,没,有,很,多,粮,食,，,但,他,们,原,本,是,可,以,买,下,西,欧,或,其,他,地,区,的,粮,食,的,，,这,样,世,界,上,又,无,饥,饿,的,人,，,人,们,可,以,吃,到,健,康,食,品,。,有,些,国,家,浪,费,粮,食,现,象,很,严,重,，,有,许,多,粮,食,比,较,便,宜,，,所,以,引,起,不,了,重,视,去,珍,惜,，,而,“,绿,色,食,品,”,产,量,较,少,，,随,着,它,的,价,格,比,较,贵,，,人,们,就,不,会,去,浪,费,它,，,懂,得,珍,惜,它,了,。	C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-CC,C-CC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,C-NN,C-ETC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LB,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-NR,C-NR,C-CC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,S-AD,S-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,M-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,S-AD,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,S-P,S-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-N
