相,反,“,绿,色,食,品,”,即,是,质,量,好,，,又,是,没,有,“,扔,掉,”,的,必,要,。,它,的,量,也,是,十,分,会,适,宜,我,们,的,需,要,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,R-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,R-VC,C-VE,C-VE,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,R-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
吸,烟,当,然,是,伤,害,身,体,的,毒,品,。,它,似,乎,美,女,蛇,，,会,给,人,带,来,一,时,的,安,慰,。	R-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,S-AD,S-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
人,应,该,具,有,自,己,决,定,自,己,的,前,途,。,当,然,局,限,上,以,后,没,有,可,能,性,的,人,。	C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,S-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU
参,赛,作,品,有,２,０,０,之,多,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,M-DEG,C-NN,C-PU
我,的,父,母,，,一,生,中,只,希,望,我,们,都,会,长,大,成,人,，,事,业,成,功,没,要,求,什,么,，,只,希,望,我,们,两,姐,弟,每,天,过,得,很,快,乐,虽,然,他,们,没,有,上,过,大,学,，,他,们,盼,望,我,和,弟,弟,能,上,大,学,所,以,父,母,给,最,大,的,爱,和,能,力,希,望,一,天,能,走,进,大,学,参,加,我,们,毕,业,典,时,。	C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,M-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,M-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,S-LC,C-PU
最,近,，,在,韩,国,也,是,允,许,抽,烟,的,地,方,越,来,越,少,了,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,W-AD,W-VC,W-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,W-DEC,W-NN,W-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
有,些,学,生,吗,为,了,表,示,他,是,真,真,的,少,男,用,起,来,吸,显,示,他,们,多,帅,。,何,给,女,学,生,们,看,见,他,们,吸,烟,有,多,帥,。,现,在,在,学,校,里,一,进,去,男,生,厕,所,就,热,热,的,，,因,为,全,部,的,空,气,都,被,烟,带,进,去,了,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,S-SP,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VC,S-VA,S-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,S-AD,S-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-CD,C-VV,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-LB,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
那,么,，,我,们,可,以,以,“,代,沟,”,视,为,自,然,现,象,，,袖,手,旁,观,吗,？	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-P,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
爸,爸,、,妈,妈,过,得,好,吗,？,我,离,开,家,上,学,了,已,经,四,年,。,每,周,末,，,我,一,直,回,家,了,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DER,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,R-AS,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-SP,C-PU

他,们,也,是,给,国,家,带,来,荣,誉,的,人,，,我,们,世,界,上,的,人,大,部,分,都,知,道,巴,西,因,为,这,不,简,单,是,自,然,风,景,美,丽,，,而,且,还,包,括,这,是,有,很,多,足,球,明,星,运,动,员,的,国,家,，,间,接,中,他,们,引,起,了,世,界,注,意,的,理,由,之,一,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,W-P,W-P,W-PN,W-AD,W-VA,W-VA,R-VC,M-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-VC,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,M-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

虽,然,我,不,能,跟,他,们,聊,天,，,但,他,们,很,亲,切,地,告,诉,我,在,车,厢,内,的,注,意,点,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU

那,里,风,景,很,好,看,，,到,处,都,有,椰,树,，,太,阳,晒,得,很,厉,害,，,南,国,花,草,开,得,很,美,，,而,且,那,里,岛,民,很,素,朴,又,性,格,开,朗,，,在,街,上,，,碰,到,陌,生,人,时,也,给,我,们,亲,热,的,微,笑,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-PN,C-PN,M-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,W-AD,W-NN,W-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-P,S-PN,S-PN,S-VA,S-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
”,如,果,在,这,种,情,况,下,，,妈,妈,去,问,孩,子,该,意,思,，,而,孩,子,自,然,地,告,诉,妈,妈,，,俩,人,都,在,语,言,上,可,以,说,得,上,来,。,就,是,在,出,现,语,言,上,的,代,沟,，,没,有,自,己,去,努,力,要,求,，,或,不,应,该,以,我,知,他,不,知,的,事,情,来,看,不,起,对,方,，,代,沟,这,个,问,题,是,解,决,不,了,的,。	C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DER,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,M-VE,W-PN,W-PN,W-VV,W-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CC,M-AD,C-VV,R-VV,R-P,R-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
丈,夫,不,应,该,了,帮,助,妻,子,自,杀,，,但,是,两,个,面,的,去,想,是,对,的,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-CD,S-M,S-NN,S-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
但,是,没,有,限,制,地,使,用,很,可,能,破,坏,物,链,，,结,果,环,境,破,坏,严,重,，,人,的,体,内,也,积,累,化,学,物,质,，,以,致,增,加,病,人,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU

还,有,很,多,富,裕,的,人,只,要,提,倡,绿,食,品,。,但,是,我,们,应,该,要,在,脑,子,里,浮,现,着,现,在,世,界,上,还,有,几,亿,人,因,缺,少,粮,食,而,挨,饿,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-CC,C-CC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
有,人,说,，,安,乐,死,可,以,省,钱,这,样,的,想,法,很,不,好,，,没,有,人,心,。,比,如,，,有,一,个,人,他,的,病,治,不,好,，,他,向,病,争,夺,，,不,想,死,，,正,在,努,力,地,克,服,痛,苦,。,但,是,他,的,家,族,不,想,看,他,痛,苦,的,样,子,，,而,且,他,家,没,钱,，,所,以,家,族,决,定,安,乐,死,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,S-P,S-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

看,了,短,消,息,以,后,，,我,赞,称,某,市,政,府,出,台,的,规,定,。,吸,烟,对,人,类,身,体,有,危,害,是,一,般,的,常,识,，,老,少,男,女,连,吸,烟,者,也,都,知,道,的,事,。	C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU
如,果,父,母,是,不,好,的,话,，,孩,子,一,定,学,不,好,的,兴,趣,爱,好,、,思,想,观,念,等,等,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,R-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU
？,还,有,他,们,只,想,随,流,做,出,一,样,的,歌,儿,，,整,天,让,我,们,听,差,不,多,的,，,太,厌,倦,的,。	C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,S-P,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-SP,C-PU
实,际,上,，,由,于,“,早,恋,”,有,些,学,生,迷,了,路,，,甚,至,于,学,习,成,绩,也,有,影,响,，,可,是,如,果,家,长,们,、,老,师,们,给,学,生,多,提,倡,“,男,女,偏,见,的,集,中,交,流,”,的,好,处,，,让,他,们,知,道,不,要,过,早,的,恋,爱,的,理,由,，,那,就,可,以,大,家,也,放,心,地,、,愉,快,地,续,继,交,流,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,W-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-PN,W-PN,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

他,平,时,诚,实,、,镇,静,，,无,论,做,什,么,实,事,求,是,的,作,风,，,有,锲,而,不,舍,的,精,神,，,那,样,的,人,说,要,死,，,我,已,没,办,法,了,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,M-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,R-DEC,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

”,哥,哥,他,真,是,跟,你,一,样,，,担,心,我,，,妈,妈,我,不,是,个,小,孩,子,。	C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU
因,为,发,生,代,沟,的,原,因,之,一,就,是,大,家,都,只,知,道,自,己,不,知,道,别,人,，,只,有,自,己,的,说,法,是,对,的,，,如,果,人,们,会,照,顾,别,人,的,话,，,代,沟,问,题,就,不,会,存,在,。	C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
每,人,都,应,该,有,自,由,自,在,，,所,以,对,他,们,的,生,命,也,应,该,可,以,做,出,决,定,，,不,应,该,由,律,来,管,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-PU

这,样,以,来,，,代,沟,问,题,就,不,再,出,现,，,而,双,方,也,会,无,所,不,谈,了,。	C-AD,C-AD,S-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU

另,一,方,面,，,这,个,社,会,很,繁,忙,，,竞,争,的,很,强,，,不,动,也,不,行,啊,！,所,以,这,流,行,歌,曲,的,重,点,是,在,节,拍,轻,快,，,有,活,动,力,。,有,时,候,心,疲,力,弱,听,一,听,，,或,者,唱,一,唱,都,会,给,自,己,增,加,了,心,力,，,体,力,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,S-NN,S-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VE,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-NN,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-VV,C-CD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
不,要,光,执,己,见,，,听,听,他,们,的,意,见,，,了,解,一,下,他,们,那,一,代,人,的,想,法,和,思,想,世,界,。	C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,S-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,们,的,父,母,在,生,长,的,时,候,，,他,们,大,部,分,被,动,动,作,。,而,且,，,父,母,的,要,求,是,应,做,的,事,。,原,因,就,是,家,长,制,的,社,会,方,式,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,M-JJ,C-JJ,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU

”,这,些,话,对,两,方,对,话,更,丰,富,。	C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,S-P,S-CD,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

刚,刚,过,去,五,·,一,节,。,这,几,年,中,国,也,有,比,较,长,的,假,期,，,在,去,年,开,始,工,作,的,我,来,说,，,这,是,第,一,次,的,长,期,体,息,。,我,很,早,以,前,就,开,始,想,到,哪,里,去,好,，,但,这,一,次,的,节,日,是,单,位,统,一,安,排,的,旅,游,，,出,国,旅,游,“,泰,国,八,日,游,”,。	W-AD,W-AD,W-NT,W-NT,W-CD,W-CD,W-CD,W-M,C-PU,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,C-VE,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,R-DEG,S-JJ,S-JJ,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU
只,有,我,们,获,得,选,择,“,安,乐,死,”,的,权,利,，,才,能,够,说,得,上,法,律,保,护,我,们,的,自,由,。	C-AD,C-VE,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-DER,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,们,必,须,想,一,次,我,父,母,为,了,我,们,这,样,说,“,别,出,去,，,别,回,晚,，,别,这,件,衣,服,等,等,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,S-VV,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,M-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU
例,如,在,一,个,全,女,的,班,女,，,本,性,是,怕,羞,的,她,们,以,为,咱,们,是,同,类,，,就,能,随,意,行,动,，,她,们,敢,于,学,习,与,模,仿,男,人,，,比,方,说,男,人,本,性,是,有,一,点,儿,粗,鲁,，,女,方,在,同,一,班,模,仿,，,甚,至,打,架,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-DT,S-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
众,所,周,知,，,这,是,不,对,的,父,母,应,该,走,进,孩,子,的,世,界,和,孩,子,的,心,，,这,样,孩,子,才,会,知,道,正,确,他,们,必,须,走,的,路,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,W-JJ,W-JJ,W-PN,W-PN,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-DEC,C-NN,C-PU
其,次,，,增,加,绿,色,食,品,的,产,量,的,话,，,会,发,生,很,大,利,润,。,那,可,以,把,它,用,在,挨,饥,饿,的,人,的,身,上,这,也,会,需,要,各,面,的,补,助,力,量,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-AD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-BA,C-PN,C-VV,C-P,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,想,对,侍,这,种,问,题,的,时,候,最,重,要,的,是,互,相,了,理,，,互,相,爱,。,那,容,易,解,决,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,S-AS,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU
我,认,为,生,产,绿,色,产,品,是,好,事,，,但,是,不,可,能,完,全,依,依,绿,色,产,品,。,更,好,的,方,法,是,我,提,出,通,过,不,断,的,科,技,进,步,发,明,对,身,体,没,什,么,有,害,的,药,品,。,但,是,现,在,还,存,在,有,些,问,题,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-AD,W-VA,W-DEC,W-NN,W-NN,W-VC,W-PN,W-VV,W-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
不,管,父,母,好,不,好,，,也,孩,子,自,己,能,分,别,这,是,好,，,这,不,是,好,。,所,以,我,觉,得,没,关,无,一,不,是,从,幼,年,就,开,始,在,孩,子,心,目,中,打,下,深,深,的,烙,印,。,而,且,，,如,果,对,孩,子,没,有,父,母,的,话,，,对,孩,子,成,长,变,了,最,重,要,的,问,题,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,W-AD,W-NN,W-NN,W-PN,W-PN,C-VV,S-AD,S-AD,C-PN,C-VC,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,W-AD,W-VC,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-AD,S-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-AS,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

”,等,等,都,是,让,我,伤,脑,筋,。	C-PU,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU
可,是,，,父,母,对,孩,子,成,长,的,影,响,还,是,最,大,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,W-NN,W-NN,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,W-VV,W-DEC,W-NN,W-NN,W-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
“,烟,”,不,仅,仅,危,害,抽,烟,者,，,而,危,害,周,围,的,人,。	C-PU,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU

最,重,要,原,因,可,从,人,类,的,性,格,短,处,，,时,间,的,节,省,和,经,济,效,应,来,加,以,说,明,。	C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,为,如,果,我,们,要,选,取,绿,色,食,品,的,话,，,不,应,该,用,化,肥,和,农,药,，,那,么,农,作,物,的,产,量,会,大,降,低,，,结,果,世,界,上,几,亿,人,没,有,粮,食,可,以,吃,，,所,以,在,这,个,问,题,上,我,们,应,该,三,思,而,行,。	C-P,C-P,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,M-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
后,来,人,们,为,了,解,决,饥,饿,的,问,题,，,发,明,了,化,肥,、,农,药,物,。,目,前,有,些,国,家,基,本,上,解,决,了,国,内,的,饥,饿,问,题,，,又,想,吃,了,无,使,用,化,肥,、,农,药,的,绿,色,问,题,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,S-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,跟,在,你,们,怀,里,中,的,一,样,，,照,样,是,个,努,力,生,活,热,爱,生,活,的,人,。	C-PN,C-CC,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,S-NN,S-NN,S-LC,C-DEG,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-M,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU
我,们,都,知,道,，,青,少,年,的,求,学,时,期,，,尤,其,是,在,中,学,时,期,，,年,龄,介,于,十,２,至,十,六,、,６,、,７,岁,之,间,，,是,生,理,特,征,明,显,发,育,而,产,生,变,化,的,时,期,，,青,少,年,对,于,自,己,以,及,异,性,生,理,都,会,经,过,一,个,忧,虑,、,了,解,到,接,受,的,过,程,。,在,这,个,过,程,中,，,倘,若,没,有,或,者,较,少,的,接,触,异,性,，,会,对,异,性,生,理,缺,乏,认,识,，,从,而,加,深,好,奇,，,这,种,好,奇,心,在,青,少,年,时,期,没,有,经,过,男,女,正,常,的,相,处,（,比,如,同,在,一,起,学,习,）,而,获,得,初,步,认,识,，,再,经,过,辅,导,的,话,，,当,青,少,年,步,入,真,正,的,青,年,期,，,这,种,经,过,抑,压,的,好,奇,心,，,可,能,会,演,变,成,一,种,炽,热,的,强,烈,探,索,企,图,，,这,时,，,道,德,意,识,比,较,弱,的,青,年,，,更,加,可,能,会,造,成,一,定,的,社,会,问,题,，,比,如,：,非,礼,与,强,暴,等,等,的,罪,案,，,这,都,可,能,是,由,于,在,青,少,年,时,，,较,少,与,异,性,接,触,而,引,发,的,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,S-CD,C-CC,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU,S-CD,S-PU,S-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-CC,C-CC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VE,C-VE,C-CC,C-CC,C-AD,C-VA,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-PU,C-VV,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-NN,S-NN,S-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-CC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP 这,样,的,条,件,下,最,合,理,的,方,法,是,每,安,照,一,定,的,顺,序,去,抬,水,，,这,样,的,话,，,即,可,以,减,少,个,人,的,负,担,，,又,天,天,有,水,喝,。	C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,R-DT,C-NR,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-M,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU

说,实,在,的,话,，,我,也,意,识,到,自,己,的,心,里,面,有,这,种,自,私,的,我,。,所,以,我,常,常,需,要,自,己,的,欲,望,跟,良,心,做,斗,战,，,我,常,常,看,见,我,输,了,自,己,的,欲,望,。,可,是,我,们,应,该,要,考,虑,别,人,的,利,益,。	C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,R-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,S-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,W-AD,W-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-PN,W-PN,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,S-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,M-AS,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,对,流,行,歌,曲,是,还,比,较,喜,欢,的,，,因,为,它,以,我,的,心,情,可,以,改,变,我,那,时,候,的,心,理,状,况,。	C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,W-VC,W-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,R-P,W-PN,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,C-PN,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,认,为,由,上,述,的,理,由,，,国,家,和,社,会,对,公,共,场,所,抽,烟,的,人,应,该,采,取,一,些,措,施,。,这,样,的,措,施,应,该,包,括,：,一,、,国,家,应,建,立,与,公,共,环,境,有,关,的,法,律,措,施,；,二,、,通,过,教,育,告,诉,大,家,吸,烟,的,危,害,；,三,、,通,过,各,种,文,化,活,动,树,立,一,个,良,好,的,社,会,风,气,。,通,过,这,样,的,措,施,，,大,家,不,是,因,为,怕,罚,款,等,的,惩,罚,而,不,抽,烟,，,而,是,为,了,大,家,、,我,们,的,孩,子,不,抽,烟,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,M-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-CD,R-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,M-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

有,人,说,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,，,更,提,高,产,量,力,，,挽,救,世,界,挨,饿,的,饥,饿,的,。,我,认,为,这,样,的,想,法,是,可,以,说,是,很,浅,的,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,M-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-AD,S-VA,C-SP,C-PU
可,是,这,里,很,有,自,由,，,可,以,自,己,想,做,什,么,，,就,什,么,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,R-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,M-PN,C-PN,R-PN,C-PU

有,一,些,科,学,家,说,被,动,吸,烟,比,吸,烟,不,好,，,吸,烟,的,人,不,应,该,在,公,共,场,所,随,便,吸,烟,。,我,真,不,明,白,的,是,吸,烟,是,对,身,体,不,好,的,，,但,有,时,候,在,电,视,里,出,现,烟,的,广,告,，,有,的,时,候,不,让,人,吸,烟,内,容,的,公,益,广,告,。	C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,S-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
２,１,世,纪,现,代,人,们,不,愿,意,吃,用,化,肥,和,农,药,的,农,作,物,，,可,是,不,少,的,发,达,国,家,还,是,面,对,着,饥,饿,问,题,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
音,乐,，,无,论,是,在,以,往,或,者,是,现,代,的,生,活,当,中,是,不,可,缺,少,的,。,由,于,音,乐,能,够,将,给,人,类,带,来,欢,乐,，,所,以,音,乐,在,人,们,日,常,生,活,里,占,了,重,要,的,地,位,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,S-CC,S-CC,S-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-VV,C-AS,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
有,时,跟,同,学,们,一,起,去,Ｋ,Ｔ,Ｖ,，,一,起,唱,一,首,中,国,歌,还,有,英,语,歌,很,有,意,思,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,S-CC,S-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

我,不,完,全,反,对,男,女,分,班,，,也,不,大,力,支,持,这,现,象,。,在,这,社,会,里,，,男,女,是,需,要,一,起,工,作,、,生,活,的,。,使,用,男,女,分,班,的,做,法,会,使,学,生,有,进,入,社,会,时,，,使,到,两,性,双,方,感,到,很,陌,生,，,不,知,如,何,面,对,双,方,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-DT,M-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,S-VV,S-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-PN,S-PN,C-PU

我,特,别,喜,喜,《,秋,》,可,能,是,因,为,它,是,这,三,本,书,中,比,较,乐,观,、,开,朗,的,一,部,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VC,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-PU
现,在,在,日,本,也,是,对,这,绿,色,食,品,很,多,人,注,目,，,他,们,研,究,了,很,多,年,，,终,于,成,功,了,未,经,污,染,加,工,的,又,可,以,大,量,生,产,的,很,多,种,的,绿,色,食,品,。,所,以,在,日,本,上,《,绿,色,食,品,与,饥,饿,》,的,问,题,是,已,经,不,成,问,题,了,。,但,是,价,格,方,面,还,是,贵,，,大,概,比,一,般,的,贵,２,倍,，,但,是,很,多,人,喜,欢,买,绿,色,食,品,，,由,于,是,想,身,体,方,面,吧,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-DT,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-VA,C-VA,C-AS,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,R-LC,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-P,W-P,W-VC,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
我,觉,得,无,论,是,男,子,或,是,女,子,都,应,该,有,同,样,的,对,待,。,就,如,是,整,个,社,会,是,一,直,不,断,地,依,赖,。,大,家,互,相,帮,助,，,不,分,你,我,，,没,有,这,一,类,的,男,女,分,班,的,形,样,，,那,么,大,家,就,可,以,和,和,睦,睦,地,过,生,活,，,就,不,会,有,什,么,恐,怖,分,子,或,战,争,了,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-VE,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
因,此,，,在,工,作,之,余,，,我,也,在,半,工,半,读,的,情,况,下,完,成,了,旅,游,大,专,文,凭,，,并,且,考,取,了,甲,级,文,凭,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
女,生,属,于,较,早,熟,的,一,种,而,男,生,则,是,较,晚,熟,一,类,。,就,是,因,为,这,个,差,距,，,男,生,和,女,生,的,想,法,有,着,天,渊,之,别,的,差,别,。,男,生,面,对,问,题,时,，,只,顾,大,场,着,想,，,因,此,忽,略,了,很,多,小,细,节,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-MSP,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,M-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-JJ,S-M,C-AS,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
此,外,，,男,女,生,的,体,格,和,兴,趣,一,般,上,是,不,一,样,的,。,在,教,导,体,育,课,时,，,男,女,学,生,分,班,上,课,，,能,更,好,地,根,据,他,们,的,能,力,和,兴,趣,来,进,行,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-P,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEV,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

为,了,解,脱,他,们,的,痛,苦,，,帮,助,自,杀,，,即,用,安,乐,死,的,方,法,。,可,能,很,多,人,对,这,样,行,为,感,到,有,些,共,感,，,有,些,人,也,许,认,为,从,人,道,方,面,来,看,这,种,行,为,有,道,理,，,是,应,该,的,。	C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,S-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU

第,二,是,因,为,食,用,绿,色,食,品,能,够,更,好,的,吸,收,我,们,所,需,的,营,养,。,没,有,使,用,过,化,肥,和,农,药,如,果,能,的,话,，,也,可,以,生,的,吃,，,这,样,吃,可,以,吸,收,农,作,物,特,有,的,营,养,成,分,，,也,可,以,使,身,体,健,康,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
我,虽,然,对,小,陆,的,死,感,到,痛,心,，,但,有,时,候,我,甚,至,要,为,那,些,“,八,卦,传,媒,”,便,感,到,心,寒,。	C-PN,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-JJ,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

每,个,人,一,结,婚,就,开,始,从,来,经,历,过,的,新,生,活,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,为,，,中,国,政,府,也,是,慢,慢,意,识,到,，,抽,烟,虽,然,是,个,人,的,权,力,，,不,过,在,公,共,场,合,抽,烟,是,损,害,公,众,的,行,为,。	C-P,C-P,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,R-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-CS,C-CS,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
当,然,除,了,父,母,以,外,在,孩,子,的,生,活,中,有,很,多,别,的,所,谓,的,老,师,，,比,如,说,他,的,朋,友,、,他,自,己,的,经,验,等,等,，,还,加,上,学,校,的,老,师,（,其,实,他,们,对,孩,子,的,教,育,起,的,作,用,也,非,常,明,显,）,，,但,是,我,还,是,认,为,孩,子,的,爸,爸,妈,妈,是,最,重,要,的,老,师,，,因,为,孩,子,的,性,格,、,能,力,等,等,都,是,由,父,母,教,育,确,定,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-DT,C-DT,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-SP,C-PU
然,而,上,一,辈,的,世,代,受,到,了,全,体,主,义,式,教,育,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,S-DT,S-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
总,而,言,之,，,最,近,开,始,的,在,公,众,场,所,禁,止,吸,烟,的,规,定,是,为,个,人,的,健,康,和,公,众,利,益,要,进,行,的,，,而,要,严,得,进,行,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,S-AD,C-VV,S-VA,S-DER,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
而,且,，,我,相,信,健,康,的,环,坏,中,，,能,得,到,更,多,的,健,康,食,品,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,M-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
吃,“,绿,色,食,品,”,，,还,是,吃,化,工,食,品,，,我,认,为,在,这,个,问,题,上,没,有,唯,一,答,案,，,要,是,就,得,选,择,一,个,，,那,我,就,选,择,化,工,食,品,。	C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,C-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,希,望,有,一,天,，,当,我,在,面,临,进,退,两,难,，,与,死,神,争,扎,的,时,刻,，,我,情,愿,我,家,里,的,人,，,以,“,安,乐,死,”,的,方,式,让,我,长,眠,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
他,们,来,了,以,后,我,自,己,觉,得,活,不,下,去,。,因,为,回,到,了,家,以,后,我,不,能,出,去,外,边,也,不,能,吃,饭,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-LC,C-LC,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
我,从,现,在,开,始,努,力,生,活,当,您,们,的,好,女,儿,，,我,还,年,纪,少,，,经,验,也,很,泛,。	C-PN,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,W-AD,W-NN,W-NN,S-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VA,C-PU
我,自,己,来,说,，,我,的,父,亲,的,爱,好,是,看,书,，,所,以,从,小,时,候,的,父,亲,常,常,带,着,我,去,书,店,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,为,这,个,不,孝,的,孩,每,天,不,听,话,，,不,努,力,学,习,，,一,直,玩,，,麻,烦,的,事,情,。	C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
只,有,一,个,民,族,。	C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
听,到,我,所,爱,的,外,公,过,世,了,时,我,不,是,很,懂,事,，,不,过,因,为,我,听,到,消,息,时,妈,哭,得,很,伤,心,，,我,也,忍,不,住,哭,得,她,一,样,的,伤,心,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-LC,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-NN,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DER,M-PN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
素,知,贵,公,司,欲,聘,请,一,名,广,告,设,计,师,。	S-AD,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,认,为,中,国,不,远,的,将,来,一,定,会,成,为,世,界,上,的,领,头,国,家,，,不,过,如,果,一,直,不,能,解,决,问,题,的,话,，,中,国,难,把,握,未,来,，,我,读,完,这,个,短,文,后,，,感,觉,到,的,东,西,是,自,墓,挖,掘,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEV,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU
所,以,我,还,是,同,意,吃,“,绿,色,食,品,”,。,就,算,解,决,了,挨,饿,进,了,肚,子,里,，,后,果,还,是,不,可,想,象,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-AS,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-AS,W-NN,W-NN,W-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU
现,在,我,进,行,我,的,人,生,中,又,重,要,又,吃,力,的,过,程,。,因,为,我,是,大,四,吧,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,R-SP,C-PU
看,以,前,的,家,庭,的,话,，,婆,婆,让,儿,媳,妇,做,家,庭,的,所,有,的,事,，,而,儿,媳,妇,应,该,做,这,样,的,事,。	C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU
无,论,家,里,要,很,多,钱,，,无,论,给,我,很,多,麻,烦,，,我,还,是,想,要,让,妈,妈,活,下,来,。,假,如,我,是,脑,死,病,人,的,话,，,我,想,给,我,安,乐,死,。	S-AD,S-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,父,亲,以,前,是,抽,烟,的,一,个,人,，,但,他,现,在,不,抽,。	C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-JJ,C-VC,W-VV,W-VV,W-DEC,W-CD,W-CD,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
我,想,它,給,我,最,大,的,影,响,就,是,我,的,人,生,观,因,而,改,变,了,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU
虽,然,世,界,上,的,不,少,人,都,吸,烟,，,不,过,不,吸,烟,是,多,。,人,家,都,知,道,吸,烟,引,起,所,有,的,疾,病,，,而,且,不,吸,烟,的,人,在,吸,烟,的,人,身,边,也,就,会,引,起,各,种,疾,病,。,于,是,在,韩,国,一,般,地,区,几,乎,不,能,吸,烟,，,这,都,是,为,了,不,吸,烟,的,健,康,于,公,众,利,益,的,影,响,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VC,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,R-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU
可,以,，,医,生,不,许,，,我,才,能,活,到,现,在,。	S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU
最,后,，,因,为,父,母,跟,孩,子,的,时,间,最,长,，,父,母,是,唯,一,最,有,影,响,的,老,师,，,不,但,父,母,有,耐,心,和,真,心,去,教,孩,子,，,父,母,会,为,孩,子,的,全,部,方,面,关,怀,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-AD,W-AD,W-NN,W-NN,M-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,C-VA,C-VA,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
五,天,的,放,假,之,间,，,我,和,一,个,朋,友,一,起,去,旅,游,。,在,旅,游,的,路,上,，,我,们,看,了,很,多,美,丽,而,感,人,的,风,光,，,遇,见,了,很,多,温,柔,亲,切,的,中,国,人,。	C-CD,C-M,C-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,S-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-CC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,S-VA,S-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-PU
如,果,以,后,我,们,使,用,多,量,的,化,肥,和,农,药,的,话,，,虽,然,产,量,会,增,大,，,但,是,对,人,体,一,点,的,好,处,都,没,有,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-LC,C-LC,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-PU
老,天,爷,从,天,上,看,见,了,小,和,尚,们,的,动,作,，,想,出,了,办,法,给,他,们,好,好,地,训,练,一,下,。,他,射,下,了,一,件,雷,电,在,庙,的,屋,顶,上,点,了,火,。,三,个,和,尚,突,然,发,现,屋,顶,上,点,了,火,就,拼,命,地,跑,到,山,下,挑,水,救,火,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,R-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,S-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,S-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
而,且,人,吸,烟,的,时,候,把,烟,吐,出,来,，,这,个,吐,出,来,的,副,流,烟,比,吸,烟,的,本,人,吸,的,烟,对,身,体,的,恶,影,响,还,严,重,。,现,在,，,越,来,越,多,的,人,抽,烟,，,而,开,始,抽,烟,的,年,龄,也,越,来,越,少,。,很,多,青,少,年,已,经,开,始,吸,烟,，,他,们,还,很,年,轻,，,身,体,的,成,长,还,不,到,完,全,的,时,期,吸,烟,的,话,，,对,身,体,的,发,育,也,有,比,较,大,的,影,响,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-BA,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VA,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

总,而,言,之,，,我,认,为,的,是,现,在,的,我,是,把,“,绿,色,食,品,”,放,在,不,挨,饿,的,前,边,儿,，,还,有,，,先,解,决,面,临,的,问,题,后,，,解,决,下,一,步,的,问,题,，,但,，,我,们,也,不,能,看,，,因,为,增,加,粮,食,而,挨,饿,，,使,用,多,一,些,化,肥,和,农,药,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VC,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-PN,R-VC,C-BA,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-P,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
其,实,不,抽,烟,的,人,比,抽,烟,的,人,更,有,害,健,康,。	C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,S-NN,S-DEC,S-NN,C-P,S-VV,S-VV,S-DEC,S-NN,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

首,先,，,我,觉,得,这,个,问,题,不,能,说,哪,个,更,重,要,，,但,我,明,确,的,认,为,，,人,的,生,命,应,当,是,第,一,位,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-PU

我,拿,环,境,的,重,要,性,来,讲,，,说,了,我,想,法,的,原,因,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,S-VV,S-AS,C-PN,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,一,个,问,题,是,只,有,一,个,方,法,，,就,是,提,高,生,产,量,，,为,了,现,在,世,界,上,有,几,亿,因,缺,少,粮,食,而,挨,饿,的,人,们,一,定,要,提,高,生,产,量,。	C-DT,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,R-VC,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,R-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

，,但,是,我,要,说,有,梦,的,人,，,不,要,看,歌,星,的,外,貌,，,只,要,看,歌,的,内,边,，,那,么,你,可,以,理,解,歌,星,真,正,的,意,思,，,歌,星,不,是,我,们,的,全,部,，,歌,星,只,是,我,们,心,理,的,安,食,地,。	C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-DT,C-DT,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU

听,到,有,哪,边,的,红,叶,精,彩,的,话,，,我,妈,带,我,去,看,。,不,管,什,么,季,节,，,我,妈,找,到,自,然,里,面,的,好,的,东,西,给,我,们,看,。,我,认,为,，,孩,子,心,目,中,打,下,深,深,的,烙,印,的,是,还,是,父,母,，,不,可,能,是,别,的,人,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NR,C-NR,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,R-VC,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-PU

据,心,理,专,家,的,意,见,，,孩,子,们,在,开,始,说,的,段,时,间,特,别,受,父,母,的,影,响,。,这,种,影,响,表,现,在,根,据,父,母,的,态,度,与,行,为,而,作,。,那,么,在,我,现,实,生,活,当,中,，,这,种,事,实,既,有,好,处,又,有,坏,处,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-DEC,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,S-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,S-PN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,们,人,类,每,时,每,刻,都,一,直,向,前,进,发,展,，,为,我,们,人,类,造,福,。,虽,然,我,人,类,在,不,断,的,进,步,，,但,是,我,们,对,自,己,的,身,体,健,康,和,公,众,的,利,的,保,护,意,识,越,来,越,减,弱,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-P,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,S-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-VA,C-VA,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,R-VV,C-VV,C-PU
要,不,周,围,的,人,—,—,特,别,是,父,母,—,—,不,太,注,意,使,它,保,持,“,干,净,”,，,它,也,容,易,吸,取,不,干,净,的,东,西,，,会,弄,脏,。,而,它,吸,取,不,“,干,净,”,的,东,西,的,来,源,往,往,是,与,它,很,近,的,地,方,—,—,也,许,会,是,朋,友,，,却,最,给,它,很,大,影,响,的,还,是,父,母,。,“,白,布,”,会,染,上,让,人,注,目,的,红,色,，,也,会,染,上,令,人,觉,得,恐,怖,的,黑,色,，,有,时,候,会,给,人,家,梦,想,的,虹,色,，,有,时,候,让,人,讨,厌,的,泥,色,。	S-VV,S-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,S-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-AD,W-AD,W-P,W-PN,R-AD,W-JJ,W-NN,W-NN,W-DEC,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,S-NN,C-PU
当,然,，,不,要,世,界,每,个,地,方,进,行,开,始,绿,色,农,业,。,一,点,一,点,做,，,阶,段,的,进,行,。,那,么,，,很,多,国,家,的,很,多,人,不,要,死,因,为,没,有,吃,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,W-VV,W-P,W-P,W-AD,W-AD,W-VV,M-PU

比,方,说,我,们,自,己,养,绿,色,食,品,。,我,的,母,亲,也,在,我,们,家,的,院,场,里,养,几,个,蔬,菜,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,S-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-CD,S-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,为,我,从,小,时,打,柔,道,所,以,我,想,上,高,中,后,，,打,柔,道,打,得,比,以,前,更,好,、,更,强,，,因,此,我,加,入,了,队,。,但,加,入,了,以,后,，,没,有,我,想,得,那,么,好,。,每,天,下,了,课,后,，,练,两,个,多,小,时,，,天,天,被,学,兄,摔,左,摔,右,，,痛,得,要,命,。	C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,R-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DER,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,M-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-VE,C-VE,C-PN,C-VV,S-DER,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-LB,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-VA,C-DER,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
其,实,第,三,个,和,尚,的,性,格,非,常,猛,烈,，,一,旦,决,定,后,什,么,也,不,敢,听,，,其,他,的,俩,个,和,尚,没,有,办,法,了,，,就,不,得,不,听,第,三,个,和,尚,的,意,见,，,第,三,个,和,尚,开,始,不,让,别,人,喝,水,。,然,后,大,家,没,有,喝,水,了,。,有,的,人,再,三,来,到,庙,里,求,求,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,S-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,W-VV,W-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU
说,到,如,何,解,决,这,个,问,题,，,我,认,为,我,们,这,不,挨,饿,的,人,首,先,需,要,改,自,己,的,意,识,，,不,要,那,样,子,浪,费,粮,食,，,如,果,有,了,剩,余,的,粮,食,，,不,是,把,它,扔,掉,，,而,把,它,捐,到,世,界,各,地,的,人,们,正,在,受,饥,饿,之,苦,的,地,方,去,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VE,C-AS,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-BA,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-BA,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU
“,老,少,同,乐,”,，,这,个,成,语,是,意,味,着,解,决,这,个,问,题,的,可,能,性,。,重,视,别,人,的,看,法,就,是,解,决,所,有,问,题,。,人,们,都,不,会,坚,持,自,私,意,识,的,话,，,社,会,也,是,更,变,成,美,好,的,。	C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU
古,时,候,，,人,们,通,过,介,绍,来,婚,嫁,，,坏,处,是,没,见,过,面,，,也,不,了,解,对,方,，,可,是,在,现,在,，,男,女,经,介,绍,后,，,是,可,以,进,一,步,了,解,对,方,的,，,如,果,发,现,对,方,不,适,合,，,随,时,可,以,中,断,关,系,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-SP,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

是,因,为,我,亲,眼,看,到,病,人,多,么,痛,苦,。	R-VC,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
还,有,环,境,保,护,方,面,是,因,为,化,肥,和,农,药,不,使,用,所,以,土,地,也,不,污,染,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-CC,W-NN,W-NN,W-AD,W-VV,W-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU
现,在,的,科,学,技,术,越,来,越,进,步,，,农,业,科,学,技,术,不,断,研,究,生,产,的,增,加,方,法,，,那,就,可,以,解,决,这,个,问,题,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VA,S-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
比,如,韩,国,的,传,统,习,惯,，,长,者,说,什,么,年,轻,人,就,听,他,的,话,，,就,家,里,的,年,长,者,说,了,算,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,S-PN,S-DEG,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
如,果,你,有,钱,，,但,没,有,农,作,物,，,这,是,不,可,以,发,生,的,情,况,。,而,且,绿,色,食,品,是,有,限,的,，,所,以,农,作,物,的,价,格,也,涨,高,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-VE,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-VV,S-VA,C-PU
另,外,，,晚,辈,也,要,改,变,此,前,的,想,法,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-NT,S-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,现,在,上,高,二,，,虽,然,我,们,班,都,是,不,同,国,籍,的,人,，,可,是,都,对,流,行,歌,曲,有,着,极,大,的,喜,欢,，,甚,至,变,成,了,爱,好,。,我,在,我,们,班,时,是,一,个,不,喜,欢,流,行,歌,曲,的,人,，,也,不,是,说,很,不,喜,欢,，,就,是,不,会,去,主,动,去,听,流,行,歌,曲,。	C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,R-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

这,样,，,你,可,以,了,解,对,方,，,可,以,沟,涌,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-VV,C-PU
有,效,的,阅,读,书,籍,，,除,选,择,好,书,—,—,有,意,义,的,书,、,能,启,发,思,想,进,步,的,书,以,外,，,还,要,注,意,方,法,。,阅,读,杂,志,或,报,刊,当,然,可,以,扫,读,、,跳,读,，,但,阅,读,评,论,书,籍,，,尤,如,专,业,型,的,理,论,书,籍,就,不,同,了,。,因,此,，,视,需,而,用,不,随,意,阅,读,，,需,要,技,巧,。	C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
最,后,，,我,想,现,在,我,们,能,做,的,是,少,抽,烟,，,多,做,一,些,广,告,，,把,烟,卖,的,贵,一,点,。,这,样,会,抽,烟,的,人,变,越,来,越,少,，,周,围,的,垃,圾,少,了,，,得,肺,癌,而,死,的,人,也,越,来,越,少,了,。,我,想,这,样,就,会,把,我,们,的,社,会,更,加,美,好,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-BA,C-NN,C-VV,S-DEC,C-VA,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-DEC,W-NN,S-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-AS,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-BA,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

他,们,的,一,举,一,动,都,在,我,脑,海,里,留,下,深,刻,的,印,象,，,而,我,更,为,他,们,拍,下,了,很,多,的,照,片,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,M-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
对,我,来,说,，,很,多,久,的,歌,曲,比,流,行,歌,曲,好,听,多,了,。	C-P,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,M-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-AD,C-SP,C-PU
所,以,她,的,学,校,成,绩,也,不,用,说,，,还,跟,父,母,的,关,系,也,越,来,越,恶,化,了,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,R-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU
其,中,之,一,，,吸,烟,对,健,康,的,影,响,是,众,多,所,知,的,。,烟,不,仅,损,害,抽,的,人,本,身,的,身,体,，,还,损,害,吸,入,抽,烟,者,吐,出,的,烟,的,人,。,而,且,给,这,抽,烟,者,周,围,的,人,所,受,到,的,影,响,比,抽,烟,者,自,己,还,严,重,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-CD,S-CD,S-M,S-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-DEC,C-NN,S-PN,S-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-P,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
现,在,，,在,公,共,场,所,上,，,允,许,抽,烟,的,地,方,越,来,越,少,了,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
在,我,看,在,我,的,看,法,，,丈,夫,不,应,受,到,法,律,的,制,裁,因,为,他,是,为,他,的,妻,子,而,做,的,。,因,为,他,爱,妻,子,而,不,愿,她,再,受,痛,苦,才,这,样,做,的,。,安,乐,死,不,是,杀,人,而,是,救,人,的,行,为,，,让,人,解,脱,痛,苦,而,死,得,有,尊,严,。	C-P,C-PN,C-VV,S-P,S-PN,S-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VC,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-DER,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
你,看,见,他,们,的,生,活,状,况,，,能,说,出,：,“,现,在,是,注,意,身,体,健,康,的,问,题,，,不,要,增,产,食,粮,，,应,以,品,质,为,主,。,",我,觉,的,这,样,的,话,，,真,的,忽,视,现,在,挨,饿,的,人,们,的,人,权,。,如,果,本,国,剩,下,的,有,些,食,粮,，,那,国,家,应,该,给,贫,困,国,家,那,剩,下,的,食,粮,。,人,类,是,一,样,的,珍,惜,的,存,在,，,到,地,球,上,挨,饿,的,问,题,完,全,解,的,那,天,，,我,们,应,该,记,住,我,们,自,己,挨,饿,的,时,候,，,总,之,，,我,觉,得,我,们,还,要,解,决,饿,问,题,，,关,注,增,产,食,粮,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,S-DT,S-DT,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DT,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
现,在,有,的,国,家,可,取,安,乐,死,，,有,的,国,家,不,可,取,安,乐,死,。,在,我,的,国,家,不,可,安,乐,死,。,我,希,望,考,虑,我,上,面,写,的,内,容,之,后,，,在,日,本,也,可,取,安,乐,死,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,M-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,R-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,为,为,了,孩,子,为,了,我,们,的,未,来,我,们,要,忍,耐,地,努,力,。	C-P,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,S-AD,S-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

，,Ｂ,和,尚,向,Ａ,和,尚,骂,了,一,顿,。	C-PU,C-NN,C-CC,C-AD,S-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-PU

随,着,社,会,生,产,力,和,科,学,技,术,，,引,起,了,世,界,人,民,的,生,活,水,平,提,高,，,从,此,人,们,对,于,自,己,的,健,康,的,关,心,日,益,增,大,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,R-VV,R-VV,R-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU

人,本,来,是,自,私,的,存,在,，,大,部,分,的,时,间,以,自,己,为,主,生,活,下,去,。	C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-PU

现,代,很,多,国,家,关,于,吸,烟,方,面,得,到,的,利,益,很,大,，,特,别,是,还,没,发,展,的,国,家,更,大,吸,烟,方,面,的,经,济,上,利,益,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,S-P,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,W-AD,W-JJ,M-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,W-LC,M-NN,W-NN,C-PU
可,是,这,个,吸,烟,也,会,带,来,反,面,的,恶,化,作,用,。,众,所,周,知,，,吸,烟,者,的,早,期,死,亡,率,比,没,有,吸,烟,者,的,高,很,多,。,而,且,吸,烟,不,仅,是,对,吸,烟,者,本,人,的,身,体,有,坏,，,还,会,影,响,到,吸,烟,者,周,围,的,不,吸,烟,者,的,健,康,。,因,为,吸,烟,吐,出,来,的,烟,味,循,环,在,房,间,里,的,时,候,，,这,个,烟,味,使,房,间,里,的,家,具,，,诸,如,此,类,沙,发,、,花,朵,、,桌,子,，,床,等,产,生,臭,味,。,而,且,如,果,不,吸,烟,者,在,同,一,个,房,间,里,面,的,话,，,当,它,把,吸,烟,者,吐,出,来,的,烟,味,吸,进,去,，,这,个,烟,味,使,不,吸,烟,者,比,吸,烟,者,还,会,伤,害,身,体,的,健,康,。	C-AD,C-AD,R-DT,R-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-JJ,S-JJ,S-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,S-VE,S-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,R-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-ETC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,S-PN,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,R-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,R-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,R-VV,M-VV,C-VV,R-NN,R-NN,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU

到,目,前,为,止,，,我,从,来,没,有,抽,烟,。,我,觉,得,那,时,候,的,印,象,太,强,了,和,知,道,了,抽,烟,对,身,体,有,什,么,害,。,比,如,说,，,抽,烟,的,人,很,容,易,得,了,关,于,肺,的,病,和,抽,烟,很,容,过,瘾,我,觉,得,抽,烟,还,是,个,人,的,自,由,，,可,是,它,的,烟,会,影,响,到,我,们,不,抽,烟,的,人,的,健,康,，,在,这,个,方,面,我,们,要,考,虑,。	C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,M-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,C-AS,S-P,M-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-VV,R-AS,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,S-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

这,次,寒,假,给,了,深,刻,的,印,象,，,给,我,引,起,了,对,中,国,少,数,民,族,的,兴,趣,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,M-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-P,R-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

其,次,，,从,个,人,权,力,角,度,来,看,，,一,个,人,若,得,了,无,药,可,救,的,病,而,想,采,取,武,断,的,行,为,，,这,是,谁,也,档,住,不,了,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-CS,C-VV,C-AS,C-VE,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-PN,C-AD,C-NN,W-VV,W-AD,R-VV,C-SP,C-PU
现,代,科,学,技,术,水,平,非,常,高,，,所,以,我,们,能,开,发,而,发,明,又,考,虑,生,产,量,，,又,对,人,体,有,益,的,化,肥,和,农,药,。,这,样,的,话,，,我,认,为,我,们,能,解,决,“,饥,饿,问,题,”,并,介,意,我,们,的,健,康,问,题,。	C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-MSP,R-VV,R-VV,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
在,我,们,的,世,界,上,总,人,口,占,有,五,十,亿,左,右,，,而,且,随,着,现,代,化,的,发,展,，,经,常,出,现,各,种,各,样,的,后,果,。,比,如,说,环,境,污,染,、,气,候,变,化,、,自,然,灾,害,等,等,，,其,中,随,着,科,学,化,的,发,展,，,我,们,很,担,心,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,而,生,成,的,粮,食,，,所,以,我,们,现,代,关,注,是,怎,能,解,决,这,个,问,题,。	C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,M-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

那,时,妈,妈,你,每,天,为,我,祷,告,，,给,我,很,多,健,康,药,品,和,营,养,食,品,，,吃,那,个,的,时,候,，,我,十,分,感,觉,到,妈,妈,的,慈,爱,，,不,禁,流,泪,了,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-CD,C-CD,R-JJ,R-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,S-AD,S-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU
但,是,你,们,两,位,却,连,一,次,的,不,平,都,没,抱,过,，,连,一,次,的,吭,声,都,没,发,出,来,。,只,是,默,默,地,接,受,我,，,不,变,地,支,持,我,了,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,R-SP,C-PU
在,那,个,时,候,学,校,放,假,大,多,数,企,业,不,要,上,班,，,大,家,都,休,息,。	C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
据,说,，,烟,火,烧,的,时,候,发,生,的,烟,比,人,抽,的,时,候,发,生,的,更,厉,害,，,尤,其,是,孕,妇,被,吸,的,话,，,有,可,能,胎,儿,的,身,上,发,生,畸,形,。,因,此,，,吸,烟,的,人,应,该,考,虑,自,己,和,周,围,的,人,的,健,康,，,政,府,也,不,让,他,们,允,许,随,便,随,地,吸,烟,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,W-NN,W-NN,W-SB,C-VV,M-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,W-VE,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,W-PN,W-PN,W-VV,W-VV,S-AD,S-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
对,于,自,己,选,择,的,人,，,他,的,性,格,与,自,己,的,相,同,和,合,不,合,的,来,这,是,最,重,要,的,。,有,些,人,只,是,看,他,的,外,表,而,不,去,观,察,他,生,活,习,惯,和,性,格,，,这,样,相,处,起,来,以,后,是,会,有,很,多,的,问,题,会,出,现,得,。	C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-CC,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,S-DEC,C-VV,R-PN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-VC,C-VV,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-DER,C-PU
我,不,算,是,一,个,喜,欢,听,流,行,歌,曲,的,人,，,对,现,在,流,行,什,么,歌,曲,也,不,闻,不,问,，,也,不,在,乎,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

当,然,，,这,其,中,也,包,括,正,面,和,负,面,的,影,响,：,当,听,者,以,端,正,的,态,度,去,欣,赏,它,时,，,这,可,以,使,听,者,心,旷,神,怡,，,帮,助,听,者,放,松,以,工,作,、,学,习,中,紧,绷,的,神,经,。,据,我,所,知,，,很,多,人,在,悲,伤,、,难,过,的,时,候,都,会,听,一,些,具,有,鼓,励,性,质,的,流,行,歌,曲,，,这,大,大,帮,助,他,们,转,变,心,情,，,令,他,们,可,以,从,悲,痛,的,阴,影,中,走,出,来,；,相,反,的,，,如,果,听,人,们,意,不,在,于,享,受,音,乐,，,而,是,唱,者,的,外,貌,，,那,就,体,验,不,到,音,乐,带,来,的,真,正,乐,趣,。,例,如,，,常,常,发,生,在,网,上,互,骂,自,己,喜,欢,的,歌,手,的,对,手,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,S-VA,S-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,S-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
话,说,回,来,，,“,绿,色,食,品,”,和,“,饥,饿,”,都,很,重,要,，,要,想,搞,好,“,绿,色,食,品,”,想,要,提,高,人,们,的,生,活,水,平,，,先,把,温,饱,问,题,解,决,之,后,，,慢,慢,提,高,人,们,对,“,绿,色,食,品,”,的,意,识,让,我,们,大,家,一,起,来,发,展,“,绿,色,食,品,”,的,意,识,让,我,们,大,家,一,起,努,力,建,设,好,我,们,祖,国,的,家,园,，,为,我,们,明,天,的,希,望,定,下,一,个,坚,定,的,目,标,，,更,好,地,发,展,农,业,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
先,父,母,应,该,知,道,现,在,年,青,人,的,想,法,和,行,为,是,很,正,常,的,，,还,有,他,们,的,想,法,将,会,成,为,未,来,时,代,人,类,的,普,通,观,念,所,以,父,母,有,肯,定,的,眼,睛,来,看,自,己,的,孩,子,的,生,活,方,式,。,孩,子,呢,应,该,要,有,了,解,前,辈,们,经,历,的,以,前,的,生,活,条,件,和,情,况,还,有,该,认,识,长,辈,们,也,有,了,年,青,时,代,虽,然,他,们,外,貌,变,老,了,可,以,他,们,仍,然,有,年,青,的,心,情,所,以,如,果,跟,他,们,好,好,儿,地,谈,话,的,话,能,得,到,很,多,有,益,的,事,了,。	W-AD,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,W-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,S-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,S-NN,S-LC,C-LC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,R-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-DT,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-AS,S-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,S-VV,S-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,S-NN,S-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-SP,R-PU
然,后,自,己,想,一,想,在,公,共,场,所,的,时,候,自,己,怎,么,行,为,。,抽,烟,也,是,，,采,取,这,样,的,措,施,之,前,应,该,每,一,个,人,好,好,想,一,想,公,共,场,所,的,问,题,，,然,后,才,去,考,虑,一,下,在,公,共,场,所,抽,烟,的,人,的,罚,款,制,度,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

开,始,大,学,生,活,的,时,候,，,我,每,天,很,想,回,家,，,常,常,到,角,落,里,流,眼,泪,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

目,前,，,我,们,面,临,着,产,生,对,人,体,好,多,绿,色,食,品,或,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,提,高,产,量,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,S-VV,S-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,S-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU

大,部,分,喜,欢,流,行,歌,曲,的,话,，,自,已,也,努,力,喜,欢,流,行,歌,曲,。	C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
与,此,同,时,，,晚,辈,也,做,出,努,力,了,解,长,辈,难,以,接,受,新,知,识,和,环,境,等,以,及,帮,助,他,们,适,应,新,社,会,，,也,不,应,强,迫,他,们,接,受,自,己,的,看,法,。,既,然,有,了,代,沟,，,双,方,认,定,其,现,实,而,做,出,努,力,消,除,至,少,减,少,两,代,之,间,的,代,沟,，,不,然,越,时,间,过,这,代,沟,越,大,，,我,们,将,不,会,填,其,空,间,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,M-CC,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VE,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,S-PN,C-NN,C-NN,S-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-AD,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,S-PN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU

一,个,人,不,管,在,店,里,买,东,西,时,，,还,是,在,饭,店,里,吃,饭,时,，,连,随,便,走,路,自,然,而,然,地,听,到,流,行,歌,曲,。,怎,么,不,能,受,到,影,响,呢,！,因,此,有,人,更,喜,欢,上,它,，,有,人,更,看,不,起,它,。	C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-AD,W-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,R-LC,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU

由,于,以,上,的,条,件,，,我,们,有,事,跟,他,们,谈,就,没,有,问,题,了,。	C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
第,三,，,我,希,望,这,些,年,轻,人,多,花,时,间,在,看,书,，,而,不,是,天,天,听,流,行,歌,曲,。,大,部,分,的,这,些,年,轻,人,是,学,生,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-NN,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-CD,W-CD,W-CD,R-DEG,W-DT,W-DT,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
就,是,不,仅,是,对,周,围,的,人,造,成,麻,烦,，,而,对,环,境,也,受,到,吸,烟,的,害,处,。,现,在,各,个,城,市,为,了,保,护,我,们,自,己,、,地,球,到,处,提,倡,绿,化,。,人,们,采,取,造,树,等,地,措,施,来,重,新,考,虑,自,己,的,地,球,。	C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-AD,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,R-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-ETC,R-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,R-AD,R-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
对,于,这,个,问,题,我,的,观,点,是,我,们,应,该,考,虑,世,界,上,的,饥,饿,。	C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
因,此,为,了,解,脱,死,者,和,家,人,的,痛,苦,帮,死,者,离,开,痛,海,苦,生,，,我,们,应,该,不,要,用,保,守,的,法,律,来,判,断,是,非,，,在,文,章,所,提,出,的,案,子,不,应,该,受,到,法,律,的,制,裁,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,S-AD,S-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
不,抽,烟,的,人,们,不,能,理,解,抽,的,，,所,以,他,们,对,抽,烟,的,态,度,越,来,越,严,格,起,来,了,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VA,S-VA,R-VV,R-VV,C-AS,C-PU

当,然,，,我,是,属,于,那,种,不,喜,欢,，,甚,至,非,常,蔑,视,流,行,歌,曲,。,我,认,为,流,行,歌,曲,和,流,行,音,乐,表,达,的,感,觉,太,俗,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
总,括,而,言,，,吸,抽,对,个,人,健,康,和,公,众,利,益,有,莫,大,的,坏,影,响,。,所,谓,“,预,防,胜,于,治,疗,”,，,我,们,应,该,洁,身,自,爱,，,远,于,烟,海,，,并,且,应,该,团,结,一,致,响,应,政,府,的,号,召,，,共,同,迈,向,进,步,的,未,来,。	S-AD,S-AD,S-LC,S-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-AD,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU
它,们,很,长,时,间,以,来,被,人,们,受,欢,迎,。,不,论,男,女,老,少,都,喜,欢,这,些,首,歌,曲,。,这,样,的,歌,曲,既,唱,得,容,易,又,会,共,享,人,家,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,R-LB,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,R-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,W-VV,W-DER,W-VA,W-VA,C-AD,S-VV,C-VV,W-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU

”,所,以,我,觉,得,如,果,自,己,要,孩,子,的,话,，,一,定,先,努,力,地,培,训,，,而,提,高,素,质,以,后,，,才,能,有,生,孩,子,的,资,格,。	C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
心,理,学,家,一,般,认,为,，,一,个,人,的,童,年,对,他,后,来,的,生,活,影,响,很,深,，,他,的,性,格,和,基,本,的,思,维,方,式,都,是,那,时,期,构,成,的,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-SP,C-PU

我,忘,不,了,最,后,一,次,去,英,国,的,时,候,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
我,不,敢,说,所,有,的,吸,烟,者,随,便,扔,掉,香,烟,，,但,是,，,实,际,上,乱,扔,掉,香,烟,的,人,是,非,常,常,见,的,，,他,们,根,本,没,有,意,识,到,整,洁,的,市,容,给,大,家,带,来,的,利,益,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
十,年,来,科,学,家,已,经,发,现,了,许,多,病,的,治,疗,方,法,，,所,以,很,多,病,者,也,不,是,很,惨,去,世,，,却,会,慢,慢,治,好,，,有,个,俗,话,这,样,说,“,在,哪,我,们,要,努,力,做,到,，,就,是,在,哪,里,有,路,或,解,决,问,题,的,办,法,”,。,我,希,望,我,们,不,要,容,易,放,弃,，,而,永,远,坚,持,下,去,。,只,相,信,，,终,有,一,天,我,们,会,成,功,的,。,总,而,言,之,，,我,很,支,持,法,律,的,做,法,，,任,何,人,不,能,随,便,帮,别,人,自,杀,，,那,是,一,种,严,重,的,犯,罪,。	C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,S-AD,S-VA,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VE,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-NN,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU

相,信,这,一,点,长,处,能,让,我,为,快,乐,家,庭,旅,游,公,司,的,导,游,一,职,做,出,更,多,贡,献,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,R-CD,R-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

从,现,在,我,应,该,报,答,你,们,的,恩,慧,，,现,在,我,还,不,是,，,可,我,要,努,力,。	C-P,C-NT,C-NT,M-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VC,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
相,识,时,，,彼,此,以,交,心,或,交,流,的,方,式,是,最,理,想,的,，,然,而,，,“,君,子,之,交,淡,如,水,”,，,对,于,初,相,识,的,异,性,朋,友,我,们,也,要,保,持,一,定,的,距,离,，,以,示,对,彼,此,的,尊,重,及,自,身,的,安,全,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-MSP,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,M-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
应,该,站,在,对,方,的,立,场,上,看,情,况,。,尤,其,是,长,辈,人,比,晚,辈,人,更,容,易,了,解,他,们,。,因,为,长,辈,人,已,经,过,来,了,孩,子,年,龄,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,个,问,题,的,主,人,公,当,然,是,我,，,我,高,中,学,的,时,候,，,我,特,别,嫌,我,父,母,每,天,在,我,的,身,边,像,教,孩,子,一,样,干,涉,我,，,所,以,我,往,没,有,上,课,而,且,老,师,交,的,作,业,也,没,做,。,回,想,来,这,种,行,动,非,常,让,人,没,面,子,的,。,可,是,我,不,知,道,为,什,么,我,那,会,儿,常,常,做,过,坏,事,，,有,人,说,凡,是,在,青,春,期,的,孩,子,不,管,他,的,成,绩,如,何,，,家,庭,的,环,境,怎,么,样,，,长,相,好,不,好,都,有,对,父,母,和,老,师,反,感,，,我,也,这,么,想,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,S-NN,S-NN,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-P,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,S-MSP,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,R-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU

我,为,了,会,了,解,中,国,文,化,，,跟,本,地,人,很,多,说,话,，,尤,其,是,对,日,本,人,的,印,象,。,我,觉,得,很,多,人,觉,得,日,本,人,有,钱,，,日,本,人,是,个,骗,子,之,类,的,不,好,的,印,象,。,但,我,会,了,解,中,国,人,为,什,么,会,感,觉,到,这,样,子,。,因,为,说,得,内,容,里,有,了,很,多,对,日,本,人,的,恨,恐,。,我,的,感,觉,很,遗,憾,。	C-PN,C-P,C-P,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,W-AD,W-CD,W-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-VC,R-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,R-JJ,R-JJ,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,S-DER,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,R-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-AD,C-PU,C-PN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

因,为,在,世,界,上,那,么,多,有,为,缺,少,食,品,而,贫,困,或,者,死,的,人,。	C-P,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,W-AD,W-AD,W-CD,W-VE,S-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-CC,M-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU

我,觉,得,关,键,是,父,母,是,帮,助,孩,子,的,健,康,而,正,常,的,成,长,，,并,不,是,勉,强,孩,子,去,学,习,的,监,督,者,。,父,母,不,能,控,制,孩,子,的,一,切,，,最,好,有,良,好,的,沟,通,好,好,了,解,孩,子,状,态,，,支,持,孩,子,的,健,康,成,长,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,R-VC,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
如,果,，,我,们,按,自,然,方,式,来,种,地,食,物,的,话,，,可,能,只,有,小,部,分,在,世,界,上,有,饭,吃,。,但,是,，,由,于,世,界,上,的,人,越,来,越,多,，,粮,食,的,需,要,更,高,，,农,民,们,就,得,按,最,可,能,快,的,办,法,产,生,很,多,粮,食,。,他,们,想,，,如,果,能,用,化,肥,还,要,其,它,化,学,的,东,西,，,这,将,会,提,高,产,量,，,也,会,带,更,多,的,钱,，,农,民,们,的,生,活,就,会,越,来,越,好,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
在,香,港,社,会,上,人,们,之,间,用,广,东,话,来,互,相,交,流,。	C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,S-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
首,先,造,成,父,母,和,子,女,在,一,起,的,时,间,。,这,时,父,母,和,子,女,的,谈,话,可,以,使,问,题,比,以,前,少,了,。,可,是,父,母,的,工,作,很,忙,，,子,女,要,自,己,的,时,间,，,这,样,的,话,，,家,人,找,家,人,都,喜,欢,的,爱,好,或,者,运,动,。	C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-VA,R-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,R-NN,R-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
据,我,所,知,，,吸,烟,将,人,体,健,康,造,成,伤,害,，,人,要,呼,吸,，,呼,吸,是,由,肺,来,进,行,的,。,由,于,烟,的,产,生,的,有,害,物,质,进,入,肺,中,，,导,致,肺,里,的,某,些,气,宫,无,法,正,常,排,出,体,外,，,而,且,依,附,于,肺,里,，,从,而,提,高,患,得,肺,癌,的,机,率,增,加,。	C-P,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-BA,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-DT,C-DT,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-P,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-DER,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,R-VV,C-PU

第,一,，,两,代,人,之,间,了,解,互,相,的,行,为,方,式,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,是,一,个,不,会,由,绿,色,食,品,的,开,发,而,挨,饿,的,人,，,但,我,渴,望,一,个,世,界,—,—,人,人,都,自,己,的,家,，,人,人,都,有,自,己,的,职,业,，,人,人,都,有,东,西,吃,，,人,人,都,很,幸,福,。	C-PN,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
做,这,样,的,话,，,所,有,的,家,庭,问,题,容,易,解,决,，,和,睦,相,处,。,让,家,庭,成,员,感,到,有,安,全,感,，,幸,福,。	W-VV,W-JJ,W-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,M-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
但,这,并,不,意,味,着,在,我,们,的,社,会,上,已,经,消,失,了,饥,饿,。,还,在,世,界,各,地,的,国,家,和,地,区,依,然,存,在,着,食,量,不,足,的,问,题,，,所,以,我,认,为,还,需,要,重,视,增,量,产,量,的,问,题,也,同,时,不,可,忽,视,人,们,对,健,康,的,追,求,。	C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,的,父,亲,以,前,开,出,租,车,的,司,机,先,生,。,他,只,知,道,挣,钱,不,知,道,自,己,的,健,康,，,母,亲,也,只,知,道,把,钱,放,在,银,行,里,，,过,了,二,十,年,的,努,力,我,们,家,的,情,况,变,得,富,裕,，,这,样,的,背,景,下,我,可,以,上,大,学,，,还,有,两,个,姐,姐,也,能,大,学,毕,业,，,我,们,不,太,知,道,多,么,努,力,才,会,有,成,功,。	C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-JJ,M-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-BA,C-NN,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,S-VV,S-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DER,C-VA,C-VA,M-PU,M-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,想,，,在,那,些,人,民,饿,肚,子,的,地,方,还,是,应,该,用,化,肥,吧,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,R-SP,C-PU
首,先,，,长,时,间,抽,烟,的,人,比,不,抽,烟,人,得,癌,症,率,更,高,。,如,果,在,公,司,里,抽,烟,的,人,比,较,多,的,话,，,应,该,将,来,受,到,损,失,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,M-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
一,块,口,香,糖,从,一,个,无,意,识,的,人,的,嘴,里,飞,出,来,可,以,把,一,个,美,丽,的,公,共,场,地,的,面,貌,毁,掉,了,，,能,给,环,境,保,护,工,作,带,来,很,多,麻,烦,；,用,来,清,除,乱,吐,的,口,香,糖,的,经,费,也,不,少,的,。	C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-BA,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-SP,C-PU,S-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,R-SP,C-PU
但,法,律,是,无,形,的,，,妻,子,死,后,，,法,院,认,为,丈,夫,犯,了,故,意,杀,人,罪,。	C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
“,喜,不,喜,欢,流,行,歌,曲,”,这,是,众,生,云,云,，,各,有,所,说,的,。	C-PU,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,S-NN,S-NN,S-ETC,S-ETC,C-PU,C-DT,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU

这,对,社,会,来,讲,，,肯,定,是,一,件,好,事,，,可,是,这,也,会,害,有,些,公,司,。,比,如,，,日,本,有,的,饭,店,禁,止,吸,烟,后,，,客,人,愈,来,愈,少,了,，,是,因,为,，,吸,烟,者,不,愿,意,住,这,饭,店,。,他,们,讲,不,能,轻,松,，,那,么,去,可,以,吸,烟,的,地,方,。	C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-VE,S-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,M-VC,C-P,C-P,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,S-VV,M-AD,C-VV,S-VA,S-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU
发,达,国,家,的,食,量,剩,下,得,多,，,甚,至,每,天,扔,在,大,海,。,用,剩,下,的,食,量,救,贫,困,国,家,的,饥,饿,。,同,时,，,应,该,继,续,开,发,像,“,绿,色,食,品,”,有,利,于,身,体,，,普,及,其,他,落,后,国,家,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DER,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-P,C-PU,W-JJ,W-JJ,W-NN,W-NN,W-PU,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,W-PU,M-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
但,说,完,这,点,后,我,又,想,它,和,古,典,音,乐,和,其,他,音,乐,有,何,处,不,同,呢,。,它,就,是,不,用,让,我,们,累,，,而,是,轻,松,、,快,乐,地,感,觉,到,音,乐,的,动,听,。	C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-M,C-LC,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,S-PN,S-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,S-PN,C-AD,C-VC,M-AD,S-AD,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,M-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-PU
母,亲,远,从,国,内,南,来,，,她,是,一,位,貌,美,可,亲,，,又,是,三,从,四,德,的,女,人,，,整,天,忙,着,料,理,家,务,，,很,辛,劳,又,得,不,到,祖,母,的,关,怀,，,不,时,挨,骂,挨,打,被,欺,负,也,无,可,诉,，,久,而,久,之,就,患,上,了,胃,病,，,身,怀,着,孕,，,体,重,日,减,，,直,到,哥,哥,诞,生,后,，,还,是,常,遭,到,祖,母,姑,叔,们,无,理,取,闹,找,是,非,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SB,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,M-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
