我,以,为,父,母,是,孩,子,的,第,一,任,老,师,。,人,们,刚,生,下,到,上,幼,儿,园,，,大,概,一,直,跟,父,母,在,一,起,。	C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

”,意,思,是,孩,子,一,直,看,着,父,母,做,什,么,，,就,自,己,做,什,么,。,下,面,我,自,己,过,去,的,事,情,来,说,明,。	C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,W-AD,W-PN,W-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,M-PN,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
我,们,都,受,不,了,看,病,人,不,是,自,主,的,活,着,，,而,是,以,医,疗,机,械,而,活,着,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU
因,此,我,跟,爸,爸,常,常,吵,架,了,。	C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-PU
在,新,加,坡,大,学,，,我,所,修,书,的,课,程,是,工,商,旅,游,业,公,程,。,到,了,北,京,，,我,为,了,要,增,加,自,己,在,华,文,商,业,的,知,识,，,所,以,在,北,京,大,学,修,读,了,两,年,的,课,程,。,修,读,的,课,程,完,毕,后,，,我,就,在,一,间,北,京,旅,游,公,司,就,职,经,理,位,置,。	C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,R-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-P,C-CD,S-M,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
我,们,拿,什,么,样,的,歌,曲,叫,流,行,歌,曲,？,一,般,人,认,为,流,行,歌,曲,是,很,多,人,都,喜,欢,听,喜,欢,唱,的,就,是,流,行,歌,曲,，,但,是,实,际,上,人,们,喜,欢,的,，,红,火,的,那,些,流,行,歌,曲,是,值,得,喜,欢,、,值,得,红,火,吗,？	C-PN,C-PN,S-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,S-VA,S-VA,C-DEC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,S-VA,S-VA,M-SP,C-PU
世,界,上,有,很,多,国,家,、,人,种,、,宗,教,和,看,法,所,以,说,不,定,我,的,看,法,好,，,你,的,看,法,错,。,而,且,各,个,宗,教,对,死,的,看,法,不,一,定,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,S-AD,S-AD,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-AD,S-AD,C-PU
但,这,样,的,想,法,和,选,“,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,的,”,完,全,没,有,关,系,，,要,是,我,在,超,市,里,有,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,的,食,品,和,绿,色,食,品,的,话,，,我,还,是,选,绿,色,食,品,的,因,为,我,想,活,得,长,一,点,，,不,想,得,病,。	C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,R-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DER,C-VA,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
现,代,人,们,都,赶,时,间,各,各,都,很,忙,，,所,以,父,母,和,子,女,之,间,的,对,话,越,来,越,难,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-DT,S-DT,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
比,如,说,，,我,的,爸,爸,的,爱,好,是,看,书,，,所,以,从,小,的,时,候,我,开,始,看,书,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU
至,今,我,最,难,忘,的,假,期,就,是,我,大,学,三,年,级,来,中,国,访,问,了,丝,绸,之,路,的,那,个,暑,假,。,原,来,我,对,丝,绸,之,路,很,感,兴,趣,，,因,为,我,小,学,的,时,候,看,的,日,本,的,电,视,台,在,中,国,新,疆,拍,的,电,视,节,目,的,影,响,很,大,，,还,有,后,来,我,在,高,中,的,时,候,看,的,一,本,小,说,也,让,我,产,生,对,这,个,方,面,的,兴,趣,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DER,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,M-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

就,像,我,举,的,两,个,例,子,，,所,有,的,杀,人,犯,能,用,“,安,乐,死,”,的,借,口,，,而,将,杀,他,人,。	C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-P,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU
真,的,，,流,行,歌,曲,不,但,是,属,于,年,青,人,的,歌,曲,，,也,适,合,像,这,一,般,年,纪,的,人,（,我,今,年,五,十,岁,）,。	C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,M-DT,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-PU
但,是,一,个,声,音,也,没,有,的,话,，,可,能,人,们,的,心,情,更,不,舒,服,。,因,为,没,有,声,音,的,空,间,让,我,们,感,孤,独,感,寂,寞,感,紧,张,感,。,我,们,人,间,是,从,出,生,以,前,听,音,乐,的,，,所,以,我,觉,得,人,家,不,能,接,受,一,个,完,全,没,有,声,音,的,环,境,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,S-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,S-VV,S-JJ,S-JJ,S-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,R-NN,R-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-PN,S-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
就,是,，,随,着,社,会,的,发,展,，,对,人,们,的,生,育,观,念,也,带,了,巨,大,变,化,。,比,如,，,在,现,代,社,会,，,女,人,也,在,职,业,上,占,了,较,高,的,地,位,，,这,样,的,职,业,女,性,群,越,来,越,多,，,而,她,们,认,为,不,要,早,生,孩,子,。,因,此,晚,生,孩,子,的,女,性,也,越,来,越,多,了,，,有,了,这,样,的,情,况,下,，,现,在,发,生,的,一,个,问,题,就,是,“,小,皇,帝,”,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,M-AS,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-AS,C-PU,S-VE,S-AS,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-PU,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-PU
所,以,能,看,市,场,上,、,商,店,里,看,到,绿,色,食,品,，,很,多,人,们,都,愿,意,买,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
因,为,我,们,一,有,空,或,者,寂,寞,会,听,歌,曲,，,歌,曲,使,人,的,感,到,快,乐,，,安,慰,，,心,里,舒,服,。	C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,R-DEG,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

当,然,这,新,时,代,的,人,思,考,也,变,得,很,快,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
我,开,始,抽,烟,以,后,，,我,一,直,觉,得,“,烟,”,能,改,变,一,个,人,的,不,好,东,西,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-DEG,C-AD,C-VA,M-VA,C-VA,C-PU

参,加,表,演,后,两,三,天,，,我,陪,父,母,上,海,游,览,，,过,愉,快,时,光,后,回,日,本,去,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,W-NR,W-NR,W-VV,W-VV,C-PU,S-AD,C-VA,C-VA,M-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,M-PU

因,为,，,对,病,人,来,说,是,无,痛,苦,死,。	C-P,C-P,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-PU
不,仅,对,自,己,有,害,，,而,且,对,他,人,也,会,造,成,身,体,的,影,响,。,在,路,上,人,人,都,会,经,常,看,见,边,走,边,抽,烟,的,，,而,且,还,随,手,把,烟,头,扔,在,路,上,，,这,样,人,我,觉,得,很,不,讲,卫,生,，,还,没,有,素,质,。	M-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-NN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

于,是,，,政,府,决,定,下,来,了,一,项,规,定,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

首,先,，,我,要,说,我,一,年,前,已,经,开,始,戒,烟,。,我,祖,父,因,为,过,量,得,吸,烟,，,所,以,得,了,肺,癌,症,，,结,果,去,年,去,世,了,。,因,此,我,感,到,很,害,怕,，,而,且,学,习,了,吸,烟,对,身,体,没,有,好,处,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,些,“,安,乐,死,”,的,问,题,是,从,来,经,常,发,生,过,的,。,“,安,乐,死,”,这,个,字,让,我,怀,忆,我,小,学,的,时,候,看,的,一,本,小,说,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,R-AD,R-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-DEC,C-PU,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
也,许,说,我,的,假,期,度,过,方,法,不,是,买,东,西,，,而,是,市,场,研,究,呢,。	C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-PN,R-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,W-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
那,么,，,所,谓,子,女,或,者,后,辈,们,有,什,么,特,点,。,这,说,都,不,用,说,，,是,大,家,都,知,道,的,，,他,们,虽,然,很,活,动,，,主,动,做,事,。,但,是,有,一,点,儿,激,动,容,易,生,气,，,不,足,耐,心,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,W-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU

不,能,不,理,公,共,的,第,二,要,提,供,良,好,的,教,育,，,任,人,张,破,着,不,让,他,们,停,下,来,，,这,是,无,能,的,政,府,。,应,该,政,府,站,在,前,方,良,好,的,政,策,来,引,导,国,民,，,比,如,用,传,播,媒,体,来,传,播,公,益,广,告,，,或,者,在,培,养,很,多,教,师,到,各,个,省,、,各,个,县,等,从,上,到,下,的,方,式,来,教,育,人,民,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,R-DEG,C-OD,C-OD,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,S-NR,S-VV,C-AS,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-VE,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,R-NN,R-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,R-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-ETC,M-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
既,没,有,供,给,营,养,，,也,没,有,提,供,好,的,成,分,。	C-AD,S-VE,S-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
人,一,生,必,然,会,走,进,婚,姻,殿,堂,，,那,是,多,么,快,乐,的,一,刻,一,天,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,R-CD,R-M,C-PU
因,此,，,男,女,双,方,在,婚,前,的,最,初,相,识,，,到,后,来,的,相,知,相,觉,，,并,决,定,共,赴,婚,姻,殿,堂,，,这,整,个,过,程,对,婚,姻,的,成,败,有,着,重,大,的,影,响,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-VV,C-PU,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
大,部,分,孩,子,从,小,到,长,大,以,后,，,父,母,是,你,们,最,亲,切,的,人,，,每,天,都,照,顾,你,，,看,你,每,天,长,大,。,所,以,有,很,多,孩,子,的,思,想,观,念,、,兴,趣,爱,好,、,行,为,举,止,都,像,他,们,的,父,母,一,样,，,并,且,孩,子,的,生,活,习,惯,的,行,为,都,是,从,小,由,父,母,来,教,育,。	C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-P,S-VV,S-VV,S-LC,S-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
我,认,为,吃,“,绿,色,食,品,”,是,第,一,位,的,，,因,为,吃,了,用,化,肥,和,农,药,的,农,作,物,，,就,害,于,我,们,的,健,康,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-SP,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-AS,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,听,说,过,到,三,岁,之,前,的,生,活,环,境,决,定,孩,子,今,后,的,人,格,。,所,以,我,们,大,人,不,仅,给,她,很,好,的,教,育,环,境,，,还,给,她,好,的,生,活,环,境,。,我,说,的,生,活,环,境,指,得,不,只,是,经,济,上,的,，,更,重,要,是,精,神,上,的,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,R-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,M-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,M-P,C-PN,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-DER,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-SP,C-PU

世,界,食,粮,丰,富,的,国,家,出,口,食,粮,。	C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
我,从,高,中,毕,业,将,临,进,大,学,那,一,年,暑,假,对,我,来,讲,是,筹,学,费,的,黄,金,时,期,。,那,就,是,说,，,这,段,时,光,是,我,全,力,以,赴,出,去,打,工,的,。,我,说,“,全,力,以,赴,”,不,是,多,言,多,语,修,辞,，,我,甚,至,为,了,这,份,工,作,离,开,了,家,乡,和,亲,友,。	C-PN,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-BA,S-P,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,M-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,S-VA,S-VA,S-AD,S-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
现,代,人,都,很,敏,感,这,个,问,题,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,W-AD,W-AD,W-VA,W-VA,M-DT,W-DT,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU
我,觉,得,原,因,是,不,了,解,对,方,，,人,们,不,认,识,对,方,的,存,在,价,值,。,目,前,很,多,一,辈,之,间,的,沟,通,与,交,流,非,常,困,难,。,他,们,没,有,共,同,什,么,目,的,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-CD,C-CD,S-CD,S-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-DT,W-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
发,达,国,家,的,现,实,是,：,一,边,过,量,地,作,农,业,物,等,等,的,食,品,，,一,边,浪,费,食,品,，,这,就,是,没,有,道,理,的,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,S-VV,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

为,了,解,决,这,种,问,题,，,可,以,在,用,化,肥,和,农,药,大,量,生,产,的,情,况,下,可,以,少,量,生,产,绿,色,食,品,，,以,满,足,那,些,人,的,需,求,，,这,样,不,仅,解,决,了,粮,食,的,缺,乏,，,还,解,决,了,社,会,人,的,需,求,。	C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,R-VV,R-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,看,成,“,我,是,已,经,成,年,人,不,要,听,任,何,人,的,想,法,和,管,教,”,所,以,我,跟,父,母,交,流,的,时,间,越,来,越,很,少,了,。	C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-PN,W-VC,W-AD,W-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,R-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
如,果,我,们,这,样,做,下,去,的,话,发,生,更,严,重,的,结,果,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
相,应,地,，,人,们,也,增,加,了,对,这,些,的,理,论,知,识,，,大,量,收,集,有,关,的,书,籍,来,阅,读,，,进,行,研,究,和,探,讨,。,在,这,样,的,前,提,下,，,“,有,效,阅,读,”,应,该,要,有,的,放,矢,，,用,很,少,的,时,间,而,获,得,相,当,的,效,益,。,怎,么,才,能,去,做,到,呢,？	C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,S-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,R-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,R-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU

我,敢,说,解,决,这,个,问,题,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,想,一,起,生,活,在,人,生,的,一,对,男,女,应,该,是,互,相,了,解,对,方,、,同,情,对,方,、,照,顾,对,方,、,爱,护,对,方,最,重,要,的,是,感,情,，,从,小,一,起,长,大,的,一,对,男,女,不,是,有,多,多,少,少,的,感,情,吗,？	C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,W-VE,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,S-DEV,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

代,沟,，,这,两,个,字,，,普,通,看,来,是,简,单,的,字,或,者,很,简,单,的,事,，,如,果,像,这,试,卷,上,的,情,况,下,，,是,很,难,忘,的,一,件,事,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-PU,R-JJ,R-JJ,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-PU,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-PU
其,中,人,方,面,没,问,题,，,但,对,物,，,即,容,器,方,面,可,能,有,问,题,，,三,个,和,尚,应,该,先,做,合,适,的,容,器,，,后,用,它,来,抬,水,喝,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,M-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU
能,产,出,很,多,农,作,业,，,又,对,身,体,也,好,的,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,S-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,R-SP,C-PU
我,认,为,绿,色,食,品,不,仅,仅,对,个,人,的,健,康,有,很,多,好,处,而,且,也,有,使,人,想,到,世,界,食,粮,问,题,的,作,用,。,挨,饿,也,是,个,世,界,食,粮,问,题,之,一,而,已,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VC,R-M,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-SP,R-SP,C-PU
我,想,这,不,是,某,一,个,地,方,的,问,题,，,而,是,世,界,性,的,问,题,，,因,此,应,该,世,界,各,国,的,人,们,更,关,注,这,问,题,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-DT,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-DEC,W-NN,W-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
吃,绿,色,食,品,，,不,但,对,人,身,有,好,处,而,且,对,环,境,也,有,一,些,好,处,。	C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,S-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
在,孩,童,时,期,，,对,于,孩,子,来,说,，,父,母,是,接,触,最,多,的,人,，,随,之,也,就,成,了,模,仿,的,对,象,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
主,要,是,精,神,要,集,中,，,对,书,籍,、,报,纸,有,必,要,记,下,的,就,记,在,本,子,上,。,就,我,本,人,来,说,，,因,为,我,目,前,是,一,位,教,师,，,所,以,，,我,每,阅,读,到,一,些,有,关,的,词,语,、,成,语,等,我,都,一,一,的,给,予,抄,下,来,；,有,时,在,报,章,上,阅,读,到,有,好,的,文,章,都,把,它,剪,下,来,；,当,读,到,一,些,生,词,生,字,就,查,字,典,，,以,便,更,加,了,解,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,M-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-LC,C-DEG,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-DT,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-DEV,R-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-VE,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-BA,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
如,果,自,己,种,农,作,的,话,农,作,物,生,长,之,前,吃,什,么,呢,？,没,有,什,么,可,吃,的,就,喝,着,西,北,风,等,农,作,物,长,完,？,那,就,吃,自,己,种,的,菜,以,前,饿,死,了,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-SP,C-PU,C-VE,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-P,C-JJ,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU

”,如,果,我,想,听,哥,哥,的,光,盘,Ｃ,Ｄ,的,时,候,，,他,常,常,说,“,你,一,定,不,会,理,解,歌,儿,词,的,内,容,。,这,是,我,初,中,小,时,的,事,情,。	C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,R-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
对,于,生,活,在,常,年,如,夏,的,马,来,西,亚,的,我,来,说,，,这,可,是,新,鲜,又,好,奇,的,经,验,呢,！,我,是,一,直,向,往,着,穿,羊,毛,衣,窝,在,麻,辣,火,锅,前,哈,着,冷,气,团,的,经,验,，,因,为,这,种,感,觉,挺,浪,漫,的,，,不,是,吗,？	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-IJ,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
现,在,韩,国,可,跟,以,前,相,比,有,天,壤,之,别,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-NR,C-NR,W-AD,W-P,W-NT,W-NT,W-VV,W-VV,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
在,父,母,身,边,是,最,安,全,的,地,方,，,如,果,在,国,外,有,生,什,么,事,怎,么,办,？,绝,对,不,能,去,国,外,学,习,”,我,那,天,晚,上,一,直,跟,父,母,说,了,半,天,，,可,是,没,有,用,，,我,感,觉,到,闷,死,了,。,可,是,我,不,能,放,弃,一,直,跟,父,母,说,话,，,有,时,候,给,父,母,如,果,我,在,国,外,学,习,的,话,那,里,的,生,活,和,计,划,表,，,第,一,次,父,母,不,听,我,说,话,，,不,看,我,给,父,母,的,计,划,表,，,可,是,跟,他,们,说,着,说,着,过,了,一,段,时,间,他,们,终,于,听,了,我,说,话,，,终,于,看,了,我,的,表,。,我,觉,得,这,样,父,母,和,子,女,之,间,有,困,难,的,问,题,的,原,因,可,能,是,两,人,之,间,不,足,说,话,。,有,发,生,什,么,问,题,绝,对,不,能,大,声,说,，,只,要,跟,他,们,商,量,商,量,，,那,就,有,好,的,成,果,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,R-CD,R-M,R-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-NN,S-NN,S-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-CD,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,W-PU,C-VE,R-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

外,边,特,别,冷,而,且,下,车,的,人,们,连,连,走,了,。,我,害,怕,了,因,为,我,的,朋,友,不,在,。,在,只,有,二,、,三,个,灯,下,我,一,个,人,等,了,她,们,来,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,W-P,W-AD,W-VE,W-CD,W-PU,W-CD,W-M,W-NN,W-LC,W-PN,W-CD,W-CD,W-NN,C-VV,R-AS,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU
现,在,的,情,况,而,言,，,非,洲,等,地,区,因,缺,少,粮,食,而,挨,饿,的,情,况,是,非,常,多,的,。	M-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-ETC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU

“,绿,色,食,品,”,这,个,名,称,流,行,于,发,达,国,有,。	C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,R-VV,C-PU

然,后,随,着,国,家,发,展,，,我,们,讲,究,，,爱,护,自,然,环,境,吧,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

但,有,些,人,太,着,迷,了,我,看,到,有,一,个,歌,迷,，,为,了,看,一,次,歌,星,放,弃,了,自,己,的,一,切,，,这,可,以,说,到,了,很,危,险,的,程,度,。	C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,R-AS,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,好,像,好,久,没,有,给,你,们,写,信,。,自,己,觉,得,年,纪,越,大,，,给,你,们,写,信,有,点,儿,不,好,意,思,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,M-VE,C-M,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

真,不,知,道,为,什,么,大,男,人,大,概,都,吸,烟,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
作,为,晚,辈,，,应,该,多,理,解,父,母,的,苦,心,，,父,母,批,评,你,时,，,不,想,把,你,怎,么,样,，,而,是,想,让,你,少,走,弯,路,，,要,不,让,你,误,入,歧,途,，,父,母,毕,竟,是,过,来,人,，,你,要,静,下,来,听,他,们,的,话,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-BA,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,R-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU

如,果,我,们,只,是,为,了,我,们,的,健,康,，,只,生,产,绿,色,食,品,的,话,，,不,能,解,决,世,界,饥,饿,问,题,。,我,们,先,解,决,世,界,饥,饿,问,题,以,后,，,想,生,产,绿,色,产,品,也,可,以,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
对,个,人,的,身,体,来,说,没,有,对,健,康,好,的,。,比,如,，,在,公,共,场,所,抽,烟,，,对,非,抽,烟,的,人,也,有,相,当,大,的,害,健,康,的,作,用,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,R-P,R-NN,R-NN,C-VA,R-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,S-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,S-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

没,有,人,照,顾,他,们,所,以,被,送,到,那,儿,。,他,们,有,了,饭,，,有,衣,服,，,能,上,学,，,可,并,不,说,幸,福,。	C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,M-SB,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-AS,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
近,将,来,绿,色,食,品,也,不,说,绿,色,食,品,。,因,为,世,界,上,所,有,的,食,物,变,成,绿,色,食,品,的,话,，,一,点,也,不,必,要,分,别,的,说,“,绿,色,食,品,”,了,。,我,认,为,这,并,不,是,梦,话,里,的,故,事,，,而,是,现,实,。	R-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-AD,C-AD,S-DEV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,R-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
所,以,为,了,保,持,公,共,场,所,整,洁,，,对,在,公,共,场,所,边,走,边,抽,烟,的,人,罚,款,的,规,定,是,必,要,的,。,目,前,世,界,上,已,经,在,比,较,发,达,的,国,家,、,发,达,的,地,区,里,头,有,了,这,种,规,定,的,地,区,也,不,少,。,但,还,是,还,有,很,多,地,区,里,还,没,有,这,种,规,定,，,这,是,一,定,要,尽,快,决,解,的,问,题,。,不,然,的,话,对,人,体,、,公,共,卫,生,、,最,终,也,对,地,球,给,非,常,大,的,损,害,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,W-AD,W-AD,R-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-VA,W-VA,W-DEC,W-NN,W-NN,W-PU,R-JJ,R-JJ,R-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,C-VE,C-AS,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,R-NN,R-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,R-CC,C-CC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
随,着,经,济,的,发,展,，,老,百,姓,的,生,活,水,平,也,不,断,提,高,，,因,此,他,们,的,需,求,也,不,断,增,多,，,例,如,：,想,住,上,豪,华,的,房,、,旅,馆,，,想,购,买,私,人,轿,车,，,想,吃,放,心,肉,等,一,些,绿,色,食,品,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-ETC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

十,几,年,前,，,当,我,们,购,买,菜,时,，,最,考,虑,的,不,是,菜,的,质,量,而,是,菜,价,的,高,低,，,但,是,随,着,人,们,生,活,的,提,高,，,老,百,姓,对,农,作,物,的,要,求,也,逐,渐,提,高,了,。	C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU
现,在,还,不,能,进,行,安,乐,死,，,但,我,得,到,了,希,望,所,以,我,希,望,将,来,我,国,和,中,国,也,可,取,，,而,希,望,不,幸,的,人,得,到,幸,福,和,法,律,的,热,情,。,如,果,这,样,的,话,，,没,有,什,么,顾,虑,可,以,去,天,堂,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,S-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,R-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,M-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,W-VE,W-VE,W-DT,W-DT,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,W-VV,M-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU
虽,然,孩,子,受,到,很,好,的,影,响,，,但,不,好,的,影,响,也,同,时,受,到,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-DEV,W-VV,W-VV,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-VV,W-VV,C-PU

父,母,亲,！,我,在,学,校,里,的,生,活,很,有,兴,趣,。	S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU

但,我,深,信,爸,爸,把,教,堂,的,老,人,们,送,回,家,后,，,一,定,会,把,我,也,送,回,宿,舍,。	C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-VV,W-BA,W-PN,W-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

可,是,，,我,认,为,目,前,虽,然,中,国,人,学,习,英,语,很,热,门,，,但,是,在,大,部,分,的,地,方,跟,中,国,人,交,流,不,通,用,英,语,，,所,以,我,必,须,学,汉,语,。,而,且,，,跟,中,国,人,交,流,时,，,互,相,用,第,二,语,言,说,话,，,我,觉,得,了,解,对,象,的,意,更,难,。,如,果,我,掌,握,汉,语,的,话,，,更,容,易,了,解,对,象,的,思,想,，,感,情,什,么,的,，,而,且,跟,中,国,人,认,识,以,后,当,成,密,切,的,关,系,，,就,是,因,为,我,懂,汉,语,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-CS,C-CS,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-OD,C-OD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,S-NN,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,S-VV,S-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

”,我,说,“,什,么,事,情,让,你,怎,么,高,兴,呢,？	C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,S-AD,S-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU

我,认,为,属,于,我,们,发,达,国,家,和,发,展,中,国,家,的,人,应,该,先,想,这,个,挨,饿,的,许,多,人,们,。,当,然,为,了,我,们,的,健,康,选,吃,“,绿,色,食,品,”,是,好,的,，,但,是,一,些,挨,饿,的,人,们,连,好,多,用,化,肥,和,农,药,的,农,作,物,也,不,能,吃,。,然,后,我,们,应,该,想,办,法,帮,助,这,些,缺,少,粮,食,的,人,们,，,他,们,也,有,吃,“,绿,色,食,品,”,的,权,力,，,而,且,我,们,应,该,提,供,给,他,们,没,有,污,染,的,食,品,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,R-PN,R-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,R-CD,R-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
还,有,另,外,一,个,原,因,是,通,过,学,汉,语,，,可,交,流,很,多,的,朋,友,。,我,如,果,没,有,学,习,汉,语,的,话,，,我,可,能,一,直,在,国,内,，,只,国,内,的,人,们,交,往,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-AD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

青,年,人,对,老,年,人,的,看,法,有,一,点,儿,改,变,，,也,许,有,一,些,是,西,洋,文,化,传,进,来,的,。,例,如,他,们,认,为,，,做,父,母,亲,的,应,该,陪,养,教,育,孩,子,们,一,直,到,十,七,岁,，,而,孩,子,们,没,有,这,个,必,要,扶,养,老,人,家,当,他,们,年,老,时,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-VC,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VA,C-VA,C-LC,C-PU

来,中,国,以,后,，,我,慢,慢,学,会,了,汉,语,，,懂,得,中,国,的,历,史,和,文,化,，,我,学,汉,语,不,简,简,单,单,是,为,了,想,唱,中,文,歌,曲,，,而,是,我,想,真,正,地,了,解,中,国,。,我,现,在,生,活,在,北,京,，,是,中,国,的,首,都,，,所,以,我,觉,得,我,有,最,好,的,环,境,来,学,习,汉,语,，,来,了,解,中,国,。,现,在,已,经,有,了,一,定,的,汉,语,水,平,，,所,以,我,希,望,我,可,以,研,究,中,国,的,历,史,，,我,想,知,道,，,那,么,大,的,一,个,中,国,是,怎,么,发,展,过,来,的,。	C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,S-VC,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,M-VC,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VE,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-AS,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NR,C-NR,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-SP,C-PU

不,仅,是,对,别,人,，,吸,烟,者,本,身,也,有,很,多,不,便,。,因,为,很,多,地,方,，,如,火,车,上,、,公,车,上,、,公,众,场,所,上,已,禁,止,吸,烟,。,吸,烟,者,在,那,些,地,方,想,吸,烟,要,躲,到,洗,手,间,等,地,方,烟,，,带,来,不,便,和,烦,恼,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-PN,S-PN,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,个,人,对,安,乐,死,是,保,认,可,的,态,度,的,。	C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
那,里,有,着,很,多,新,的,机,动,游,戏,，,有,千,奇,百,怪,的,活,意,，,而,最,特,别,的,是,，,我,们,可,以,看,到,中,国,的,国,宝,—,—,熊,猫,（,安,安,和,佳,佳,）,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-JJ,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU
而,要,是,父,母,以,自,己,为,榜,样,在,家,里,好,好,儿,的,，,孩,子,也,会,同,样,喜,欢,善,良,对,待,别,人,。	C-AD,C-VV,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

”,她,的,意,思,是,汉,语,具,有,的,特,点,太,多,，,对,一,个,外,国,人,确,实,很,难,学,，,所,以,有,那,么,多,的,人,会,放,弃,。	C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

上,面,的,情,况,来,看,，,代,沟,问,题,的,最,大,的,原,因,是,都,没,有,一,起,聊,天,儿,的,机,会,。	M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

但,我,相,信,各,国,都,各,国,的,规,律,，,法,律,。,专,门,经,营,这,些,不,正,当,的,业,务,若,被,扑,，,后,果,不,堪,入,目,，,虽,然,没,有,被,判,死,刑,，,但,恐,怕,得,坐,上,监,狱,。	C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-CS,C-SB,S-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,S-AD,S-AD,C-SB,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,样,不,就,要,用,的,化,肥,量,更,大,了,吗,？,所,以,，,我,们,得,发,明,一,种,对,人,的,身,体,有,极,少,的,害,处,的,化,肥,。	C-AD,C-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-DEC,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-P,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-AD,C-VA,R-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

例,如,：,《,春,天,的,故,事,》,、,《,走,近,新,时,代,》,，,这,些,华,语,流,行,歌,曲,，,昭,示,了,中,国,的,改,革,开,放,，,邓,小,平,作,为,一,位,时,代,的,伟,人,，,他,高,瞻,远,瞩,，,中,国,只,有,走,中,国,式,的,社,会,主,义,，,中,国,才,能,繁,荣,富,强,，,中,国,人,民,的,命,运,才,能,好,转,，,实,现,小,康,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-NR,R-NR,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,赞,成,公,共,场,所,不,允,许,抽,烟,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
世,界,上,，,饥,饿,的,问,题,也,是,很,严,重,的,，,而,现,在,世,界,上,还,有,几,亿,人,口,因,缺,少,粮,食,而,挨,饿,，,所,以,应,该,要,限,制,人,口,增,加,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-CC,C-CC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
要,解,决,问,题,，,老,师,们,和,家,长,们,要,教,这,些,盲,目,的,追,求,歌,星,的,青,少,年,和,学,生,们,盲,目,追,求,歌,星,、,流,行,歌,曲,的,结,果,。,我,认,为,听,这,些,流,行,歌,曲,也,不,是,什,么,坏,事,，,因,为,它,使,青,少,年,从,学,习,的,压,力,中,摆,脱,下,来,，,但,我,希,望,这,些,青,少,年,和,学,生,们,不,只,追,求,流,行,歌,曲,、,歌,星,，,而,把,那,些,听,音,乐,的,时,间,用,在,学,习,上,，,长,大,了,会,得,到,好,结,果,，,要,成,为,祖,国,的,栋,梁,之,材,为,祖,国,做,出,贡,献,！	C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-BA,C-DT,C-DT,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
年,轻,人,觉,得,人,生,是,自,己,满,足,的,，,别,人,不,能,管,。,但,是,他,们,的,父,母,往,往,把,自,己,的,想,法,强,迫,子,女,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,R-VV,R-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-BA,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

对,１,５,岁,的,我,来,说,这,“,代,沟,”,的,问,题,可,能,也,发,现,过,，,但,我,觉,得,“,代,沟,”,这,种,现,象,最,大,的,原,因,是,父,母,和,孩,子,不,在,一,起,谈,话,。,如,果,父,母,和,孩,子,互,相,不,说,话,的,话,“,代,沟,”,的,问,题,就,会,更,严,重,，,并,且,很,难,解,决,“,代,沟,”,这,个,问,题,。	C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DT,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-PU,R-NN,R-NN,R-PU,R-DT,R-DT,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU

有,一,天,，,她,在,电,视,里,听,见,某,个,流,行,歌,曲,，,她,一,听,就,感,动,了,，,所,以,她,去,学,校,的,时,候,，,吃,饭,的,时,候,，,甚,至,学,习,的,时,候,，,她,一,直,听,流,行,歌,曲,。,有,时,候,，,为,了,看,唱,歌,的,歌,手,，,她,常,常,没,去,学,校,，,所,以,她,的,成,绩,越,来,越,不,好,。,她,的,父,母,非,常,担,心,自,己,的,孩,子,，,因,为,马,上,到,大,学,考,试,。	C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,S-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU

通,常,一,个,人,的,烟,龄,超,过,二,十,年,，,其,肺,部,发,黑,，,到,了,晚,年,对,人,的,健,康,有,十,分,不,好,影,响,，,很,容,易,引,发,肺,结,核,等,疾,病,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,M-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,M-P,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,的,导,游,工,作,非,常,出,色,，,在,两,年,内,我,已,经,成,为,带,团,最,多,的,导,游,。	C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

多,生,产,粮,食,，,减,少,饥,饿,，,没,有,把,饿,的,人,的,时,候,，,再,去,想,那,个,“,绿,色,食,品,”,吧,！	C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-VE,S-BA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-SP,C-PU
一,支,烟,里,面,含,有,很,多,种,对,自,己,的,身,体,不,利,的,要,素,。,我,在,电,视,节,目,上,看,了,很,多,由,吸,烟,过,度,死,去,的,人,们,。,他,们,大,多,都,是,吸,烟,了,几,十,年,的,烟,，,最,终,，,在,病,院,里,知,道,自,己,很,了,癌,症,。	C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,S-AD,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
所,以,从,小,父,母,亲,对,我,们,来,说,有,深,刻,的,印,象,，,无,论,遇,到,什,么,困,难,，,父,母,亲,永,远,陪,着,在,我,们,身,边,来,坚,持,我,们,是,因,为,从,小,他,们,给,我,们,的,爱,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,R-AS,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU
我,就,是,成,人,了,。,从,现,在,我,要,还,给,你,们,我,收,到,的,事,情,。	C-PN,R-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-VV,S-AD,S-P,S-PN,S-PN,S-PN,S-VV,S-VV,S-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
但,是,你,去,比,较,有,的,国,家,问,问,，,那,么,你,觉,得,他,们,应,怎,么,回,答,，,他,们,肯,定,说,“,绿,色,食,品,”,，,因,为,他,们,生,活,上,已,经,吃,的,饱,，,所,以,对,他,们,来,说,重,要,的,是,健,康,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,M-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-DEC,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

现,代,人,们,的,生,活,方,式,的,不,一,样,，,讲,究,个,性,我,们,共,同,追,求,的,是,很,少,。,但,我,们,可,以,一,起,听,流,行,音,乐,，,对,音,乐,交,谈,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,R-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU

父,母,与,孩,子,之,间,的,矛,盾,就,是,在,他,们,之,间,的,对,话,不,足,上,有,的,。,父,母,不,敢,跟,孩,子,直,接,商,量,对,孩,子,的,问,题,，,孩,子,也,不,敢,建,议,向,父,母,对,自,己,的,现,在,心,理,情,况,怎,么,样,。,因,此,为,了,解,决,这,个,问,题,，,每,天,晚,上,父,母,和,孩,子,关,于,自,己,的,今,天,的,生,活,谈,一,谈,或,者,互,相,建,议,自,己,的,想,法,，,那,么,肯,定,父,母,对,孩,子,，,孩,子,对,父,母,的,代,沟,问,题,越,来,越,咸,少,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-LC,S-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,R-P,W-PN,W-PN,W-DEG,W-NT,W-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,R-P,R-P,W-PN,W-PN,W-DEG,W-NT,W-NT,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,W-CD,W-VV,C-CC,C-CC,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-NN,W-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-NN,S-VA,C-PU
它,不,仅,对,吸,烟,人,有,害,而,会,影,响,到,周,围,环,境,。,吸,烟,的,影,响,范,围,广,大,和,长,期,，,大,家,不,能,预,料,，,不,能,计,算,吸,烟,可,带,来,的,后,果,。,吸,烟,消,极,影,响,是,把,一,个,健,康,人,变,成,一,个,衰,弱,的,人,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-VA,C-VA,C-CC,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,M-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-BA,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU
只,有,粮,食,增,产,，,我,们,才,养,活,人,口,。,其,次,，,我,们,提,供,国,家,单,位,的,帮,助,来,鼓,励,绿,色,食,品,生,产,中,。,最,后,，,用,广,告,宣,传,等,的,办,法,来,呼,吁,绿,色,食,品,的,消,费,。	C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,R-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,S-VV,S-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,所,要,应,征,的,职,位,是,一,名,经,理,，,我,是,从,哈,佛,大,学,毕,业,于,旅,游,业,的,，,除,此,以,外,，,我,也,曾,在,米,兰,啊,旅,游,业,学,校,深,造,过,。,在,那,段,时,间,，,我,参,加,了,许,多,旅,游,有,关,的,国,际,比,赛,。	C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,R-CD,R-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-SP,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,M-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,的,这,次,假,日,既,了,解,中,国,文,化,又,省,了,很,多,钱,。,我,认,为,很,值,的,。	C-PN,C-DEG,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,S-SP,C-PU
相,反,，,发,达,国,家,人,都,要,吃,绿,色,食,品,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,个,是,对,饥,饿,的,国,家,有,好,处,，,但,是,我,觉,得,吃,的,东,西,和,毒,一,样,。,这,样,做,的,不,是,完,全,安,全,的,解,决,。,先,做,没,有,污,染,的,绿,色,食,品,是,最,重,要,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,M-PU

可,是,，,孩,子,们,要,到,几,周,岁,以,上,才,开,始,有,上,学,校,或,幼,儿,园,的,机,会,，,坏,的,习,惯,可,能,一,早,已,养,成,了,，,那,时,已,经,太,迟,，,可,以,把,他,们,教,好,的,。,而,且,，,孩,子,们,其,老,师,的,时,间,也,不,会,比,其,父,母,的,多,。,虽,然,，,有,些,孩,子,会,到,寄,宿,学,校,，,但,是,，,他,们,在,幼,儿,的,时,候,已,经,是,在,跟,父,母,学,东,西,了,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-M,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-BA,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VA,R-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,R-VC,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

我,希,望,是,公,民,的,幸,福,，,才,是,那,个,国,家,的,幸,福,，,也,是,全,世,界,的,幸,福,，,我,还,希,望,不,因,农,业,人,口,的,减,少,所,带,来,全,世,界,的,饥,饿,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,R-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

那,是,我,第,一,次,出,家,生,活,的,经,验,，,用,钱,也,不,能,买,到,的,一,种,很,特,别,的,经,验,。,我,真,感,谢,你,们,两,位,许,我,去,台,湾,学,汉,语,。	C-PN,C-VC,C-PN,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,S-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-CD,C-M,S-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

他,们,没,有,就,现,在,的,我,。,从,现,在,也,想,继,续,学,他,们,的,教,训,。	W-PN,W-PN,W-AD,W-AD,C-P,M-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-PN,C-PU,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
不,过,，,我,个,人,是,觉,得,，,如,果,环,境,允,许,的,话,，,从,小,一,起,长,大,的,玩,伴,能,最,终,发,展,成,一,对,情,侣,，,然,后,走,上,红,地,毯,的,另,一,端,是,最,理,想,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-DT,C-CD,C-NN,M-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU
吃,这,个,绿,色,食,品,的,话,，,虽,然,对,身,体,好,处,但,是,觉,得,有,点,饿,。	C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-SP,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-M,C-NN,C-PU
具,体,的,话,，,最,好,从,小,学,时,学,校,开,始,教,育,吸,烟,对,人,健,康,的,影,响,等,。	C-JJ,C-JJ,S-DEG,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-JJ,C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-PU
但,是,考,虑,到,吸,烟,对,公,众,利,益,的,影,响,时,，,我,们,不,能,简,单,的,说,吸,烟,是,个,人,的,自,由,，,因,为,它,给,社,会,带,来,很,多,负,面,影,响,。,比,方,说,不,喜,欢,吸,烟,的,人,也,得,闻,到,烟,味,，,而,且,青,少,年,虽,然,还,没,有,长,大,也,有,可,能,模,仿,成,年,人,开,始,吸,烟,。,如,今,这,些,市,政,府,出,台,一,项,规,定,，,以,便,禁,止,在,公,共,场,所,边,走,边,去,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-AD,S-VV,C-PU

觉,得,不,断,的,研,究,化,肥,和,农,药,也,可,以,做,了,一,种,减,少,化,学,污,染,成,份,的,研,究,结,果,。,那,样,不,断,的,研,制,而,创,造,新,产,品,，,可,以,解,决,农,药,和,化,肥,问,题,。,虽,然,我,重,视,了,饥,饿,问,题,可,人,的,健,康,忽,视,也,不,可,以,，,有,一,定,的,程,度,上,吃,“,绿,色,食,品,”,也,是,重,要,的,。	M-VV,C-VV,M-AD,C-VV,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,R-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,S-MSP,S-VV,S-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU

可,能,每,一,个,人,经,过,“,代,沟,”,的,问,题,吧,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,S-P,S-P,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
可,是,即,使,据,法,律,禁,止,抽,烟,，,也,在,公,共,场,所,抽,烟,的,人,是,还,有,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-AD,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,W-VV,W-DEC,W-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU
首,先,说,我,也,是,吸,烟,者,之,一,。,所,以,我,写,出,对,我,这,样,吸,烟,者,来,看,的,想,法,。	C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,M-VV,C-VV,S-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-MSP,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
但,是,，,实,际,，,开,始,在,农,村,里,的,生,活,，,我,遭,遇,了,很,多,没,想,到,的,事,情,。,这,儿,地,方,的,主,要,农,产,物,是,用,沙,拉,的,素,菜,。,因,为,这,村,位,于,东,京,接,近,的,山,丘,地,带,，,而,且,东,京,的,夏,天,又,热,又,湿,，,不,能,生,产,用,沙,拉,的,素,菜,，,所,以,夏,天,也,凉,快,的,这,村,的,夏,天,很,忙,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,R-NN,R-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-VC,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-DT,M-NN,C-VV,C-VV,W-NR,W-NR,W-VV,W-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,M-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-DT,M-NN,C-DEG,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
依,我,看,法,，,把,不,挨,饿,放,在,第,一,位,。,再,说,，,我,认,为,先,解,决,挨,饿,是,更,重,要,的,问,题,。	S-P,S-PN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-BA,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,S-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
吸,烟,者,不,该,让,非,吸,烟,者,受,害,，,这,是,非,吸,烟,者,的,权,力,，,如,果,因,此,非,吸,烟,者,得,病,的,话,就,是,谁,来,负,责,呢,？,因,而,吸,烟,者,在,共,圾,所,边,不,能,抽,烟,，,这,不,是,政,府,的,负,责,的,而,是,个,人,的,道,德,问,题,。,现,代,社,会,一,天,比,一,天,发,病,率,很,高,一,些,，,所,以,应,当,注,意,一,下,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,W-P,W-PN,W-VC,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,R-AD,R-VC,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,S-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,M-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,W-CD,W-M,W-P,W-CD,W-M,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,S-AD,S-VA,R-AD,R-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-PU
但,是,痛,苦,的,生,是,有,意,义,吗,？	C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,S-DEC,C-NN,R-VC,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
还,有,研,究,把,农,作,物,的,产,量,可,以,大,大,上,升,的,方,案,，,传,给,贫,贫,国,家,种,地,的,技,术,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,W-BA,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,W-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,S-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

而,且,，,周,围,的,人,也,对,我,特,别,好,，,很,亲,切,又,热,情,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,S-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

家,务,都,留,给,我,，,妈,妈,怕,我,手,忙,脚,乱,地,做,事,，,但,是,我,年,纪,这,么,大,的,大,姑,娘,了,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,M-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
不,在,爸,爸,以,后,头,一,次,遇,到,的,‘,父,母,节,’,对,我,来,说,很,难,过,。,因,为,有,很,多,事,，,我,不,能,到,家,看,妈,妈,。	W-AD,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VE,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,小,时,候,没,有,父,亲,，,都,是,靠,着,母,亲,生,活,，,那,时,候,我,母,亲,一,定,很,辛,苦,的,。,所,以,我,现,在,也,不,知,道,父,亲,的,爱,情,，,想,起,这,件,事,情,就,感,到,很,寂,寞,。	C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,R-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
其,实,我,认,为,在,公,共,场,所,抽,烟,的,最,不,好,的,一,个,原,因,，,就,是,“,抽,烟,人,不,影,响,自,己,健,康,而,影,响,别,人,健,康,”,。,根,据,科,学,分,析,已,表,明,，,抽,烟,时,最,含,有,毒,害,物,质,就,在,从,人,的,嘴,吐,出,来,的,烟,气,里,面,。,所,以,，,在,人,口,密,集,的,商,业,中,心,里,有,许,多,人,好,不,在,乎,地,抽,烟,，,我,们,不,得,不,把,烟,吸,进,在,自,己,肺,里,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-CD,C-CD,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-AD,R-VV,R-VV,S-VV,S-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-BA,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU
其,实,现,在,在,很,多,地,方,发,生,这,样,的,事,情,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,M-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
蛋,糕,之,类,的,甜,点,，,这,些,看,起,来,优,雅,、,很,甜,，,但,其,实,做,蛋,糕,而,抓,住,顾,客,的,爱,顾,真,是,很,难,的,。,那,么,，,我,妹,妹,为,什,么,选,了,好,不,容,易,的,职,业,呢,？	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,S-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
但,如,此,的,话,，,我,们,也,没,有,理,由,去,把,世,界,上,的,所,有,人,民,推,入,生,命,危,险,中,的,！	C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,R-DEG,C-PU
那,样,的,话,两,代,人,的,代,沟,肯,定,解,决,了,。	C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-PU
不,久,她,的,哥,哥,和,一,群,人,把,我,给,救,了,，,当,时,我,知,道,怎,样,感,谢,她,，,她,那,舍,不,得,我,的,脸,使,我,发,出,了,对,她,爱,，,而,我,也,明,白,了,爱,让,一,个,人,的,黑,夜,消,退,，,进,入,无,限,光,明,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-BA,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,M-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-DT,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,S-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-P,C-PN,M-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
在,日,本,我,有,一,个,加,拿,大,的,朋,友,，,她,在,日,本,英,语,学,校,教,英,语,，,我,曾,经,在,她,的,班,里,。,下,课,之,后,我,们,经,常,到,外,去,卡,拉,Ｏ,Ｋ,、,喝,酒,。,有,一,天,她,告,诉,我,：,“,我,跟,我,父,母,黄,金,周,期,到,中,国,去,旅,游,我,们,四,月,三,十,号,到,上,海,。	C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-PN,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-LC,M-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,S-NN,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,S-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU
我,一,边,想,，,为,什,么,这,个,丈,夫,好,好,的,照,顾,妻,子,呢,？	C-PN,R-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
另,一,方,面,，,有,些,发,达,国,家,面,临,饥,饿,，,如,果,使,用,化,肥,、,农,药,的,话,，,可,以,生,产,很,多,食,品,，,也,许,他,们,也,不,会,饥,饿,，,但,是,我,认,为,，,还,是,使,用,化,肥,、,农,药,是,不,好,的,。,如,果,给,他,们,吃,这,些,污,染,食,品,，,那,早,迟,会,病,，,要,是,情,况,严,重,的,话,，,会,以,致,死,，,这,样,的,话,，,没,法,解,决,问,题,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,W-AD,W-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,W-PU,W-NN,W-NN,R-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VA,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,R-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,样,一,来,孩,子,们,过,得,非,常,富,有,的,生,活,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,R-DEC,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU
我,们,以,为,流,行,歌,曲,给,人,们,好,处,和,坏,处,。,我,们,应,该,让,孩,子,们,收,到,好,处,。	C-PN,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
她,喜,欢,吃,面,包,和,人,手,饮,料,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
总,而,言,之,，,我,觉,得,不,用,热,烈,追,求,流,行,歌,曲,，,反,而,经,常,听,古,典,歌,曲,使,我,们,的,生,活,朝,气,蓬,勃,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

如,果,一,段,时,间,不,允,许,抽,烟,的,话,，,他,们,就,会,变,得,不,安,的,情,态,，,而,且,他,们,的,身,体,越,来,越,虚,弱,，,脸,色,、,眼,睛,者,变,得,黄,，,一,点,儿,也,没,有,好,处,。,而,且,他,们,对,比,如,一,个,家,里,的,家,长,抽,烟,那,就,一,个,家,庭,都,抽,烟,一,样,的,结,果,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,R-VV,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DER,C-VA,C-VA,R-DEC,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-DER,C-NN,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,S-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,M-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,从,过,去,的,什,么,时,候,一,直,到,现,在,心,里,怀,着,你,们,俩,的,恩,惠,。,我,不,会,永,远,忘,记,。	C-PN,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,R-DEG,R-DT,R-DT,R-NN,R-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,W-AD,W-VV,W-AD,W-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
就,是,三,天,前,我,在,家,旁,边,的,人,行,道,走,一,走,时,前,面,走,的,一,位,男,的,开,始,抽,烟,。	C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-CD,S-VV,C-LC,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-CD,S-M,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
先,说,过,的,“,怎,么,说,话,”,以,外,怎,么,站,起,来,，,怎,么,走,足,，,各,个,国,家,不,同,的,吃,饭,习,惯,、,思,想,、,交,流,方,法,等,等,。,孩,子,学,习,这,些,生,活,习,惯,时,，,父,母,最,难,过,的,题,目,是,“,怎,么,教,是,最,好,的,方,法,”,那,时,父,母,每,天,考,虑,怎,么,教,走,路,、,怎,么,教,吃,饭,，,但,是,我,觉,得,父,母,自,己,的,生,活,没,有,乱,的,话,不,要,考,虑,其,它,的,方,法,。,孩,子,自,然,重,视,的,部,分,是,父,母,普,通,的,生,活,过,时,的,自,然,的,行,动,。	C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-LC,C-LC,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,S-VV,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VC,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,R-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,的,奶,奶,已,经,不,在,，,她,失,去,的,原,因,就,是,一,种,不,治,之,症,，,但,是,我,记,的,很,清,楚,她,给,我,说,的,话,：,“,不,管,以,后,我,的,病,会,带,给,我,多,少,痛,苦,，,我,的,最,后,一,天,肯,定,会,让,我,感,到,非,常,高,兴,，,因,为,我,知,道,那,一,刻,家,里,人,都,会,在,我,周,围,！,因,为,有,你,们,所,以,我,的,最,后,一,刻,钟,肯,定,会,让,我,安,乐,死,。	C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,M-PU,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,M-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-PN,W-VV,W-VV,W-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-PN,W-P,W-PN,W-VV,W-DEC,W-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-LC,C-LC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VE,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-NN,S-NN,S-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
二,是,不,知,道,对,恋,爱,。	C-CD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
这,时,我,认,为,应,先,自,我,捡,讨,的,应,该,是,父,母,吧,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
，,依,我,看,来,，,流,行,歌,曲,，,可,分,两,类,：,一,类,是,长,期,流,行,，,数,起,几,十,年,的,歌,曲,，,另,一,类,是,短,期,流,行,歌,曲,，,它,只,在,一,段,时,间,的,经,过,，,流,行,力,气,慢,慢,降,低,。	C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CD,R-M,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-P,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
但,是,只,重,视,学,业,，,而,忽,略,了,两,性,之,间,的,沟,通,及,信,任,感,的,建,设,，,也,将,成,为,孩,子,学,习,过,程,中,所,缺,席,的,宝,贵,课,程,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-MSP,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
近,年,以,来,，,在,世,界,各,国,为,人,们,举,办,戒,烟,活,动,，,这,样,的,活,动,有,助,于,人,们,的,身,体,健,康,，,还,有,利,于,保,护,环,境,。,除,了,活,动,以,外,，,在,公,共,场,所,也,有,时,规,定,禁,止,吸,烟,。,那,么,对,人,的,健,康,具,体,有,什,么,危,害,呢,？	C-NT,C-NT,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-P,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

第,一,，,人,类,需,要,吃,东,西,的,主,要,目,的,是,保,护,身,体,健,康,。,假,如,我,们,吃,得,饱,，,但,是,吃,的,东,西,对,身,体,有,害,的,话,，,我,们,身,体,的,健,康,会,损,失,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-DER,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU
代,沟,是,以,前,有,了,，,现,在,也,有,，,以,后,也,一,定,有,。	C-NN,C-NN,R-VC,C-P,C-LC,C-VE,R-AS,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-VE,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-PU
因,为,已,大,家,都,知,道,抽,烟,的,坏,处,。	C-P,C-P,W-AD,W-JJ,W-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
由,于,没,有,任,何,的,化,学,成,分,，,对,人,类,的,健,康,特,别,好,。,所,以,人,们,为,了,保,持,自,己,的,健,康,，,越,自,己,的,生,活,条,件,丰,富,，,越,寻,找,这,种,保,健,食,品,。,可,是,，,跟,用,化,肥,和,农,作,物,相,比,，,产,量,不,多,，,不,能,充,当,人,类,现,在,对,面,的,饥,饿,问,题,。	C-P,C-P,C-VE,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-AD,W-PN,W-PN,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NT,C-NT,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
做,为,长,辈,人,应,该,除,了,教,育,子,女,以,外,，,去,学,学,电,脑,等,新,科,技,，,增,加,和,子,女,之,间,兴,趣,及,爱,好,的,话,题,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,W-VV,W-VV,W-P,W-P,W-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,W-LC,W-LC,W-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,M-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,能,帮,忙,解,决,现,今,社,会,受,高,深,教,育,的,男,女,迟,恋,爱,，,迟,结,婚,与,迟,生,育,或,不,生,育,的,难,题,。	C-PN,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
現,代,科,学,进,步,越,快,越,地,球,得,病,的,情,况,也,越,来,越,严,重,。	C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,R-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
面,对,挫,折,，,人,小,不,免,都,会,觉,得,为,什,么,上,天,这,么,不,公,平,，,选,择,了,自,己,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,R-JJ,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU
最,重,要,的,关,键,不,管,是,怎,么,相,识,，,总,之,，,彼,此,能,够,了,解,对,方,，,容,忍,对,方,，,将,会,有,一,个,美,满,的,婚,姻,，,有,一,个,幸,福,的,家,庭,，,也,有,一,个,终,身,的,好,伴,侣,。	C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,R-NN,R-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
能,够,生,存,、,活,下,去,的,人,数,多,了,，,那,就,自,然,而,能,解,决,上,述,的,问,题,的,人,出,来,的,刻,率,也,多,了,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-AS,C-PU,C-PN,R-AD,C-AD,C-AD,R-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,S-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-AS,C-PU

绿,色,食,品,是,我,们,以,为,最,理,想,的,食,品,，,这,种,食,品,没,受,到,任,何,的,污,染,，,所,以,很,多,人,都,欢,迎,吃,绿,色,食,品,。,毕,竟,，,要,是,劝,奖,让,人,们,吃,绿,色,食,品,，,农,业,生,产,量,一,定,降,低,下,，,所,以,会,有,影,响,给,饥,饿,，,可,是,对,人,类,最,重,要,是,保,护,健,康,。	C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,R-VV,R-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-VV,W-VE,W-NN,W-NN,S-VV,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,M-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

从,婴,儿,开,始,，,我,们,每,天,都,跟,父,母,接,触,，,我,们,说,的,一,举,一,动,不,但,在,语,言,表,达,方,面,，,甚,至,在,性,格,方,面,都,离,不,开,父,母,所,引,起,的,影,响,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,R-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
解,决,方,法,是,首,先,发,现,有,饥,饿,地,方,的,话,帮,助,他,们,不,让,饥,饿,死,。,如,比,，,美,国,、,英,国,、,日,本,等,条,件,好,的,国,家,多,帮,助,解,决,，,提,供,食,品,什,么,的,。,应,该,富,裕,的,国,家,帮,助,穷,的,国,家,，,人,人,都,帮,助,好,的,话,可,以,解,决,这,个,问,题,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-PU,S-AD,S-P,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-ETC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-PU,W-VV,W-VV,W-VA,W-VA,W-DEC,W-NN,W-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,篇,小,故,事,告,诉,我,们,，,只,追,求,自,己,个,人,的,利,益,不,追,求,大,家,共,同,的,利,益,，,导,致,连,一,个,人,的,利,益,也,得,不,到,的,严,重,后,果,。	C-DT,C-M,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-VV,C-VV,C-AD,R-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
有,人,说,，,国,家,可,从,香,烟,的,税,收,里,得,到,许,多,钱,，,如,果,不,让,人,们,吸,烟,，,国,家,不,是,少,收,许,多,钱,了,吗,？	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,M-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-SP,C-SP,C-PU

我,们,不,仅,在,大,街,上,，,甚,至,连,家,小,餐,馆,、,小,街,上,都,能,听,到,流,行,音,乐,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,R-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
我,们,不,甘,于,现,状,，,要,追,求,更,好,的,解,决,方,法,，,所,以,我,希,望,科,学,家,们,努,力,寻,找,而,制,造,对,人,体,没,有,害,处,，,而,且,能,提,高,生,产,量,的,农,药,。,如,果,我,们,能,发,明,这,种,农,药,，,那,么,我,们,怀,有,的,问,题,就,都,能,解,决,。,我,们,目,前,只,等,待,这,日,子,的,过,来,，,不,得,不,吃,被,化,学,污,染,的,食,品,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,S-VV,S-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-LB,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,来,中,国,的,理,由,之,一,是,家,长,每,次,什,么,时,候,都,帮,我,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,R-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU
还,是,不,去,的,好,呢,？	M-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,R-DEC,C-JJ,C-SP,C-PU
那,怎,么,解,决,吸,烟,对,个,人,健,康,和,公,众,利,益,的,问,题,呢,？,首,先,，,对,公,共,场,所,抽,烟,的,人,国,家,制,定,措,施,并,开,始,实,施,。,因,为,社,会,不,是,抽,烟,者,的,，,非,抽,烟,者,也,有,社,会,权,利,，,所,以,让,抽,烟,者,注,意,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
比,如,，,如,果,父,母,爱,看,书,，,喜,欢,帮,助,别,人,，,这,一,切,都,很,显,然,影,响,到,他,们,的,孩,子,，,当,他,们,遇,到,不,幸,的,人,们,他,也,会,想,办,法,来,帮,助,他,们,，,这,是,因,为,他,们,在,父,母,身,上,学,到,了,关,爱,别,人,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
到,现,在,，,做,点,心,是,我,的,爱,好,之,一,。	R-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-VC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,父,母,他,们,的,性,格,是,特,别,特,别,大,方,的,，,不,管,做,什,么,事,都,很,认,真,，,而,且,做,得,很,好,的,。,我,从,我,母,亲,学,到,的,东,西,是,最,多,的,。,她,常,常,跟,我,说,：,做,什,么,事,都,要,认,真,，,无,论,结,果,如,何,都,一,定,得,努,力,才,行,，,最,重,要,的,就,是,你,所,做,过,的,过,程,，,而,不,是,结,果,。	C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,R-AD,R-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-VA,R-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,R-AS,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
而,且,，,为,了,治,病,所,需,要,的,费,用,也,不,少,。,如,果,经,济,方,面,有,困,难,的,话,就,不,能,去,病,院,。,在,不,想,给,大,家,添,麻,烦,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,R-P,R-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,S-P,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

随,着,现,在,的,到,来,，,两,代,之,间,会,发,生,那,样,的,问,题,。,两,代,人,首,先,承,认,这,一,个,点,。	C-P,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,R-CD,C-NN,C-PU

因,为,我,丈,夫,是,在,老,挝,做,公,务,员,的,，,老,挝,的,公,务,员,的,工,资,一,个,月,只,有,５,块,美,元,，,这,样,怎,么,够,用,呢,？	C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,R-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
但,关,健,是,不,要,过,于,的,喜,欢,。,比,如,，,喜,欢,的,歌,星,达,到,痴,迷,的,程,度,影,响,学,习,。	C-AD,C-NR,C-NR,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,S-AD,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,M-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
他,们,总,是,觉,得,流,行,歌,曲,是,在,世,界,上,根,本,不,要,的,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-DEC,C-PU
但,是,，,吸,烟,者,有,吸,烟,的,权,力,，,所,以,人,家,吸,烟,我,们,管,不,着,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU

总,而,言,之,，,吸,烟,对,个,人,健,康,和,公,众,利,益,带,来,很,不,好,的,影,响,，,所,以,为,了,提,高,个,人,健,康,质,量,和,公,众,利,益,，,我,们,要,采,取,各,种,各,样,的,可,以,减,少,吸,烟,者,的,政,策,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,R-VV,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
孩,子,看,着,父,母,的,背,而,成,长,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
没,有,人,教,我,工,作,，,当,然,我,失,败,，,可,是,同,事,们,批,评,我,。,那,时,我,不,高,兴,，,提,了,意,见,，,然,后,我,的,主,任,这,样,回,答,“,你,的,想,法,不,对,而,错,觉,的,。,你,已,经,大,人,了,，,不,是,孩,子,，,什,么,事,情,都,自,己,有,责,任,，,这,儿,不,是,学,校,，,在,这,儿,里,你,的,身,份,并,不,是,学,生,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-MSP,R-VV,R-VV,R-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,M-JJ,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,W-AD,W-PN,W-PN,W-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-LC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

若,子,女,开,始,进,入,青,春,期,时,，,作,父,母,的,应,该,以,朋,友,身,份,问,及,他,们,的,心,中,对,象,。,尤,其,是,女,儿,，,事,先,我,们,身,为,父,母,的,，,特,别,是,母,亲,，,应,在,她,未,有,心,上,人,之,前,，,对,她,谈,起,一,些,涉,及,寻,找,对,象,的,经,验,，,并,告,诉,她,，,身,为,女,儿,家,处,处,要,小,心,谨,慎,，,别,让,男,生,占,了,便,宜,，,所,谓,一,失,足,成,千,古,恨,等,等,。,那,对,她,往,后,在,选,择,对,象,时,会,留,下,深,刻,的,印,象,。	S-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-AD,R-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,R-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU,C-PN,S-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

由,于,最,近,遇,到,禽,流,感,，,使,公,司,面,对,财,务,问,题,，,导,致,关,门,。	C-P,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU
虽,然,我,们,解,决,不,了,世,界,上,的,饥,饿,现,象,但,是,用,化,肥,做,农,产,物,帮,助,他,们,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU
为,了,解,决,我,和,爷,爷,之,间,的,代,沟,，,他,们,当,了,中,介,人,，,常,常,给,我,说,爷,爷,长,的,时,候,的,情,况,，,他,在,日,本,工,作,时,的,困,难,什,么,的,。	C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU
所,以,这,和,尚,的,事,也,是,，,当,然,麻,烦,的,事,替,我,别,人,做,非,常,高,兴,。,但,是,麻,烦,的,事,中,，,肯,定,有,可,以,学,会,的,地,方,。,他,们,和,尚,也,喝,水,没,了,，,应,该,有,人,抬,水,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-CC,C-AD,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,W-P,W-PN,W-NN,W-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-CC,C-AD,C-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-VE,C-SP,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU
所,以,我,认,为,最,重,要,的,教,育,在,于,父,母,的,人,性,方,面,教,育,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU
等,一,会,儿,吧,。	S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-SP,C-PU
父,母,以,为,如,果,自,己,得,了,一,种,不,治,之,症,，,会,对,我,很,多,麻,烦,。,虽,然,他,们,这,么,说,，,我,不,能,给,他,们,做,安,乐,死,。,可,是,，,如,果,他,们,得,了,痛,苦,的,不,治,之,症,，,我,也,不,得,不,做,安,乐,死,的,方,法,，,为,了,他,们,的,要,求,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,S-P,C-PN,M-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,M-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,M-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,们,四,个,人,上,高,中,学,生,的,时,候,，,常,常,跟,父,母,有,“,代,沟,”,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU
有,了,你,们,这,么,大,的,爱,情,，,我,们,能,好,好,长,大,了,。	C-VE,C-AS,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
对,于,这,样,的,地,方,已,经,不,比,从,前,了,吧,！	R-P,R-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-SP,C-SP,C-PU
因,为,我,想,让,你,们,失,望,不,想,让,你,们,担,心,所,以,没,有,告,诉,。	C-P,C-P,C-PN,M-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU

因,为,我,们,的,大,部,分,没,有,面,临,过,自,己,“,死,”,的,现,实,。,我,连,家,里,人,的,不,治,之,症,也,没,经,过,。,所,以,我,很,难,以,想,象,“,安,乐,死,”,的,情,况,。	C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,M-DEG,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

当,然,，,如,果,父,母,从,小,就,对,自,己,的,孩,子,大,声,呼,骂,或,者,是,动,不,动,就,打,孩,子,，,这,样,这,些,孩,子,就,会,对,任,何,事,情,都,产,生,恐,惧,，,甚,至,对,应,该,做,的,事,情,也,怕,挨,打,而,不,敢,勇,地,去,做,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-CC,C-CC,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,S-DEV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-PU
我,喜,欢,上,学,的,日,子,，,因,为,学,校,里,教,师,和,同,学,都,很,融,洽,。,课,余,时,间,都,参,加,唱,歌,舞,蹈,训,练,，,每,逢,儿,童,节,、,国,庆,日,都,参,与,文,娱,演,出,，,心,里,总,感,觉,又,快,乐,又,光,荣,。,下,课,时,在,学,校,聊,天,，,那,时,的,友,情,可,多,纯,洁,啊,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
如,果,有,剩,钱,的,话,，,您,和,爸,爸,不,如,用,那,些,钱,到,处,观,光,，,好,不,好,嘛,？,别,再,为,女,儿,的,钱,财,问,题,挂,心,了,！	C-CS,C-CS,C-VE,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU

父,亲,是,文,弱,书,生,，,到,过,城,市,—,—,厦,门,上,过,中,学,，,好,像,是,双,十,中,学,吧,，,回,乡,后,执,教,于,崇,文,小,学,，,也,当,过,校,长,。,母,亲,家,是,茶,农,，,未,嫁,前,以,采,茶,帮,助,家,费,，,十,六,岁,那,年,就,下,嫁,我,爸,，,当,然,那,时,是,由,媒,人,撮,合,的,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,R-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-LC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NT,C-NT,C-LC,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-LC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
听,说,间,接,吸,烟,比,直,接,吸,烟,的,不,利,更,厉,害,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-AD,S-VA,S-VA,C-PU
这,样,，,我,受,到,压,力,时,、,身,体,累,时,、,心,情,不,好,时,，,音,乐,都,成,我,的,朋,友,解,决,我,当,面,的,问,题,我,认,为,不,管,什,么,种,类,的,音,乐,，,如,果,我,们,好,好,利,用,或,听,的,话,，,流,行,歌,曲,会,对,我,们,的,精,神,有,很,大,的,好,处,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,S-AD,S-AD,C-DEV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CS,C-CS,C-DT,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,觉,得,，,我,们,做,父,母,对,子,女,的,态,度,不,要,太,专,制,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
心,理,学,家,指,出,，,在,中,学,生,时,期,往,往,是,学,生,叛,逆,之,时,。,若,家,长,越,是,压,抑,孩,子,接,触,异,性,，,只,会,让,孩,子,更,加,好,奇,、,更,加,渴,望,早,日,与,异,性,在,一,起,。,我,们,可,以,预,测,得,到,，,一,旦,学,生,毕,业,，,他,们,反,而,会,比,现,今,的,学,生,更,活,跃,于,男,女,情,感,、,甚,至,是,滥,交,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,R-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU

要,是,我,们,是,个,文,明,的,、,对,别,人,有,理,解,的,人,，,不,应,该,在,公,共,场,所,抽,烟,，,保,持,自,己,的,健,康,，,而,而,得,考,虑,别,人,的,健,康,。	C-VV,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-VC,R-M,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU,R-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-VE,W-VV,W-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,M-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

四,年,前,，,我,的,一,个,老,同,学,因,为,发,生,交,通,事,故,而,受,了,大,伤,，,而,且,他,从,此,到,现,在,一,直,没,有,醒,过,变,成,植,物,人,了,。	C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,R-VV,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-AS,S-JJ,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,S-AD,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

妈,，,您,不,把,饭,菜,做,给,我,，,也,我,自,己,会,做,而,吃,。,您,不,把,我,的,衣,服,洗,干,净,，,也,我,自,己,会,洗,。	C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,W-AD,W-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-MSP,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-BA,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,W-AD,W-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
