比,如,说,，,为,发,泄,苦,，,为,引,人,注,目,等,。,可,是,反,对,吸,烟,，,因,为,吸,烟,对,个,人,健,康,没,有,什,么,好,处,，,据,统,计,，,吸,烟,者,比,非,烟,者,更,容,易,得,肺,癌,等,疾,病,，,而,且,吸,烟,对,非,吸,烟,者,的,健,康,有,坏,处,，,吸,烟,可,以,影,响,到,非,吸,烟,者,的,健,康,，,所,以,吸,烟,者,为,公,众,利,益,应,该,在,公,共,场,所,别,边,走,边,抽,烟,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-ETC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DER,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

如,果,不,用,化,肥,和,农,药,，,生,做,绿,色,食,品,的,话,，,农,作,物,的,产,量,就,会,降,低,，,而,且,现,在,世,界,上,有,很,多,没,有,东,西,吃,的,人,。,为,了,少,数,人,的,健,康,，,不,想,饥,饿,的,人,，,这,儿,有,道,理,吗,？,反,正,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,，,对,人,的,健,康,没,有,很,大,的,印,象,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,S-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,R-PN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
我,觉,得,为,了,我,们,身,体,健,康,吃,绿,色,食,品,重,要,，,但,是,大,大,提,高,生,产,量,来,救,那,些,没,有,粮,食,吃,的,人,更,重,要,。,因,为,我,们,都,是,在,地,球,上,出,生,的,，,无,论,你,是,哪,国,人,你,也,逃,不,出,地,球,外,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-VC,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-PU
再,来,，,如,果,坚,持,把,男,生,与,女,生,分,开,就,读,的,话,，,可,能,会,引,起,社,会,问,题,。	S-AD,S-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
三,年,之,间,很,多,人,问,我,：,“,你,为,什,么,来,北,京,学,汉,语,？,”,那,时,候,我,每,次,不,能,顺,利,地,回,答,。	C-CD,C-M,S-LC,S-LC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,M-AD,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

我,认,为,这,个,办,法,最,好,，,因,为,人,间,的,社,会,和,技,术,、,科,学,，,快,速,发,展,好,像,飞,机,一,样,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-AD,W-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-AD,W-AD,W-NN,W-NN,W-VA,W-VA,C-PU

但,是,总,觉,得,我,在,像,你,们,般,的,父,母,下,生,生,过,来,就,太,好,了,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,S-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-LC,C-VV,S-VV,R-VV,R-VV,R-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
一,般,都,是,日,出,而,作,，,日,入,而,息,，,一,家,人,早,晚,都,碰,面,，,噓,寒,问,暖,，,融,融,洽,洽,的,。,当,然,作,为,父,亲,的,古,代,人,有,时,难,免,板,起,面,孔,，,冷,冰,冰,地,对,着,孩,子,，,这,也,不,过,是,遵,从,古,训,严,父,出,孝,子,的,一,项,教,子,策,略,而,已,，,冷,面,孔,下,还,是,让,孩,子,感,觉,出,颗,颗,溫,暖,爱,子,女,的,心,，,做,娘,的,更,不,用,提,了,，,孩,子,是,她,们,骨,中,的,骨,，,肉,中,之,肉,，,呵,护,唯,恐,不,及,呢,！,我,们,中,华,民,族,的,家,庭,教,育,就,是,在,爷,的,唱,黑,臉,，,娘,的,唱,青,衣,的,环,境,薰,陶,下,，,一,代,代,火,尽,薪,传,，,延,续,下,来,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VA,C-PU,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,S-NN,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-VE,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,R-CD,R-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-M,S-M,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,M-VV,C-DEC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-NN,C-DEG,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

最,近,，,在,公,共,场,所,，,比,如,地,铁,、,餐,厅,、,公,园,、,洗,手,间,，,有,些,参,观,的,地,方,等,等,不,允,许,抽,烟,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,M-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
其,实,吸,烟,比,烟,味,更,有,对,身,体,的,坏,处,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,W-AD,W-VE,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
他,们,带,给,孩,子,的,影,响,将,会,波,及,到,孩,子,的,成,功,于,否,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-AD,C-PU

但,是,，,也,有,喜,欢,流,行,歌,曲,，,甚,至,还,有,人,非,常,蔑,视,流,行,歌,曲,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
大,家,一,起,喝,的,结,果,就,没,了,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-VE,C-SP,C-PU
吸,烟,对,公,众,毫,无,利,益,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
我,认,为,同,性,之,间,的,互,相,竞,争,比,与,异,性,的,大,，,可,以,让,学,生,们,有,更,大,的,自,觉,性,与,别,人,比,较,，,并,锻,锻,我,们,的,竞,争,能,力,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,S-PN,S-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
生,活,上,用,的,最,基,本,的,东,西,都,是,从,我,父,母,学,的,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-SP,C-PU
我,特,别,注,意,的,是,父,母,不,应,该,当,做,一,个,知,道,任,何,事,情,的,人,，,要,做,个,好,朋,友,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

有,的,人,认,为,吃,“,绿,色,食,品,”,比,不,挨,饿,更,重,要,的,而,有,的,人,认,为,我,们,首,先,应,该,解,决,饥,饿,的,问,题,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,R-DEC,C-MSP,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
除,非,牛,你,直,接,饮,它,，,一,般,的,情,况,下,是,没,有,问,题,的,。	C-CS,C-CS,R-NN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VC,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
有,的,家,人,认,为,只,要,能,看,到,自,己,所,爱,的,人,的,肉,体,心,情,就,好,一,点,，,也,还,可,以,期,待,着,奇,迹,；,但,有,的,家,人,觉,得,看,到,自,己,亲,人,像,机,器,人,或,者,试,验,体,一,般,被,医,疗,机,器,围,着,，,心,里,都,受,不,了,了,。,他,们,宁,可,让,他,安,稳,地,送,到,天,堂,里,去,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,M-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-LB,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,R-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-PU
我,是,如,果,听,到,有,些,人,说,那,首,歌,好,听,的,话,，,就,听,那,首,歌,，,可,是,一,听,觉,得,不,好,听,的,话,，,我,就,不,听,了,，,然,后,过,几,天,后,再,听,那,首,歌,，,那,样,的,话,，,觉,得,很,好,听,，,很,奇,怪,呀,！	C-PN,R-VC,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-VV,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
其,实,农,村,发,生,了,上,面,一,件,事,，,在,互,相,同,意,下,帮,助,她,自,杀,。,我,们,的,奶,奶,也,用,“,安,乐,死,”,的,方,法,回,去,天,堂,了,。,这,也,是,不,是,亲,戚,们,觉,得,把,她,照,顾,很,辛,苦,，,而,是,只,有,存,在,爱,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,S-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-P,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,R-VC,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-BA,W-PN,W-VV,W-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,R-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

我,还,有,话,跟,您,说,，,不,要,太,说,爸,爸,啦,！	C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

我,觉,得,男,女,分,班,未,免,能,避,免,学,生,早,恋,因,为,学,生,们,还,可,以,有,早,恋,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NR,C-NR,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
如,果,不,解,决,这,个,问,题,，,贫,困,挨,饿,的,人,为,了,自,己,的,生,存,，,更,破,坏,环,境,，,比,如,砍,伐,森,林,资,源,，,绝,灭,野,生,动,物,。,如,果,因,贫,困,而,破,坏,环,境,，,对,富,裕,阶,层,将,来,不,能,生,存,下,去,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-NN,S-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
有,别,个,案,件,也,是,妻,子,让,丈,夫,帮,助,她,自,杀,，,但,这,个,案,件,是,因,为,他,们,没,钱,所,以,就,这,样,做,。	C-VE,S-CD,S-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU

但,是,我,们,知,道,放,弃,什,么,、,选,择,什,么,都,给,我,们,带,来,负,面,的,影,响,。,就,是,说,，,人,们,还,没,定,论,，,吃,“,绿,色,食,品,”,和,不,挨,饿,哪,个,是,第,一,位,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,M-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VC,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-SP,C-PU
我,们,能,够,利,用,政,府,的,客,观,的,政,策,和,化,肥,生,产,企,业,的,技,术,完,善,完,全,可,以,解,决,污,染,问,题,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,R-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
其,实,我,差,不,多,每,次,在,家,里,做,什,么,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,M-PN,C-PN,C-PU
而,且,弟,弟,还,是,９,岁,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-PU
因,为,就,这,样,我,的,Ｈ,Ｓ,Ｋ,汉,语,水,平,考,试,准,考,不,上,了,。,我,心,里,很,难,过,给,您,带,来,失,望,。,虽,然,我,这,次,考,不,上,，,下,次,我,会,考,上,的,。	C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-PN,R-VV,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,C-SP,C-PU
如,今,，,在,上,戒,烟,运,动,进,行,开,展,。,同,时,，,各,国,政,府,出,台,一,项,规,定,，,在,公,共,场,所,吸,烟,的,人,将,被,罚,款,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,R-P,R-VV,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,M-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-SB,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
但,是,很,多,时,父,母,没,有,意,识,到,，,孩,子,们,学,的,知,识,不,仅,从,上,课,的,时,得,到,的,而,且,也,会,从,父,母,身,上,学,到,的,。,父,母,认,为,，,把,孩,子,送,到,一,个,很,好,的,学,校,就,够,了,，,但,是,他,不,知,道,如,果,孩,子,们,每,天,也,正,在,试,探,自,己,的,父,母,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,S-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-CS,R-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

而,且,曾,几,何,时,在,大,家,庭,里,生,活,，,爷,爷,，,奶,奶,等,生,育,过,孩,子,的,“,老,师,”,的,指,导,、,帮,助,之,下,可,以,养,孩,子,的,情,况,变,成,，,而,如,今,的,小,家,庭,就,是,没,有,经,验,、,没,有,老,师,的,情,况,下,要,养,孩,子,。,父,母,的,对,孩,子,的,所,有,的,责,任,更,大,了,。,孩,子,只,能,看,父,母,两,个,人,，,他,们,的,一,圆,一,动,就,影,响,到,孩,子,的,后,来,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,M-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,S-CD,S-NN,S-AD,S-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU

一,是,后,来,人,们,生,活,很,齐,全,很,富,裕,，,在,城,里,想,吃,什,么,都,有,，,因,此,吃,的,太,多,，,太,奢,侈,，,市,民,没,想,到,还,有,其,他,人,没,有,吃,，,挨,饿,。	C-CD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VE,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-DEC,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
我,一,个,人,在,家,里,跟,你,们,过,生,活,，,所,以,有,时,我,忙,得,没,关,心,你,们,。,我,看,，,妈,感,觉,“,没,人,关,心,我,”,这,样,。	C-PN,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-LC,C-PN,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VE,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,R-PN,R-PN,C-PU

然,而,在,今,天,这,个,充,满,竞,争,紧,张,的,社,会,里,，,我,们,又,能,怎,样,安,排,时,间,和,选,择,有,益,的,书,籍,来,阅,读,呢,？,以,下,是,简,单,谈,述,我,的,一,点,看,法,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-DT,C-DT,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-VA,R-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,S-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,R-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

即,使,增,强,了,公,众,对,健,康,的,意,识,，,也,增,强,了,个,人,的,意,识,。	S-CS,S-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,觉,得,父,母,十,分,重,要,，,可,是,孩,子,身,边,的,任,何,交,流,（,对,话,、,争,吵,等,）,的,重,要,性,我,们,研,究,这,一,问,题,时,候,并,不,应,该,忽,视,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

人,们,的,生,活,水,平,提,高,了,，,全,面,比,较,稳,定,了,，,就,忘,记,了,从,前,的,苦,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-AD,R-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU
其,中,，,农,产,品,是,占,最,多,的,比,重,。,因,为,许,多,产,品,中,农,产,品,是,人,的,食,品,中,最,多,吃,的,而,基,本,的,食,品,。,随,着,环,境,、,气,候,的,变,化,人,们,只,好,用,各,种,化,肥,和,农,药,。	S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-VC,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,R-CD,R-CD,R-NN,R-NN,R-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,S-AD,S-VV,C-DEC,C-MSP,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
对,于,吸,烟,者,来,讲,，,禁,烟,问,题,不,只,是,一,两,年,持,续,的,斗,争,。,随,着,公,众,利,益,的,重,要,性,强,大,，,禁,烟,措,施,实,行,得,更,加,严,厉,，,这,使,吸,烟,者,无,地,自,容,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VA,S-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
后,来,，,中,学,的,国,文,老,师,余,得,仙,很,常,来,我,家,，,在,我,房,里,一,坐,就,是,整,个,上,午,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DER,C-VV,R-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU

但,是,年,岁,越,来,越,大,，,我,们,会,说,。,这,是,我,们,对,父,母,受,到,影,响,了,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-PN,C-VC,M-PN,C-PN,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

所,以,一,个,星,期,一,次,回,家,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NT,C-NT,W-NT,W-M,W-VV,W-VV,C-PU
可,是,，,我,认,为,对,人,们,最,受,欢,迎,的,就,是,流,行,歌,曲,。,有,的,人,认,为,流,行,歌,曲,是,年,轻,人,喜,欢,的,歌,曲,，,可,这,种,想,法,是,错,的,，,我,觉,得,不,管,什,么,种,类,的,音,乐,，,只,是,听,的,人,感,到,好,听,，,那,么,都,能,喜,欢,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,R-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-AD,W-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CS,C-CS,M-DT,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,M-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU
父,母,传,给,孩,子,除,了,血,和,肉,之,外,还,有,思,想,，,最,影,响,孩,子,就,是,父,母,的,思,想,和,看,法,。,每,一,个,小,孩,都,在,这,个,环,境,里,，,他,就,很,自,然,有,影,响,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,一,个,人,认,为,农,作,物,的,生,产,过,程,中,不,要,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,，,因,为,化,肥,和,农,药,会,对,人,体,引,起,严,重,危,害,。,农,作,物,生,产,过,程,中,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,会,增,加,农,作,物,的,产,量,，,也,可,以,解,决,在,世,界,上,几,亿,人,的,因,缺,少,粮,食,而,挨,饿,问,题,。,但,对,世,界,上,的,饥,饿,问,题,来,说,，,在,世,界,上,有,地,国,家,的,农,作,物,的,产,量,比,自,己,国,家,的,需,要,，,我,们,可,以,用,那,些,国,家,不,太,需,要,的,农,作,物,来,解,决,世,界,饥,饿,问,题,。	C-PN,S-CD,S-CD,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,R-DEG,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

反,正,以,前,我,不,是,歌,迷,可,已,经,变,了,，,所,以,对,流,行,歌,曲,感,兴,趣,，,为,什,么,很,多,人,喜,欢,听,流,行,歌,而,变,歌,迷,？	C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,为,我,想,人,民,大,家,都,必,有,一,个,权,利,—,—,就,是,选,选,“,死,”,的,权,力,。	C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,R-NN,R-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-PU,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
喜,不,喜,欢,流,行,歌,曲,是,一,种,偏,爱,的,做,法,或,错,或,对,没,有,送,连,，,所,以,我,不,会,排,斥,别,人,不,喜,欢,它,们,因,我,想,我,们,该,尊,重,别,人,的,爱,好,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-CC,C-P,C-VE,C-VE,S-VV,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,M-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,是,新,加,坡,国,立,大,学,大,学,毕,业,，,在,那,儿,专,修,语,文,，,修,读,了,日,语,。	C-PN,C-VC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,的,爸,爸,很,爱,说,：,“,我,小,的,时,候,，,不,像,跟,你,那,样,弱,。	C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,R-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
自,一,九,九,六,年,，,印,尼,政,府,对,华,校,禁,闭,后,，,对,我,们,这,些,在,读,的,华,侨,子,女,受,到,了,严,重,的,打,击,。,我,只,能,在,家,自,修,，,看,书,、,阅,读,来,提,高,自,己,的,汉,语,水,平,。,但,这,对,于,当,时,刚,刚,念,完,初,中,一,课,程,的,我,显,得,无,比,的,吃,力,，,因,为,自,己,所,学,到,的,词,汇,是,有,限,的,，,而,且,当,时,又,没,有,什,么,书,可,供,我,们,参,考,。	C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,R-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DT,C-DT,C-P,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-P,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,S-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-PN,M-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

最,近,我,发,现,了,我,周,围,抽,烟,人,的,人,很,多,。,不,管,是,男,性,或,女,性,、,中,国,人,或,外,国,人,，,除,了,几,个,朋,友,以,外,几,乎,都,抽,烟,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,S-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,S-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
我,个,人,认,为,市,民,口,均,一,根,烟,的,社,会,状,况,着,实,反,映,出,当,地,人,民,的,愚,鲁,和,自,私,。,根,据,医,学,调,查,表,示,，,抽,烟,或,吸,取,过,量,二,手,烟,的,孕,妇,生,出,畸,型,儿,的,机,率,都,会,普,遍,比,一,般,人,来,得,高,。,倘,若,人,们,知,道,这,个,资,讯,，,妇,女,们,了,解,当,中,带,来,的,影,响,，,却,依,然,故,我,地,猛,对,着,未,世,面,的,孩,儿,吞,云,吐,雾,，,除,了,说,他,们,愚,鲁,，,我,可,想,不,出,另,一,个,更,贴,切,的,形,容,词,了,。	C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AS,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,W-VV,W-AD,W-AD,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-VV,C-DER,C-VA,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,S-AD,S-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEV,C-VA,C-VA,C-AS,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
这,是,说,，,无,论,我,们,意,识,到,没,有,，,我,们,在,社,会,中,生,活,，,在,工,作,上,或,者,在,家,里,跟,其,它,的,人,交,流,。	C-PN,C-VC,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-VE,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-CC,C-CC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-CC,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

是,为,了,保,持,整,洁,，,保,护,非,吸,烟,者,。,这,对,社,会,来,讲,，,肯,定,是,一,件,好,事,，,可,是,这,也,会,害,有,些,公,司,。,比,如,，,日,本,有,的,饭,店,禁,止,吸,烟,后,，,客,人,愈,来,愈,少,了,，,是,因,为,，,吸,烟,者,不,愿,意,住,这,饭,店,。	M-VC,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-VE,S-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,M-VC,C-P,C-P,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

“,爸,，,妈,，,我,一,直,想,你,们,辛,苦,地,工,作,捕,养,我,们,姐,弟,的,恩,惠,，,但,我,呢,，,每,天,不,听,你,们,说,的,话,不,努,力,学,习,，,经,常,跟,弟,弟,吵,架,，,给,你,们,失,望,，,我,真,对,不,起,你,们,。,我,一,直,到,现,在,没,孝,顺,，,我,年,纪,大,了,到,现,在,才,懂,事,了,。	C-PU,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-AS,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU

在,世,界,国,家,社,会,生,产,力,的,发,展,角,度,来,看,，,世,界,国,家,可,以,分,为,三,种,国,家,：,第,一,种,是,发,达,国,家,，,他,们,的,社,会,生,产,力,已,经,发,展,水,平,很,高,，,饥,饿,的,问,题,不,大,；,第,二,种,是,发,展,中,国,家,，,他,们,的,社,会,生,产,力,正,在,维,持,高,速,发,展,，,饥,饿,的,问,题,也,差,不,多,已,经,解,决,或,饥,饿,问,题,解,决,已,经,达,到,一,定,程,度,上,；,第,三,种,是,贫,困,国,家,，,他,们,的,社,会,生,产,力,没,有,达,到,一,定,的,水,平,，,饥,饿,的,问,题,也,还,差,得,远,。,不,能,解,决,饥,饿,问,题,的,贫,困,国,家,大,多,数,在,于,非,洲,和,亚,洲,。	S-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,W-NN,W-NN,W-AD,W-VA,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-VV,R-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-CC,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU

学,校,是,我,们,学,生,的,可,以,玩,和,找,朋,友,的,地,方,。,现,在,，,很,多,学,校,开,始,进,行,男,女,分,班,的,试,验,老,师,和,家,长,们,认,为,这,样,可,以,避,免,生,生,早,恋,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
中,国,也,温,饱,问,题,基,本,上,解,决,了,。	C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-AS,C-PU
同,社,会,变,化,越,来,越,快,，,我,们,的,之,间,新,生,了,“,代,沟,”,这,个,词,。,在,韩,国,指,这,个,词,说,，,“,时,代,差,异,”,。,因,发,生,这,种,情,况,，,在,家,里,、,学,校,里,等,的,地,方,有,几,个,问,题,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,R-DEG,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,W-VV,W-DT,W-DT,W-NN,R-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,R-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,想,“,安,乐,死,”,是,可,取,的,一,个,权,力,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-CD,C-CD,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
我,在,元,阳,认,识,了,许,多,哈,尼,族,，,他,们,很,好,客,而,且,对,我,这,样,的,外,地,人,也,很,热,情,。	C-PN,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

父,母,也,是,应,该,努,力,理,解,孩,子,。,孩,子,天,天,学,习,的,很,累,，,而,且,他,们,的,想,法,和,以,前,的,不,一,样,。,社,会,发,展,地,快,，,而,且,大,，,所,以,孩,子,的,意,思,不,能,和,以,前,大,人,的,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,R-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-DEC,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-DEV,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,M-PU

母,亲,前,几,天,我,跟,您,一,起,去,看,病,的,时,候,丈,夫,给,我,说,“,现,在,老,母,亲,需,要,的,不,是,药,就,是,心,情,中,的,安,定,”,我,听,到,这,句,话,时,突,然,想,起,来,很,多,我,对,你,不,听,话,的,事,情,。,还,有,现,在,母,亲,的,病,绝,对,需,要,心,情,上,的,安,定,所,以,您,不,要,那,么,多,的,思,考,吧,，,哥,哥,已,经,结,婚,生,孩,子,我,已,经,长,大,了,，,不,要,那,么,思,考,吧,！	C-NN,C-NN,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,S-AD,S-VC,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-PN,R-P,R-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,M-AD,C-AD,C-VA,R-DEC,R-NN,R-NN,R-SP,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-AD,C-AD,R-VV,R-VV,R-SP,C-PU
“,绿,色,食,品,”,是,指,不,用,化,肥,或,农,药,的,、,用,未,经,污,染,的,农,产,品,。,这,样,的,“,绿,色,食,品,”,不,仅,对,身,体,无,害,，,也,对,健,康,有,益,。	C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-PU,R-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
再,来,，,不,妨,找,几,个,朋,友,相,聚,，,讨,论,书,的,内,容,，,充,分,的,理,解,书,中,的,内,涵,，,各,有,各,的,见,解,与,看,法,，,这,样,更,增,深,了,自,己,对,四,周,环,境,、,人,事,的,处,理,态,度,与,守,则,。,这,样,亦,更,甚,于,独,自,阅,读,。	C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VA,C-AS,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,S-NN,S-NN,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
据,我,的,经,验,来,说,，,我,在,学,校,学,习,，,因,为,男,性,和,女,性,有,不,同,的,想,法,，,所,以,我,做,过,很,多,错,，,有,时,候,使,女,的,朋,友,伤,心,。,可,是,通,过,那,样,的,体,验,后,，,我,慢,慢,地,了,解,女,性,的,想,法,。,那,在,男,女,分,班,的,学,校,上,怎,么,办,呢,？	C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,S-VV,C-AS,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,S-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
有,一,次,我,在,学,校,考,试,，,结,果,考,掉,了,，,所,以,我,就,不,敢,回,家,去,见,我,的,父,母,亲,，,那,时,我,的,一,个,朋,友,就,对,我,说,，,不,要,去,害,怕,什,么,，,勇,敢,的,面,对,现,实,，,所,以,我,就,回,家,了,，,那,时,我,的,母,亲,已,经,知,道,我,考,掉,试,的,事,，,但,是,她,并,没,有,责,怪,我,，,她,对,我,说,：,“,不,要,为,了,这,一,件,事,情,而,难,过,，,我,不,会,打,你,，,也,不,会,骂,你,，,因,为,你,已,经,努,力,的,去,考,了,，,只,要,你,不,灰,心,，,只,要,你,肯,再,努,力,就,一,定,会,考,上,的,。,”,等,到,我,听,到,我,的,母,亲,对,我,说,的,这,一,些,话,以,后,，,马,上,就,恢,复,了,信,心,，,等,到,第,二,年,考,试,的,时,候,，,我,就,只,听,着,我,妈,妈,所,说,的,话,，,—,努,力,而,再,努,力,，,终,于,到,最,后,我,考,上,了,这,一,回,的,考,试,。	C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-DEG,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-PU,R-ETC,R-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-DT,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,R-VV,R-VV,C-MSP,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
理,由,有,两,个,：,一,个,是,天,下,有,男,女,两,种,性,，,虽,然,这,个,差,别,很,大,，,但,互,相,了,解,、,共,同,努,力,而,建,设,社,会,的,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-VC,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-M,S-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-SP,C-PU
在,公,共,场,所,里,应,该,有,抽,烟,的,地,方,的,话,，,我,想,边,走,边,抽,烟,的,人,会,越,来,越,少,，,对,吸,烟,者,没,有,好,处,，,也,不,用,罚,款,了,。,这,样,就,会,我,们,的,周,围,变,得,更,干,净,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-AD,W-VV,W-PN,W-PN,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
我,希,望,好,多,人,们,把,学,习,流,行,歌,曲,的,时,间,放,在,学,习,、,工,作,上,，,大,家,为,了,咱,们,的,社,会,着,想,吧,！	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,R-CD,R-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-BA,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
其,次,，,没,有,父,母,的,关,怀,和,爱,护,，,孩,子,会,产,生,不,良,或,不,对,的,想,法,，,使,孩,子,们,从,小,就,胡,思,乱,想,而,走,向,不,正,确,的,方,向,。,因,此,，,父,母,必,须,在,这,方,面,多,关,注,，,成,为,孩,子,的,第,一,任,老,师,，,为,孩,子,做,个,好,榜,样,，,让,孩,子,能,判,断,什,么,是,对,什,么,是,错,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VC,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VC,C-NN,R-NN,C-PU
我,也,想,父,母,是,孩,子,的,第,一,任,老,师,。,我,们,从,父,母,学,第,一,个,是,什,么,？	C-PN,C-AD,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,M-OD,C-OD,S-M,M-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU
因,此,，,我,个,人,认,为,男,女,之,间,的,相,识,方,式,，,还,是,通,过,亲,友,的,介,，,逐,步,了,，,才,发,展,感,情,，,逐,渐,相,爱,的,最,为,理,想,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,R-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

父,亲,的,每,句,话,，,我,都,记,在,心,中,，,慢,慢,的,让,自,己,做,到,最,好,，,不,负,父,亲,的,期,望,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,S-DEV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

出,现,“,绿,色,食,品,”,，,也,是,因,为,有,些,国,家,的,生,活,水,平,发,展,到,不,会,受,到,生,存,威,胁,、,开,始,对,健,康,有,所,关,注,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

总,之,，,如,果,患,者,自,愿,死,，,帮,他,自,杀,的,人,不,是,一,个,罪,所,以,不,应,该,受,法,院,的,制,裁,但,是,如,果,患,者,还,想,活,但,家,人,让,医,生,打,死,的,药,，,那,才,是,犯,罪,的,行,为,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,S-AD,S-VC,S-CD,S-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,R-VV,R-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

有,了,慈,和,爱,，,社,会,该,变,得,更,美,好,，,更,平,安,。,这,正,是,许,多,世,界,名,人,所,苦,心,干,了,一,辈,子,的,事,业,，,也,是,世,界,人,人,心,中,美,丽,的,梦,想,。,我,希,望,今,后,出,版,社,多,出,些,慈,爱,书,籍,，,更,盼,望,人,人,多,读,它,，,使,人,人,心,性,改,变,，,良,心,流,露,，,慈,心,大,长,，,那,孔,夫,子,老,人,家,的,大,同,世,界,到,矣,！	C-VE,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,S-VA,S-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-MSP,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-M,M-JJ,C-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,S-SP,C-PU

对,吸,烟,者,来,说,，,知,道,吸,烟,对,健,康,不,好,，,但,是,对,心,理,来,看,有,很,多,好,处,。,如,果,要,吸,烟,，,但,不,能,吸,烟,，,就,很,容,易,生,气,，,不,能,集,中,，,由,此,产,生,不,忍,不,往,的,压,力,。,但,是,，,我,认,为,这,也,是,香,烟,的,恶,因,素,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-MSP,C-VV,M-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-AD,S-VV,S-AD,S-VV,R-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-JJ,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU

有,时,您,叫,我,帮,什,么,忙,，,我,没,答,应,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
目,的,地,还,没,决,定,，,可,是,选,择,地,还,是,海,边,好,，,不,是,夏,威,夷,那,样,游,客,很,多,的,地,方,，,而,是,人,少,令,人,感,到,寂,寞,的,地,方,好,。,我,可,能,在,海,滨,上,整,天,看,远,远,的,海,，,迷,入,思,索,，,感,觉,神,游,至,天,上,。,我,找,到,这,样,的,“,孤,独,海,滨,”,之,前,，,坐,火,车,（,不,是,快,车,，,而,是,慢,车,）,独,去,很,长,陆,地,之,行,。,我,想,，,从,北,京,坐,国,际,列,车,一,直,到,莫,西,格,，,可,能,要,一,个,星,期,左,右,吧,，,然,后,莫,西,格,往,西,走,到,伦,郭,，,再,往,西,走,到,爱,尔,兰,，,爱,尔,兰,再,往,西,西,端,的,海,滨,，,我,觉,得,很,好,。,虽,然,目,的,地,还,没,决,定,，,可,是,这,是,我,在,心,里,抱,怀,着,的,未,来,一,个,假,期,的,最,有,可,能,的,候,选,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,S-DEV,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,R-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,R-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,M-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-VV,S-AD,S-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,S-NN,S-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NR,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VC,C-PN,C-VC,C-PN,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NT,C-NT,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU
“,公,共,场,所,边,走,边,抽,烟,的,人,将,被,罚,款,”,规,定,会,引,起,各,种,各,样,的,讨,论,，,可,当,然,大,家,都,希,望,找,到,共,同,语,言,来,决,定,吸,烟,的,问,题,怎,么,解,决,。	C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-SB,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
我,的,挨,饿,方,法,是,出,口,农,产,品,。,在,世,界,的,有,些,国,家,还,剩,着,吃,的,东,西,，,而,有,些,国,家,不,足,食,物,，,就,是,说,，,国,家,之,间,还,没,有,良,好,的,农,产,量,平,衡,的,关,系,。	C-PN,C-DEG,M-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,R-AS,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,W-VA,W-VA,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
可,能,下,周,很,有,什,么,急,事,就,要,回,家,看,看,您,们,。	S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-AD,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU
我,的,父,母,就,是,我,的,理,想,的,一,对,夫,妻,。	C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-DEG,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,虽,然,很,喜,欢,流,行,歌,曲,，,特,别,是,歌,字,又,令,人,感,动,又,用,完,美,的,语,言,但,我,不,会,对,自,己,喜,欢,的,歌,星,达,到,痴,迷,的,程,度,。	C-PN,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-P,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

的,确,，,吸,烟,是,对,身,体,不,好,的,，,但,是,对,心,里,有,好,处,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,S-NN,S-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

已,经,结,婚,的,朋,友,们,对,我,说,：,“,看,男,人,的,时,，,你,一,定,要,看,他,的,父,母,是,什,么,样,的,人,。,因,为,父,母,是,孩,子,重,大,影,响,的,人,。,”,这,说,明,，,如,果,在,很,多,方,面,父,母,的,观,念,，,思,念,不,对,的,说,，,孩,子,也,会,有,一,样,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,M-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEV,S-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VE,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU
男,女,在,一,间,班,里,有,许,多,坏,处,，,但,也,有,许,多,好,处,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-CD,S-M,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
而,流,行,音,乐,的,流,行,程,度,也,不,会,长,久,，,过,了,一,段,时,日,就,被,淘,汰,了,，,新,的,流,行,歌,曲,也,就,蜂,拥,而,出,，,新,冒,出,的,歌,星,、,乐,队,也,迷,倒,了,多,少,人,。,而,在,众,多,流,行,歌,曲,中,，,偶,像,派,多,于,实,力,派,，,而,年,轻,人,跟,随,着,偶,象,来,选,服,饰,、,发,型,，,我,们,作,为,父,母,的,如,经,济,能,力,许,可,还,可,满,足,他,（,她,）,们,的,要,求,，,但,要,是,不,到,的,年,轻,人,多,是,走,向,堕,落,或,坏,处,。	C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-SB,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,S-CD,S-CD,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PU,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VC,M-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU

你,退,休,以,后,，,拿,我,的,工,资,来,生,活,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,S-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
第,一,，,流,行,歌,曲,对,我,们,心,情,方,面,有,好,处,，,有,时,候,让,我,们,开,心,感,动,，,有,时,候,让,我,们,哭,，,心,里,不,好,时,听,歌,曲,的,话,歌,曲,给,我,们,安,慰,，,我,们,心,情,会,好,一,点,，,又,会,给,好,像,感,情,干,燥,的,人,帮,助,，,跟,着,流,行,歌,曲,唱,的,话,，,我,们,会,把,烦,恼,的,事,情,忘,掉,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VA,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,S-VA,S-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
因,为,它,有,些,人,不,安,，,将,来,是,不,是,会,发,生,第,三,次,世,界,大,战,？	R-P,R-P,C-PN,M-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-VC,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
最,好,的,措,施,还,是,把,烟,的,价,格,升,高,，,这,样,才,不,会,有,那,个,政,府,把,我,们,当,孩,子,的,感,觉,。	C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-BA,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VE,C-DT,S-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-BA,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
她,临,走,时,，,因,为,她,连,呼,吸,也,困,难,，,所,以,用,全,身,来,呼,吸,，,而,且,她,全,身,土,色,。,对,我,来,说,，,真,可,怜,。,她,走,了,以,后,，,她,的,表,情,非,常,稳,定,，,好,象,她,没,经,过,刚,才,的,痛,苦,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-P,R-PN,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,R-AD,R-AD,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,M-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VA,S-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

如,，,我,曾,经,在,报,纸,上,看,过,关,于,这,方,面,的,消,息,，,有,一,个,初,中,生,因,自,己,所,喜,欢,的,歌,星,解,散,而,跳,楼,自,杀,。,对,这,些,不,爱,自,己,的,生,命,，,轻,生,的,现,象,也,不,能,排,除,。,他,们,应,该,从,盲,目,的,歌,星,、,听,流,行,歌,曲,中,清,醒,过,来,，,合,的,地,安,排,时,间,，,不,要,过,度,的,去,索,取,，,要,科,学,的,喜,欢,它,。	C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-DEG,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU
总,之,，,吸,烟,是,有,害,的,，,哪,怕,是,侵,犯,了,一,定,的,私,人,权,，,也,要,继,续,禁,止,的,。,希,望,这,种,严,厉,的,措,施,提,高,人,们,的,自,觉,意,识,，,为,自,己,、,为,他,人,、,为,社,会,放,弃,吸,烟,的,坏,习,惯,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,父,母,常,常,说,“,如,果,我,们,得,了,一,种,不,治,之,症,，,你,帮,助,我,们,做,安,乐,死,”,。	C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU
现,代,社,会,有,多,种,疾,病,，,其,中,“,绝,症,”,可,不,少,，,例,如,艾,兹,病,、,各,种,癌,症,…,…,患,有,绝,症,者,，,他,们,多,半,死,前,都,要,承,受,极,其,的,痛,苦,。,我,们,让,他,们,们,忍,受,痛,苦,还,是,想,办,法,去,止,断,他,们,的,痛,苦,，,让,他,们,安,乐,地,进,入,“,第,二,世,界,”,呢,？,我,曾,经,亲,眼,看,亲,人,与,疾,病,的,斗,争,，,在,旁,边,听,他,的,叫,喊,，,真,是,多,么,心,疼,的,。	C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,S-AD,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
我,希,望,出,现,不,喜,欢,的,人,也,改,成,喜,欢,的,歌,出,来,。,世,界,人,都,进,入,美,丽,的,歌,里,。,这,样,的,歌,有,的,话,，,没,有,不,喜,欢,音,乐,的,人,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,M-NN,R-VV,R-VV,C-PU,M-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,W-JJ,W-JJ,W-DEG,W-NN,W-VE,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU
我,认,为,这,是,我,在,小,时,候,母,亲,给,我,的,教,训,吧,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VC,C-PN,R-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
虽,然,这,个,做,法,可,以,避,免,学,生,们,早,谈,恋,爱,，,可,是,容,易,产,生,他,们,会,变,生,同,性,人,的,问,题,。,好,像,出,得,龙,潭,，,又,入,鳄,湖,一,样,。,我,觉,得,世,上,所,有,的,问,题,都,是,因,为,人,与,人,之,间,的,问,题,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-DER,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,R-P,R-P,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,认,识,的,姐,姐,曾,发,生,过,这,样,的,一,件,事,，,她,是,因,为,为,了,减,肥,而,开,始,吃,了,葡,萄,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,此,，,某,市,政,府,出,台,的,新,规,定,，,无,疑,是,在,解,救,吸,烟,的,人,，,同,是,也,解,救,了,无,辜,不,吸,烟,的,人,。,同,时,，,公,众,场,合,少,有,吸,烟,的,人,，,也,会,渐,渐,消,除,吸,烟,这,股,风,气,的,现,象,，,使,环,境,、,社,会,及,人,们,更,健,康,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
此,外,，,吸,烟,者,一,般,来,讲,，,他,们,的,身,体,比,较,弱,，,所,以,很,容,易,得,到,病,。,对,公,众,也,有,大,危,险,性,事,实,上,，,被,传,染,者,，,他,们,得,到,的,伤,害,更,宽,。,我,支,持,政,府,能,严,厉,的,罚,措,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-MSP,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-LB,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
所,以,男,女,同,班,将,使,到,大,家,在,将,来,的,社,会,上,更,懂,得,如,何,与,异,性,相,处,，,比,如,在,工,作,上,和,在,爱,情,关,系,上,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-BA,C-VV,R-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-CC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-LC,C-PU

我,希,望,天,下,有,情,人,都,终,成,眷,属,，,“,缘,”,这,个,字,就,是,我,所,理,想,的,结,交,方,式,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-MSP,M-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
那,一,天,，,我,跟,妈,妈,吵,架,了,，,吵,架,得,很,厉,害,。	S-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
有,几,个,方,法,：,第,一,，,通,过,贸,易,再,分,配,世,界,各,国,的,农,作,物,；,第,二,，,通,过,国,际,组,织,帮,助,饥,饿,的,人,民,；,第,三,，,通,过,联,合,国,救,饥,饿,的,人,民,。	C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
如,果,能,把,儒,家,思,想,教,育,加,入,现,在,的,社,会,，,一,定,能,使,代,沟,缩,小,矩,离,，,上,下,交,流,上,有,了,着,点,、,方,向,，,一,向,方,也,可,以,发,扬,中,国,文,化,的,美,德,，,另,一,向,面,也,可,以,提,升,家,庭,美,好,的,风,气,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,C-AS,C-AS,C-M,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,S-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,S-AD,S-AD,S-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-VA,S-VA,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
从,另,外,一,个,角,度,去,看,呢,，,我,觉,得,学,校,和,老,师,的,培,训,并,是,不,可,少,的,。	C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
主,要,反,对,的,原,因,是,安,乐,死,的,危,害,性,。,人,的,生,命,不,应,该,与,其,他,人,来,控,制,，,也,不,该,由,自,己,来,控,制,，,因,为,人,生,不,是,从,人,來,的,。	W-AD,W-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
在,这,世,界,没,有,那,么,多,人,责,斥,酒,鬼,而,对,烟,民,那,么,严,格,是,为,什,么,？	C-P,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,M-VE,C-VE,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU
我,觉,得,还,来,得,及,“,一,年,之,计,在,于,春,，,一,日,之,计,在,于,晨,”,我,从,三,月,份,开,始,准,备,考,试,了,。,既,使,白,天,工,作,忙,，,我,觉,得,不,那,么,疲,劳,。,因,为,我,会,追,求,我,的,梦,，,所,以,觉,得,我,是,个,非,常,幸,福,的,人,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,M-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VC,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU
如,果,我,们,能,平,心,静,气,对,待,子,女,，,当,朋,友,看,待,，,有,麻,烦,事,，,尽,量,帮,助,解,决,，,常,与,他,们,聊,天,，,闲,话,家,常,，,感,情,很,好,，,一,定,不,会,发,生,类,似,的,问,题,。,而,且,从,小,时,候,就,应,该,开,始,培,养,感,情,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
“,依,赖,心,”,这,个,东,西,是,好,物,，,还,是,坏,物,？,我,认,为,，,依,赖,心,跟,别,的,所,有,的,事,情,一,样,具,有,好,坏,的,两,方,面,。	C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-JJ,S-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-JJ,S-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,必,须,学,会,独,立,、,成,熟,和,坚,强,，,好,让,您,们,不,需,要,再,为,我,费,心,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,S-PN,S-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU

首,先,，,我,喜,欢,流,行,歌,曲,的,理,由,是,听,流,行,歌,曲,的,时,候,担,心,的,心,情,变,成,一,个,年,以,前,的,事,情,了,。,当,时,是,因,为,期,中,考,试,时,间,，,所,以,我,带,着,很,多,压,力,，,想,哭,，,想,放,弃,，,我,的,心,情,一,直,没,有,信,心,，,担,心,了,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,R-NN,R-NN,M-VV,C-VV,R-CD,R-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,S-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU
联,系,到,我,自,己,，,我,有,很,严,格,的,父,母,，,但,他,们,从,我,小,时,候,常,常,教,我,好,好,学,习,。,爸,爸,很,忙,，,妈,妈,不,管,孩,子,，,所,以,我,跟,弟,弟,们,做,什,么,事,情,很,凶,，,我,们,也,不,管,别,人,，,有,一,点,自,私,。,从,这,里,能,看,得,出,父,母,有,很,大,的,影,响,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VE,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-VE,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,为,每,个,人,都,有,自,己,的,权,力,来,安,排,自,己,的,生,活,。	C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,R-PN,R-PN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,认,为,，,这,样,的,情,况,下,才,能,保,证,我,们,的,未,来,，,我,们,的,孩,子,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,M-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,认,为,这,世,界,上,，,不,是,“,绿,色,”,的,食,品,应,该,不,在,生,产,，,怎,么,说,那,也,危,害,我,们,身,体,健,康,的,东,西,。,随,着,世,界,的,发,展,，,人,类,的,生,活,都,到,一,些,水,平,的,时,候,，,没,有,谁,挨,饿,；,谁,能,吃,绿,色,食,品,的,时,候,，,这,才,是,人,们,希,望,的,世,界,了,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-VE,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,M-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,R-SP,C-PU
所,以,，,很,多,人,想,使,用,化,肥,与,农,药,，,提,高,农,作,物,的,产,量,，,尽,量,免,得,饥,饿,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,曾,经,听,说,如,果,没,有,人,吃,肉,类,食,品,，,再,说,世,界,上,的,所,有,的,人,不,吃,肉,类,的,话,，,一,定,会,比,现,在,更,大,的,面,积,上,会,做,农,业,，,那,么,世,界,上,不,会,发,生,饥,饿,的,问,题,。,还,有,一,个,解,方,法,，,就,是,农,业,部,分,上,很,富,绕,的,国,家,比,如,，,美,国,、,奥,地,利,亚,、,中,国,等,国,家,要,帮,助,一,些,很,穷,而,饥,饿,的,国,家,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CS,C-CS,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-CD,C-CD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,S-NR,S-NR,S-NR,S-NR,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-ETC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-VA,C-CC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
也,许,，,有,人,说,人,死,以,前,，,要,是,非,常,痛,苦,，,只,想,死,，,可,是,如,果,症,不,能,治,好,的,话,，,就,没,有,别,的,办,法,了,，,只,好,用,“,安,乐,死,”,。,我,以,前,养,一,只,很,聪,明,的,小,狗,（,当,然,它,不,是,人,，,可,是,这,就,是,例,子,）,，,它,得,了,一,种,犬,症,。,我,花,了,很,多,钱,为,了,治,好,它,，,可,都,没,用,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,S-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,M-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-PN,W-VV,W-AS,W-CD,W-CD,W-NN,W-P,W-P,W-VV,W-VV,W-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

这,个,不,要,说,明,连,小,孩,子,也,知,道,。,香,烟,有,很,多,害,人,体,的,物,质,，,而,且,某,个,人,在,吸,烟,时,流,出,的,副,流,烟,的,毒,性,比,吸,进,去,的,烟,里,的,毒,性,更,多,，,一,般,有,好,几,倍,的,。,而,且,如,果,在,旁,边,吸,进,这,个,副,流,烟,的,人,不,喜,欢,香,烟,的,话,，,还,加,上,心,理,原,因,，,更,加,会,影,响,这,个,人,的,身,体,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,S-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-DT,R-DT,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,S-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,R-JJ,R-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,R-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,R-DT,S-JJ,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
但,是,由,家,人,、,朋,友,和,老,师,们,的,鼓,励,下,，,我,绝,对,不,会,轻,易,放,弃,。	C-AD,C-AD,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
自,古,以,来,，,人,家,说,吸,烟,是,绝,对,百,害,无,益,的,生,活,习,惯,，,但,在,全,世,界,上,吸,烟,的,人,口,数,从,来,没,落,下,的,。,最,近,随,着,人,们,对,身,体,健,康,与,社,会,环,境,的,关,心,愈,来,愈,多,，,禁,烟,的,运,动,也,展,开,全,世,界,里,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,S-LC,S-DEG,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,R-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,W-VV,W-VV,M-NN,W-NN,W-NN,R-LC,C-PU
不,过,我,觉,得,保,护,身,体,最,好,的,方,法,不,是,吃,保,养,食,品,，,而,是,吃,“,绿,色,食,品,”,最,好,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-AD,R-VA,C-SP,C-PU
我,本,人,是,不,赞,成,这,种,分,班,制,的,看,法,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU
第,一,是,在,日,本,寒,假,期,间,过,元,旦,，,对,日,本,人,来,说,元,旦,是,跟,中,国,的,春,节,一,样,特,别,重,要,的,节,日,之,一,。,一,月,一,日,是,对,小,孩,儿,（,儿,童,）,来,说,，,最,高,兴,的,一,天,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-VC,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-CD,W-NN,W-NT,W-NT,W-VC,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-PU,W-NN,W-NN,W-PU,W-LC,W-LC,W-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-PU
可,是,，,无,论,年,轻,人,还,是,老,年,人,，,我,们,都,是,在,这,世,界,一,起,过,下,去,的,人,。,于,是,代,沟,问,题,应,该,要,好,好,解,决,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-M,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

我,不,想,人,们,选,择,“,绿,色,食,品,”,是,一,种,奢,侈,的,行,为,，,是,因,为,人,们,都,愿,意,健,康,，,因,此,人,们,都,自,然,而,然,地,找,用,未,经,污,染,的,农,产,品,加,工,的,“,绿,色,食,品,”,。	C-PN,C-AD,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-VC,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU
我,特,别,喜,欢,看,流,行,歌,曲,。,其,实,，,觉,得,不,喜,欢,流,行,歌,曲,的,人,很,愚,蠢,，,如,果,喜,欢,看,流,行,歌,曲,的,话,，,平,时,在,学,习,的,过,程,当,中,可,以,放,松,一,下,，,听,听,歌,，,学,习,效,果,也,就,提,高,了,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU
对,于,他,的,习,惯,，,最,觉,得,有,意,思,的,是,他,们,从,早,上,八,点,一,直,工,作,到,下,午,两,点,左,右,，,回,家,吃,午,饭,后,不,再,上,班,。	C-P,C-P,S-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-AD,W-VV,W-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

我,支,持,某,市,政,府,出,台,的,一,项,规,定,。,对,我,个,人,主,观,的,意,见,来,说,，,我,的,身,体,不,能,接,受,烟,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,M-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-P,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU
她,外,面,、,内,面,都,没,有,变,化,，,所,以,人,群,中,我,很,快,找,到,她,。	C-PN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-PN,C-PU

但,，,我,觉,得,如,果,太,过,度,地,疯,狂,这,种,流,行,音,乐,的,话,，,我,们,很,容,易,会,失,去,自,己,的,中,心,和,想,法,，,所,以,先,要,选,好,自,己,喜,欢,的,音,乐,，,然,后,适,地,享,受,是,最,好,的,方,法,。,特,别,是,对,一,个,未,成,年,来,说,，,他,们,还,不,够,控,制,自,己,的,情,况,下,，,太,过,度,地,集,中,这,样,的,流,行,音,乐,和,自,己,喜,欢,的,偶,像,歌,手,的,话,，,很,容,易,会,失,去,自,己,生,活,的,中,心,。,这,样,一,来,，,青,少,年,一,定,要,在,父,母,和,老,师,的,指,导,下,，,要,适,度,地,去,享,受,流,行,歌,曲,。	C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CS,C-CS,R-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,M-LC,C-PU,C-PN,M-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,R-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,R-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

对,我,自,己,，,父,母,是,我,的,第,一,任,老,师,。,从,小,父,母,付,出,了,不,少,的,苦,来,培,养,我,，,从,小,到,长,大,他,们,给,了,良,好,的,教,育,。,当,然,我,能,读,书,不,仅,仅,是,因,为,学,校,的,老,师,而,且,父,母,亲,给,了,我,不,少,的,影,响,。	C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,M-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,S-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,M-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,的,小,学,是,在,那,里,读,的,，,那,时,老,师,多,数,是,由,棉,兰,这,较,大,的,城,市,请,来,的,，,多,是,只,教,了,一,两,年,就,走,了,，,那,么,我,们,在,小,学,六,年,中,可,有,了,无,数,的,老,师,。,那,时,我,们,读,的,是,华,校,，,所,以,整,个,小,城,的,年,轻,人,都,讲,华,语,作,为,母,语,。	C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-CD,C-VC,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-DT,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-OD,C-M,C-LC,C-VV,C-VE,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-JJ,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

所,以,虽,然,家,里,的,情,况,不,好,，,但,是,为,了,我,一,个,人,破,定,银,行,定,期,存,钱,，,交,付,我,的,学,费,。,那,时,候,我,的,心,真,痛,苦,还,真,感,谢,两,位,，,可,是,说,不,出,来,了,。,我,呢,要,报,答,你,们,两,位,的,恩,惠,，,在,大,学,努,力,学,习,，,一,直,得,到,好,成,绩,和,奖,学,金,，,你,们,看,我,的,成,绩,表,喜,欢,着,笑,容,时,，,我,也,非,常,地,高,兴,了,。,你,们,两,位,每,次,我,需,要,时,帮,助,我,真,感,谢,。,特,别,是,我,去,年,暑,假,的,时,候,，,我,很,想,去,中,国,，,所,以,打,工,的,时,候,，,妈,妈,您,暗,暗,地,给,我,钱,，,我,真,忘,不,了,。,都,托,您,的,福,，,我,今,年,寒,假,时,可,以,去,了,中,国,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-SP,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,M-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,S-AS,S-NN,S-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VA,C-VA,R-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,M-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,R-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU

我,学,习,汉,语,是,为,了,想,更,多,了,解,中,国,的,文,化,。,因,为,我,是,华,人,但,移,居,了,加,拿,大,多,年,对,于,中,国,真,正,的,文,化,，,我,只,略,知,一,二,而,已,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-AD,C-CD,M-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-CD,C-M,C-P,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-SP,C-PU
我,小,时,，,经,常,跟,着,他,去,他,的,房,间,，,虽,然,当,时,他,弄,的,电,脑,或,书,我,都,不,懂,，,但,是,我,喜,欢,那,个,气,氛,。	C-PN,C-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

第,三,，,共,有,各,自,的,爱,好,，,要,努,力,作,跟,对,方,最,爱,的,事,，,那,么,对,方,也,想,跟,你,一,起,做,什,么,。,经,过,这,样,的,习,惯,的,话,，,那,两,代,之,间,可,能,产,生,一,种,共,感,带,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,S-PN,S-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,R-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,M-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,R-DEG,R-NN,C-PU,R-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
”,这,句,话,是,我,从,小,现,在,为,之,父,母,对,我,说,的,。	C-PU,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-VC,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,S-NT,S-NT,R-P,R-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,M-PU

吸,烟,对,人,类,有,害,的,道,理,是,很,多,人,都,知,道,的,实,事,。,它,不,仅,危,害,着,抽,烟,本,人,的,身,体,健,康,，,而,且,又,影,响,了,周,围,人,的,身,体,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
如,何,这,么,说,，,理,由,如,下,。,孩,子,出,生,后,，,对,孩,子,注,重,的,爱,情,最,多,对,的,人,应,该,是,父,母,，,并,且,孩,子,也,需,要,父,母,的,爱,情,。	S-AD,S-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-VA,R-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU

在,每,人,各,不,相,同,的,结,交,方,式,，,我,觉,得,每,种,方,式,都,有,它,的,优,点,，,比,如,说,是,通,过,亲,戚,朋,友,的,介,绍,吧,，,这,也,是,一,种,好,的,方,式,因,为,对,方,是,我,们,所,相,信,和,痛,爱,的,人,介,绍,的,那,么,肯,定,他,不,会,是,一,个,坏,人,了,因,为,我,们,的,亲,戚,、,朋,友,不,会,找,些,不,好,的,人,来,介,绍,给,自,己,人,那,么,你,就,不,用,担,心,他,的,性,格,与,家,庭,环,境,了,。	C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,R-VC,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,S-NN,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

但,是,有,些,地,区,的,人,们,一,直,感,到,饥,饿,的,残,悲,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,S-JJ,S-NN,C-PU

爸,，,妈,最,近,一,天,的,气,温,差,太,大,。	C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,S-VA,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
如,果,别,的,和,尚,替,自,己,到,山,下,抬,水,是,可,能,的,话,，,那,么,最,好,不,够,了,，,他,高,兴,得,不,得,了,。,但,是,要,是,这,样,做,，,却,自,己,喝,不,到,水,，,那,太,可,惜,，,自,己,也,很,想,喝,水,。,但,是,世,界,上,，,哪,里,有,能,得,到,占,别,人,的,便,宜,？,自,己,懒,在,山,上,，,让,别,人,去,上,下,抬,水,得,到,别,人,抬,水,的,东,西,喝,是,不,可,能,的,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-AD,S-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DER,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,W-AD,W-PN,W-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,R-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-PN,C-PN,W-VV,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,R-LC,R-LC,C-VV,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,W-NN,W-DEC,R-NN,R-NN,C-VV,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
但,是,加,上,一,个,人,，,一,共,有,三,个,人,的,话,情,况,不,一,样,。,一,个,人,要,留,在,庙,里,，,还,有,两,个,人,可,以,去,抬,水,的,。,大,家,都,希,望,同,一,个,事,情,：,除,了,自,己,以,外,的,两,个,人,去,抬,水,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NR,C-LC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,R-DEC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU
而,且,，,在,分,班,学,校,里,的,学,生,有,可,能,会,与,从,别,校,学,生,谈,恋,爱,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-P,R-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
因,此,，,父,母,是,子,女,的,第,一,任,老,，,也,是,他,们,一,辈,子,的,老,师,，,从,出,生,以,来,，,子,女,哪,时,不,是,处,处,向,父,母,学,习,和,效,仿,的,？	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-VA,M-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,M-PU
这,种,朋,友,，,可,在,大,学,时,代,、,工,作,场,所,、,宴,会,派,对,相,遇,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU
不,管,父,母,让,孩,子,做,什,么,，,还,是,不,让,孩,子,做,什,么,，,孩,子,都,要,模,仿,父,母,，,看,父,母,做,什,么,，,他,偏,要,做,什,么,。,所,以,要,注,意,，,教,育,孩,子,不,能,光,在,一,段,时,间,里,教,育,就,放,心,，,还,注,意,孩,子,从,出,生,在,世,到,长,大,离,开,家,乡,总,是,看,着,父,母,的,一,个,一,个,动,作,、,举,止,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,S-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-P,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

月,份,回,中,国,后,，,我,凭,着,这,张,发,票,开,始,查,找,，,花,了,两,个,星,期,总,算,找,到,他,了,。,得,知,这,位,好,心,人,名,叫,陈,伯,伯,，,是,一,位,上,海,某,某,出,租,车,有,限,公,司,的,老,司,机,了,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-SP,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,W-CD,W-M,W-NR,W-NR,W-DT,W-DT,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-DEC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

”,说,到,这,儿,我,不,是,说,我,对,流,行,歌,曲,没,有,感,反,。,也,觉,得,流,行,歌,曲,有,问,题,，,就,是,“,痴,迷,”,。,很,多,的,高,中,生,喜,欢,自,己,喜,欢,的,歌,手,，,这,可,以,理,解,，,但,连,自,己,该,做,的,事,都,不,做,，,而,去,追,歌,手,。	C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
考,高,考,的,那,一,年,，,我,必,须,选,专,业,，,那,时,我,的,脑,海,里,毫,无,“,汉,语,”,这,个,词,。,后,来,发,生,了,一,点,意,外,，,让,我,转,到,中,文,系,去,。,刚,开,始,学,我,对,汉,语,没,什,么,看,法,，,我,也,不,知,道,，,究,竟,我,是,否,喜,欢,学,汉,语,。,两,三,年,过,去,，,我,才,慢,慢,地,发,觉,自,己,对,汉,语,越,来,越,感,兴,趣,，,我,喜,欢,它,了,。	R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,C-VE,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,M-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-SP,C-PU

举,个,例,子,，,由,于,青,少,年,年,纪,尚,轻,，,人,生,经,验,并,没,有,告,知,他,们,吸,烟,有,害,于,他,们,，,所,故,，,这,无,疑,使,他,们,容,易,受,人,的,影,响,而,吸,烟,。,何,况,在,这,崇,尚,时,尚,潮,流,的,时,代,，,穿,着,奇,装,异,服,、,口,里,吞,云,吐,雾,、,沉,迷,于,痱,痱,之,音,的,青,少,年,到,处,可,见,，,而,这,种,现,象,竟,日,益,严,重,！,所,故,，,我,由,衷,地,赞,赏,该,市,政,府,的,这,项,措,施,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,M-PU,C-MSP,S-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-DT,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-MSP,S-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

可,是,粮,食,跟,人,口,比,起,来,非,常,不,足,，,因,此,我,们,一,直,用,别,的,办,法,解,决,了,，,这,就,是,用,化,肥,和,农,药,我,也,理,解,而,且,这,个,办,法,也,有,道,理,。,但,是,我,觉,得,这,个,办,法,不,是,那,么,很,好,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,R-AD,C-VA,C-PU

尽,管,这,三,个,男,人,都,是,去,那,个,高,山,修,养,自,己,的,身,体,与,心,理,，,但,是,该,和,尚,尚,未,学,好,了,生,活,中,最,基,本,的,道,理,：,这,就,是,如,果,要,希,望,提,高,自,己,绝,对,不,要,有,对,工,作,与,其,它,方,面,的,自,私,态,度,；,如,果,有,着,只,好,做,的,工,作,最,好,尽,快,和,尽,时,的,来,完,成,，,比,如,如,果,跟,几,位,一,起,住,的,话,，,不,得,不,合,作,。,这,三,个,和,尚,则,呢,好,像,还,没,有,清,楚,的,明,白,合,作,的,原,因,。,我,从,来,没,有,念,过,这,个,故,事,，,可,是,我,听,说,过,由,于,他,们,不,愿,认,真,地,合,作,来,挑,水,，,有,一,天,出,现,火,灾,，,可,是,呢,，,那,时,候,就,来,不,及,到,远,的,河,去,挑,来,水,。,因,此,，,他,们,的,古,老,庙,就,没,了,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-CS,C-CS,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VE,R-VE,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,S-VV,S-LC,C-DEG,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,M-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,R-SP,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-SP,C-PU,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-SP,C-PU

当,时,刚,到,达,北,京,时,，,我,才,过,了,十,七,岁,的,生,日,。,带,着,一,种,从,来,没,体,验,到,过,感,觉,，,我,降,落,在,北,京,。	R-NT,R-NT,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU

但,是,可,以,说,孩,子,的,成,长,产,生,重,大,被,影,响,父,母,是,最,重,要,。,父,母,的,兴,趣,爱,好,还,是,思,想,观,念,是,从,小,到,大,在,孩,子,心,目,中,给,留,了,特,别,深,刻,的,印,象,。,所,以,如,果,一,个,孩,子,算,好,还,是,不,好,，,首,先,应,看,父,母,对,孩,子,的,热,爱,，,不,可,能,如,果,一,个,好,的,教,育,不,给,一,个,孩,子,很,好,的,想,法,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,S-SB,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,S-CC,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-P,R-VV,C-VV,M-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,R-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,S-NN,S-PU,C-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-CS,R-CS,R-CD,W-CD,W-VA,W-DEC,W-NN,W-NN,W-AD,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,S-NN,S-PU

首,先,，,我,们,来,看,一,下,吸,烟,对,个,人,健,康,有,怎,么,样,的,影,响,。,虽,然,在,我,以,前,看,过,的,书,里,提,到,，,吸,烟,能,使,人,降,低,他,的,精,神,压,力,，,紧,张,时,能,让,吸,烟,者,放,松,他,的,心,情,，,但,这,种,对,人,体,还,算,是,有,用,的,作,用,在,吸,烟,这,个,过,程,中,，,还,是,不,胜,于,它,的,无,益,之,处,。,我,还,记,得,我,小,时,候,，,因,为,吸,烟,我,祖,父,和,祖,母,而,死,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,S-JJ,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-AS,C-DEC,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,S-VV,S-VV,S-DEC,S-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,W-P,W-P,W-VV,W-VV,W-PN,W-NN,W-NN,W-CC,W-NN,W-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-PU
拿,我,的,经,历,来,说,，,我,父,亲,在,我,小,时,候,就,开,始,与,中,国,人,打,交,道,，,接,受,一,些,中,国,留,学,生,来,住,我,家,，,因,此,我,也,开,始,与,中,国,人,交,流,了,。,我,父,母,他,们,不,仅,教,我,中,国,悠,长,的,历,史,，,而,且,还,告,诉,我,了,中,国,人,的,思,想,和,交,流,方,式,。,我,之,所,以,来,中,国,读,书,，,就,因,为,父,亲,教,我,的,这,些,东,西,后,来,启,发,了,我,的,学,习,兴,趣,。	C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-CC,C-CC,C-VV,C-PN,C-NR,C-NR,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,R-AS,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

在,这,三,年,里,，,我,的,工,作,表,佳,，,曾,获,得,公,司,所,颁,发,的,“,年,度,最,佳,导,游,奖,”,。	C-P,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU
但,，,流,行,歌,曲,是,短,暂,的,，,９,０,年,代,的,流,行,歌,作,出,来,的,时,间,比,古,典,音,乐,晚,很,长,时,间,，,但,是,，,已,经,人,们,的,记,忆,中,消,失,了,。,流,行,歌,虽,然,当,流,行,时,很,多,人,的,喜,爱,，,但,是,，,过,时,间,就,像,本,来,没,有,的,歌,一,样,消,失,了,。	C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-CS,C-CS,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-LC,C-AD,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
有,关,研,究,中,了,解,到,，,吸,烟,不,仅,对,吸,烟,个,人,有,身,体,危,害,，,还,会,周,围,的,人,带,来,很,大,的,影,响,。,在,世,界,上,，,特,别,是,在,发,达,、,发,展,中,国,家,的,死,亡,率,分,析,中,，,死,于,吸,烟,所,导,致,各,种,疾,病,的,有,很,大,一,部,分,。	C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-VE,C-AD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
不,便,重,视,工,业,化,产,业,，,而,且,对,基,本,产,业,的,农,业,收,获,量,极,大,关,注,了,。,可,以,说,，,现,在,我,们,吃,的,从,用,化,肥,和,农,药,的,农,作,物,生,产,出,来,的,。	S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,R-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,M-PU

我,最,终,认,为,分,班,这,个,做,法,不,对,，,而,不,应,该,做,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

所,以,我,们,首,先,应,该,改,变,这,种,想,法,，,不,然,的,话,永,远,作,不,到,“,绿,色,食,品,”,还,有,，,如,果,“,绿,色,食,品,”,的,产,量,不,久,的,将,来,越,来,越,大,的,话,，,最,好,给,世,界,上,饥,饿,的,的,地,方,。,可,是,这,是,说,起,来,很,简,单,作,起,来,很,难,的,问,题,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,M-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-JJ,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,R-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
但,是,不,管,是,谁,，,父,母,对,他,的,影,响,还,是,存,在,的,，,或,多,或,少,，,还,是,有,，,还,会,在,各,个,方,面,上,有,表,现,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-VE,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

其,次,，,要,改,善,人,们,对,流,行,歌,的,态,度,，,有,些,人,迷,与,歌,而,成,为,痴,迷,可,是,，,歌,并,不,是,人,的,一,切,而,是,生,活,中,的,一,部,分,，,是,在,某,个,意,义,上,一,种,游,戏,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,S-VV,S-P,C-NN,C-MSP,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-DEG,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-VC,W-P,W-DT,W-DT,W-NN,W-NN,W-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
可,是,我,想,，,虽,然,大,家,都,认,为,“,别,人,走,，,我,也,走,”,式,的,行,为,也,接,得,受,，,但,是,如,果,相,反,的,话,他,们,会,遵,守,规,则,吗,？	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-VV,R-DER,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
一,般,孩,子,们,成,长,过,程,中,他,们,的,性,格,、,行,为,、,思,想,观,念,的,决,定,性,，,就,在,父,母,的,身,上,。	C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-JJ,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
流,行,歌,曲,还,不,切,实,际,地,追,求,时,尚,，,几,乎,很,多,歌,曲,的,旋,律,是,差,不,多,的,。,这,使,大,众,们,感,到,没,有,新,味,口,。,还,有,，,有,些,歌,手,们,在,唱,歌,的,时,候,竟,然,会,在,歌,词,无,缘,无,故,插,上,几,句,脏,话,，,这,也,使,听,者,皱,起,了,眉,头,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-AD,R-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-VE,S-JJ,S-NN,S-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
是,因,为,没,有,任,何,阻,碍,。,我,不,同,这,么,个,想,法,。	M-VC,C-P,C-P,C-VE,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
在,欧,洲,多,部,分,的,国,家,，,医,生,没,有,进,行,“,安,乐,死,”,的,权,利,，,但,是,不,治,之,病,的,病,人,可,以,要,求,医,生,提,供,适,当,的,药,品,帮,助,病,人,在,家,人,或,父,母,亲,的,帮,助,下,进,行,自,杀,。	C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,S-VV,S-DEC,S-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,样,一,直,谈,话,下,去,，,了,解,对,方,的,立,场,，,在,对,方,的,立,场,来,想,的,话,，,代,沟,已,经,不,会,代,沟,了,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,S-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU

另,一,方,面,，,男,生,与,女,生,同,班,不,利,的,一,方,面,是,，,男,生,爱,作,弄,女,生,，,在,上,课,时,不,专,心,听,课,，,尤,其,是,高,班,的,学,生,。,因,随,着,时,代,的,发,展,，,电,影,的,影,响,，,社,会,的,复,杂,化,，,是,男,女,学,生,在,发,育,时,期,时,更,受,到,很,大,的,影,响,。	S-AD,S-AD,S-AD,S-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-P,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
