而,且,现,在,还,有,很,多,科,学,家,根,据,他,们,的,研,究,表,明,，,什,么,娠,妇,运,动,对,孩,子,好,啊,、,抽,烟,害,孩,子,的,身,体,啊,等,等,。,我,不,能,都,听,他,们,的,话,，,可,是,自,己,有,孩,子,的,“,第,一,老,师,”,的,自,觉,和,责,任,感,，,我,一,定,会,把,我,的,孩,子,教,育,成,一,个,懂,得,事,的,人,。,我,相,信,如,果,我,努,力,去,做,一,个,好,人,的,话,，,孩,子,也,会,学,会,去,做,好,心,人,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-BA,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,S-VV,S-VV,S-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

但,我,考,上,大,学,以,后,和,很,多,吸,烟,的,朋,友,打,交,道,，,我,的,这,种,看,法,也,逐,渐,变,化,起,来,了,。,我,现,在,觉,得,抽,烟,是,一,种,个,人,的,爱,好,之,一,，,如,果,在,别,人,的,面,前,不,肯,抽,烟,，,而,且,把,吸,完,后,的,垃,圾,不,扔,到,地,上,而,放,在,垃,圾,上,，,就,无,法,指,责,吸,烟,者,。,因,为,吸,烟,者,的,身,体,只,属,于,吸,烟,者,自,己,，,即,使,他,们,吸,烟,吸,得,很,久,危,害,了,自,己,的,健,康,会,犯,癌,症,、,心,脏,病,等,疾,病,也,我,们,为,何,可,以,令,他,们,戒,烟,呢,？	C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-BA,W-VV,W-VV,W-LC,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,W-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-LC,C-PU,M-AD,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,C-PN,C-PN,S-AD,S-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU

可,是,，,因,为,生,活,很,忙,，,我,与,您,们,很,少,时,间,谈,过,话,，,所,以,，,趁,着,这,次,机,会,我,要,向,您,们,说,说,我,的,心,里,话,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,C-VV,R-AS,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

相,反,来,说,，,如,果,父,母,在,孩,子,小,时,候,常,常,教,他,们,好,的,做,人,道,理,和,长,大,后,要,做,一,个,有,用,而,会,常,常,服,务,社,会,的,人,，,那,么,他,们,的,孩,子,长,大,成,人,后,很,可,能,会,成,为,有,用,的,人,。,近,来,有,很,统,计,指,出,，,有,很,多,常,常,犯,案,的,青,年,都,是,双,失,青,年,或,者,是,从,少,没,有,得,到,父,母,教,导,的,。,这,些,青,少,年,都,是,因,为,自,少,父,母,没,有,好,好,教,他,们,，,所,以,他,们,才,会,误,入,歧,途,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-VE,C-VV,S-MSP,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-VC,C-AD,S-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,M-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-P,S-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU

从,认,识,朋,友,中,结,交,心,仪,的,另,一,半,是,最,唯,理,想,不,过,的,了,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-DT,C-CD,C-CD,C-VC,C-AD,R-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-SP,C-PU
为,什,么,不,让,吸,烟,而,对,个,人,什,么,影,响,？,吸,烟,是,对,个,人,健,康,和,公,众,利,益,的,很,不,好,的,影,响,。,吸,烟,是,继,续,性,的,，,年,龄,和,性,别,是,无,关,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,R-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-DEC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU,M-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
此,外,，,吸,烟,者,在,公,众,场,合,中,也,往,往,不,照,顾,卫,生,，,烟,蒂,随,处,扔,，,这,无,形,中,破,坏,了,公,共,场,所,的,卫,生,，,也,影,响,了,市,容,的,整,洁,，,待,外,国,观,光,游,客,来,到,本,国,时,，,就,会,让,他,们,留,下,非,常,不,好,的,印,象,了,，,情,况,如,果,再,恶,劣,些,，,恐,怕,会,影,响,国,家,的,旅,游,业,也,说,不,定,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU

我,在,你,们,的,眼,中,还,是,小,孩,，,不,过,实,事,上,已,经,长,大,了,。	C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-NN,S-NN,C-LC,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

吸,烟,导,致,各,种,疾,病,，,特,别,是,对,肺,有,很,大,的,恶,影,响,。,可,是,吸,烟,者,他,们,都,知,道,吸,烟,的,坏,处,但,是,非,吸,烟,不,可,。,是,因,为,吸,烟,对,精,神,有,好,处,，,比,如,，,不,高,兴,的,时,候,，,生,气,的,时,候,，,一,吸,烟,就,会,精,神,安,定,，,吸,烟,者,感,到,很,舒,服,，,吸,烟,可,以,取,消,精,神,压,力,。	C-VV,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-VE,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,S-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,M-VC,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,们,抱,着,客,观,、,乐,观,而,积,极,的,态,度,创,造,能,解,决,的,方,法,。,比,如,说,发,明,用,植,物,做,的,农,药,、,吃,得,多,、,即,使,吃,得,再,多,，,一,点,也,没,有,给,我,们,的,健,康,损,失,。,我,的,哥,哥,在,从,事,农,业,，,种,草,莓,、,西,瓜,等,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-DER,C-VA,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-PU
，,学,规,可,以,违,反,，,父,母,的,训,言,不,听,，,尤,其,在,国,立,中,学,，,学,生,群,殴,的,事,已,不,以,为,怪,，,这,种,不,好,的,风,气,会,直,接,影,响,学,生,的,心,理,。,所,以,在,我,的,想,法,要,解,决,“,代,沟,”,的,基,本,方,法,是,纠,正,教,育,方,策,，,要,明,白,自,己,是,东,方,民,族,，,把,崇,拜,西,方,文,化,的,观,念,改,变,过,来,，,这,样,在,行,为,方,式,、,生,活,态,度,以,及,价,值,观,念,能,有,所,改,变,。	C-PU,S-VV,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-VV,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,S-AD,S-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-P,C-PN,S-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

但,是,，,我,的,想,法,，,就,是,，,该,吃,绿,色,食,品,，,因,为,最,近,的,社,会,的,污,染,进,行,很,快,，,所,以,污,染,的,比,率,也,是,很,浓,的,。,已,经,我,的,地,球,的,天,然,资,源,都,是,污,染,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,S-AD,S-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,S-VA,C-VA,C-PU,W-AD,W-AD,W-PN,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
现,在,我,们,还,是,对,粮,食,问,题,没,有,根,本,的,解,决,。,政,府,为,了,人,民,的,保,健,和,世,界,饥,饿,问,题,而,努,力,，,还,有,想,办,法,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,R-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-VE,W-VE,W-JJ,W-JJ,S-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,M-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-CC,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
对,于,这,个,问,题,，,我,的,看,法,是,这,种,规,则,不,仅,是,很,好,的,，,而,且,是,有,必,要,的,。	C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

虽,然,如,此,，,我,们,一,直,很,自,由,，,他,从,来,没,有,对,我,们,的,选,择,提,出,反,对,，,而,一,直,支,持,我,们,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU

最,先,我,想,当,今,的,进,化,是,必,需,的,。	S-AD,S-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU

我,认,为,男,女,合,班,的,好,处,在,于,可,以,使,学,生,在,进,入,社,会,前,学,习,两,性,平,等,共,处,、,分,工,合,作,的,原,则,，,并,可,使,男,女,学,生,自,然,地,接,受,两,性,教,育,，,了,解,如,何,尊,重,异,性,，,及,如,何,利,用,两,性,的,差,异,達,成,社,会,上,不,同,性,质,的,任,务,。,毕,竟,以,一,个,完,善,的,教,育,体,制,而,言,，,学,生,们,要,学,习,的,不,仅,是,课,本,上,的,理,轮,，,人,际,关,系,、,生,活,智,慧,、,应,变,能,力,、,处,事,原,则,，,都,对,学,生,们,进,入,社,会,后,的,实,际,生,活,关,系,重,大,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-PU,C-CC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
一,般,人,认,为,吸,烟,只,是,对,直,接,吸,烟,者,有,影,响,。	C-JJ,C-JJ,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
首,先,，,吸,烟,对,个,人,会,引,起,健,康,影,响,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-M,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
但,是,我,看,父,母,向,人,打,招,呼,时,，,我,在,心,里,有,一,些,好,感,觉,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
“,代,沟,”,问,题,，,已,经,成,为,困,扰,我,们,社,会,上,众,多,家,庭,的,问,题,。,有,许,多,专,家,为,此,著,书,论,述,，,有,许,多,家,庭,悲,剧,也,是,因,为,“,代,沟,”,问,题,没,有,妥,善,解,决,而,不,应,产,生,。	C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,R-AD,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
我,觉,得,不,必,要,所,有,的,东,西,弄,换,“,绿,色,食,品,”,。,为,了,解,决,饥,饿,问,题,和,生,产,者,的,问,题,，,还,是,留,一,下,不,是,“,绿,色,”,的,，,也,应,该,的,。,有,“,绿,色,”,的,和,“,不,绿,色,”,的,两,种,的,话,，,我,们,消,费,者,可,以,选,择,喜,欢,的,一,种,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,S-VA,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-VV,C-AD,S-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEC,C-PU,M-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-VE,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-PU,C-DEG,C-CC,C-PU,S-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-PU
我,喜,欢,交,新,朋,友,，,在,人,际,方,面,我,沟,通,完,全,没,有,问,题,除,了,在,人,与,人,之,间,和,语,言,方,面,我,能,胜,任,之,外,，,我,还,能,唱,中,文,和,西,洋,歌,曲,和,弹,吉,它,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
那,么,这,样,的,代,沟,问,题,是,为,什,么,产,生,的,呢,？,我,想,产,生,代,沟,问,题,的,根,本,原,因,是,父,母,跟,子,女,之,间,生,活,的,年,代,是,不,同,的,，,所,以,各,各,经,过,的,经,验,也,不,一,样,，,当,然,父,母,和,子,女,的,想,法,不,一,样,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-AD,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-DT,S-DT,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,W-AD,W-AD,W-NN,W-NN,W-CC,W-NN,W-NN,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
但,是,为,了,平,平,安,安,的,生,活,应,该,克,服,这,种,问,题,，,那,怎,么,解,决,呢,？	C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
少,４,倍,，,这,大,大,的,危,害,了,人,民,群,众,的,身,体,健,康,。	C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
食,品,可,分,为,两,种,，,一,种,是,“,绿,色,食,品,”,另,一,种,是,“,非,绿,色,食,品,”,绿,色,食,品,指,得,是,没,有,污,染,的,食,品,，,像,蒙,古,草,原,上,生,产,的,牛,奶,等,等,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-VC,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-VC,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-DER,C-VC,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU
我,上,学,时,，,他,对,我,的,唯,一,的,要,求,是,，,如,果,我,对,学,习,不,感,兴,趣,的,话,，,不,要,学,习,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
二,来,，,会,以,免,孩,子,成,为,同,性,恋,者,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
总,之,，,这,是,关,于,个,人,的,喜,欢,，,任,何,人,都,有,不,同,的,看,法,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
有,一,位,人,在,人,口,密,集,的,车,站,一,边,走,一,边,抽,烟,，,旁,边,有,一,个,小,孩,子,，,因,为,他,抽,的,那,个,一,只,香,烟,，,那,个,小,孩,子,的,眼,睛,受,到,伤,害,。,我,认,为,这,样,的,危,险,性,很,多,。,我,们,应,该,保,护,孩,子,们,和,环,境,，,不,应,该,损,坏,他,们,。	C-VE,C-CD,S-M,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-DT,R-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU
这,也,有,道,理,的,话,。,但,我,们,必,得,注,目,的,地,方,就,是,抽,烟,不,是,只,影,响,个,人,，,而,是,影,响,周,围,的,人,。	C-PN,C-AD,M-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU
这,三,年,中,我,考,虑,了,许,多,次,，,关,于,我,的,将,来,了,。,从,两,年,前,，,我,希,望,我,会,找,一,个,理,想,的,工,作,了,，,当,然,我,想,找,跟,中,国,有,关,的,工,作,。	C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-AD,C-VV,R-AS,C-PU,R-P,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,可,以,说,心,里,不,安,状,态,。,现,在,的,生,活,中,，,我,不,认,识,隔,壁,的,住,人,。,既,然,跟,他,们,见,了,面,，,也,不,打,交,乎,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,S-CS,S-CS,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU
我,们,觉,得,流,行,歌,曲,水,平,不,够,高,级,水,平,是,一,种,偏,见,和,根,深,蒂,固,的,想,法,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,R-JJ,R-NN,R-NN,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,样,的,小,小,的,爱,情,会,自,然,而,然,地,积,蓄,起,来,，,产,生,很,好,的,心,理,作,用,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,已,经,说,过,了,，,我,的,年,纪,不,少,，,以,前,我,十,几,岁,的,时,候,喜,欢,流,行,歌,曲,因,为,为,了,跟,朋,友,们,一,起,享,受,通,感,。,当,时,我,感,觉,到,真,奇,怪,，,不,知,道,流,行,歌,曲,的,话,不,能,交,往,朋,友,吗,？	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-JJ,C-PN,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
然,后,我,很,快,得,考,上,上,级,班,，,那,男,孩,再,也,不,能,难,为,我,了,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,S-DER,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-SP,C-PU
目,前,，,在,流,行,歌,曲,的,趋,向,看,，,我,个,人,觉,得,绝,大,多,数,流,行,歌,曲,都,是,面,对,年,轻,人,制,造,的,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,S-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU

这,样,更,危,害,对,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-VA,C-PU
现,在,这,样,的,事,不,是,个,不,常,看,的,事,情,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,S-M,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
假,如,，,得,了,一,种,不,治,之,病,的,人,，,得,了,一,种,残,疾,的,人,，,在,经,济,方,面,很,困,难,的,人,等,等,。,当,然,，,那,种,人,中,也,有,简,直,享,爱,生,命,的,，,努,力,工,作,的,。	S-CS,S-CS,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,S-AD,S-VV,S-DEC,S-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VE,R-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
看,了,欧,洲,的,一,些,国,家,，,能,买,的,绿,色,食,品,是,为,有,钱,的,人,，,笔,者,也,认,为,除,了,以,上,所,述,问,题,以,外,，,我,们,还,可,以,考,虑,从,另,一,外,的,角,度,，,即,生,产,者,，,如,垮,国,公,司,，,是,否,他,们,愿,意,这,种,食,品,成,功,？	C-VV,C-AS,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,M-VC,R-P,C-VE,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-LC,C-LC,C-MSP,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-P,W-DT,R-CD,W-LC,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,S-VV,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,W-AD,W-AD,W-PN,W-PN,C-VV,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
“,绿,色,食,品,”,就,是,把,用,未,经,污,染,的,农,产,品,加,工,的,食,品,，,这,种,绿,色,食,品,生,产,的,时,候,不,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,。,所,以,，,虽,然,这,样,的,绿,色,食,品,不,会,有,害,对,人,的,健,康,，,但,是,，,农,作,物,的,产,量,会,大,大,降,低,不,过,，,生,产,农,作,物,的,时,候,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,的,话,，,虽,然,农,作,物,的,生,产,量,会,很,大,，,但,是,会,有,害,对,人,的,健,康,。,而,且,，,土,地,污,染,也,可,能,很,严,大,。	C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,R-BA,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-P,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-AD,S-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-P,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,S-VA,C-PU
饭,店,，,市,场,，,百,华,大,楼,等,总,是,能,听,了,流,行,歌,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-AS,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-PU
几,天,前,过,“,爸,爸,妈,妈,的,节,日,”,那,时,我,买,了,一,套,花,给,你,们,。	C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,S-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU
”,在,闲,聊,的,时,候,，,您,总,是,不,厌,其,烦,的,叮,咛,教,诲,的,说,：,“,做,人,要,有,志,气,。,虽,然,这,些,情,景,已,事,隔,多,年,，,但,您,所,讲,过,的,话,我,们,将,来,永,远,不,会,忘,记,，,您,的,教,诲,我,们,一,定,力,行,实,践,。,您,们,放,心,吧,。	C-PU,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-AS,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,R-NT,R-NT,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-PN,S-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
可,是,这,种,方,法,不,是,根,本,的,解,决,策,略,，,反,而,，,从,长,期,的,角,度,上,恐,怕,会,带,来,更,严,重,的,问,题,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,为,食,品,量,多,的,国,家,人,民,，,先,进,国,家,人,民,想,吃,绿,色,食,品,。,食,品,量,小,的,国,家,人,民,想,选,不,想,因,饥,饿,所,以,去,世,。,不,足,粮,食,国,家,的,人,民,已,经,过,饥,饿,的,困,难,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,R-VV,R-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,W-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-P,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
上,面,我,写,了,两,个,原,因,，,在,公,共,场,所,不,允,许,抽,烟,保,持,市,容,整,洁,并,保,护,青,少,年,，,这,些,措,施,的,好,处,让,人,提,醒,我,们,社,会,不,是,个,人,的,而,是,共,同,的,社,会,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-CC,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
所,以,尽,量,早,点,儿,法,律,上,许,可,安,乐,死,。,不,然,的,话,，,现,在,也,很,多,病,人,和,伤,人,从,早,到,晚,痛,苦,，,真,可,怜,。	C-AD,C-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-NN,W-NN,W-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,R-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
我,认,为,这,个,世,界,上,没,有,十,全,十,美,人,。,不,管,是,美,国,大,总,统,，,他,也,有,缺,点,。,所,以,父,母,也,毕,竟,是,人,，,不,可,能,是,完,全,的,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-PU,S-CS,S-CS,C-VC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU

我,要,当,翻,译,是,有,几,个,原,因,，,所,以,我,非,要,学,语,言,不,可,了,。,当,时,我,的,朋,友,学,韩,语,，,我,也,开,始,想,学,一,点,，,可,是,我,觉,得,学,韩,语,没,有,用,，,也,不,能,说,完,全,没,用,不,过,跟,我,的,理,想,还,差,。,那,时,我,看,到,了,中,国,留,学,的,广,告,，,从,此,我,对,中,国,很,有,兴,趣,，,大,家,都,说,２,１,世,纪,是,中,国,的,世,纪,，,世,界,的,目,观,都,投,向,中,国,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-VC,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-AD,S-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,M-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-OD,C-OD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU

首,先,，,当,男,女,同,班,时,，,他,们,能,在,一,起,和,不,同,性,格,的,人,交,流,或,在,一,起,合,作,。,这,是,非,常,重,要,的,，,因,为,当,他,们,步,入,社,会,工,作,时,，,他,们,会,面,对,不,同,性,别,和,性,格,的,人,工,作,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-JJ,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,W-P,W-AD,W-AD,W-P,W-JJ,W-JJ,W-NN,W-NN,W-DEC,W-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-P,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU
我,姐,姐,的,女,儿,常,常,抱,怨,妈,妈,不,懂,她,的,心,，,说,她,们,存,在,很,深,的,“,代,沟,”,究,其,原,因,，,原,来,她,的,妈,妈,除,了,学,习,，,什,么,也,不,让,她,干,，,我,找,姐,姐,谈,希,望,她,能,摆,脱,母,亲,架,子,以,朋,友,心,态,与,女,儿,谈,谈,后,来,姐,姐,真,的,试,了,试,，,结,果,还,真,有,效,，,她,们,之,间,的,关,系,与,以,前,相,比,大,有,改,善,。	C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

人,类,想,吃,“,绿,色,食,品,”,是,很,自,然,的,，,因,为,大,家,都,知,道,吃,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,生,产,出,来,的,农,作,物,会,有,害,于,人,的,健,康,，,而,且,人,类,无,论,是,谁,都,最,担,心,的,是,自,己,的,身,体,健,康,，,所,以,人,们,希,望,吃,“,绿,色,食,品,是,非,要,的,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-JJ,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,W-AD,W-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-DEC,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-AD,S-VV,C-SP,C-PU

如,果,我,们,更,重,视,我,和,他,人,的,关,系,，,付,出,我,们,的,爱,心,，,关,心,别,人,的,话,，,我,们,的,这,世,界,肯,定,是,没,有,饥,饿,的,美,丽,的,世,界,。,我,们,首,先,要,学,习,跟,别,人,分,享,我,们,的,食,物,，,我,们,的,爱,心,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-PN,C-CC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-DT,M-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
遇,到,饥,饿,的,威,机,。,我,们,应,该,先,考,虑,每,个,人,维,护,的,最,基,本,的,权,利,，,然,后,考,虑,绿,色,食,品,。	S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,W-DT,W-DT,W-NN,W-VV,W-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,此,，,在,各,式,各,样,的,书,籍,种,类,当,中,，,先,取,自,己,有,兴,趣,的,范,畴,，,再,細,研,究,，,从,而,发,展,成,一,科,专,门,学,问,。,其,次,，,从,阅,读,中,会,逐,渐,明,白,有,关,知,识,，,语,言,基,础,渐,渐,巩,固,，,而,达,到,更,明,白,了,解,图,中,內,容,。,跟,着,，,阅,读,的,速,度,和,方,法,更,要,全,面,提,升,。,当,面,对,着,一,份,资,料,，,第,一,步,要,明,白,大,概,內,容,，,这,可,从,标,题,及,第,一,段,和,文,章,尾,段,中,得,出,；,第,二,步,要,仔,咀,嚼,每,一,段,文,字,所,表,达,的,意,思,；,第,三,步,就,是,要,自,己,总,结,所,吸,收,的,內,容,，,组,织,出,个,人,独,特,的,见,解,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,R-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-M,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
但,安,乐,死,问,题,的,最,难,点,是,它,不,仅,是,个,人,的,问,题,而,家,属,的,问,题,，,还,有,我,们,现,在,法,律,方,面,也,有,难,点,。,要,帮,安,乐,死,的,人,会,不,会,杀,人,犯,呢,？,他,是,不,是,做,了,好,事,或,坏,事,，,很,难,回,答,。	C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-MSP,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,R-AD,R-VC,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,S-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

我,记,得,爸,爸,去,世,不,久,那,一,段,日,子,，,妈,常,约,我,们,四,个,去,坟,场,扫,墓,。,我,们,什,么,也,没,带,，,一,下,三,轮,车,我,们,先,乖,乖,地,在,坟,上,清,除,杂,草,，,拾,拾,一,些,树,叶,，,一,会,儿,就,向,妈,要,求,去,捉,蜻,蜓,，,就,这,样,，,我,们,四,个,也,像,蜻,蜓,一,样,自,由,得,“,飞,”,了,。,妈,在,爸,坟,前,开,始,哭,了,，,哭,声,渐,渐,地,大,，,我,牵,着,妹,妹,慢,慢,地,走,近,妈,身,边,，,听,到,她,用,福,清,话,自,哀,自,唱,：,“,金,木,啊,金,木,！,你,实,在,太,忍,心,了,！	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-AD,S-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,R-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,S-DER,C-PU,C-VV,C-PU,C-AS,C-PU,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,M-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-JJ,C-NN,C-SP,C-JJ,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-SP,C-PU

可,是,这,个,方,法,就,是,为,家,庭,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

因,以,老,大,我,总,是,感,到,对,不,起,你,们,。,如,果,养,我,们,不,辛,苦,没,有,你,们,的,病,吧,。	C-P,S-P,M-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-VE,C-VE,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

当,然,必,要,很,长,时,间,和,忍,耐,心,。,但,心,里,面,有,对,家,人,的,爱,情,和,信,念,的,话,问,题,就,不,那,么,重,了,！	C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-AD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,S-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VA,C-SP,C-PU

他,们,说,如,果,来,中,国,时,，,可,以,吃,中,国,菜,，,也,可,以,算,去,游,行,吧,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,R-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-SP,C-PU
在,有,的,地,区,没,有,吃,饭,所,以,很,多,人,饥,饿,甚,至,饿,死,。,这,样,的,情,况,下,我,们,应,不,应,该,主,张,吃,“,绿,色,食,品,”,？	C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,W-VV,W-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,M-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU
原,来,在,的,两,个,和,尚,的,合,作,关,系,已,经,很,好,的,，,但,是,出,现,了,这,个,第,三,者,就,没,有,互,相,帮,助,的,精,神,了,。,这,个,事,情,告,诉,我,们,，,个,人,在,社,会,上,生,活,，,靠,自,己,努,力,是,最,基,本,的,想,法,，,和,别,人,合,作,、,互,相,帮,助,是,必,须,的,，,但,是,如,果,自,己,的,生,活,都,依,靠,别,人,的,话,，,就,破,坏,合,作,关,系,，,自,己,个,人,也,不,能,生,存,下,去,了,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-DEG,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,S-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-DT,C-DT,C-OD,C-OD,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,R-NN,R-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU
我,也,没,想,到,那,次,我,已,经,考,砸,了,。,我,知,道,考,试,成,绩,以,后,我,开,始,也,哭,了,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-M,C-PN,R-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PN,W-VV,W-VV,W-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU

许,多,实,践,例,子,证,明,，,网,上,的,粉,红,色,陷,阱,无,可,防,备,。	C-CD,C-CD,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
从,我,刚,出,生,到,现,在,父,母,们,对,我,的,态,度,依,然,没,有,变,，,他,们,什,么,都,教,我,，,什,么,都,告,诉,我,，,是,我,的,出,生,到,现,在,的,第,一,任,老,师,。	C-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-VC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
“,食,”,的,问,题,也,是,不,是,很,大,。,现,在,社,会,粮,食,是,很,多,。	C-PU,C-VV,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,R-VC,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
我,老,小,是,正,在,准,备,高,考,的,，,所,以,妈,妈,很,关,心,他,。,妈,妈,周,中,一,直,帮,助,我,弟,弟,，,周,末,帮,助,爸,爸,，,所,以,最,近,妈,妈,很,累,。	C-PN,M-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
如,中,国,，,在,国,内,战,争,时,人,们,很,希,望,共,产,党,推,翻,国,民,党,，,得,到,快,的,解,放,，,所,以,人,间,就,流,行,了,《,义,勇,军,进,行,曲,》,。,现,在,社,会,的,歌,曲,有,各,样,各,样,的,类,型,和,歌,手,，,如,，,带,有,传,统,意,义,的,民,歌,，,表,示,对,某,种,事,物,反,抗,的,滚,摇,歌,，,还,有,受,年,轻,人,喜,爱,的,流,行,歌,等,。	C-AD,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,W-VV,W-VV,M-JJ,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-NN,R-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-ETC,C-PU
我,认,为,：,某,人,抽,不,抽,烟,，,基,本,上,是,属,于,个,人,的,问,题,，,虽,然,吸,烟,损,害,他,的,健,康,，,也,不,宜,轻,易,地,剥,夺,吸,烟,的,权,利,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

从,各,国,的,做,法,来,看,，,依,我,来,看,只,有,新,加,坡,对,解,决,这,个,问,题,比,较,成,功,，,别,的,国,家,所,得,到,的,成,果,都,不,明,显,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,R-VV,R-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-AD,C-VE,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,R-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

而,父,母,对,孩,子,的,成,长,影,响,最,大,，,因,为,他,们,对,待,孩,子,的,时,间,最,长,。	C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
每,个,暑,假,我,回,日,本,，,回,家,之,后,先,找,打,工,。,我,去,年,夏,天,在,中,国,菜,饭,店,打,工,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,M-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

所,以,我,硬,着,头,皮,回,国,，,然,后,花,了,一,年,多,的,时,间,，,慢,慢,让,父,母,了,解,这,件,事,情,。,刚,开,始,他,们,非,常,反,对,我,们,的,结,婚,，,可,是,去,年,他,来,日,本,跟,父,母,见,面,以,后,，,无,可,奈,何,同,意,了,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU

还,有,一,个,方,法,是,，,一,般,很,多,饥,饿,国,家,的,经,济,水,平,很,低,的,，,我,觉,得,对,这,样,的,国,家,提,供,一,些,物,资,，,但,不,断,地,提,供,资,源,是,可,能,经,济,上,有,困,难,，,就,是,发,展,国,家,他,们,去,那,里,创,造,工,作,等,等,…,这,种,会,减,少,饥,饿,人,数,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,R-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-VC,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-PN,R-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU
目,前,为,了,自,己,的,身,体,健,康,不,要,吸,烟,的,人,越,来,越,多,。,我,认,为,因,为,人,们,的,经,济,比,以,前,好,，,所,以,人,们,现,在,很,重,视,自,己,的,身,体,健,康,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-VA,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,觉,得,这,时,开,始,父,母,和,孩,子,的,师,弟,关,系,。,这,时,父,母,说,的,不,太,好,的,话,以,后,孩,子,成,长,过,程,的,语,言,能,力,很,有,影,响,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,M-LC,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
首,先,，,我,认,为,应,该,把,解,决,饥,饿,作,为,第,一,主,要,问,题,来,解,决,。,只,有,真,正,挨,过,饿,的,人,，,才,知,道,食,品,对,人,命,的,维,持,是,多,么,重,要,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-BA,R-VV,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-OD,C-OD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
我,们,应,该,用,规,定,吸,烟,者,的,习,惯,改,善,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,M-PU
唯,有,他,们,觉,得,条,上,各,方,面,都,相,当,匹,配,的,，,有,进,一,步,发,展,机,会,的,，,才,会,尝,试,拉,红,线,，,当,媒,人,，,给,男,女,双,方,制,造,结,交,的,机,会,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-M,C-LC,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-VE,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
如,果,爸,爸,或,妈,妈,吸,烟,，,那,么,孩,子,分,明,呼,吸,系,统,不,好,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU
在,９,０,年,代,以,后,，,世,界,上,歌,曲,文,化,有,了,变,化,这,就,是,新,出,现,的,流,行,歌,曲,，,以,前,人,们,的,歌,曲,文,化,是,听,好,的,歌,曲,就,好,的,歌,曲,。	C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-JJ,C-VV,C-VV,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-MSP,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,W-VV,W-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,觉,得,中,国,汉,语,很,有,意,思,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,R-NR,R-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
绿,色,食,品,是,人,们,把,用,未,经,污,染,的,农,产,品,加,工,的,食,品,。,它,是,没,有,受,到,化,学,污,染,，,肯,定,有,利,于,人,的,健,康,。,例,如,，,东,方,国,家,人,都,很,喜,欢,吃,蔬,菜,种,类,，,所,以,有,很,多,人,没,有,疾,病,，,有,很,多,长,寿,老,人,。	C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,R-BA,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,R-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
但,是,自,己,一,个,人,喜,欢,所,以,没,有,勇,气,表,白,对,方,。,因,此,后,悔,没,有,勇,气,的,自,己,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,W-VV,W-VV,M-PN,W-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,W-VE,W-VE,W-NN,W-NN,R-DEC,W-PN,W-PN,C-PU
对,我,来,说,，,我,的,父,母,都,是,知,识,分,子,，,而,且,他,们,爱,读,书,，,文,化,水,平,高,而,且,特,别,讨,厌,说,谎,言,的,孩,子,而,且,性,格,比,较,严,格,。,但,我,小,的,时,候,我,的,性,格,跟,我,的,父,母,完,全,相,反,爱,说,谎,言,、,打,朋,友,。,但,通,过,父,母,的,教,育,和,模,仿,他,们,的,行,动,现,在,的,我,的,性,格,完,全,变,了,，,而,且,我,的,父,母,一,直,凭,“,诚,实,、,努,力,”,这,四,个,字,教,育,了,我,因,此,现,在,的,我,无,论,做,什,么,事,都,非,常,努,力,，,从,来,不,走,马,观,花,地,态,度,做,事,。	C-P,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-AD,R-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,R-CC,R-CC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,R-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-SP,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
如,今,，,随,着,经,济,的,蓬,勃,发,展,，,人,们,的,水,平,不,断,提,高,，,很,多,东,西,与,生,活,品,等,就,应,运,而,生,，,应,运,而,变,。,尤,其,是,烟,这,个,东,西,虽,然,给,人,们,带,来,了,新,鲜,，,但,是,对,健,康,特,有,坏,处,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-VA,C-VA,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
是,不,是,因,为,家,庭,教,育,不,好,，,所,以,出,来,了,这,种,情,况,？	C-VC,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,R-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
另,外,，,喜,欢,流,行,歌,曲,的,人,主,要,是,青,少,年,，,喜,欢,的,连,那,么,难,背,的,歌,词,都,背,过,了,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,S-DEC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU
如,果,没,有,一,辈,子,们,的,努,力,和,知,识,，,也,没,有,现,在,发,展,的,社,会,。,他,们,不,是,跟,年,青,人,想,的,保,守,主,义,者,。,年,青,人,应,该,学,老,一,辈,子,们,的,知,识,而,努,力,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-VE,C-VE,S-AD,S-AD,S-AD,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,R-NR,R-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
虽,然,我,不,懂,得,老,挝,语,，,可,是,他,们,家,人,特,别,热,情,地,接,待,我,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU
这,样,父,亲,的,思,想,而,产,生,的,行,为,，,都,很,大,影,响,了,长,大,后,的,宋,庆,龄,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,从,小,时,很,喜,欢,听,各,种,音,乐,。	C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,们,每,个,人,都,希,望,自,己,不,通,过,辛,苦,的,经,验,得,到,很,大,的,收,获,。,可,是,人,还,是,为,了,获,得,什,么,东,西,应,该,努,力,下,去,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,R-AD,R-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

如,果,人,们,常,常,吃,这,样,生,长,的,农,作,物,就,会,造,成,危,害,身,体,健,康,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
现,代,的,医,学,、,科,学,还,不,没,有,解,决,农,药,引,起,的,副,作,用,问,题,，,但,医,科,方,面,的,技,术,也,一,天,比,一,天,提,高,，,总,有,一,天,会,克,服,这,些,问,题,。	C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,R-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-P,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
吸,烟,不,仅,是,对,人,体,有,害,，,还,对,自,然,环,境,也,有,很,大,的,危,害,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,R-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
那,么,为,了,控,制,对,人,的,影,响,，,先,科,学,者,或,有,关,部,门,决,定,农,药,使,用,标,准,。,比,方,说,，,对,待,大,米,可,以,用,某,个,农,药,、,使,用,量,多,少,、,一,年,几,次,可,以,使,用,、,使,用,时,要,穿,什,么,样,的,衣,服,等,等,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-AD,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,W-CC,W-JJ,W-JJ,W-NN,W-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,W-CD,W-M,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU
”,她,就,这,样,说,我,。	C-PU,C-PN,S-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU
另,外,，,吸,烟,者,的,嘴,巴,颜,色,会,变,黑,，,而,且,口,味,变,臭,，,使,周,围,的,人,一,看,就,远,远,离,开,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
更,对,许,多,国,家,的,文,化,，,艺,术,，,历,史,等,等,都,有,相,当,的,认,识,。	C-AD,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-AD,C-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
随,着,反,华,排,华,浪,潮,日,益,激,烈,，,大,哥,回,国,后,的,第,二,年,，,也,就,是,一,九,六,零,年,，,二,哥,、,二,姐,、,三,姐,也,同,时,去,中,国,升,学,。,家,里,留,下,父,母,、,大,姐,我,和,二,位,弟,弟,，,我,时,值,十,岁,，,念,小,学,四,年,级,。	C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-DEG,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-CC,S-CD,S-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-OD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
绿,色,食,品,一,方,面,受,人,们,的,欢,迎,，,一,方,面,产,生,人,们,的,忧,虑,。,吃,绿,色,食,品,的,人,是,先,进,国,家,的,人,。,未,开,发,国,家,的,人,民,还,没,解,决,吃,的,问,题,。	C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,S-VV,S-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,S-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
还,可,以,加,强,我,们,的,胆,量,，,还,有,最,重,要,的,我,们,可,以,了,解,了,各,种,各,样,的,人,。,但,遇,到,困,难,的,时,候,一,定,会,出,现,一,个,人,来,帮,助,我,们,，,所,以,这,个,假,期,我,一,生,中,也,不,可,能,忘,的,假,期,。	C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,M-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,R-AS,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,M-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU
然,后,，,他,又,给,我,们,体,会,到,一,些,书,中,与,社,会,的,相,同,之,处,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,S-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-LC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
然,后,，,人,的,本,性,是,都,一,样,的,。,按,很,多,我,们,长,辈,的,经,验,，,他,们,也,是,年,轻,的,时,候,，,各,自,都,有,自,己,特,别,迷,上,了,的,爱,好,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,W-VC,W-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,M-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VE,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,S-AS,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
如,果,太,早,恋,，,会,导,致,陷,入,爱,情,的,迷,网,也,不,能,自,拔,，,这,不,但,荒,废,学,业,，,也,辜,负,了,父,母,及,师,长,对,她,们,的,期,望,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,对,我,来,说,只,是,其,中,的,一,个,原,因,为,什,么,我,来,中,国,学,习,。	C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-VC,R-NN,R-NN,W-DEG,W-CD,W-CD,W-NN,W-NN,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-PN,W-VV,W-NR,W-NR,W-VV,W-VV,C-PU
如,果,，,我,有,了,一,个,机,会,喜,欢,歌,星,，,我,肯,定,就,喜,欢,他,的,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-PU,C-PN,C-VE,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-SP,C-PU
说,流,行,歌,曲,是,单,人,唱,或,组,合,团,唱,的,，,不,像,古,典,音,乐,那,样,，,用,高,大,的,嗓,子,和,令,人,沉,醉,的,音,乐,，,而,是,活,泼,、,健,朗,和,令,人,热,血,沸,腾,的,音,乐,而,组,合,出,来,的,。	S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,S-P,S-VA,S-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
可,是,实,际,上,还,没,得,到,成,功,的,程,度,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,R-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
不,过,，,我,住,的,地,方,不,是,大,城,市,，,快,没,了,可,看,的,新,电,影,。,首,先,，,我,们,俩,开,车,到,福,冈,看,电,影,，,马,上,福,冈,的,电,影,都,看,完,了,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-AD,W-VE,W-AS,W-VV,W-VV,W-DEC,W-JJ,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU,R-AD,R-AD,R-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-AD,W-AD,W-NR,W-NR,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU
不,了,解,她,们,的,人,才,会,去,用,不,干,净,的,眼,光,去,看,她,们,！	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU
我,觉,得,一,家,人,应,该,努,力,，,各,个,人,得,爱,家,人,而,且,常,常,相,信,家,人,，,家,长,更,努,力,照,顾,妇,人,、,孩,子,这,样,的,话,，,至,少,这,个,家,庭,不,会,发,生,代,沟,问,题,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
抽,烟,不,只,是,害,抽,烟,本,人,的,健,康,，,而,且,会,害,抽,烟,周,围,人,的,健,康,。,所,以,我,认,为,吸,烟,的,人,吸,烟,时,，,多,加,尊,重,周,围,的,人,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU
第,一,，,首,先,，,为,了,减,少,将,来,吸,烟,者,的,比,率,在,家,庭,和,学,校,里,的,教,育,要,加,强,。,据,了,解,，,吸,烟,者,的,开,始,吸,烟,的,年,龄,越,早,越,很,难,停,止,吸,烟,，,所,以,对,青,少,年,的,教,育,是,十,分,重,要,的,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,R-AD,R-AD,R-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-AD,R-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU
我,们,吃,了,农,作,物,也,应,该,到,田,去,生,产,一,些,未,经,污,染,的,“,绿,色,食,品,”,啊,！,我,们,先,吃,这,些,农,作,物,后,，,一,起,动,手,要,种,田,，,尽,量,不,用,化,肥,或,农,药,生,产,食,品,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,W-CD,W-M,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
第,一,，,如,果,为,了,提,高,农,作,物,的,产,量,，,而,不,提,倡,吃,“,绿,色,食,品,”,这,虽,然,可,以,产,量,很,多,粮,食,提,供,给,的,挨,饿,的,人,，,又,可,以,减,少,因,没,有,粮,食,而,感,到,挨,饿,的,人,，,但,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,的,粮,食,会,大,大,的,危,害,人,们,的,健,康,的,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU
我,希,望,全,世,界,的,人,“,吃,得,饱,，,穿,得,温,”,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-DER,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,C-PU,C-PU
母,亲,的,头,发,是,黑,色,的,，,个,子,高,的,，,男,孩,长,大,了,，,找,自,己,的,爱,人,也,可,能,是,一,个,个,子,高,的,，,头,发,黑,色,的,女,人,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,M-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,M-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,样,，,我,们,就,能,帮,助,由,饥,饿,而,受,痛,苦,的,人,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU
一,般,发,生,“,代,沟,”,的,原,因,不,仅,是,他,们,互,相,之,间,没,有,沟,通,的,话,题,，,而,且,只,自,己,的,角,度,看,父,母,或,子,女,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-LC,C-LC,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
面,对,浩,如,烟,海,的,书,籍,，,我,们,应,该,怎,样,利,用,有,限,的,时,间,去,阅,读,更,多,的,书,，,并,取,得,有,效,的,成,果,？,这,是,非,常,重,要,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU

对,“,父,母,是,孩,子,的,第,一,任,老,师,”,我,同,意,这,观,点,。	S-P,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
人,们,只,要,爱,份,乐,于,帮,助,他,人,的,爱,心,，,那,就,没,有,什,么,困,难,，,只,要,用,心,帮,助,他,人,，,别,人,也,会,尽,力,帮,助,你,的,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-CS,C-CS,S-VV,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-SP,C-PU

所,以,孩,子,只,有,跟,父,母,交,流,，,那,样,交,流,中,，,孩,子,学,考,虑,别,人,的,心,情,、,别,人,的,想,法,等,等,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,M-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU

因,为,人,一,生,下,来,了,以,后,，,应,该,拼,命,的,活,，,如,此,才,能,对,得,起,上,天,和,自,己,的,祖,先,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-DEV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
现,代,的,生,活,水,平,提,高,大,部,分,人,们,非,常,重,视,健,康,的,问,题,。	C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,M-CD,C-CD,C-CD,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,们,家,几,个,小,孩,都,学,到,了,要,勤,劳,，,上,学,后,都,懂,得,勤,勤,学,习,，,故,都,能,获,得,好,成,绩,，,为,父,母,争,了,不,少,光,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-PU
虽,然,吃,“,绿,色,食,品,”,的,想,法,是,好,的,，,但,不,太,符,合,现,实,，,因,此,我,们,应,该,把,受,饥,饿,放,在,第,一,位,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-BA,S-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-P,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-PU
”,坦,白,地,说,，,我,小,小,时,不,太,喜,欢,您,，,因,为,你,每,天,很,晚,才,回,来,，,所,以,我,没,有,机,会,跟,你,聊,天,，,看,你,。	C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VA,S-VA,S-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU
贫,困,、,挨,饿,是,农,村,的,问,题,，,农,作,物,也,大,部,分,在,农,村,栽,培,。,被,化,学,污,染,受,到,不,作,用,是,城,市,的,问,题,，,愿,意,买,绿,色,食,品,的,人,也,城,市,人,多,，,这,个,两,个,问,题,好,像,有,南,北,问,题,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,W-AD,W-CD,W-CD,W-CD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-SB,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-PU,C-DT,R-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
吸,烟,者,在,公,共,场,所,吸,烟,，,许,多,人,不,知,不,觉,吸,二,手,烟,。,而,且,有,的,吸,烟,者,把,吸,完,了,烟,随,便,扔,掉,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-BA,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,M-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

我,认,为,吸,烟,者,不,是,故,意,害,别,人,的,健,康,，,所,以,不,吸,烟,者,也,不,会,那,么,强,烈,批,评,他,们,。,还,有,吸,烟,者,也,该,认,真,地,考,虑,给,他,人,的,影,响,，,特,别,在,公,共,场,所,，,关,心,别,人,是,起,码,的,礼,貌,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-NN,M-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

我,们,一,群,人,，,有,的,大,喊,大,叫,，,有,的,却,哭,了,起,来,。,那,时,我,急,中,生,智,，,一,把,就,把,那,件,床,单,拉,下,来,，,用,脚,出,力,的,在,那,件,床,单,上,乱,踩,，,结,果,就,把,火,给,踩,灭,了,。,才,没,有,引,起,火,灾,，,真,是,不,幸,中,之,大,幸,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,S-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-BA,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,S-DEC,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-BA,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,M-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

没,有,什,么,变,化,，,国,家,的,文,化,不,能,发,展,，,文,化,的,发,展,需,要,新,的,文,化,和,老,文,化,的,调,整,。,这,个,是,很,难,但,是,需,要,。,人,们,有,点,改,变,想,法,，,可,以,了,解,喜,欢,流,行,歌,曲,的,人,。	M-VE,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,R-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,R-VE,R-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU
而,且,，,社,会,需,求,男,女,的,东,西,也,不,一,样,。,比,如,，,男,性,要,有,忍,耐,力,、,体,力,。,但,一,般,来,说,比,较,粗,心,。,女,性,要,温,柔,温,缓,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,S-NN,S-VA,C-PU
这,样,的,话,，,不,会,大,副,度,减,少,产,量,而,吃,绿,色,食,品,。	C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-MSP,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
上,次,我,在,我,的,老,家,做,过,了,打,工,。,我,工,作,的,主,要,内,容,是,陪,跟,从,中,国,来,的,旅,客,欢,光,、,去,好,的,餐,厅,吃,饭,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,R-AS,R-AS,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
我,先,到,一,家,旅,行,社,打,听,一,下,有,没,有,机,票,。,没,想,到,售,票,员,说,是,还,有,很,多,机,票,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,M-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,R-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,为,要,是,分,开,了,，,可,能,会,引,起,学,生,的,成,绩,。,因,为,要,是,在,学,习,方,面,，,女,生,比,男,生,好,，,女,生,会,努,力,学,，,但,男,生,不,那,么,努,力,，,只,有,少,些,男,生,会,努,力,。,那,是,说,他,们,有,没,有,自,己,的,目,标,，,要,是,有,的,话,，,他,们,会,努,力,学,习,，,实,现,目,标,，,但,是,很,少,。	C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,S-VA,S-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-PN,S-VC,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-AD,C-VE,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VE,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
他,离,开,中,国,和,我,以,后,只,写,信,、,打,电,话,联,系,的,，,所,以,他,怎,么,样,的,样,子,不,知,道,。,差,不,多,一,年,半,的,时,间,没,见,面,，,不,是,第,一,次,见,面,知,道,他,是,我,干,哥,哥,。,我,见,到,他,就,不,知,不,觉,流,了,眼,泪,，,因,为,我,认,为,干,哥,哥,把,我,忘,了,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,W-CC,W-PN,W-AD,W-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-PN,W-VA,W-VA,W-VA,W-DEC,W-NN,W-NN,M-AD,W-VV,W-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,R-AD,R-VC,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VC,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-BA,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU

这,个,故,事,来,看,我,们,生,活,很,有,趣,。,我,们,人,类,是,人,和,人,之,间,的,关,系,上,生,活,的,。	M-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,M-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,M-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU

有,些,吸,烟,者,明,知,这,个,是,不,好,的,，,但,还,是,死,性,不,改,，,继,续,抽,下,去,。,吸,烟,人,口,太,多,的,话,，,空,气,就,越,来,越,污,染,，,导,致,气,候,变,化,，,破,坏,自,然,绿,化,等,影,响,。,这,样,的,情,况,持,续,下,去,的,话,公,众,利,益,的,影,响,和,个,人,的,健,康,就,会,坏,得,不,可,挽,救,了,，,所,以,必,须,采,取,对,吸,烟,者,严,厉,的,规,定,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,R-PN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VA,C-DER,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU

我,们,国,家,到,了,现,代,比,较,发,达,了,起,来,，,但,是,还,是,缺,少,粮,食,而,挨,饿,的,国,民,很,多,，,还,有,一,方,面,是,国,家,有,点,儿,了,富,有,就,有,些,国,民,有,了,钱,要,更,好,吃,的,更,健,康,的,绿,色,食,品,了,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-AS,R-VV,R-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-AD,W-VC,W-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,W-MSP,W-VV,W-VV,W-DEC,W-NN,W-NN,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,W-AS,W-VV,R-VV,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-AS,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
我,希,望,能,够,跟,汉,语,或,中,国,文,化,有,关,的,工,作,。,除,此,之,外,我,也,许,要,当,老,师,，,因,为,可,以,不,断,进,高,自,己,的,水,平,而,且,能,够,有,很,稳,定,的,工,作,，,在,当,老,师,的,时,候,可,以,跟,学,生,接,触,得,比,较,多,，,所,以,从,此,也,可,以,了,解,学,生,的,性,格,和,他,们,的,学,习,外,语,的,能,力,。,我,学,汉,语,也,是,为,了,我,自,己,，,我,能,够,了,解,并,且,认,识,到,自,己,的,中,国,传,统,很,悠,久,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-JJ,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NR,S-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

这,也,真,令,我,们,头,疼,的,一,件,事,。,由,于,现,代,的,孩,子,跟,我,们,这,些,做,父,母,所,处,的,年,代,不,同,，,所,以,他,们,对,我,们,的,要,求,当,然,是,很,高,的,。,有,时,我,常,想,，,如,果,我,尽,量,来,满,足,孩,子,们,的,愿,望,，,便,意,味,着,彼,此,就,无,存,有,“,代,沟,”,了,罢,，,但,答,案,还,是,错,误,的,。	C-PN,C-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DT,C-DT,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-MSP,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,S-VE,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AS,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
我,这,次,看,到,了,父,亲,玩,得,很,开,心,，,感,到,然,后,我,应,该,带,父,母,出,去,玩,。,以,后,我,跟,他,们,不,能,在,一,起,，,我,应,该,珍,惜,这,种,机,会,。,这,次,假,期,让,我,觉,悟,了,父,母,的,重,要,性,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,S-AD,S-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,M-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,S-NN,S-NN,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

第,二,，,流,行,的,歌,曲,的,歌,词,反,映,当,时,代,。,比,如,很,多,最,近,流,行,的,歌,曲,的,歌,词,，,差,不,多,都,是,关,于,爱,情,的,呢,，,因,为,是,什,么,？,就,是,人,们,关,心,的,项,目,转,移,到,爱,情,，,现,代,人,很,关,心,爱,情,，,所,以,他,们,一,听,关,于,爱,情,故,事,的,歌,曲,就,喜,欢,了,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NT,C-NT,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-SP,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,R-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-PU

这,样,每,个,人,都,能,享,受,而,保,护,自,己,的,利,益,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
作,父,母,应,该,教,他,们,怎,么,做,人,，,能,让,他,们,能,做,一,个,好,人,那,么,父,母,应,教,孩,子,学,做,人,应,该,是,让,他,们,从,自,己,的,行,为,、,动,作,都,要,做,得,好,。,中,国,有,一,句,话,说,：,“,言,传,身,教,”,意,思,是,教,孩,子,最,好,是,从,自,己,的,身,上,让,孩,子,学,到,，,孩,子,是,从,小,他,们,都,认,为,父,母,做,才,是,对,的,。,他,们,好,学,能,力,较,强,，,只,要,看,父,母,怎,么,说,他,们,马,上,就,按,着,说,，,或,者,父,母,的,举,止,也,是,，,所,以,不,难,看,出,父,母,就,是,孩,子,的,第,一,任,老,师,。	C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,R-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,R-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DER,C-VA,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VC,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,R-PN,R-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,M-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-AS,C-VV,C-PU,R-CC,R-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

依,我,的,看,法,，,从,小,一,起,长,大,的,玩,伴,不,是,一,个,理,想,的,结,交,方,式,，,因,为,有,可,以,两,人,从,小,一,起,长,大,，,大,家,都,很,了,解,对,方,，,但,是,有,人,解,得,这,不,是,爱,情,，,有,可,能,是,友,情,，,不,一,定,是,从,小,一,起,长,大,就,喜,欢,对,方,，,也,很,可,能,是,一,种,关,心,已,不,是,爱,，,我,们,达,到,爱,的,程,度,才,可,以,进,到,婚,姻,，,通,过,亲,戚,朋,友,的,介,绍,也,并,不,是,一,个,理,想,方,式,。,如,果,两,个,人,通,过,朋,友,介,绍,能,慢,慢,了,解,也,可,能,走,进,美,好,的,婚,姻,一,个,偶,然,的,机,会,相,遇,，,两,人,从,来,没,见,个,面,，,突,然,相,遇,，,慢,慢,了,解,，,早,长,早,久,，,经,一,段,长,时,间,双,方,很,爱,互,双,方,，,这,时,就,是,进,婚,姻,的,美,好,时,间,。	C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VE,S-VV,S-VV,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-M,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-AD,S-VV,S-AD,S-AD,C-PU,S-P,C-CD,C-M,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,S-VV,S-AD,S-PN,S-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

不,过,遇,到,饥,饿,，,人,就,活,不,下,去,。,所,以,我,认,为,人,类,先,解,决,饥,饿,问,题,，,然,后,解,决,食,品,污,染,问,题,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

这,是,一,个,家,庭,和,社,会,问,题,，,我,们,常,常,听,到,年,青,人,的,感,叹,，,说,他,们,很,难,呆,在,家,里,，,因,为,父,母,的,训,话,很,多,，,又,常,重,复,的,啰,哩,啰,哩,的,讲,的,一,大,堆,理,由,。,我,觉,得,对,父,母,的,态,度,，,我,们,应,该,出,于,尊,重,，,而,我,们,做,父,母,的,，,也,应,该,跟,着,社,会,的,潮,流,学,习,，,父,母,跟,孩,子,应,该,像,对,待,好,朋,友,一,样,，,我,们,做,父,母,的,不,要,太,过,尊,严,。,现,在,时,代,不,同,了,，,我,们,每,一,分,钟,，,每,一,钞,钟,，,都,应,该,学,习,社,会,的,潮,流,，,才,赶,得,上,时,代,，,两,代,人,之,间,的,代,沟,。	C-PN,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-VV,R-VV,R-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,S-IJ,S-DEG,C-VV,C-DEC,C-CD,C-JJ,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-PN,R-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,R-VV,R-VV,C-VA,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-AS,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-M,C-PU,C-DT,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,M-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

总,之,说,，,我,们,要,考,虑,的,是,，,不,是,放,弃,其,一,个,问,题,，,而,是,怎,样,把,两,者,都,发,展,下,去,。	C-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,S-PN,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-BA,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
时,间,过,得,真,快,，,不,知,不,觉,得,今,日,我,已,是,一,个,四,十,出,头,年,龄,的,中,年,妇,女,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-DER,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-LC,C-LC,R-NN,R-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU
第,一,，,喜,欢,流,行,歌,曲,可,以,把,我,们,的,生,活,更,完,美,一,些,，,比,如,说,，,和,朋,友,一,起,玩,儿,的,时,候,，,我,们,可,以,唱,现,在,流,行,的,歌,。,这,样,，,可,以,把,气,氛,更,好,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-BA,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,S-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
当,我,们,有,时,间,面,对,面,谈,话,时,，,我,才,和,他,们,好,好,谈,，,也,叫,他,们,提,出,自,己,的,意,见,。,哪,一,个,不,对,，,哪,一,个,做,对,了,，,都,要,指,出,来,，,供,大,家,来,讨,论,，,结,果,，,在,不,伤,和,气,也,不,伤,尊,严,的,情,况,下,，,把,问,题,一,个,一,个,都,来,研,究,如,何,解,决,如,何,从,好,的,方,面,来,处,理,这,些,事,。	C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,S-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,R-DT,R-DT,R-NN,C-PU
我,想,上,面,的,原,因,是,父,母,和,子,女,不,能,容,易,代,沟,的,最,基,本,。,所,以,先,年,轻,人,有,宽,阔,的,心,理,来,理,解,父,母,一,代,的,生,活,环,境,和,心,理,状,态,。,以,后,慢,慢,地,说,一,说,现,在,自,己,的,生,活,和,想,法,，,跟,父,母,说,的,时,候,一,定,要,忍,耐,，,坚,持,试,试,跟,父,母,谈,话,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,M-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-AD,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,C-VE,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-CD,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
对,我,自,己,的,经,验,来,说,，,我,爷,爷,是,一,个,吸,烟,者,，,他,抽,得,很,厉,害,了,，,至,少,一,天,抽,了,一,盒,。,虽,然,他,一,个,人,抽,了,烟,，,但,是,跟,他,一,起,过,的,奶,奶,也,犯,了,气,管,支,炎,，,而,且,引,起,了,并,其,他,的,病,。,这,种,情,况,，,当,然,是,原,因,不,只,是,爷,爷,的,烟,，,可,是,医,生,说,过,了,就,是,原,因,之,一,。	S-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-LC,S-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,R-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,R-AS,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,R-AS,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-VV,C-AS,S-NN,S-NN,S-VV,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,R-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-SP,M-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,为,我,们,老,家,是,台,湾,金,门,，,是,以,福,建,话,为,主,。	C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,M-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

因,此,上,一,辈,子,应,先,接,近,下,一,辈,子,试,图,对,话,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-AD,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

只,有,解,决,这,个,不,平,衡,的,问,题,，,才,有,真,的,人,类,的,幸,福,和,进,步,。	C-AD,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-AD,W-VE,W-AD,W-AD,W-NN,W-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
可,是,她,每,天,毅,力,刻,苦,地,学,习,。,最,后,她,考,上,了,出,人,意,料,到,的,著,名,的,大,学,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,S-NN,S-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,W-VV,W-VV,W-AS,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,R-VV,R-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

记,得,父,亲,说,过,，,当,我,三,岁,的,那,年,，,刚,好,日,本,南,侵,，,日,本,军,在,我,们,住,的,小,岛,—,—,文,岛,登,陆,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,S-P,C-PN,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
现,在,生,命,科,学,发,展,了,，,人,类,可,以,制,造,复,制,动,物,而,且,有,的,科,学,家,打,算,制,造,复,制,人,间,！,我,看,这,种,科,学,发,展,使,人,们,误,会,，,就,是,人,类,可,以,控,制,生,命,的,幻,想,。,可,是,我,想,，,人,不,能,选,择,出,生,，,也,不,能,死,亡,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU

。	C-PU
那,么,每,一,个,都,心,理,准,备,好,以,后,这,么,样,解,决,我,们,人,类,面,对,的,问,题,，,我,认,为,有,三,个,解,决,的,办,法,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,M-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-VA,C-LC,C-LC,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
吸,烟,可,以,带,来,癌,症,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
各,性,会,尊,重,对,方,的,性,别,的,不,同,。	S-DT,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
长,期,抽,烟,引,起,气,管,炎,、,肺,癌,、,心,脏,病,等,疾,病,。,抽,烟,不,但,对,抽,烟,的,本,人,有,害,，,还,要,影,响,到,周,围,的,人,的,健,康,，,甚,至,有,些,科,学,者,说,，,在,健,康,方,面,抽,烟,给,周,围,的,人,带,来,的,影,响,比,对,本,人,的,影,响,还,要,大,。,不,过,很,多,抽,烟,的,人,已,知,道,此,习,惯,之,有,害,，,但,因,为,中,毒,，,戒,不,了,烟,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,S-VV,S-VV,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-P,S-NN,S-NN,M-PU,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU
如,果,人,们,能,说,第,三,个,语,言,能,使,自,己,更,有,价,值,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-OD,C-OD,S-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

那,吸,烟,有,什,么,样,的,害,处,政,府,来,管,它,呢,？	C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-PN,C-SP,C-PU
每,个,人,为,了,维,持,生,命,不,顾,别,人,，,比,如,，,抢,东,西,、,偷,东,西,，,甚,至,发,生,杀,人,之,类,的,凶,恶,的,罪,犯,。,在,绝,迫,的,情,况,下,人,类,会,失,去,理,性,，,那,么,，,社,会,混,乱,是,必,然,的,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,S-AD,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
您,一,直,辛,辛,苦,苦,地,工,作,了,，,没,有,时,间,照,顾,您,自,己,。,可,是,，,现,在,都,已,经,长,大,了,，,所,以,享,受,自,己,的,生,活,吧,！	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-PU,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,M-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

我,还,记,得,当,时,跟,我,哥,哥,一,块,上,学,期,间,，,当,时,学,校,周,一,至,周,六,开,学,，,在,学,校,的,后,侧,是,人,家,，,他,家,中,设,有,电,视,机,；,以,前,电,视,机,不,是,每,一,个,家,庭,都,有,本,领,买,的,而,且,在,昼,天,没,有,播,放,，,除,非,星,期,六,和,星,期,天,。,那,么,当,每,逢,星,期,六,的,那,一,天,，,我,和,同,班,的,同,学,非,偷,向,侧,窗,外,的,那,家,电,视,机,观,看,电,视,节,目,不,可,，,算,是,很,有,趣,也,很,高,兴,。,我,的,童,年,也,算,是,不,错,，,虽,然,没,有,机,会,取,得,高,等,学,兴,业,，,但,也,在,其,中,能,取,了,很,多,知,识,，,很,多,做,人,的,道,理,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NR,C-CD,C-CC,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-DT,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-VE,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,S-NN,C-NN,S-VE,S-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-CC,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-PN,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-ETC,C-VV,R-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

饶,我,的,错,。	S-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NN,C-PU
我,觉,得,回,答,这,个,问,题,很,难,，,因,为,不,管,你,是,我,对,象,认,识,的,，,最,重,要,还,是,存,在,着,爱,情,，,爱,情,是,两,个,人,在,一,起,共,同,生,活,的,基,础,。,爱,情,当,然,也,可,以,是,突,然,的,也,可,以,慢,慢,地,出,现,，,尤,其,两,个,人,互,相,了,解,、,互,相,支,持,。,彼,此,一,见,倾,心,的,人,不,少,，,但,能,长,期,在,一,起,却,不,多,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-VC,C-PN,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,M-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,M-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
这,是,跟,人,的,健,康,最,密,切,有,关,的,问,题,。,所,以,如,今,的,大,家,都,所,提,倡,的,就,是,绿,色,食,品,的,饮,用,。	C-PN,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-PN,C-PN,R-AD,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
在,这,个,世,界,上,吸,烟,的,人,数,是,不,计,其,数,的,。,但,是,近,年,来,吸,烟,对,身,体,有,害,的,事,实,、,很,多,科,学,家,说,的,话,、,他,们,研,究,出,来,的,可,靠,的,证,据,帮,助,我,们,了,解,这,个,事,实,越,来,越,深,。,现,在,在,各,种,各,样,的,地,方,可,以,看,到,",不,许,抽,烟,",的,标,志,。	C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,R-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,W-VV,W-VV,W-DT,W-DT,W-NN,W-NN,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-VA,M-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

小,时,候,的,我,是,实,现,父,母,对,我,的,愿,望,和,期,待,是,第,一,重,要,的,。,所,以,我,想,孩,子,是,父,母,的,希,望,下,有,时,答,应,有,时,感,到,压,力,，,有,时,反,抗,长,大,的,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-PN,S-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-OD,C-OD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU
应,该,不,是,。,我,考,试,之,前,认,真,地,学,习,时,，,为,了,避,开,噪,音,，,用,手,纸,塞,耳,朵,，,那,以,后,暂,时,可,以,集,中,地,学,习,。,但,是,，,过,几,个,小,时,以,后,有,点,不,舒,服,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,S-VC,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,M-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VE,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
以,现,今,社,会,的,科,讯,发,达,，,青,少,年,还,是,有,办,法,通,过,上,网,、,通,电,话,交,到,男,女,朋,友,而,发,展,一,段,为,人,不,知,的,地,下,情,，,这,种,地,下,情,反,而,对,青,少,年,男,女,造,成,更,大,的,伤,害,。,因,为,通,过,与,陌,生,人,交,往,，,由,于,青,少,年,的,人,生,经,验,不,者,，,不,会,辩,别,好,坏,，,很,容,易,走,错,路,。,所,以,家,长,不,必,太,担,心,学,校,混,合,式,教,育,会,来,早,恋,。	C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,W-VA,W-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

我,认,为,，,社,会,现,在,不,断,的,发,展,，,人,类,不,断,的,开,发,，,总,会,有,一,天,发,明,出,我,所,说,的,一,样,的,农,药,和,化,肥,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-AD,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,们,的,社,会,生,活,是,不,是,男,女,分,开,的,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-VC,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
在,我,国,，,也,曾,听,闻,女,校,的,女,学,生,特,别,爱,勾,引,男,生,，,男,校,的,男,学,生,特,别,爱,去,挑,逗,女,生,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

首,先,，,我,们,做,大,人,的,一,定,要,先,能,明,白,现,在,青,年,一,代,的,人,。,时,代,不,同,了,，,以,前,没,有,的,，,现,在,什,么,都,有,了,，,电,视,机,，,从,黑,白,到,彩,色,的,，,家,里,的,设,备,都,现,代,化,，,不,必,用,人,力,来,操,辨,，,只,用,脑,力,来,操,行,都,能,办,得,到,。,和,我,们,以,前,的,时,代,简,直,是,天,和,地,！	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-DEG,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-AS,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-VE,C-VE,C-DEC,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VE,C-AS,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,S-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DER,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-PU

我,们,应,该,必,须,要,发,明,新,种,化,肥,和,农,药,人,们,都,希,望,做,安,全,的,农,作,物,。,我,很,希,望,这,样,的,事,情,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-JJ,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU
所,以,在,好,多,人,一,起,活,动,的,场,合,上,吸,烟,的,话,，,会,影,响,他,人,的,身,体,健,康,，,而,且,二,手,吸,烟,是,对,身,体,更,不,好,的,。,所,以,好,多,国,家,已,经,在,实,行,在,公,共,场,所,上,不,能,吸,烟,，,如,果,吸,烟,的,话,那,个,吸,烟,者,被,罚,款,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-JJ,W-JJ,W-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-SB,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
特,别,是,三,星,大,企,业,，,公,司,的,整,个,楼,上,不,允,许,抽,烟,。,有,人,说,，,生,活,在,这,么,严,格,的,社,会,上,的,现,代,人,将,来,是,否,丧,失,自,己,的,自,由,？	C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NR,C-NR,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
