我,想,政,府,不,断,的,颁,布,严,格,的,措,施,一,定,能,让,社,会,吸,烟,者,越,来,越,少,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
另,外,，,吸,烟,的,多,半,人,吸,烟,以,后,就,扔,掉,它,，,这,从,保,持,环,境,的,角,度,来,看,有,问,题,。,这,种,情,况,下,，,某,市,政,府,提,出,来,的,措,施,有,道,理,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,W-VV,W-VV,W-DEC,W-CD,W-CD,C-NN,C-VV,M-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
就,是,人,们,把,用,未,经,污,染,的,农,产,品,加,工,的,食,品,叫,做,“,绿,色,食,品,”,。,能,吃,未,经,污,染,的,“,绿,色,食,品,”,来,可,以,保,持,自,身,健,康,是,件,好,事,，,但,我,们,首,先,要,考,虑,到,如,果,不,用,化,肥,和,农,药,的,话,，,农,作,物,的,产,量,又,会,大,大,降,低,。,这,让,我,们,考,虑,，,地,球,上,还,是,很,多,饥,饿,现,象,存,在,。	C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,R-BA,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,R-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VC,M-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
虽,然,一,开,始,觉,得,那,是,那,么,漫,长,，,但,结,束,以,后,又,似,乎,有,点,短,暂,。,在,这,一,段,时,间,里,我,的,英,文,水,平,有,所,提,高,，,回,到,学,校,在,英,文,课,上,成,绩,也,有,所,进,步,，,让,我,重,新,的,了,解,了,“,假,期,”,的,意,思,：,并,不,光,是,玩,，,假,期,也,可,以,加,强,你,某,一,门,不,好,的,学,科,。,我,渡,过,了,一,个,前,所,未,有,的,特,别,假,期,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,M-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-M,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,R-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU
可,是,我,们,都,有,现,在,的,生,活,，,不,能,回,回,去,以,前,。,我,离,开,韩,国,时,也,非,常,舍,不,得,，,但,是,我,们,应,该,回,去,自,己,的,生,活,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
好,多,人,都,想,戒,吸,烟,。,可,是,因,吸,烟,有,中,毒,性,，,所,以,如,果,习,惯,性,抽,烟,的,人,长,时,间,不,抽,的,话,，,肯,定,有,副,作,用,。,总,之,，,—,开,始,抽,烟,很,难,戒,。	C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,M-PU
有,一,天,，,小,雪,的,母,亲,得,了,急,症,，,抢,救,不,果,病,逝,了,。,小,雪,的,父,亲,为,了,让,她,能,再,得,回,母,爱,，,决,定,娶,一,个,很,娴,慧,的,女,人,给,小,雪,当,后,母,。,小,雪,自,从,另,娶,后,，,以,为,父,亲,的,心,已,被,后,母,霸,占,了,。	C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,S-AD,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-NN,W-NN,W-P,W-P,W-AD,W-VV,W-LC,W-PU,W-VV,W-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-LB,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU
直,到,近,代,，,思,想,逐,渐,开,放,，,女,孩,子,也,可,以,上,学,堂,读,书,，,不,过,，,当,时,学,校,收,学,生,大,以,纯,男,生,或,纯,女,生,为,主,。	C-P,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,S-NN,S-JJ,C-P,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
因,此,我,觉,得,，,我,这,个,问,题,不,能,单,独,的,考,虑,，,而,是,从,生,态,环,境,和,人,类,的,生,存,的,大,背,景,下,考,虑,。	C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

第,二,个,原,因,是,流,行,词,曲,的,音,调,和,伴,奏,都,很,好,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
这,本,书,给,我,们,启,示,。	C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,上,小,学,一,直,遇,到,很,多,老,师,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,想,流,行,歌,曲,不,错,，,不,过,我,也,经,常,不,太,喜,欢,听,。,因,为,大,家,觉,得,好,听,，,这,不,是,说,我,也,觉,得,好,听,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,R-AD,R-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,S-PN,S-AD,S-VC,S-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
现,时,音,乐,还,可,以,治,病,。	S-NT,S-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
抽,烟,的,本,人,失,去,健,康,，,这,理,所,当,然,，,但,哪,有,权,力,损,害,不,抽,烟,的,人,的,健,康,呢,？	C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
在,人,的,一,生,中,每,个,人,都,要,有,一,个,对,自,己,很,好,的,伴,侣,，,否,则,的,话,他,的,人,生,会,是,一,个,空,的,人,生,像,一,个,没,有,内,容,的,一,本,书,。	C-P,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,S-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-CD,S-CD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,R-CD,R-M,C-NN,C-PU
在,工,作,的,四,年,里,，,我,已,累,积,了,许,多,和,外,国,公,司,洽,谈,和,合,作,的,经,验,，,也,已,懂,得,如,何,有,利,地,管,理,和,经,营,一,个,公,司,。,因,此,我,也,在,二,零,零,三,年,里,的,十,大,经,理,里,，,占,有,一,席,之,位,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-CD,C-M,R-LC,C-DEG,C-CD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,样,一,来,，,人,们,逐,渐,重,视,“,绿,色,食,品,”,目,前,几,乎,成,为,世,界,人,重,视,的,热,门,话,题,了,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
这,我,同,意,，,但,只,能,想,这,不,喜,欢,这,种,歌,曲,的,人,就,不,用,花,钱,买,这,种,歌,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,R-AD,R-AD,R-VV,R-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-PU
由,于,我,受,到,顾,客,的,爱,戴,，,我,也,得,到,上,司,的,重,视,。	C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,样,下,去,的,这,世,界,的,物,品,都,被,污,染,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-SB,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
最,难,忘,的,事,是,我,跟,爸,爸,打,架,的,事,件,。,我,还,记,得,那,天,我,说,什,么,：,“,如,果,我,是,当,父,母,的,，,我,决,不,说,为,了,子,女,父,母,好,多,痛,苦,这,样,的,话,！	C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VC,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-VV,R-DT,R-DT,C-PU,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU
在,我,看,来,，,我,觉,得,人,人,是,听,音,乐,取,乐,的,，,所,以,对,于,某,种,音,乐,，,它,都,没,有,对,，,没,有,错,的,。,我,们,不,应,该,去,分,或,把,什,么,歌,看,成,高,等,和,低,等,的,。	C-P,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PU,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,C-CC,C-BA,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,S-CC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU
即,使,不,吸,烟,的,人,也,说,不,定,得,病,。,因,为,如,果,在,吸,烟,人,的,旁,边,，,就,不,吸,烟,也,等,于,吸,烟,。,就,是,二,手,烟,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,M-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,今,天,在,体,育,上,的,兴,趣,与,成,就,可,以,算,是,受,到,爸,爸,很,大,的,影,响,。	C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
大,学,毕,业,后,，,也,曾,在,一,家,出,版,社,担,任,过,广,告,设,计,师,。,期,间,还,做,推,销,部,门,的,工,作,，,我,和,许,多,广,告,客,户,打,交,道,，,对,这,一,行,业,更,有,深,一,层,的,了,解,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,M-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-CC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-DT,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,W-AD,W-VE,C-JJ,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,就,是,，,在,父,母,亲,的,天,早,上,决,定,的,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,R-NN,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
我,觉,得,人,类,只,有,两,种,，,是,女,性,和,男,性,。,女,性,和,男,性,一,起,生,活,，,从,古,以,来,这,是,普,普,通,通,的,事,情,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,M-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-P,S-JJ,S-LC,S-LC,C-PN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

为,了,这,个,问,题,，,市,政,府,出,了,一,项,规,定,：,是,在,公,共,场,所,边,走,边,抽,烟,的,人,将,被,罚,款,。,因,为,罚,的,款,是,特,别,的,贵,，,所,以,现,在,的,人,们,在,公,共,场,所,怕,抽,烟,。,上,星,期,五,在,新,闻,里,报,道,，,如,今,，,在,公,共,场,所,，,允,许,抽,烟,的,地,方,越,来,越,少,了,，,所,以,抽,烟,的,人,也,明,显,减,少,了,。	C-P,C-P,M-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-SB,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,R-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU

找,到,了,就,把,那,个,有,问,题,的,部,分,自,己,改,善,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-AD,C-BA,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-CD,C-CD,C-PN,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU
例,如,：,当,一,个,很,好,的,教,汉,语,的,老,师,，,要,结,婚,像,爸,爸,一,样,的,好,看,的,人,，,织,成,跟,我,们,家,那,样,很,和,睦,、,愉,快,的,家,旅,。,可,是,其,中,最,希,望,的,是,爸,爸,妈,妈,的,健,康,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,W-VV,W-VV,M-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-VA,W-VA,W-DEC,W-JJ,W-JJ,W-DEG,W-NN,C-PU,S-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,S-AD,S-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
上,学,以,前,是,可,以,说,准,备,社,会,生,活,的,期,间,，,也,可,以,说,只,有,父,母,当,孩,子,们,的,老,师,的,期,间,。,正,在,我,说,的,“,父,母,”,是,意,味,着,在,家,庭,有,保,护,孩,子,的,责,任,的,人,。,一,般,来,说,，,是,父,母,，,可,有,的,家,庭,可,能,有,不,一,样,的,情,况,，,有,可,能,祖,父,母,当,那,个,任,务,，,有,可,能,养,父,母,要,当,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,W-VC,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,R-NR,R-NR,R-NR,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,M-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
此,后,我,跟,爸,在,一,起,讨,论,，,我,们,俩,以,后,应,该,如,何,，,那,时,我,非,常,坦,白,地,说,了,我,的,心,里,存,在,的,话,。,爸,爸,听,完,我,所,说,的,，,抬,头,看,我,说,“,对,不,起,，,作,为,爸,爸,，,没,有,了,解,我,女,儿,的,心,情,。,”,然,后,我,们,努,力,要,了,解,互,相,的,心,情,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-CD,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,R-VV,R-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
如,果,以,后,的,科,技,比,现,在,更,进,步,，,对,人,类,给,好,处,的,话,我,们,拥,有,的,这,种,不,可,思,议,的,麻,烦,会,解,决,而,以,后,的,未,来,一,定,是,完,美,的,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
在,韩,国,里,有,的,人,为,了,健,康,要,减,肥,不,吃,饭,，,在,北,朝,鲜,里,有,的,人,为,了,活,着,吃,人,肉,。	C-P,C-NR,C-NR,R-LC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-LC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
有,的,家,长,认,为,把,孩,子,送,到,学,校,去,念,书,，,就,以,为,是,解,决,了,身,为,父,母,的,责,任,，,但,事,实,却,没,有,像,一,般,人,所,想,像,得,那,么,理,想,。,因,为,现,代,的,所,谓,学,校,却,并,不,是,学,习,的,中,心,，,有,一,些,学,校,的,老,师,只,教,课,而,他,们,没,有,教,导,学,生,怎,样,做,一,个,有,用,的,人,，,更,严,重,的,是,很,多,学,生,在,学,校,里,交,上,了,不,好,的,朋,友,，,功,课,不,做,整,天,出,去,玩,，,根,本,没,有,说,想,好,好,学,习,的,念,头,，,这,样,以,后,对,他,们,的,前,途,就,不,好,，,使,老,人,家,失,望,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,R-VV,R-VV,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,R-PN,R-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-VE,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-NN,W-NN,W-AD,W-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,M-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
有,时,候,可,以,请,别,人,帮,忙,，,可,是,每,次,这,样,做,，,不,但,对,自,己,，,而,且,对,大,家,不,好,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,M-AD,C-AD,C-PU

二,来,，,我,认,为,即,使,吸,烟,对,身,体,有,害,，,也,毫,不,有,好,处,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,R-CS,R-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,S-AD,S-AD,S-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,们,家,到,３,年,前,跟,一,般,家,庭,一,样,每,天,吃,一,般,食,品,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,R-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

这,个,问,题,的,严,重,性,不,仅,在,于,抽,烟,的,人,本,身,的,健,康,影,响,，,也,在,于,他,周,围,的,人,受,到,不,好,的,影,响,之,处,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,R-NN,C-PU

我,还,觉,得,现,在,我,对,中,国,文,化,知,道,不,够,，,我,想,努,力,地,学,习,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,M-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
所,以,吸,烟,者,人,一,定,要,注,意,自,己,的,身,体,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,觉,得,解,决,这,个,问,题,只,有,唯,一,的,方,法,就,是,父,母,和,孩,子,多,谈,话,。,如,果,孩,子,心,里,有,些,问,题,的,话,父,母,听,他,们,的,话,以,后,帮,他,们,解,决,问,题,。,一,个,星,期,一,次,或,两,个,星,期,一,次,至,少,做,一,个,家,庭,会,，,以,后,父,母,和,孩,子,谈,话,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,R-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,M-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-CD,W-CD,W-NT,W-NT,W-NT,W-M,W-CC,W-CD,W-M,W-NT,W-NT,W-NT,W-M,W-AD,W-AD,S-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,C-PU,R-AD,R-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,认,为,从,小,一,起,长,大,的,玩,伴,是,最,理,想,的,，,因,为,他,们,是,很,小,就,一,起,玩,一,起,经,历,了,很,多,事,件,、,很,多,难,忘,的,回,忆,，,他,们,经,常,一,起,玩,一,起,谈,心,，,因,此,他,们,也,会,了,解,对,方,的,性,格,对,方,的,品,行,，,很,少,会,有,像,其,它,伴,侣,那,样,时,常,鬧,着,性,品,不,合,而,分,开,，,对,对,方,不,了,解,而,分,开,，,也,有,许,多,很,可,笑,的,理,由,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VC,C-AD,C-JJ,C-P,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VE,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
青,少,年,这,时,期,是,还,没,没,成,熟,判,断,的,能,力,，,容,易,模,仿,成,人,的,吸,烟,习,惯,。,这,样,的,话,，,对,青,少,年,的,身,体,健,康,、,精,神,健,康,有,影,响,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,R-VC,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
跟,家,人,离,开,过,的,元,旦,，,只,有,一,次,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,M-CD,C-M,C-PU
根,据,调,察,，,很,明,显,地,指,出,，,吸,烟,者,的,人,数,只,有,增,无,减,。	R-P,R-P,R-NN,R-VV,C-PU,M-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
每,个,人,志,互,不,相,同,，,对,生,活,中,面,对,的,种,种,选,择,的,答,案,，,也,并,非,异,口,同,声,。,各,人,有,各,人,的,想,法,，,各,人,有,各,人,自,己,理,由,，,谁,也,没,有,资,格,去,判,断,是,非,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,S-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-NN,C-VE,C-DT,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-NN,C-VE,C-DT,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

总,之,，,如,果,想,自,己,的,健,康,，,就,戒,烟,最,好,，,我,们,有,权,利,享,受,自,己,的,爱,好,，,可,是,为,别,人,着,想,这,是,做,人,的,义,务,。,为,了,保,持,整,洁,，,并,帮,助,青,少,年,形,成,良,好,的,习,惯,，,在,公,共,场,所,禁,止,吸,烟,的,措,施,，,应,该,得,扩,大,地,实,行,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,W-NN,W-NN,W-AD,W-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,R-DER,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

男,女,生,也,呆,能,最,好,的,朋,友,。,在,每,一,个,人,的,生,活,里,，,友,谊,是,不,可,缺,乏,的,，,无,论,是,同,性,的,朋,友,或,是,别,性,的,朋,友,都,能,帮,助,一,个,孩,子,的,心,灵,成,长,。,相,反,，,当,一,个,孩,子,少,了,与,别,性,的,接,触,，,那,么,可,以,说,，,他,的,发,育,是,不,完,整,的,。	C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,R-VV,C-VV,M-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,S-DT,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VA,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-P,S-DT,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU

许,多,人,赞,成,不,吸,烟,，,那,是,因,为,吸,烟,是,对,身,体,没,有,好,处,，,它,会,给,吸,烟,者,带,来,很,多,疾,病,，,世,界,上,很,多,人,都,死,于,肺,癌,。,对,于,人,体,的,肌,肉,也,带,来,一,些,麻,烦,，,像,跑,步,时,会,感,觉,的,到,跑,了,没,多,少,就,自,己,觉,得,很,累,，,那,是,因,为,人,体,的,肌,肉,里,缺,少,氧,气,，,而,肌,肉,里,进,了,烟,的,毒,气,，,所,以,很,快,就,感,到,身,体,沉,重,的,感,觉,。,在,一,些,西,方,国,家,有,的,吸,烟,者,吸,烟,后,得,了,癌,，,就,到,法,院,告,那,些,生,产,烟,的,公,司,的,事,也,渐,渐,发,生,了,。	C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,R-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-P,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,W-AD,W-PN,W-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-PU,M-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

随,着,公,众,健,卫,知,识,的,提,升,，,吸,取,二,手,烟,会,影,响,个,人,健,康,，,甚,至,导,致,肺,癌,已,成,为,众,所,皆,知,的,医,学,常,识,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-JJ,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,S-AD,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
第,二,，,父,母,与,孩,子,们,尽,量,努,力,竞,夺,时,间,对,话,。,人,与,人,的,之,间,说,话,是,最,亲,密,的,一,个,捷,径,。,孩,子,们,对,爸,爸,、,妈,妈,说,出,朋,友,关,系,，,学,校,生,活,情,况,等,等,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,R-DEG,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-AD,S-VA,S-VA,C-DEC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU
我,赞,同,这,问,题,的,说,法,，,但,在,现,代,的,环,境,中,，,我,认,为,父,母,对,儿,女,的,影,响,范,围,逐,渐,缩,小,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

而,且,这,些,生,活,带,来,的,不,利,我,们,的,克,服,方,法,也,不,一,致,。	C-AD,C-AD,M-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
我,一,般,过,假,期,是,就,是,这,样,，,我,在,日,本,的,时,候,也,一,样,。,若,没,有,钱,、,时,间,没,有,这,样,原,因,不,能,去,旅,游,的,话,，,我,家,附,近,找,个,环,境,很,好,的,地,方,，,然,后,在,那,里,呆,一,天,，,这,样,用,假,期,也,不,错,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-VC,C-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,R-PN,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-CS,M-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-PU,W-NN,W-NN,W-VE,W-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

教,育,是,重,要,的,方,面,，,因,为,如,果,从,小,孩,子,们,没,掌,握,好,的,教,育,恐,怕,长,大,以,后,他,们,做,为,坏,人,，,所,以,父,母,亲,应,该,好,好,教,育,孩,子,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-PN,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

比,如,很,多,妈,妈,喜,欢,做,的,事,我,也,随,着,喜,欢,做,：,看,爱,情,小,说,、,买,东,西,、,做,饭,、,看,历,史,电,影,、,作,毛,衣,等,。,虽,然,我,的,外,貌,很,像,妈,妈,的,，,可,是,行,为,举,止,完,全,是,爸,爸,的,：,我,也,是,内,向,，,喜,欢,安,静,的,环,境,，,不,急,地,办,事,，,交,很,少,朋,友,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PN,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,S-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VA,W-VA,W-DEV,R-VV,W-VV,W-PU,C-VV,W-AD,W-JJ,W-NN,C-NN,C-PU

一,到,每,个,周,末,他,就,要,带,我,去,钓,鱼,。	C-CD,C-CC,R-DT,R-DT,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,不,是,反,对,“,安,乐,死,”,的,。,我,想,“,安,乐,死,”,的,法,律,化,是,会,做,的,，,加,以,条,件,就,行,了,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-DEC,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,S-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU
我,从,高,中,时,，,我,总,是,跟,父,亲,吵,架,了,。,因,为,父,亲,不,承,认,我,也,是,在,家,里,独,立,的,人,。,父,亲,总,是,说,“,你,一,定,听,我,的,话,”,他,常,常,把,自,己,的,要,求,强,加,到,我,身,上,。,当,天,，,我,想,跟,父,亲,对,这,个,问,题,好,好,儿,商,量,商,量,。,但,是,每,次,没,有,机,会,打,发,时,间,跟,父,亲,商,量,对,这,个,问,题,。	R-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,R-SP,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-BA,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
开,始,了,抽,烟,以,后,，,他,们,有,了,一,种,优,越,感,。,但,当,时,我,的,对,抽,烟,的,想,法,打,负,了,这,个,诱,惑,。,我,是,个,网,球,迷,，,从,十,五,岁,的,时,候,开,始,打,的,球,。	C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,R-DEG,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,C-NN,C-PU

有,些,人,开,始,只,重,视,老,师,在,上,课,讲,的,东,西,，,其,实,我,们,更,应,该,重,视,父,母,给,我,们,的,教,育,。,我,们,的,生,活,一,点,都,离,不,开,父,母,，,所,以,父,母,可,以,说,是,我,们,第,一,任,老,师,。,就,算,世,界,发,展,到,什,么,地,步,，,我,们,每,个,人,都,记,住,这,一,点,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,M-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-PU

可,是,我,认,为,，,人,不,能,擅,自,决,定,自,己,何,时,要,死,，,但,如,果,忍,不,住,痛,苦,，,选,“,安,乐,死,”,也,是,一,种,无,可,奈,何,的,手,段,。,但,如,果,帮,助,自,己,“,安,乐,死,”,的,人,要,惩,罚,，,这,也,是,一,种,痛,苦,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,R-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,S-AD,S-AD,S-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

就,因,为,懂,对,方,，,所,以,会,时,不,时,制,造,些,浪,漫,，,让,对,方,一,个,惊,喜,。	C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

要,避,免,孩,子,早,恋,，,应,是,父,母,需,与,孩,子,培,养,良,好,的,沟,通,方,式,，,尽,早,分,亨,身,为,学,生,的,主,要,职,务,是,学,习,，,求,取,好,成,绩,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-VV,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

若,这,些,国,家,把,一,定,数,量,的,粮,食,送,到,那,些,挨,饿,的,国,家,，,问,题,就,会,自,然,解,决,的,，,不,必,要,只,靠,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,之,类,的,东,西,来,栽,培,的,办,法,。,因,为,，,眼,下,，,吃,不,下,而,掉,到,垃,圾,箱,的,粮,食,多,的,多,呢,。	C-CS,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-BA,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,S-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,S-DER,C-AD,C-SP,C-PU
我,觉,得,这,是,应,该,父,母,责,任,，,养,孩,子,的,时,候,千,万,不,要,养,公,主,王,子,了,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,W-VC,W-VV,W-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
每,天,我,们,面,脸,，,却,没,有,时,间,谈,心,里,的,话,。,我,看,这,个,题,目,，,就,脑,子,里,一,时,混,乱,了,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-AD,W-NN,W-NN,W-LC,C-CD,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU

有,一,个,男,孩,常,欺,负,我,了,。,我,没,勇,气,面,对,他,打,架,、,抗,议,，,所,以,他,的,行,为,越,来,越,激,烈,了,。,终,于,我,对,母,亲,告,诉,这,件,事,，,说,不,想,参,加,游,泳,课,。	C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,R-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,希,望,安,乐,死,在,所,有,的,国,家,变,成,合,法,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,R-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
在,生,产,过,程,中,，,由,于,不,用,化,肥,和,农,药,，,带,来,人,们,的,健,康,。,但,是,，,我,认,为,现,在,不,可,能,以,“,绿,色,食,品,”,为,代,替,全,世,界,的,食,量,问,题,。,虽,然,人,们,的,生,活,提,高,，,但,是,在,世,界,上,有,几,亿,人,因,缺,少,粮,食,而,挨,饿,。,所,以,我,认,为,把,“,不,挨,饿,”,放,在,第,一,位,。,吃,“,绿,色,食,品,”,是,少,数,人,的,需,要,，,我,们,应,该,考,虑,大,多,数,的,问,题,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-P,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,M-BA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-P,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-PU,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,M-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
如,果,说,在,静,音,的,环,境,生,活,对,人,身,有,危,害,的,话,，,那,么,居,住,在,深,山,里,的,人,岂,不,是,要,短,命,据,我,所,知,居,在,高,山,森,林,的,人,反,而,比,居,在,噪,音,繁,华,的,城,市,里,要,长,寿,的,多,，,一,般,在,城,市,里,居,住,的,人,平,均,寿,命,为,６,３,左,右,，,而,居,在,冷,静,的,深,山,人,平,均,寿,命,都,能,高,达,７,５,岁,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-VV,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,M-P,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-PU
我,是,从,男,子,中,学,毕,业,出,来,的,，,记,得,读,中,三,、,四,时,，,我,们,同,学,都,会,到,对,面,的,女,校,找,机,会,，,约,对,面,女,校,的,女,生,去,看,戏,，,搞,的,校,长,一,声,令,下,，,不,许,我,们,进,学,校,。,但,是,，,我,们,也,会,通,过,种,种,管,道,进,行,联,系,，,友,情,一,样,发,展,，,那,您,说,男,女,分,班,还,有,什,么,意,义,呢,？	C-PN,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-LC,C-CD,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

对,于,吸,烟,对,个,人,健,康,的,公,众,利,益,的,影,响,不,独,有,偶,。	R-P,R-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
“,代,沟,”,这,个,问,题,不,是,在,最,近,新,发,生,的,问,题,，,而,是,从,很,久,以,前,到,现,在,存,在,着,我,们,社,会,里,的,问,题,。	C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,S-AS,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

随,着,经,济,，,社,会,的,发,展,，,我,们,的,想,法,和,价,值,观,等,思,维,方,式,变,化,了,很,多,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU

一,个,和,向,说,：,“,应,该,节,约,水,。,所,以,我,们,一,天,可,以,只,能,去,一,个,人,怎,么,样,？	C-CD,C-CD,C-CC,S-P,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-CD,C-M,R-VV,R-VV,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

是,大,是,小,挫,折,使,我,们,的,生,活,更,有,意,义,，,更,有,滋,味,。	M-VC,C-AD,C-VC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
因,为,对,这,个,问,题,上,宗,教,的,因,素,非,常,大,。,例,如,基,督,教,基,本,上,禁,止,人,们,自,杀,，,这,是,因,为,社,会,有,人,命,是,上,帝,给,人,们,的,观,念,。,所,以,在,西,方,国,家,往,往,对,这,个,问,题,在,道,德,的,层,次,议,论,纷,纷,。	C-P,C-P,S-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,S-NN,S-NN,C-VC,C-NR,C-NR,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU
通,过,爸,爸,我,懂,得,该,怎,么,对,待,人,情,，,通,过,妈,妈,我,晓,得,怎,么,在,大,海,游,游,（,我,家,穷,的,时,候,妈,是,主,干,活,）,。,妈,妈,她,栉,风,沐,雨,地,找,钱,回,家,养,整,个,家,庭,。,爸,也,不,是,空,闲,地,在,家,，,他,是,一,个,学,习,高,的,人,，,对,社,会,还,是,某,个,生,活,方,面,的,问,题,他,都,了,如,指,掌,，,他,是,我,们,的,辅,导,老,师,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,和,妹,都,乖,，,很,听,话,，,认,真,读,书,。,母,亲,常,说,：,“,做,人,要,有,道,德,，,学,问,”,。,我,和,妹,妹,照,她,的,教,训,，,不,曾,为,非,作,恶,，,乐,意,帮,助,别,人,，,到,今,日,来,，,姐,妹,俩,都,嫁,得,好,丈,夫,，,生,有,好,儿,女,，,事,业,方,面,也,有,高,成,就,，,母,亲,老,年,也,得,到,安,慰,。	C-PN,C-CC,C-NN,C-AD,M-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-DER,C-VA,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,M-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

在,苏,州,，,我,容,易,能,达,成,了,我,的,目,的,。,在,那,里,，,到,处,吃,的,东,西,都,很,香,，,一,点,没,有,菜,不,使,人,感,动,。,尤,其,是,米,饭,的,独,特,的,甜,味,，,对,我,来,说,好,像,表,现,不,出,来,那,样,很,好,吃,。,我,吃,到,米,饭,的,时,候,，,不,知,不,觉,地,想,起,来,了,以,前,的,记,忆,，,也,就,是,说,，,我,以,前,去,苏,州,的,时,候,，,在,哪,个,地,方,去,玩,玩,，,在,哪,个,地,方,吃,什,么,东,西,，,在,哪,个,地,方,喝,酒,等,等,。,那,样,的,各,种,的,记,忆,，,我,的,脑,子,里,又,回,来,了,。	C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-PN,W-AD,W-AD,W-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,W-CD,W-M,W-VE,W-VE,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,S-AD,S-VV,S-VV,S-AD,S-AD,S-AD,S-VA,S-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,M-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,M-VV,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU

那,时,大,约,四,、,五,岁,，,那,时,我,，,是,我,爸,爸,、,妈,妈,最,疼,我,的,时,候,了,。,我,想,应,该,是,的,，,因,为,，,他,们,十,分,（,其,实,应,该,是,万,分,）,的,爱,我,。,我,想,吃,什,么,，,我,是,想,去,哪,里,玩,，,都,可,以,实,现,我,的,愿,望,，,因,为,，,那,时,我,家,的,家,境,非,常,好,，,再,加,上,我,又,是,独,生,子,，,爸,爸,、,妈,妈,的,“,小,皇,帝,”,他,们,对,我,可,以,说,是,百,依,百,顺,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-PN,C-LC,R-PN,C-PU,C-VC,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-DEG,C-NN,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,R-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-PN,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-PU,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

一,周,前,，,我,在,网,上,看,了,烟,里,的,几,百,有,害,的,原,料,，,其,中,有,几,个,原,料,尼,古,丁,可,以,使,人,死,。,吸,烟,不,是,对,吸,烟,的,人,有,害,就,是,对,接,近,的,有,害,。,一,个,人,的,不,好,习,惯,可,导,致,几,个,人,的,疾,病,。,一,般,说,，,吸,烟,的,人,比,不,吸,烟,的,人,死,得,快,。	C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-CD,C-CD,M-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,S-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-DEC,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-P,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-PU

当,然,，,我,们,不,应,该,把,安,乐,死,为,对,病,人,最,好,的,办,法,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
老,是,你,们,支,持,我,想,做,什,么,，,学,什,么,。	W-AD,W-AD,W-PN,W-PN,W-VV,W-VV,W-PN,W-VV,W-VV,W-PN,W-PN,W-PU,W-VV,W-PN,W-PN,C-PU
调,查,显,示,，,许,多,学,生,被,访,问,时,说,不,赞,同,男,女,分,班,但,父,亲,却,赞,同,。,这,因,为,父,母,们,都,深,知,男,女,同,班,的,后,果,，,那,就,是,他,们,的,孩,子,将,会,在,求,学,时,期,陷,入,谈,恋,爱,过,程,而,荒,废,学,业,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-SB,S-VV,S-VV,C-LC,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-NN,R-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

对,话,不,足,的,家,庭,肯,定,没,有,家,族,之,间,互,相,了,解,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,S-NN,S-NN,C-LC,C-LC,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

吵,到,最,后,开,始,打,架,的,时,，,我,母,亲,突,然,拿,来,两,把,刀,给,我,们,俩,一,人,一,个,。,让,我,们,不,用,吵,了,，,干,脆,互,相,杀,就,得,了,。,那,时,候,，,在,吵,得,我,们,很,惊,讶,，,就,马,上,不,吵,了,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-MSP,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-CD,S-CD,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,M-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
歌,声,会,不,会,流,行,在,于,它,本,身,的,质,量,。	S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
另,一,个,问,题,就,是,如,果,一,个,女,人,整,天,都,在,家,里,，,不,出,工,作,，,可,能,会,天,地,不,闻,，,与,社,会,脱,节,的,。,那,不,但,令,那,女,人,对,社,会,毫,无,认,识,，,也,很,多,时,候,会,令,夫,丈,之,间,没,话,可,说,。	C-DT,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-CS,C-CS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-AD,W-AD,W-CD,W-NN,W-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

孩,子,毕,竟,是,孩,子,，,在,社,会,上,，,生,活,上,什,么,都,不,太,理,解,，,甚,至,对,好,坏,的,判,断,也,不,会,正,确,地,出,来,。,那,个,时,候,，,父,母,对,孩,子,的,教,育,有,发,挥,很,大,的,作,用,。,比,如,平,时,父,母,之,间,说,话,时,，,父,母,根,本,没,有,什,么,考,虑,地,在,孩,子,面,前,说,一,些,坏,话,或,者,脏,话,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

这,样,一,说,我,是,一,种,“,中,立,”,不,赞,同,认,何,极,端,的,看,法,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-DT,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

因,为,化,学,污,染,让,生,物,消,失,的,速,度,比,由,于,饥,饿,人,类,消,灭,的,速,度,更,快,，,还,有,给,人,类,留,下,的,影,响,相,当,大,。,这,几,十,年,在,各,地,域,常,常,看,到,发,育,异,常,和,畸,形,的,动,物,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-DT,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-P,C-DT,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

”,你,们,生,下,我,和,弟,弟,，,一,直,到,现,在,抚,养,一,定,有,许,多,辛,苦,啊,！,我,都,知,道,这,点,。,因,为,我,是,老,大,，,所,以,从,小,替,你,们,不,仅,照,顾,弟,弟,而,且,做,家,务,。	C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-LC,C-PN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,W-NN,W-NT,W-NT,W-NN,W-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-VA,C-VA,S-SP,C-PU,C-PN,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,W-P,W-PN,W-PN,W-AD,W-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

，,所,以,喜,欢,流,行,的,歌,曲,，,流,行,歌,曲,容,易,流,见,到,社,会,上,，,还,有,容,易,听,，,还,有,很,多,原,因,。,比,如,在,朋,友,生,日,中,喝,酒,以,后,去,歌,厅,一,起,玩,。,那,跟,朋,友,之,间,的,关,系,越,来,越,好,。	C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,M-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU

我,觉,得,最,重,要,的,是,父,母,和,子,女,之,间,的,对,话,，,父,母,和,子,女,之,间,有,对,话,的,家,一,定,没,有,代,沟,问,题,生,活,态,度,以,及,价,值,观,念,是,一,个,人,一,个,样,，,所,以,我,们,的,社,会,里,一,定,需,要,互,相,的,了,解,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEV,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

对,很,多,“,急,速,爱,情,”,的,男,男,女,女,来,说,，,爱,情,来,得,快,，,去,得,也,快,。,很,快,就,因,为,意,见,或,性,格,不,和,等,理,由,而,告,吹,恋,情,。	C-P,C-CD,C-CD,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-P,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-CC,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-ETC,W-NN,W-NN,W-MSP,W-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU

因,为,年,青,人,的,话,题,当,中,常,常,提,出,流,行,歌,曲,和,歌,手,，,比,如,说,今,年,初,我,跟,中,国,朋,友,们,聊,天,时,常,常,提,到,关,于,超,级,女,生,的,事,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU
好,处,是,死,人,，,因,为,自,己,不,想,再,活,，,而,且,不,想,担,心,家,人,。,坏,处,是,家,里,的,人,。,因,为,妻,子,的,话,，,她,想,一,辈,子,爱,他,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU
运,动,员,的,收,入,高,是,因,为,他,们,能,运,用,自,己,的,运,动,能,力,去,比,赛,，,然,后,就,收,到,投,资,公,司,的,钱,或,者,广,告,公,司,的,钱,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU
，,先,辈,和,晚,辈,都,应,相,互,谅,解,，,互,相,取,长,补,短,。	C-PU,S-NN,S-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
在,交,际,上,，,烟,可,以,说,是,交,际,工,具,的,一,种,，,生,意,人,一,见,面,就,拿,烟,出,来,请,对,方,吸,或,紧,张,时,又,抽,去,几,根,来,吸,，,虽,然,吸,烟,可,以,让,精,神,放,松,一,点,，,但,请,别,滥,用,，,因,为,它,本,身,含,有,一,种,毒,素,，,对,心,脏,、,肺,、,肾,是,很,有,害,的,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-CC,C-VA,C-VA,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-MSP,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
第,二,，,因,吸,烟,者,不,管,在,什,么,场,所,随,便,抽,烟,，,公,共,场,所,的,清,洁,和,卫,生,问,题,很,严,重,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
昨,天,是,我,的,生,日,吧,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-VC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-SP,C-PU
它,是,一,种,因,为,无,法,，,所,以,才,进,行,的,行,为,。,比,如,有,一,位,得,了,不,治,之,症,的,人,，,无,论,措,施,什,么,办,法,也,在,痛,苦,中,解,不,脱,下,去,，,况,且,没,有,能,活,下,去,的,希,望,。,如,果,这,种,情,况,下,，,法,律,还,说,，,要,活,下,去,，,那,我,认,为,这,就,是,违,法,人,的,道,德,。	C-PN,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-P,C-P,S-AD,S-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-NN,S-NN,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,R-P,R-NN,R-NN,R-LC,S-VV,S-AD,S-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-PU,R-AD,R-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,M-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,的,薪,水,可,能,和,其,他,市,面,上,的,广,告,设,计,师,一,样,。	C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

另,一,方,面,，,吸,烟,对,吸,烟,者,也,造,出,不,好,的,结,果,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,们,去,医,院,的,话,，,可,以,亲,眼,看,由,于,抽,烟,的,毒,害,程,度,。,而,且,，,只,是,对,抽,烟,的,自,己,有,毒,害,的,话,还,可,以,。,这,个,可,以,接,受,自,己,的,责,任,，,但,是,自,己,不,抽,烟,，,因,为,在,旁,边,有,吸,烟,者,被,毒,害,的,话,，,很,可,惜,。,所,以,吸,烟,者,应,该,考,虑,这,样,方,面,自,己,小,心,选,择,抽,烟,的,地,方,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,M-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,M-AD,C-AD,C-P,S-VV,S-VV,S-DEC,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-SB,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,到,目,前,为,止,，,当,过,很,多,种,类,的,临,工,。,当,过,的,时,间,最,长,的,是,日,语,老,师,。	C-PN,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,R-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,种,情,影,，,我,们,每,天,都,反,复,。	C-AD,C-AD,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,S-AD,C-PU
因,为,肯,德,基,处,理,的,不,好,而,造,成,了,居,民,们,的,不,满,。,然,后,，,肯,德,基,采,取,了,一,些,活,动,。,就,是,，,客,人,自,己,点,的,菜,应,该,他,本,身,都,吃,掉,。,这,样,的,活,动,以,来,，,肯,德,基,的,垃,圾,总,量,大,大,降,低,。,这,个,活,动,受,到,了,居,民,们,的,喜,爱,，,然,后,其,他,的,地,区,的,肯,德,基,也,采,取,了,这,个,活,动,。	C-P,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,S-DEC,C-AD,C-AD,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,W-VV,W-VV,W-PN,W-PN,W-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-LC,S-LC,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-DT,C-DT,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
”,这,个,意,思,是,说,，,幼,年,时,代,养,成,的,习,惯,一,辈,子,影,响,到,本,人,的,性,格,，,它,说,明,出,来,幼,年,给,孩,子,教,育,的,重,要,性,。	C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-PN,S-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
每,逢,除,夕,我,们,一,家,人,团,圆,吃,年,饭,，,正,月,初,一,照,例,到,每,个,亲,戚,的,家,拜,年,，,儿,童,们,也,就,在,这,一,天,领,到,许,多,的,红,包,（,称,之,为,压,岁,钱,）,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,M-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU
甚,至,，,跟,吸,烟,的,人,一,样,的,害,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,M-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,C-PU
我,认,为,丈,夫,帮,助,妻,子,自,杀,，,丈,夫,故,意,是,故,意,的,，,但,是,他,也,不,想,杀,妻,子,，,因,为,妻,子,的,病,治,不,好,，,而,且,她,非,常,痛,苦,，,她,想,自,杀,，,所,以,丈,夫,才,决,定,杀,妻,子,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,R-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
除,此,之,外,，,我,们,东,方,父,母,也,应,该,向,西,方,的,父,母,亲,有,所,学,习,。,每,逢,假,期,或,传,统,节,目,上,，,父,母,亲,应,该,安,排,时,间,与,家,人,一,起,团,聚,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
而,且,他,们,看,抽,烟,的,人,随,便,扔,垃,圾,，,在,道,德,的,方,面,给,他,们,坏,影,响,。,第,三,，,有,危,险,出,火,。,抽,烟,的,人,扔,的,垃,圾,有,时,会,成,成,出,火,的,原,因,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-P,R-PN,R-PN,M-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-AD,W-AD,W-AD,S-VV,S-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,S-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
对,了,，,看,起,来,有,手,小,臂,的,运,动,，,实,际,上,是,以,全,身,平,衡,为,前,提,的,。,角,度,的,选,择,需,要,经,验,，,但,出,杆,要,的,是,平,稳,，,不,过,分,将,自,己,想,法,强,加,在,球,上,，,让,它,为,你,运,动,。	C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-BA,C-PN,C-PN,M-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

运,动,带,来,的,已,不,仅,仅,是,人,类,的,健,康,而,已,，,运,动,带,给,人,与,人,之,间,的,互,动,，,牵,动,着,每,个,人,心,里,共,有,的,热,情,，,我,们,会,发,现,自,己,常,坐,在,观,众,席,上,为,正,在,比,赛,的,运,动,员,欢,呼,、,紧,张,、,尖,叫,甚,至,咆,哮,、,生,气,吼,叫,！,这,便,是,最,巾,切,的,、,最,真,实,的,人,与,人,之,间,的,互,连,反,应,了,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,S-VA,S-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU
当,然,这,么,多,的,书,籍,丛,里,，,包,含,着,各,种,不,同,的,种,类,。,但,我,认,为,可,以,把,它,分,为,二,大,类,：,第,一,类,是,好,的,书,，,第,二,类,是,坏,的,书,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,R-NR,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-BA,S-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-CD,C-JJ,C-M,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-VC,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-VC,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU
因,为,如,此,，,父,母,们,要,注,意,，,他,们,对,其,孩,子,的,影,响,大,体,来,看,是,不,知,不,觉,的,，,同,他,们,给,孩,所,讲,的,东,西,还,重,要,。,总,之,，,父,母,们,要,为,孩,子,当,好,的,第,一,任,老,师,，,就,先,要,修,改,自,己,的,行,为,和,自,己,培,养,好,观,念,。	C-P,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,S-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VA,R-DEC,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,W-PN,W-PN,W-VV,W-VV,C-VA,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU
有,一,段,时,代,，,人,们,认,为,吸,烟,是,个,流,行,。	C-VE,C-CD,C-M,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-M,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
挨,饿,的,人,想,吃,东,西,，,不,想,吃,带,有,化,学,污,染,的,人,想,吃,绿,色,食,品,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,M-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,觉,得,从,朋,友,变,成,情,人,是,我,最,理,想,的,相,识,方,式,，,因,为,我,觉,得,那,样,的,话,那,两,个,人,才,能,真,正,了,解,对,方,，,只,有,那,样,才,能,真,真,正,正,的,体,谅,和,相,爱,的,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PN,M-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,R-SP,C-PU
比,如,跟,妈,妈,去,买,东,西,的,时,候,也,发,生,过,这,类,的,问,题,了,。,当,我,很,小,的,时,候,，,我,只,听,妈,妈,的,言,，,只,观,妈,妈,的,行,为,而,已,。,可,是,随,着,我,长,大,，,我,不,想,听,妈,妈,的,言,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-DT,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-SP,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,C-PU
２,本,人,也,曾,带,团,到,国,外,去,，,也,拥,有,带,团,的,经,验,，,所,以,特,写,此,信,来,应,征,，,希,望,我,能,符,合,贵,公,司,的,条,件,。	C-CD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DT,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

看,他,们,的,样,子,我,非,常,感,动,了,。	C-VV,M-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-SP,C-PU
６,岁,到,１,０,岁,之,间,，,我,非,常,喜,欢,我,父,亲,，,谁,问,我,“,你,世,界,上,谁,最,爱,你,？,”,我,直,截,了,当,地,说,“,我,的,父,亲,最,爱,我,，,我,也,是,跟,他,一,样,。,”,这,是,令,人,可,笑,的,事,情,吧,。,但,不,管,谁,说,什,么,，,当,时,我,以,为,我,的,想,法,永,远,改,不,了,的,事,实,。	C-CD,C-M,C-CC,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,R-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,R-VC,C-P,C-PN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,R-VV,R-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

为,了,增,产,，,现,在,的,情,况,下,，,化,学,肥,料,和,农,药,的,使,用,是,不,可,分,离,的,。,救,饥,饿,的,情,况,，,对,身,体,有,害,的,农,药,使,用,，,这,是,很,矛,盾,的,情,况,。	C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,M-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-SP,C-PU,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,W-VV,W-DEC,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,W-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
不,过,，,两,代,人,真,的,愿,意,了,解,对,方,的,话,，,答,案,却,很,容,易,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VA,S-VA,C-PU

有,时,引,起,火,花,的,根,头,，,是,在,公,共,场,所,里,，,引,起,的,大,部,分,火,灾,的,原,因,之,一,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
面,对,挫,折,很,多,人,可,以,轻,易,的,说,不,是,他,们,自,己,的,错,而,是,上,天,安,排,，,就,这,样,不,解,决,问,题,。,但,是,要,知,道,这,问,题,是,可,以,使,一,个,人,更,有,自,信,心,，,明,白,到,自,己,能,够,无,谓,在,多,失,望,的,时,候,也,可,以,站,起,来,，,为,生,命,和,生,活,而,去,努,力,生,存,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,S-DEV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,R-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,R-VA,R-VA,C-P,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

我,从,那,天,到,现,在,，,我,的,想,法,是,一,贯,的,。	C-PN,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-VA,S-VA,C-SP,C-PU

有,很,多,报,告,说,吸,烟,者,会,得,到,很,多,病,，,但,是,还,有,很,多,人,不,仅,不,戒,烟,，,而,抽,得,更,厉,害,。	C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-AD,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
这,几,天,，,我,估,计,为,你,们,的,礼,物,。,快,到,爸,爸,的,生,日,，,我,准,备,着,你,们,俩,的,旅,游,。,昨,天,呢,，,在,网,上,找,一,找,几,个,关,于,旅,游,的,网,站,。	C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,S-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-SP,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-CD,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,出,生,在,福,建,安,溪,，,一,个,山,明,水,秀,的,茶,乡,里,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-PU
第,六,次,人,民,大,会,上,说,：,“,全,面,建,设,小,康,社,会,”,如,果,某,些,浪,费,饮,食,的,人,停,止,浪,费,帮,助,那,些,处,于,困,难,的,人,民,的,话,，,中,国,的,小,康,社,会,很,快,就,达,到,目,的,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,M-NN,C-DT,C-DT,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,S-NN,S-PU
班,上,的,老,师,也,因,为,我,在,课,业,跟,不,上,时,，,抽,出,时,间,替,我,补,习,，,令,我,感,激,不,已,。	C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-AD,C-VV,R-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU

总,之,，,目,前,对,现,代,人,来,说,，,最,重,要,的,是,回,复,人,间,性,问,题,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VC,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
唱,流,行,歌,曲,的,人,一,般,叫,做,“,明,星,”,，,年,轻,人,喜,欢,明,星,、,追,求,明,星,，,这,不,是,不,好,的,、,理,所,当,然,的,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-PU,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU

再,说,吸,烟,者,的,周,围,人,发,病,率,比,吸,烟,者,大,。,现,在,有,些,国,家,进,行,在,路,上,不,能,吸,烟,，,吸,烟,的,发,现,时,严,厉,的,惩,罚,措,施,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VA,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,W-VV,W-VV,R-DEC,W-VV,W-VV,C-LC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU

这,么,小,小,的,动,作,，,却,带,来,了,严,重,的,后,果,，,不,可,不,慎,。	C-AD,C-AD,M-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

但,问,题,发,现,了,，,每,人,把,自,己,本,来,做,的,工,作,推,给,别,人,，,结,果,没,有,水,喝,了,。,也,许,这,故,事,的,后,面,有,一,些,另,外,结,果,的,可,能,。	C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-BA,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-CD,S-CD,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,希,望,，,通,过,三,年,的,时,间,学,汉,语,和,中,国,历,史,和,文,化,，,我,能,帮,助,印,尼,的,政,府,—,文,化,部,门,，,能,多,多,和,中,国,的,政,府,—,文,化,部,门,沟,通,一,下,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-CD,C-M,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,R-AD,R-AD,C-PU

比,如,说,，,父,母,愿,意,孩,子,当,政,治,家,，,可,是,孩,子,愿,意,当,艺,术,家,。,现,在,的,大,部,分,的,父,母,以,为,政,治,家,，,有,权,利,的,职,业,是,最,好,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
无,论,是,流,行,歌,曲,或,非,流,行,歌,曲,我,们,亦,学,会,欣,赏,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
总,之,，,我,认,为,应,该,尊,重,吸,烟,者,的,权,力,，,但,吸,烟,者,不,应,该,影,响,别,人,，,深,刻,考,虑,合,适,的,地,方,、,时,间,、,场,合,、,再,加,上,尽,量,少,抽,一,点,儿,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU

到,了,旅,馆,时,，,我,们,都,累,了,，,但,一,看,外,边,儿,的,挺,大,的,温,泉,，,我,才,明,白,这,个,旅,馆,为,什,么,在,杂,志,上,登,过,好,几,次,的,理,由,，,我,们,马,上,进,温,泉,去,了,。	C-VV,R-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-AD,S-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU

今,年,四,月,二,十,九,号,至,五,月,六,号,放,了,八,天,假,，,趁,这,个,好,机,会,又,去,了,东,北,的,大,连,旅,游,，,以,便,跟,曾,经,在,同,样,学,校,里,学,的,同,学,见,面,。,放,假,之,前,也,揣,测,到,跟,朋,友,过,日,子,好,快,乐,，,但,实,际,上,跟,朋,友,见,了,面,比,放,假,之,前,的,想,像,快,乐,得,还,多,，,差,得,太,远,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-CC,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,S-AD,S-AD,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-VA,S-VA,S-DER,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU

可,是,我,相,信,这,些,吸,烟,为,朋,友,们,在,心,里,也,明,白,政,府,做,的,是,正,确,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
有,钱,的,人,，,拥,有,得,不,得,了,，,没,有,钱,的,人,，,差,不,多,整,天,在,街,上,坐,着,。,“,绿,色,食,品,”,是,产,量,并,不,多,，,所,以,价,格,也,自,然,地,上,升,。,富,有,的,人,中,讲,究,质,量,、,讲,究,身,材,体,的,人,应,该,买,“,绿,色,食,品,”,，,不,会,吃,含,有,农,药,的,东,西,的,。	C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,S-VV,S-VV,C-DER,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

最,近,五,一,放,假,时,，,我,用,这,个,假,期,去,了,旅,顺,。,那,儿,有,可,以,观,赏,樱,花,的,地,方,，,一,到,这,儿,就,闻,到,花,香,，,真,让,人,感,到,舒,服,，,也,会,让,人,解,除,精,神,紧,张,而,轻,松,精,神,。,我,所,看,到,的,是,全,片,开,满,的,樱,花,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,R-P,R-DT,R-DT,R-NN,R-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-VV,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-CC,S-PN,S-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,S-VA,S-VA,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VC,S-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

大,多,数,未,吸,烟,者,都,同,意,烟,味,产,生,头,晕,，,可,是,有,的,人,在,公,共,场,所,里,随,便,随,意,吸,烟,。	C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,S-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,R-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

而,且,抽,烟,不,仅,影,响,着,自,己,的,健,康,还,影,响,着,别,人,，,间,接,吸,烟,的,坏,处,是,不,能,用,语,言,来,形,容,的,，,特,别,是,对,小,孩,子,或,孕,母,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-CC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU

人,生,中,，,人,一,直,会,成,长,，,到,多,大,了,也,会,学,习,新,的,东,西,。,然,后,每,个,人,要,在,和,别,人,交,流,的,时,候,互,相,影,响,了,，,其,中,可,以,再,学,会,别,的,，,这,样,过,珍,惜,的,日,子,。,我,认,为,这,样,的,“,人,际,关,系,”,，,是,在,生,活,中,很,重,要,的,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,R-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-AD,R-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,R-VV,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-P,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,W-VC,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-LC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU

中,国,有,句,俗,语,说,“,青,出,于,蓝,，,而,胜,于,蓝,”,，,这,就,说,明,，,一,般,新,的,一,代,终,比,上,一,代,更,强,而,有,力,。,换,句,话,说,年,青,的,一,辈,总,比,前,一,辈,应,该,更,好,。,所,以,在,这,种,新,旧,交,替,之,时,，,我,们,应,该,抱,着,敢,于,推,翻,古,老,的,而,又,不,合,现,实,的,，,更,不,合,逻,辑,的,人,生,观,，,并,且,大,大,推,广,合,理,而,又,现,实,的,新,人,生,观,。	C-NR,C-NR,C-VE,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-P,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-VA,S-MSP,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,W-P,W-JJ,W-CD,W-NN,W-VV,W-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-MSP,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

尤,其,是,，,对,外,语,来,讲,，,我,的,中,文,是,在,台,湾,学,习,的,，,而,且,我,的,英,文,也,是,很,强,的,。,这,些,我,的,英,文,和,中,文,能,力,在,找,到,工,作,过,程,中,，,一,定,会,作,到,积,极,作,用,。,因,为,，,在,世,界,化,时,代,，,企,业,更,多,需,要,很,会,讲,外,语,的,人,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-PU,S-P,S-NN,S-NN,S-LC,S-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PU,C-P,S-NR,S-NR,S-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU

食,物,一,直,都,是,我,们,生,存,下,来,所,必,不,可,少,的,源,泉,，,但,是,随,着,科,学,的,发,展,由,于,不,断,的,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,大,大,的,破,坏,了,我,们,所,赖,以,生,存,的,生,态,环,境,，,所,以,我,想,随,着,科,学,的,不,断,进,步,，,在,不,久,的,将,来,科,学,家,们,一,定,会,研,制,出,既,安,全,又,没,有,污,染,的,“,绿,色,食,品,”,而,且,它,们,的,产,量,也,不,比,使,用,农,业,的,农,作,物,的,产,量,小,的,。,从,而,使,挨,饿,地,区,和,发,达,地,区,都,得,以,解,决,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-VA,C-VA,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,R-DEG,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
我,认,为,我,们,不,能,选,择,在,哪,里,生,下,来,，,可,是,我,们,拥,着,在,哪,儿,，,什,么,时,候,死,去,的,权,利,。,有,的,人,可,能,马,上,不,会,接,受,这,种,看,法,。,我,希,望,社,会,上,的,人,都,享,受,别,人,的,生,死,的,权,利,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,M-AS,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,觉,得,应,该,“,绿,色,食,品,”,是,第,一,位,。,最,近,在,日,本,从,中,国,进,口,的,蔬,菜,上,的,残,留,农,业,引,起,很,大,的,问,题,，,因,为,残,留,农,药,的,浓,度,比,日,本,政,府,规,定,的,高,得,多,。,日,本,人,很,讲,究,健,康,，,对,这,种,事,情,很,敏,感,，,所,以,很,多,人,虽,然,价,钱,比,较,便,宜,，,但,是,不,敢,买,从,中,国,进,口,的,东,西,了,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-PU,W-JJ,W-JJ,W-NN,W-NN,W-PU,C-VC,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VA,C-DER,C-VA,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-CD,W-CD,W-NN,W-CS,W-CS,W-NN,W-NN,W-AD,W-AD,W-VA,W-VA,W-PU,W-AD,W-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

从,而,，,一,个,孩,子,的,性,格,构,成,和,社,会,交,流,能,力,发,展,是,从,父,母,的,教,育,和,日,常,行,为,受,到,最,大,的,影,响,，,所,以,父,母,可,谓,是,孩,子,的,第,一,任,老,师,。,孩,子,是,从,父,母,的,为,人,行,为,形,成,自,己,的,处,世,方,式,的,，,也,是,从,父,母,的,直,接,教,训,形,成,自,己,的,道,德,观,念,的,。,另,一,外,方,面,，,孩,子,的,爱,好,和,兴,趣,也,自,然,由,于,父,母,的,长,期,陪,拌,受,到,极,大,的,影,响,。	S-AD,S-AD,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-NN,S-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-PU,C-DT,W-CD,W-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-P,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,S-VV,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

当,然,用,大,量,的,农,药,和,化,肥,来,得,产,生,农,作,物,是,不,对,的,。,将,来,在,我,们,的,身,体,上,会,有,很,大,的,影,响,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,S-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-VV,C-VE,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,觉,得,第,一,位,的,是,绿,色,食,品,，,因,为,多,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,也,是,影,响,人,类,的,生,命,。,所,有,的,动,物,和,植,物,，,所,以,应,该,重,视,保,存,坏,景,，,那,么,世,界,上,很,多,人,肯,定,挨,饿,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-DEC,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,R-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,S-JJ,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU
我,也,对,文,章,中,的,夫,妻,同,情,。,得,了,不,治,之,症,病,人,可,能,对,人,生,感,到,失,望,，,也,可,能,产,生,对,生,存,的,空,虚,感,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VA,C-VA,C-VV,C-PU
应,该,从,旧,的,东,西,找,出,教,训,，,从,现,在,的,东,西,里,找,出,现,在,化,，,两,个,东,西,不,能,只,说,自,己,拥,有,的,是,最,好,的,，,互,相,理,解,是,“,代,沟,”,解,决,方,案,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,S-NT,S-NT,S-VV,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
再,说,，,公,众,利,益,有,影,响,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
虽,然,在,我,以,前,看,过,的,书,里,提,到,，,吸,烟,能,使,人,降,低,他,的,精,神,压,力,，,紧,张,时,能,让,吸,烟,者,放,松,他,的,心,情,，,但,这,种,对,人,体,还,算,是,有,用,的,作,用,在,吸,烟,这,个,过,程,中,，,还,是,不,胜,于,它,的,无,益,之,处,。,我,还,记,得,我,小,时,候,，,因,为,吸,烟,我,祖,父,和,祖,母,而,死,。,这,也,是,大,家,所,知,的,事,，,吸,烟,会,让,人,得,到,无,法,治,的,绝,症,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-AS,C-DEC,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,S-VV,S-VV,S-DEC,S-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,W-P,W-P,W-VV,W-VV,W-PN,W-NN,W-NN,W-CC,W-NN,W-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,R-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

还,有,一,种,规,定,，,就,是,不,允,许,马,上,进,行,自,杀,，,应,该,等,一,个,月,，,这,是,为,了,让,人,家,再,考,虑,一,遍,他,们,的,决,定,的,后,果,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-ETC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,S-M,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
也,当,然,存,在,健,康,问,题,，,抽,烟,不,仅,对,抽,烟,者,本,身,的,，,对,周,围,的,带,来,健,康,上,的,损,失,。	W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,R-DEG,M-PU,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
因,为,农,作,物,的,产,量,大,降,低,，,现,代,社,会,科,学,要,研,究,生,产,产,量,多,的,绿,色,食,品,的,方,法,。,通,过,科,学,方,法,的,过,程,之,后,，,农,作,物,一,定,会,很,新,鲜,而,且,生,产,量,不,会,大,大,降,低,，,自,然,农,作,物,的,价,钱,也,高,，,农,作,物,的,价,钱,影,响,到,农,民,的,收,入,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEC,R-NN,R-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,M-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

总,的,来,说,，,家,长,不,希,望,孩,子,早,恋,，,家,庭,的,教,育,也,是,很,重,要,，,而,不,应,该,硬,把,他,们,分,开,，,那,是,绝,对,起,不,了,什,么,作,用,，,有,可,能,还,会,适,得,其,反,呢,！,劝,请,天,下,的,父,母,们,，,顺,其,自,然,吧,！	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-BA,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU

我,希,望,贵,公,司,会,慎,重,地,考,虑,，,我,也,希,望,能,在,短,期,内,得,到,您,的,答,复,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,R-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
生,命,比,什,么,都,重,要,，,怎,么,讲,健,康,也,没,有,生,命,没,有,意,义,。,一,想,到,挨,饿,的,人,，,就,感,到,难,过,。,如,果,有,人,没,有,东,西,吃,的,话,，,我,们,应,该,生,产,多,一,点,，,给,他,们,分,配,就,好,了,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,S-VE,S-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU

“,绿,色,食,品,”,是,不,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,，,所,以,产,量,不,多,，,这,样,下,去,饥,饿,的,人,口,越,来,越,多,。	C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU

虽,然,我,的,年,龄,很,小,，,但,是,我,想,对,世,界,上,所,有,的,吸,烟,者,说,：,“,你,们,不,能,吸,烟,，,你,们,不,能,这,这,想,迫,害,珍,贵,的,生,命,，,求,你,们,不,要,再,抽,这,根,没,用,的,烟,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-DT,S-DT,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DT,C-M,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,M-PU
我,觉,得,互,相,考,虑,对,方,的,立,场,的,话,，,容,易,解,决,问,题,为,了,了,解,了,对,方,需,要,对,话,。,对,话,时,请,开,通,得,谈,一,下,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,S-DER,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU
有,不,少,原,于,恋,爱,而,被,流,行,的,。,反,正,，,歌,曲,流,行,的,原,因,往,往,是,于,是,否,在,人,们,的,心,里,留,下,影,响,有,关,。,而,这,会,给,人,们,希,望,，,安,慰,等,等,人,们,面,对,显,实,生,活,的,鼓,励,。	C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,R-SB,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,S-P,M-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
所,以,，,我,如,果,被,聘,请,我,一,定,会,尽,全,力,去,改,善,贵,公,司,的,服,务,水,平,，,让,它,能,够,符,合,世,纪,标,准,。,希,望,贵,公,司,能,够,给,我,这,份,机,会,，,把,旅,客,旅,游,的,经,验,显,得,更,加,完,美,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-CS,C-CS,C-SB,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

这,是,我,从,高,中,时,的,愿,望,。,所,以,我,就,选,了,在,中,教,育,汉,语,最,好,的,北,京,语,言,文,化,大,学,。	C-PN,C-VC,C-PN,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-P,C-NR,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

”,那,也,我,不,同,意,。	C-PU,C-PN,W-AD,W-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

这,样,不,但,能,把,挨,饿,的,人,们,从,食,粮,难,中,救,出,来,，,还,能,从,化,肥,和,农,药,的,危,害,中,保,护,人,类,的,身,体,健,康,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-BA,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

所,以,我,们,青,年,也,不,了,解,下,年,代,的,人,，,想,想,吧,，,我,们,下,一,代,的,人,那,样,父,母,看,我,们,，,应,该,能,了,解,父,母,的,心,情,吧,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-NN,S-NN,S-DEC,S-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,R-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,R-NN,R-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

我,认,为,没,有,完,全,的,人,，,因,此,没,有,存,在,完,全,符,格,的,父,母,，,每,个,父,母,都,有,小,小,的,毛,病,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
妈,妈,常,常,说,：,“,将,来,有,一,天,，,当,做,个,外,文,教,的,老,师,”,。,我,十,七,、,八,岁,时,，,我,爸,爸,忽,然,去,死,了,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,R-P,C-VV,C-VV,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,R-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU
由,于,我,，,您,过,于,担,心,啊,，,对,身,体,有,害,。	C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-SP,C-PU,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
该,短,文,使,我,想,到,人,的,一,种,不,可,思,议,的,怪,毛,病,，,就,是,“,人,是,一,种,依,赖,心,很,强,的,动,物,”,。,在,这,个,故,事,中,，,只,有,一,位,和,尚,时,，,他,会,发,挥,自,己,的,独,立,心,。,后,来,来,了,另,一,位,和,尚,时,，,他,们,携,手,抬,水,提,高,了,工,作,效,率,。	C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEG,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-PU,C-NN,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-AS,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
留,学,的,时,候,，,虽,然,有,时,间,，,但,还,想,做,工,作,，,可,是,真,有,意,思,，,一,旦,上,班,就,很,想,休,息,，,需,要,假,期,。,如,果,我,有,假,期,，,我,该,做,什,么,？	C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,M-PU
这,是,因,为,父,母,常,常,夜,出,晚,归,，,为,生,活,而,打,拼,。	C-PN,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-NN,S-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
我,父,母,说,，,以,养,动,物,为,学,会,爱,有,生,命,的,。	C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,M-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,M-PU
吸,烟,对,吸,烟,者,来,说,是,一,种,爱,好,，,每,个,人,都,有,享,受,自,己,爱,好,生,活,的,权,利,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,R-NN,R-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

生,命,不,是,自,己,的,东,西,。,它,是,自,己,周,围,的,人,愿,意,生,才,生,的,所,以,我,想,死,就,死,是,很,自,私,的,行,为,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,R-NN,R-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,R-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
年,青,人,不,应,该,忽,视,长,者,所,积,累,的,这,些,东,西,，,而,在,其,中,要,吸,取,珍,贵,的,经,验,和,智,慧,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
假,期,的,时,候,，,很,多,同,学,们,回,国,，,我,也,可,以,回,国,，,但,是,在,中,国,留,学,的,机,会,，,不,去,旅,游,的,话,，,太,可,惜,了,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
第,二,，,从,小,就,认,识,的,朋,友,的,选,择,安,全,，,但,是,缺,点,在,于,人,的,思,想,感,情,到,了,某,年,龄,层,时,就,会,有,所,改,变,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-DEC,W-NN,W-NN,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

那,说,法,，,我,认,为,是,正,确,的,。,因,为,在,我,们,生,活,当,中,不,时,都,需,要,阅,读,来,增,进,我,们,的,知,识,。,所,以,我,们,也,要,怎,样,学,会,有,效,阅,读,的,方,法,，,在,不,断,的,找,寻,生,活,上,所,需,要,的,知,识,，,大,家,可,以,常,常,阅,读,来,增,加,我,们,对,事,物,的,判,断,。	C-AD,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,R-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-P,C-AD,C-AD,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-LC,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

有,些,人,为,了,获,得,更,高,的,学,历,，,为,了,求,职,或,提,高,自,己,的,素,质,而,阅,读,；,而,有,些,人,为,了,休,闲,的,时,间,或,在,旅,游,途,中,阅,读,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-P,C-P,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-CC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
因,此,我,认,为,如,果,想,解,决,父,母,与,子,女,之,间,的,代,沟,的,话,，,首,先,双,方,应,该,努,力,理,解,对,方,的,想,法,而,尊,重,对,方,的,意,见,。,很,多,事,情,都,是,不,努,力,对,方,的,想,法,却,急,迫,自,己,的,想,法,而,自,然,遂,渐,产,生,代,沟,的,。,所,以,如,果,双,方,都,对,方,跟,自,己,的,想,法,不,一,致,时,尊,重,对,方,的,意,见,那,么,就,他,们,之,间,能,够,减,少,对,歧,情,况,甚,至,很,可,能,发,现,对,方,的,看,法,也,有,道,理,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,M-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-AD,C-AD,R-VV,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-NN,R-NN,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,R-PN,R-PN,R-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

据,新,闻,报,道,，,得,肺,癌,症,死,亡,的,人,越,来,越,多,。,韩,国,政,府,从,今,年,开,始,烟,的,价,格,要,贵,一,点,儿,。,但,喜,欢,我,的,人,们,不,想,戒,烟,而,还,要,买,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,M-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VA,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-MSP,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
