大,約,１,０,分,钟,我,的,身,体,也,暖,了,起,来,，,还,登,到,象,鼻,山,顶,喊,了,两,声,Ｈ,ｅ,ｌ,ｌ,ｏ,。	C-NR,C-NR,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-M,M-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-AS,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,现,在,为,了,提,高,汉,语,水,平,每,天,晚,上,从,７,点,半,到,９,点,半,在,辅,习,班,学,习,。,虽,然,每,天,很,累,但,是,在,这,里,我,学,了,很,多,东,西,，,也,认,识,了,很,多,人,，,我,们,上,课,时,学,习,多,个,方,面,的,内,容,，,而,而,采,取,许,多,方,式,提,高,水,平,。,每,天,学,习,听,力,、,作,文,、,翻,译,等,方,面,。,其,其,内,容,也,不,容,易,，,什,么,政,治,、,体,育,、,文,化,、,法,律,、,教,育,、,环,境,、,国,际,、,经,济,等,现,在,世,界,上,的,热,门,话,题,都,在,教,室,里,学,习,。	C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-CD,C-M,C-M,C-P,S-VV,S-VV,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,S-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
第,一,：,社,会,需,要,某,一,段,程,度,的,控,制,，,如,制,定,法,规,对,违,反,者,罚,款,等,强,制,性,措,施,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-DT,S-CD,S-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,R-JJ,R-JJ,R-JJ,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU
我,觉,得,人,是,受,到,很,多,周,围,环,境,的,影,响,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,R-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,常,常,吃,“,绿,色,食,品,”,，,也,很,爱,吃,的,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,C-PU
我,认,为,，,为,了,让,孩,子,安,全,的,度,过,中,高,学,这,段,时,期,是,在,好,不,过,了,。,以,后,在,大,学,时,期,在,交,异,性,朋,友,也,不,迟,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,R-P,R-P,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,S-JJ,S-JJ,S-NN,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,R-AD,R-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,S-P,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
吃,污,染,食,品,生,这,样,孩,子,的,话,，,那,对,不,起,孩,子,，,孩,子,很,多,亏,了,。	C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,R-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
每,到,假,期,，,外,公,又,带,我,回,到,父,母,身,边,，,那,时,我,总,带,着,积,存,下,来,的,钱,，,以,大,姐,的,身,份,，,尽,量,满,足,弟,妹,的,需,求,，,假,期,过,了,，,钱,也,完,了,。	C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-NN,C-AD,M-VV,C-AS,C-PU
其,次,，,流,行,歌,曲,是,帮,助,我,的,生,活,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,因,特,别,喜,爱,这,本,书,的,理,由,是,，,它,可,以,让,我,了,解,中,国,的,历,史,、,文,化,以,及,女,性,的,思,想,的,转,变,。	C-PN,R-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
人,们,所,说,“,吃,”,的,意,思,是,不,只,是,要,饱,还,要,考,虑,到,自,己,的,健,康,才,说,的,。,因,此,，,为,了,让,人,们,享,受,自,然,农,作,物,而,健,康,，,我,们,一,定,要,避,免,以,这,种,方,式,来,解,决,农,作,物,的,产,量,问,题,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,M-PU,C-VV,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,R-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,R-VV,R-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,M-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
对,进,入,社,会,活,动,之,前,的,孩,子,来,说,，,尤,其,是,上,幼,儿,园,或,小,学,之,前,的,小,孩,子,来,说,，,跟,他,们,最,亲,密,的,人,，,对,他,们,影,响,力,大,的,人,，,就,是,他,们,的,父,母,。	C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
他,们,从,眼,里,所,看,到,的,父,母,行,为,都,认,为,是,一,个,标,准,行,为,，,所,以,我,认,为,父,母,在,孩,子,跟,前,千,万,不,能,做,坏,事,，,以,免,孩,子,也,跟,着,学,坏,事,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,R-CD,R-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU
接,着,提,吸,烟,对,公,共,场,所,的,问,题,。	C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,是,一,个,很,正,常,的,成,长,过,程,，,并,不,值,得,大,惊,小,怪,的,。,我,认,为,在,普,遍,社,会,里,，,青,年,们,堕,入,爱,河,并,不,是,一,件,值,得,惊,愕,的,事,。,这,个,过,程,不,但,能,让,他,们,逐,渐,的,成,熟,，,也,能,够,给,予,他,们,一,个,探,索,内,心,情,感,世,界,的,机,会,。	C-PN,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,S-DEV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,父,亲,每,天,看,最,少,也,四,个,种,类,的,报,纸,，,还,包,括,英,字,报,纸,。	C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,W-VV,W-AD,W-VA,R-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-NR,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
父,母,也,一,般,在,看,电,视,很,少,说,话,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
我,认,为,吸,烟,给,个,人,健,康,和,公,众,利,益,不,好,的,影,响,。,首,先,，,吸,烟,不,仅,仅,给,抽,烟,的,人,本,身,的,健,康,，,而,且,给,在,他,的,旁,边,的,人,的,健,康,也,不,好,的,影,响,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
因,此,，,我,辞,了,工,作,，,来,东,京,，,开,始,拼,命,地,学,习,中,文,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,M-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,为,孩,子,出,生,之,后,第,一,次,接,触,的,人,就,是,父,母,，,所,以,父,母,对,孩,子,的,影,响,绝,大,而,且,责,任,也,相,当,重,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-CD,C-CD,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
我,在,初,中,三,年,级,的,时,候,，,考,试,考,得,不,太,好,，,当,然,父,母,生,气,了,。,但,是,，,他,们,生,气,不,是,我,成,绩,不,好,而,是,我,一,点,儿,也,没,有,准,备,考,试,的,。	C-PN,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,W-AD,W-AD,W-NN,W-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-MSP,C-VC,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-SP,C-PU
对,我,来,说,我,也,都,知,道,吸,烟,对,人,的,身,体,一,点,也,没,有,好,处,。,但,我,也,不,知,不,觉,地,找,烟,。,戒,烟,最,重,要,的,成,功,的,方,法,就,是,自,己,和,自,己,的,决,心,。	C-P,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PN,C-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,S-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,W-AD,W-VA,W-VA,W-DEC,W-JJ,W-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-CC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
第,二,是,，,吸,烟,的,人,少,的,话,，,不,用,做,烟,，,做,烟,时,候,用,的,资,源,和,资,本,可,以,用,别,的,方,面,，,那,么,社,会,的,发,展,速,度,可,以,更,快,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-VC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-PU,S-VV,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-P,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,M-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
佛,教,的,一,些,宗,派,叫,净,土,宗,在,日,本,还,有,武,士,时,从,中,国,传,过,来,了,。,人,死,了,以,后,能,去,极,乐,世,界,，,就,是,死,就,好,。,我,认,识,这,个,观,念,很,好,，,因,为,这,样,人,对,死,的,恐,怖,能,消,除,，,当,然,这,个,观,念,不,真,实,。,然,后,很,多,武,士,、,老,百,姓,自,愿,参,加,斗,战,就,死,了,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-CD,S-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,M-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-NN,S-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU
第,一,，,产,量,不,会,降,低,很,多,，,把,一,些,粮,食,能,给,挨,饿,的,人,们,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU,W-BA,W-CD,W-CD,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
如,果,，,因,谈,恋,爱,所,以,学,习,成,绩,不,好,的,话,有,自,己,的,责,任,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-PU,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-NN,S-VE,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
有,一,天,另,一,位,和,尚,来,了,在,山,里,住,的,和,尚,那,儿,。	C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,S-PN,C-PN,C-PU
我,觉,得,为,在,健,康,方,面,绿,色,食,品,很,重,要,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
因,为,从,小,开,始,我,们,的,父,母,亲,对,吃,法,严,格,。	C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-VA,C-VA,C-PU
我,已,经,二,十,七,岁,了,，,可,还,在,花,爸,妈,辛,苦,地,赚,的,钱,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU
最,后,两,天,下,了,雨,，,因,此,参,观,的,人,数,较,少,了,，,我,们,可,以,慢,慢,地,鉴,赏,了,豫,园,的,庭,园,我,觉,得,格,外,漂,亮,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,S-NN,S-NN,C-AS,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
我,觉,得,现,在,世,界,大,部,分,的,人,对,戒,烟,有,兴,趣,。,我,基,本,上,的,意,见,就,是,想,要,抽,烟,就,抽,，,不,要,抽,烟,就,不,抽,。,但,香,烟,的,话,烟,雾,给,周,围,不,少,的,影,响,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,M-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,R-AD,C-DEV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
他,们,很,兴,奋,地,说,：,当,然,没,看,过,，,我,们,和,尚,，,一,舍,入,空,门,就,不,能,看,女,的,，,在,脑,子,里,也,不,可,以,想,。,”,二,休,说,：,我,昨,天,去,挑,水,的,时,候,，,在,那,里,看,到,一,个,女,孩,走,过,来,的,情,节,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU
好,，,我,现,在,就,来,告,诉,你,，,我,从,小,时,候,对,别,的,国,家,的,语,言,很,感,兴,趣,而,且,我,父,母,也,让,我,学,习,英,语,、,法,语,等,因,为,他,们,意,识,到,了,我,很,快,就,会,学,习,很,多,词,，,好,像,有,一,种,特,殊,的,能,力,。	C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,M-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,的,父,母,也,是,为,了,这,个,原,因,而,安,排,我,就,读,男,子,小,学,和,中,学,。,无,可,否,认,，,男,女,分,班,会,減,低,男,学,生,与,女,学,生,接,近,的,机,会,，,使,他,们,能,多,花,精,神,在,学,习,上,。	C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,S-P,S-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU

其,实,这,两,个,问,题,都,不,能,忽,视,，,人,类,应,该,适,当,地,调,节,在,这,两,个,之,间,存,在,的,问,题,，,不,能,顾,此,消,彼,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-PN,S-VV,S-NN,C-PU
我,想,这,可,能,由,社,会,经,济,的,发,展,现,在,的,人,民,的,意,识,也,从,量,的,问,题,到,质,量,问,题,的,原,因,吧,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-NN,C-NN,M-P,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
近,几,年,开,始,在,食,品,市,场,中,‘,绿,色,食,品,’,出,现,了,，,而,且,进,‘,绿,色,食,品,’,被,广,大,的,消,费,者,的,好,评,，,市,场,规,模,是,越,来,越,大,了,。,绿,色,食,品,是,不,用,化,肥,和,农,药,，,所,以,‘,绿,色,食,品,的,产,量,降,低,，,所,以,有,些,人,想,在,这,世,界,上,还,有,几,亿,人,因,缺,少,粮,食,而,挨,饿,，,反,对,绿,色,食,品,，,可,是,我,觉,得,宁,愿,挨,饿,也,不,能,放,弃,绿,色,食,品,。	C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-SB,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-VV,C-P,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-CC,C-CC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
第,一,香,烟,的,包,装,纸,处,理,的,时,候,这,个,不,能,回,收,也,不,能,再,用,，,所,以,处,理,的,过,程,中,需,要,很,多,钱,。,那,么,交,钱,是,从,人,民,来,的,。,这,样,花,很,多,钱,的,话,不,能,投,资,为,国,家,未,来,的,部,门,。	R-OD,R-OD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,R-PN,R-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,R-AD,R-VV,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
现,在,比,过,去,相,比,更,容,易,得,到,很,多,知,识,，,而,且,可,以,知,道,很,多,人,的,情,况,。,所,以,有,的,初,中,生,以,为,这,么,多,人,已,经,谈,过,恋,爱,，,那,么,我,也,得,谈,恋,爱,。,年,龄,大,了,，,就,不,会,考,虑,这,样,的,事,，,但,初,中,生,还,不,会,考,虑,全,面,，,所,以,有,时,候,做,令,人,担,心,的,事,情,。	C-NT,C-NT,S-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-CD,R-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-AD,W-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
“,流,行,歌,曲,”,意,思,就,是,跟,它,的,名,字,一,样,，,现,在,我,们,所,在,的,文,化,中,最,流,行,而,有,名,的,歌,曲,，,这,不,仅,表,示,我,的,周,围,大,多,数,都,喜,欢,听,流,行,歌,曲,，,而,表,示,当,时,的,文,化,程,度,，,所,以,人,们,都,不,知,不,觉,地,进,入,流,行,歌,曲,中,。	C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,M-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU
由,于,家,庭,教,育,的,不,良,，,養,成,在,童,年,的,我,，,任,性,不,求,上,进,，,只,会,玩,，,虽,然,在,严,父,的,打,骂,劝,导,下,的,我,，,还,是,不,听,話,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-VV,R-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-PN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,R-CS,R-CS,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-DEG,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
不,是,男,女,老,少,共,享,的,，,而,只,是,年,轻,人,的,，,我,对,流,行,歌,曲,不,是,有,反,感,，,只,是,有,点,儿,可,惜,。	C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VC,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-VE,C-M,C-M,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
我,认,为,，,现,在,对,我,们,人,类,来,说,最,重,要,的,事,就,是,，,在,世,界,上,生,存,的,所,有,人,们,一,块,生,存,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-DT,C-DT,S-NN,S-NN,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
总,之,来,说,虽,我,对,这,个,问,题,没,有,什,么,知,识,，,可,我,想,一,定,要,考,虑,两,例,的,立,场,。	C-AD,S-AD,C-LC,C-LC,C-CS,C-PN,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

分,班,并,不,能,根,本,的,解,决,早,恋,问,题,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,想,说,的,是,，,虽,然,我,不,曾,好,好,珍,惜,这,位,老,师,，,但,我,知,道,我,错,了,，,我,后,悔,不,于,，,就,因,为,这,样,他,改,变,了,我,的,学,习,态,度,，,不,再,像,以,前,浑,浑,噩,噩,了,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VC,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,S-P,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU

这,样,有,很,严,格,的,法,律,也,我,还,怀,疑,已,经,死,去,的,人,真,的,要,死,，,一,点,儿,也,没,有,还,要,活,着,的,念,头,？,因,为,我,相,信,虽,然,得,了,不,治,之,病,、,受,了,很,痛,苦,，,人,的,本,性,要,活,着,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,W-AD,W-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,C-AD,S-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU
第,一,，,我,们,要,积,极,开,发,对,身,体,、,环,境,的,影,响,少,的,农,药,和,化,肥,，,并,推,动,他,的,使,用,。,第,二,，,要,提,高,农,民,的,对,农,药,、,化,肥,的,意,识,，,因,为,有,的,农,民,只,顾,经,济,效,率,、,不,顾,使,用,以,后,的,后,果,。,还,有,最,重,要,的,事,，,化,肥,、,农,药,的,质,量,方,面,，,使,用,方,面,制,定,一,个,法,来,给,他,的,生,产,企,业,和,农,民,进,行,比,较,强,制,性,的,控,制,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-MSP,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-AD,R-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

第,二,是,饥,饿,，,饥,饿,可,以,结,解,，,很,多,强,国,的,望,功,下,可,以,结,解,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,M-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU
世,界,卫,生,組,织,统,计,：,如,一,个,人,，,一,生,都,不,抽,的,平,均,命,比,平,均,已,有,廿,年,烟,龄,的,人,多,活,七,点,二,年,的,寿,命,，,而,且,这,还,不,包,括,因,抽,烟,产,生,的,疾,病,与,其,所,花,费,的,金,、,时,间,的,浪,费,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-AD,R-CD,R-CD,R-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,M-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,R-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,R-PU
虽,然,随,着,生,活,水,平,的,不,断,提,高,，,人,们,对,食,品,的,要,求,越,来,越,高,，,但,是,全,世,界,还,有,些,贫,困,地,区,的,孩,子,和,人,们,却,没,有,吃,的,东,西,而,饿,死,。,比,如,说,，,我,们,通,过,媒,体,常,常,看,到,一,些,非,洲,国,家,的,孩,子,和,老,百,姓,以,及,发,生,战,争,地,区,的,很,多,难,民,都,是,需,要,各,国,的,帮,助,。,从,人,道,主,义,的,角,度,来,看,，,我,们,应,该,生,产,很,多,的,农,作,物,给,他,们,供,吃,的,食,品,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,S-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
但,是,，,最,近,我,努,力,了,解,爸,爸,的,立,场,。,初,次,好,像,不,可,能,的,事,，,但,是,继,续,努,力,下,去,，,就,会,好,起,来,。,那,么,我,相,信,有,一,天,禺,然,会,发,现,了,解,爸,爸,的,我,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,S-NT,S-NT,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VA,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,S-NN,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-PN,C-PU

我,把,歌,曲,一,听,就,头,晕,。	C-PN,R-BA,W-NN,W-NN,W-AD,W-VV,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
那,时,候,常,常,一,起,唱,的,歌,是,我,母,亲,生,我,以,后,也,我,最,喜,欢,的,歌,。	C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VC,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,W-AD,W-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU

因,为,西,方,国,家,的,父,母,对,于,孩,子,的,所,有,问,题,先,跟,孩,子,谈,谈,还,有,听,孩,子,的,心,里,话,。,这,样,的,话,子,女,觉,得,父,母,是,对,自,己,来,说,最,好,朋,友,。,但,东,方,国,家,的,父,母,是,大,部,分,对,孩,子,的,事,这,样,对,待,：,没,有,关,心,只,说,父,母,的,想,法,从,来,不,听,孩,子,的,话,。,孩,子,也,越,来,越,跟,父,母,不,想,说,话,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-MSP,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-CC,S-CC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,W-VC,W-CD,W-CD,W-CD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-VE,S-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-AD,W-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

”,但,我,认,为,现,在,的,饥,饿,问,题,的,原,因,不,在,于,农,作,物,的,产,量,小,，,而,在,于,其,它,别,的,原,因,。,比,如,说,，,看,看,饥,饿,问,题,非,常,严,重,的,非,洲,吧,，,现,在,非,洲,的,许,多,孩,子,因,饥,饿,而,死,，,但,他,们,不,足,食,粮,的,主,要,原,因,在,于,他,们,国,家,之,间,的,内,战,。,由,于,多,次,的,内,战,他,们,流,失,了,很,多,土,地,，,而,得,不,到,农,作,物,。	C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NR,C-NR,C-SP,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,W-VV,W-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,R-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,一,个,论,点,可,说,是,没,有,人,不,知,道,，,甚,至,一,个,几,岁,小,孩,也,懂,得,一,支,烟,含,有,两,百,多,种,化,学,物,品,，,其,中,尼,古,丁,含,量,最,高,，,吸,烟,会,致,癌,，,吸,烟,后,很,难,戒,。,但,烟,草,公,司,的,精,采,广,告,却,能,让,不,少,深,知,吸,烟,的,后,果,的,青,少,年,步,上,吸,烟,一,族,之,途,。	C-DT,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-NN,R-DEG,R-NN,C-PU

我,想,“,吸,烟,对,每,个,人,有,怎,样,的,危,害,”,这,问,句,的,答,案,我,不,说,也,大,家,都,很,清,楚,。,现,在,无,论,是,发,达,国,家,还,是,发,展,中,国,家,，,都,重,视,吸,烟,对,人,民,的,健,康,问,题,。,比,如,，,青,少,年,吸,烟,问,题,是,每,个,国,家,头,疼,的,事,情,，,还,有,女,性,吸,烟,问,题,、,间,接,吸,烟,问,题,也,不,能,忽,视,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,S-VV,S-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,W-AD,W-PN,W-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
可,是,今,年,连,弟,弟,也,为,了,上,大,学,来,了,汉,城,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-AS,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU
我,一,直,在,男,女,混,合,的,班,上,课,的,，,可,是,只,有,一,年,，,高,中,二,年,级,的,时,候,，,在,只,有,女,孩,子,的,班,学,习,。,大,家,都,把,我,们,的,班,叫,“,女,班,”,，,这,样,的,叫,法,还,包,括,着,可,怜,、,看,不,起,的,情,绪,。,当,时,，,我,觉,得,班,里,只,有,女,的,是,没,有,趣,儿,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-BA,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-PU,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,R-VC,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

因,此,，,近,年,来,各,国,反,吸,烟,运,动,，,也,以,减,少,年,轻,吸,烟,人,口,为,目,标,，,例,如,严,格,禁,止,售,卖,香,烟,给,十,八,岁,以,下,的,青,少,年,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,无,形,中,也,让,对,面,更,了,解,。,这,不,但,造,成,婆,媳,之,间,的,感,情,容,融,也,形,成,了,三,代,同,堂,完,满,的,家,庭,。	C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-DT,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
而,且,一,个,人,从,小,的,时,候,看,到,某,个,人,吸,烟,，,后,来,他,也,不,知,道,他,的,未,来,吸,烟,不,吸,烟,。,如,果,社,会,的,情,况,不,允,许,随,便,吸,烟,的,话,，,这,种,情,况,是,比,较,少,了,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,S-AD,C-AD,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU

在,韩,国,前,几,年,已,经,意,识,到,歌,曲,对,年,轻,人,的,影,响,力,，,所,以,政,府,对,歌,曲,的,管,理,比,很,严,格,，,但,实,际,上,问,题,还,没,解,决,，,因,为,很,多,年,轻,人,想,听,这,种,音,乐,。	C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,S-P,S-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,们,国,家,的,生,活,水,平,八,９,８,０,年,代,以,后,高,速,成,長,了,。,随,着,生,活,水,平,提,高,，,人,的,思,考,方,式,也,就,改,变,了,。,现,在,所,谓,父,母,们,就,是,大,部,分,生,活,水,平,还,不,发,展,的,时,候,经,过,约,年,期,的,人,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NT,S-NT,S-NT,S-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,S-AD,S-AD,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU
那,解,决,办,法,是,家,长,们,让,小,孩,子,知,道,自,然,食,品,的,好,处,，,或,者,科,学,家,发,明,对,身,体,没,什,么,问,题,的,绿,色,食,品,。	C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,初,中,的,时,候,，,看,了,日,本,现,代,著,名,作,者,的,作,品,。	C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,C-NR,C-NR,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
他,说,：,“,流,行,歌,曲,呀,，,都,商,业,性,很,强,，,怎,么,每,个,人,都,喜,欢,一,样,的,歌,，,他,们,都,上,当,了,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,W-AD,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU

我,在,的,自,身,处,于,迷,话,于,日,本,歌,曲,，,因,为,上,学,的,时,候,要,坐,汽,车,，,所,以,很,无,聊,的,听,Ｍ,Ｐ,３,而,导,致,找,迷,诱,于,日,本,歌,。	C-PN,C-P,C-DEG,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,R-VV,R-NN,S-VV,S-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-VV,S-P,S-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-PU
但,毕,竟,生,活,在,日,本,，,所,以,我,的,中,文,比,起,来,日,语,还,是,差,得,多,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
我,个,人,认,为,，,运,动,员,的,收,入,高,还,是,应,该,看,他,有,没,有,能,力,，,有,没,有,对,社,会,作,出,贡,献,这,样,才,是,最,重,要,的,。	C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,M-CC,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VE,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-AD,C-VE,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-PN,S-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU
所,以,，,我,觉,得,流,行,歌,曲,与,社,会,的,环,境,很,有,关,，,而,且,，,当,代,社,会,文,化,的,程,度,来,解,决,歌,曲,的,内,容,，,我,常,常,听,以,前,的,流,行,歌,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,M-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-PU

现,今,社,会,的,青,年,在,踏,出,学,园,之,后,就,很,少,有,机,会,认,识,异,性,，,每,天,朝,九,晚,五,的,工,作,，,回,家,之,后,躲,在,一,个,狭,小,的,公,寓,里,就,过,了,一,天,。,但,是,感,谢,科,学,家,们,发,明,了,电,脑,，,建,造,了,网,络,，,让,工,作,了,一,整,天,的,青,年,们,可,以,轻,松,的,坐,在,电,脑,前,交,友,谈,天,，,让,们,的,世,界,更,开,阔,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,S-DEV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

，,从,报,中,得,知,快,乐,家,庭,旅,游,公,司,招,聘,导,游,。,我,由,衷,的,希,望,能,为,贵,公,司,服,务,。	C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VA,C-VA,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

但,是,，,听,到,有,男,女,分,班,教,育,经,验,的,朋,友,说,的,或,一,般,的,说,法,，,我,认,为,学,生,还,在,男,女,混,合,的,形,式,下,学,习,是,好,的,。,如,果,在,学,校,都,是,男,的,，,他,们,会,成,为,粗,暴,，,而,且,过,到,意,识,异,性,。,特,别,在,初,中,、,高,中,的,特,别,精,神,敏,感,的,时,期,，,如,果,日,常,没,有,与,异,性,交,流,的,机,会,，,就,怎,样,能,体,会,以,自,然,的,态,度,对,待,女,性,？,我,觉,得,男,人,应,该,从,小,学,会,与,异,性,如,何,交,流,，,如,何,对,待,女,性,。,另,外,，,如,果,在,学,校,里,的,学,校,都,是,女,的,，,她,们,就,会,失,掉,害,羞,的,观,念,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,R-VV,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,R-DEC,C-CC,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,S-DEG,W-JJ,W-JJ,W-NN,W-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-VE,C-VE,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,W-P,W-JJ,W-JJ,W-AD,W-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

因,此,，,在,这,一,问,题,上,，,我,们,需,要,共,同,努,力,，,从,自,己,做,起,，,从,政,府,角,度,来,讲,，,要,采,取,有,效,措,施,如,罚,款,、,宣,传,等,来,减,少,吸,烟,的,人,数,，,也,是,减,少,人,们,的,疾,病,，,提,高,人,们,的,生,活,质,量,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-DT,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,对,安,乐,死,有,了,很,深,刻,的,影,响,，,因,为,我,认,为,人,的,生,命,是,不,能,轻,视,的,。	W-PN,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,C-VE,R-AS,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
我,小,时,候,，,也,没,有,与,双,亲,有,太,大,的,“,代,沟,”,问,题,，,因,为,家,父,、,家,母,都,是,读,书,人,；,爸,爸,有,学,英,文,，,妈,妈,是,学,荷,文,的,。,也,许,他,们,受,到,了,不,少,中,华,思,想,所,影,响,，,所,以,对,我,们,姐,弟,妹,都,很,开,明,地,指,导,，,主,要,的,要,求,是,：,让,我,们,都,能,读,上,大,学,课,程,。	C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,R-VE,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-NR,C-NN,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,R-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,R-DEV,R-VV,R-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,受,到,老,师,的,影,响,很,大,，,不,知,不,觉,地,对,中,国,有,兴,趣,了,。,况,且,，,我,上,高,中,时,，,在,日,本,中,国,的,茶,红,起,来,了,。	C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-VA,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU

而,且,我,们,只,要,细,心,想,想,，,对,化,肥,与,农,药,进,行,一,些,措,施,，,那,应,该,没,问,题,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
化,肥,和,农,药,就,是,农,业,技,术,发,展,结,果,物,。,我,用,这,些,农,药,提,高,了,产,量,，,就,世,界,食,量,比,以,前,丰,富,。,可,是,用,这,些,农,药,一,段,时,间,，,后,来,我,们,发,现,了,这,样,东,西,对,环,境,有,不,好,的,影,响,，,而,且,在,这,样,的,环,境,中,生,长,的,农,作,物,会,影,响,到,人,的,身,体,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,S-PN,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-AD,W-NN,W-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-VA,C-VA,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-AD,R-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,觉,得,绿,色,食,品,把,人,们,的,环,境,污,染,意,识,提,高,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU

我,现,在,想,，,如,果,那,时,候,我,帮,助,自,杀,的,话,，,一,定,不,能,听,到,这,句,话,。	C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-PU
抽,烟,有,镇,沈,精,神,的,作,用,。,很,多,人,说,在,心,里,不,开,心,、,不,舒,服,时,一,抽,烟,心,里,就,好,多,了,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,S-NN,S-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-LC,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-SP,C-PU
身,为,父,母,要,不,断,地,去,学,习,，,适,应,现,代,孩,子,的,看,法,及,接,受,社,会,已,改,变,了,，,我,想,代,沟,的,问,题,会,变,小,了,甚,至,有,的,不,存,在,了,。	C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,M-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,R-AS,W-AD,W-AD,W-PN,W-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU

由,于,工,作,上,，,我,需,要,说,日,语,，,所,以,我,的,日,本,口,语,已,达,到,一,定,的,程,度,。,我,现,在,还,努,力,自,修,，,想,考,到,一,级,的,文,凭,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NR,S-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
但,是,在,世,界,上,有,很,多,人,过,饥,饿,的,生,活,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
第,二,是,，,农,民,自,己,要,改,善,自,己,的,意,识,，,政,府,控,制,农,民,们,用,农,药,，,农,民,们,不,改,善,自,己,的,意,识,就,不,行,了,，,那,农,民,们,会,偷,偷,地,用,多,量,农,药,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-VC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-P,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
比,如,，,我,想,染,我,的,头,发,，,想,在,耳,朵,扎,一,个,耳,眼,儿,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
在,俄,罗,斯,现,在,有,很,多,人,开,始,学,习,汉,语,，,以,前,完,全,不,是,这,样,，,考,上,大,学,的,时,候,越,来,越,多,人,选,汉,语,系,，,我,觉,得,这,证,明,对,中,国,的,经,济,发,展,很,不,错,。,再,说,，,中,国,是,我,们,最,近,的,邻,居,，,如,果,我,们,想,去,旅,游,，,最,方,便,到,中,国,去,，,这,样,又,便,宜,，,服,务,又,很,好,；,再,说,中,国,的,产,品,并,不,贵,，,质,量,也,不,错,，,所,以,俄,罗,斯,大,量,从,中,国,进,口,各,种,各,样,的,产,品,和,食,品,，,所,以,我,认,为,对,我,俄,罗,斯,的,东,部,地,区,的,人,来,说,，,学,汉,语,最,有,用,。	C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NT,C-NT,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-JJ,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,R-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,W-AD,W-VA,W-VA,W-VV,W-NR,W-NR,W-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,W-AD,W-AD,W-P,W-NR,W-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-PU

再,次,，,学,生,在,同,性,的,环,境,里,，,会,很,理,所,当,然,地,感,到,更,加,自,在,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

但,是,，,我,们,也,知,道,在,某,一,些,地,区,，,比,如,非,洲,大,陆,，,不,能,说,吃,不,起,绿,色,食,品,而,连,一,天,一,饭,也,吃,不,上,了,—,—,饥,饿,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-DT,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,S-MSP,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-CD,M-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,R-AS,C-PU,C-PU,M-NN,C-NN,M-PU

所,以,，,家,长,和,学,校,必,须,互,相,配,合,，,在,双,管,齐,下,教,育,子,女,或,学,生,下,，,给,予,年,轻,学,生,们,正,确,的,人,生,价,值,观,，,以,便,他,们,将,来,能,走,上,正,途,，,不,会,做,出,错,误,的,判,断,或,选,择,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,R-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,认,为,还,是,吃,“,绿,色,食,品,”,第,一,位,。,因,为,我,认,为,对,人,类,最,重,要,的,是,健,康,，,而,且,我,还,认,为,世,界,上,的,那,么,的,人,挨,饿,的,问,题,的,原,因,，,不,仅,仅,是,在,缺,少,粮,食,上,，,也,有,很,多,经,济,方,面,等,的,其,他,的,原,因,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-DEG,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-DEG,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

因,为,冲,浪,的,运,动,量,特,别,多,，,第,二,天,不,能,工,作,。,那,样,的,时,候,我,的,先,辈,批,评,我,“,你,平,时,也,一,定,要,运,动,。	C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VA,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
中,国,给,予,人,们,是,个,较,为,保,守,的,国,家,，,惟,正,当,经,济,开,始,奔,驰,，,思,想,稍,较,开,放,，,因,此,我,认,为,男,女,同,班,是,可,行,的,。,家,长,所,顾,虑,虽,有,他,们,的,一,番,见,解,，,每,个,父,母,都,渴,望,自,己,的,子,女,能,成,龙,，,成,凤,，,而,学,业,乃,是,一,道,桥,梁,，,通,往,成,功,之,路,。	C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-VC,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,M-CS,C-VE,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
我,也,认,为,父,母,是,孩,子,的,第,一,任,老,师,，,也,认,为,父,母,的,兴,趣,爱,好,、,思,想,观,念,、,行,为,举,止,等,所,有,的,事,情,一,直,到,现,在,影,响,了,我,。,这,样,看,来,，,在,孩,子,长,大,学,习,的,过,程,中,，,父,母,的,行,为,就,做,成,教,育,的,一,部,分,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,S-AS,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

因,为,过,日,子,的,方,法,不,一,样,，,还,有,个,个,人,的,想,法,也,不,一,样,。	C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,S-PN,S-PN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

每,个,人,对,流,行,歌,曲,的,看,法,都,有,所,不,同,，,我,的,看,法,也,就,和,别,人,就,不,同,了,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
前,边,已,经,说,过,了,，,为,了,决,解,“,代,沟,”,问,题,，,现,在,的,父,母,要,转,变,旧,时,代,的,观,念,，,不,要,让,孩,子,强,调,“,听,话,”,的,教,育,，,让,孩,子,自,然,地,说,出,来,自,己,的,情,况,。,如,果,你,们,的,孩,子,有,什,么,苦,恼,的,话,，,首,先,听,孩,子,的,意,见,，,然,后,父,母,们,鼓,励,孩,子,，,或,者,，,孩,子,的,意,见,犯,错,误,的,话,，,就,批,评,孩,子,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-SP,C-PU,C-P,C-P,S-AD,S-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VA,S-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
更,说,，,吸,烟,，,除,了,本,人,以,外,，,还,会,损,坏,他,人,的,健,康,。,我,自,己,不,会,抽,烟,，,所,以,我,认,为,有,些,吸,烟,的,人,好,像,没,考,虑,过,对,他,人,的,样,子,，,很,随,意,地,抽,烟,不,好,。	S-AD,S-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,M-PN,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-AD,C-AD,C-PU

消,失,三,十,多,年,华,文,教,育,终,于,在,这,蕉,风,柳,雨,的,可,爱,的,印,度,尼,西,重,现,曙,光,实,令,人,欢,欣,与,鼓,舞,的,事,情,。,尤,其,做,为,汉,语,补,习,老,师,的,我,，,多,年,的,憧,憬,已,经,露,现,了,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NR,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-PN,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-PU
随,着,烟,客,递,增,加,剧,环,境,污,染,，,烟,客,一,人,一,口,喷,出,的,烟,污,染,环,境,，,随,地,乱,抛,的,烟,蒂,变,成,垃,圾,，,影,响,市,容,美,观,。	R-P,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-NN,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
最,近,，,在,市,场,上,一,类,食,品,叫,做,“,绿,色,食,品,”,，,这,是,未,经,污,染,的,农,产,品,加,工,的,食,品,。,这,类,食,品,因,为,跟,其,他,一,般,的,食,品,不,一,样,，,所,以,比,其,他,类,食,品,更,贵,，,贵,得,两,三,倍,。,比,较,富,的,人,可,以,吃,绿,色,食,品,，,可,是,，,比,较,贫,的,人,因,太,贵,而,不,能,吃,，,他,们,知,道,农,药,对,自,己,的,身,体,有,坏,处,，,也,不,得,不,吃,一,般,的,食,品,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,M-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-VA,R-DER,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,们,生,活,中,期,待,别,人,让,自,己,做,事,而,人,多,的,话,生,活,中,很,容,易,消,失,紧,张,感,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,C-NN,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU

总,之,，,流,行,歌,曲,不,但,给,人,类,有,帮,助,，,还,能,给,国,家,有,帮,助,。,像,由,听,流,行,歌,曲,人,们,可,以,解,除,一,些,的,压,力,，,可,以,好,好,的,集,中,在,工,作,或,者,自,己,的,本,事,，,这,样,能,提,高,效,果,。,大,多,数,人,都,这,样,不,仅,会,影,响,我,国,，,还,能,影,响,世,界,上,的,各,国,家,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,R-P,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-DT,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU

中,国,有,一,句,话,，,“,不,怕,慢,，,就,怕,站,”,我,不,是,那,么,聪,明,的,孩,子,，,可,是,我,要,坚,持,努,力,学,习,而,诚,恳,地,生,活,下,去,。,我,要,把,我,的,希,望,实,现,。	C-NR,C-NR,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-MSP,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-BA,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
“,绿,色,食,品,”,这,个,概,念,也,许,多,人,已,经,不,陌,生,，,如,果,某,一,个,品,牌,的,某,一,个,食,品,被,标,有,绿,色,食,品,的,字,样,，,那,么,人,们,会,很,放,心,地,去,享,用,它,，,这,是,因,为,绿,色,食,品,不,但,不,会,给,人,们,造,成,身,体,上,的,危,害,，,反,而,会,更,有,益,于,健,康,。,可,是,某,些,食,品,因,为,被,使,用,了,大,量,的,化,肥,和,农,药,而,受,到,了,不,同,程,度,的,污,染,，,吃,了,会,有,害,于,人,体,的,健,康,。	C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,M-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-DT,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-DT,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-SB,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-P,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,R-SB,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
可,是,“,绿,色,食,品,”,的,价,格,是,非,常,贵,，,比,一,般,的,食,品,贵,了,１,．,５,倍,到,２,倍,。,这,样,的,话,，,只,有,少,数,的,有,钱,人,买,得,到,，,大,多,数,的,人,很,少,会,吃,“,绿,色,食,品,”,，,而,且,世,界,上,很,多,地,方,的,人,没,有,今,天,吃,的,东,西,。,可,样,子,越,来,越,大,起,来,了,穷,富,之,差,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,R-NT,R-NT,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,S-AD,C-AD,W-AD,W-VA,W-VV,W-VV,W-AS,W-NN,W-NN,W-DEG,W-NN,W-PU
他,们,一,直,都,很,用,工,地,培,养,我,们,，,而,希,望,我,们,将,来,会,作,一,位,忠,实,，,有,用,的,人,。,他,们,不,但,是,我,们,的,父,母,，,而,且,作,为,我,们,的,老,师,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VE,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

因,为,孩,子,们,是,观,察,附,近,的,环,境,而,像,海,绵,吸,收,各,种,种,资,源,，,所,以,看,着,父,母,亲,用,嘴,巴,沟,通,就,也,学,说,话,，,看,到,父,母,用,脚,走,路,而,不,是,在,地,上,乱,爬,也,就,学,着,站,立,和,走,路,。,除,了,这,些,生,活,基,本,动,作,之,外,，,父,母,亲,同,时,教,孩,子,读,书,识,字,、,画,画,、,玩,玩,具,、,看,电,视,和,听,音,乐,，,也,让,孩,子,们,接,触,到,父,母,背,景,的,文,化,、,母,语,、,宗,教,、,兴,趣,等,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-PU

我,不,大,清,楚,現,時,在,国,内,男,女,分,班,的,真,正,目,的,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
其,例,就,是,流,行,音,乐,，,我,虽,然,对,流,行,音,乐,有,些,反,感,，,但,某,几,首,我,常,常,听,到,的,，,我,也,越,来,越,喜,欢,。	C-PN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

目,前,，,在,这,一,世,纪,之,中,人,们,只,能,靠,自,己,的,能,力,，,也,就,是,说,除,了,自,己,也,不,能,信,托,别,人,。,但,是,呢,，,我,们,完,全,可,以,相,信,而,且,信,托,我,们,的,父,母,因,为,在,任,何,情,况,下,父,母,给,自,己,的,儿,女,希,望,最,顺,利,的,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-P,C-DT,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,R-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,S-NN,S-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,R-P,W-PN,W-PN,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,W-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,R-SP,C-PU

无,可,奈,何,之,下,，,他,们,打,起,“,享,受,人,生,”,等,的,牌,子,继,续,抽,烟,，,这,样,一,来,不,但,害,了,自,己,，,更,危,害,了,公,众,的,利,益,。,因,为,众,所,周,知,，,被,动,吸,烟,（,自,己,不,抽,而,吸,入,烟,雾,的,人,）,者,比,直,接,吸,烟,的,烟,民,们,所,受,的,健,康,损,害,更,大,。,提,起,吸,烟,的,利,害,，,烟,民,中,更,有,甚,者,大,夸,自,己,以,烟,草,税,方,式,对,公,众,的,贡,献,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-ETC,R-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEC,R-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

这,样,的,情,况,下,，,孩,子,对,自,己,的,家,，,自,己,的,父,母,不,太,适,应,而,拥,有,共,同,话,的,朋,友,多,接,触,。	C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,S-VV,S-VV,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,W-AD,W-VV,W-VV,C-PU

我,觉,得,吸,烟,是,一,个,很,不,好,的,习,惯,，,我,自,身,也,不,抽,烟,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,S-PN,S-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
总,而,言,之,，,我,们,自,己,来,管,理,自,己,的,健,康,，,与,此,同,时,，,总,是,想,办,法,解,决,饥,饿,问,题,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,R-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,认,为,在,公,共,场,所,上,边,走,边,抽,烟,就,是,小,孩,子,的,身,上,。,边,走,边,抽,烟,那,就,是,烟,头,正,处,于,小,孩,子,的,脸,上,。,而,且,很,多,这,些,吸,烟,者,常,常,会,突,然,拐,弯,和,回,头,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VC,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,R-DT,R-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
我,认,为,人,们,达,到,公,共,才,能,开,始,解,决,这,方,面,的,问,题,。,在,达,到,这,个,目,标,之,前,，,不,因,盲,目,的,提,高,生,活,水,平,，,而,是,应,该,把,人,们,最,基,本,的,生,存,问,题,解,决,好,，,这,才,是,上,策,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,S-AD,C-VA,C-VA,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
那,样,跟,她,一,起,过,几,天,了,，,我,的,嗓,子,开,始,痛,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,W-CD,W-M,W-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-PU
比,如,说,，,有,一,位,病,人,，,因,得,绝,症,，,每,天,痛,苦,不,堪,，,所,以,他,向,医,生,乞,求,，,给,他,几,粒,安,眠,药,，,帮,他,解,脱,痛,苦,（,即,安,乐,死,）,医,生,看,他,可,怜,，,终,于,答,应,了,他,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-PU

他,的,工,作,很,忙,，,一,直,去,外,地,单,身,赴,任,，,或,者,出,差,。,所,以,他,偶,尔,回,来,家,的,时,候,我,们,互,相,很,高,兴,。	C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,W-VV,W-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

另,外,，,对,于,小,一,辈,，,必,须,得,尊,重,老,一,辈,的,意,见,，,他,们,确,实,是,比,我,们,有,过,多,的,生,活,经,验,，,但,老,人,家,也,不,能,总,把,“,我,过,的,桥,比,你,走,的,路,多,”,那,类,话,搬,出,来,说,，,否,则,，,不,但,自,己,会,觉,得,太,老,了,，,年,轻,人,也,难,以,接,受,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-JJ,C-CD,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,S-AS,S-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-BA,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VA,C-PU,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

而,且,厦,门,是,比,上,海,南,，,气,温,高,。,我,决,定,了,就,去,火,车,售,票,处,买,到,厦,门,的,火,车,票,。,但,意,料,，,售,票,处,的,服,务,员,对,我,说,：,“,到,厦,门,？	C-AD,C-AD,C-NR,C-NR,S-VC,S-P,C-NR,C-NR,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,M-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU
我,们,小,时,候,还,有,没,所,谓,，,因,此,我,家,里,那,架,旧,收,音,机,就,会,为,我,们,毫,不,疲,劳,忙,个,不,停,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-CC,C-CC,C-VE,R-JJ,R-JJ,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DT,C-M,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

当,然,饥,饿,人,口,也,不,能,轻,视,，,我,觉,得,先,“,不,绿,”,的,产,品,也,生,产,而,确,保,这,些,人,的,需,要,，,然,后,在,全,世,界,政,府,国,家,的,帮,助,下,，,慢,慢,地,过,渡,到,绿,色,食,品,的,生,产,—,—,这,样,的,方,法,是,比,较,现,实,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,W-PU,W-AD,W-VA,W-PU,W-DEC,W-NN,W-NN,R-AD,W-VV,W-VV,S-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU

在,我,看,来,，,喜,欢,流,行,歌,曲,又,是,一,种,兴,趣,，,并,不,是,什,么,坏,事,。	C-P,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
如,果,有,很,多,对,吸,烟,的,措,施,的,话,，,至,少,吸,烟,者,的,吸,烟,机,会,不,多,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-VE,C-AD,C-JJ,R-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
我,觉,得,中,文,是,很,好,听,的,语,言,，,尤,其,歌,唱,起,来,非,常,很,好,听,的,歌,曲,同,时,国,语,处,处,可,通,用,跟,英,语,一,样,小,的,时,候,我,家,在,庙,附,近,，,我,跟,我,几,位,朋,友,时,常,到,庙,里,玩,亦,玩,得,很,有,兴,趣,，,又,有,善,良,的,拜,神,徒,会,拿,一,些,食,物,给,我,们,吃,，,庙,里,的,地,方,很,宽,，,我,们,到,处,跑,而,玩,累,后,又,有,的,拿,东,西,给,我,们,吃,。,同,时,我,跟,泰,国,朋,学,习,泰,文,，,因,我,父,母,不,懂,字,无,法,帮,助,我,的,学,习,，,只,好,自,己,求,学,没,环,境,学,经,验,语,言,方,面,。,如,今,我,已,成,长,各,种,方,面,语,言,、,学,问,、,经,验,能,够,在,这,社,会,脚,踏,实,地,，,替,社,会,作,一,些,善,事,。,回,想,我,童,年,时,候,我,们,玩,得,很,愉,快,不,像,今,代,小,孩,子,整,天,都,玩,电,脑,，,没,有,运,动,又,长,很,胖,，,疾,病,亦,很,多,，,今,代,的,生,活,，,都,要,花,很,多,钱,去,补,习,除,了,正,当,读,书,以,外,，,我,们,的,生,活,比,不,上,我,幼,年,的,幸,福,！	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,R-NN,R-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,R-AD,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,M-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-VV,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-AD,C-P,S-NT,S-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,M-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,S-NT,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

来,中,国,以,后,常,常,听,中,国,流,行,歌,曲,。,我,觉,得,通,过,流,行,歌,曲,可,以,知,道,中,国,人,的,现,代,想,法,是,怎,样,的,，,甚,至,可,以,了,解,中,国,的,文,化,、,社,会,。	C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,W-NR,W-NR,W-NN,W-DEG,W-JJ,W-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

所,以,我,们,能,轻,易,的,看,得,到,两,者,之,间,发,生,代,沟,而,吵,架,的,情,景,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,S-DEV,C-VV,C-DER,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

很,多,学,校,开,始,进,行,男,女,分,班,，,实,际,上,只,是,把,男,学,生,和,女,学,生,安,排,在,不,同,教,室,里,上,课,，,学,生,们,在,下,课,以,后,还,是,可,以,接,触,的,。	C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
“,代,沟,”,问,题,大,概,是,全,世,界,的,问,题,和,太,安,以,来,的,问,题,。,现,在,我,的,年,龄,二,十,五,岁,。,当,然,我,还,子,女,的,身,份,。	C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,S-AD,S-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

回,国,后,我,去,了,很,多,日,本,名,胜,古,迹,，,青,森,、,秋,田,、,长,崎,、,兵,库,等,，,对,我,来,说,，,一,个,假,期,里,从,来,没,有,去,过,那,么,多,地,方,，,过,得,很,愉,快,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PN,C-VV,M-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NR,C-NR,M-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
这,一,小,物,品,来,就,能,证,明,“,绿,色,食,品,”,重,要,性,。	C-DT,C-CD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
代,沟,在,我,来,講,不,成,问,题,，,因,为,我,很,幸,运,，,虽,在,单,亲,中,成,长,，,与,母,亲,相,依,为,命,，,直,到,我,本,人,也,有,了,三,个,孩,子,，,在,母,亲,，,孩,子,与,我,之,间,大,家,都,相,处,得,很,快,樂,，,没,有,过,很,大,的,冲,突,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-CS,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VE,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,S-VA,S-VA,C-PU,C-VE,C-VE,C-AS,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

一,是,为,了,提,高,汉,语,水,平,那,次,旅,游,是,很,好,的,。,二,是,为,了,了,解,中,国,文,化,那,次,旅,游,是,非,常,好,的,机,会,。,但,是,除,了,提,高,汉,语,水,平,、,了,解,中,国,文,化,以,外,，,去,中,国,旅,游,的,好,处,是,跟,中,国,人,的,交,流,。	C-CD,C-VC,S-P,S-P,W-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-DT,W-M,W-NN,W-NN,W-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,M-PU,C-CD,C-VC,S-P,S-P,W-VV,W-VV,W-NR,W-NR,W-NN,W-NN,W-DT,W-M,W-NN,W-NN,W-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,S-VC,M-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

如,果,我,周,围,的,人,想,要,安,乐,死,，,那,我,坚,持,地,反,对,。,我,想,跟,当,本,人,要,说,一,句,话,：,“,你,不,要,想,我,们,的,麻,烦,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-P,C-VV,S-PN,S-PN,R-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
所,以,，,从,生,理,与,心,理,角,度,看,，,青,少,年,分,班,是,不,科,学,又,不,遵,循,自,然,规,律,的,一,种,手,法,，,不,宜,鼓,吹,，,更,不,宜,实,行,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
再,说,，,对,其,吸,烟,的,人,本,身,来,说,，,也,有,很,多,不,良,的,影,响,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,R-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
如,果,各,种,的,原,因,失,去,了,父,母,的,孩,子,们,就,会,不,良,的,影,响,。,从,科,学,表,明,来,看,，,没,有,父,母,的,家,庭,孩,子,比,一,般,家,庭,有,些,差,点,儿,。,这,样,的,孩,子,们,失,去,了,父,母,的,同,时,，,失,去,最,重,要,的,老,师,。	C-CS,C-CS,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-AD,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-LC,R-LC,C-PU,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,R-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
对,我,来,说,吃,绿,色,食,品,和,不,绿,色,食,品,没,什,么,两,样,。	C-P,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,S-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
这,样,很,多,听,说,的,歌,星,虽,然,唱,得,极,差,还,是,能,造,出,的,比,较,好,听,的,歌,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-DER,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU
那,时,，,我,哭,地,一,句,话,都,说,不,出,来,了,。,可,我,现,在,想,：,我,朋,友,给,我,的,珍,贵,的,机,会,了,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,S-DEV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,M-PN,R-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-SP,C-PU

我,觉,得,不,好,的,人,里,也,有,很,聪,明,的,，,如,果,他,的,爱,人,是,个,财,产,家,，,也,可,能,他,让,他,的,爱,人,吃,毒,品,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEC,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VE,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-M,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

哪,个,父,母,不,愿,意,才,华,出,众,，,才,智,过,人,的,孩,子,呢,？,我,想,，,父,母,那,样,要,求,孩,子,之,前,，,一,定,要,从,孩,子,的,角,度,来,看,问,题,的,态,度,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,有,好,多,朋,友,们,，,也,包,括,我,和,我,的,太,太,，,就,是,在,这,种,团,体,生,活,中,，,渐,渐,地,从,一,起,工,作,的,过,程,，,培,养,起,一,种,互,相,欣,赏,而,又,能,够,互,相,容,忍,的,感,情,。	C-PN,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-CC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

其,二,是,，,分,班,教,学,并,不,可,以,有,效,的,避,免,学,生,早,恋,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

现,在,在,韩,国,在,街,道,上,或,在,公,共,场,所,，,很,不,受,欢,迎,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,S-CC,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
父,母,方,面,自,己,的,年,轻,时,代,理,解,孩,子,，,有,时,两,代,人,一,起,体,验,年,轻,人,或,长,年,人,的,文,化,，,这,样,解,决,问,题,值,得,推,荐,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

“,代,沟,”,这,两,个,字,是,近,几,年,出,现,的,新,造,语,，,意,思,是,说,两,代,人,（,父,母,与,子,女,）,之,间,在,行,为,方,式,、,生,活,态,度,以,及,价,值,观,念,等,方,面,存,在,的,差,异,。,那,么,，,这,“,代,沟,”,问,题,我,们,如,何,解,决,才,能,好,呢,？	C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-VV,S-VV,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-LC,C-LC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-DT,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,R-VV,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
我,高,兴,地,不,得,了,，,买,了,新,的,照,相,机,而,又,去,了,旅,行,。	C-PN,C-VA,C-VA,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-MSP,C-AD,C-VV,W-AS,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU

我,从,来,没,有,看,过,对,孩,子,关,心,这,么,大,的,人,。,您,是,很,坚,韧,的,人,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,S-AD,S-AD,S-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-AD,S-VA,S-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU

我,认,为,男,女,分,班,是,不,必,要,的,，,就,探,讨,男,女,分,班,普,遍,认,为,的,益,处,—,—,避,免,学,生,早,恋,，,认,为,将,子,女,与,异,性,隔,离,就,能,阻,止,早,恋,是,种,不,切,实,际,的,想,法,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NR,C-NR,M-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,为,抽,不,抽,烟,是,个,人,的,问,题,，,只,要,不,影,响,不,吸,烟,者,公,共,场,所,的,整,洁,的,话,不,过,分,的,吸,烟,应,该,是,没,什,么,大,问,题,的,。	C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
年,级,那,年,的,大,年,初,一,，,爷,爷,奶,奶,以,及,一,大,家,子,亲,朋,好,友,欢,聚,一,堂,。,晚,饭,过,后,，,家,人,坐,在,一,起,聊,起,了,家,事,，,我,一,个,小,孩,混,在,里,面,感,得,很,是,无,聊,，,于,是,，,我,自,己,跑,了,出,去,上,网,，,在,网,吧,里,和,一,群,年,龄,相,仿,的,同,学,玩,得,天,晕,地,暗,，,忘,记,了,时,间,，,把,自,己,的,亲,人,完,完,全,全,的,抛,在,了,脑,后,，,直,到,我,听,见,母,亲,的,叫,声,才,顿,时,明,白,自,己,已,在,网,吧,里,待,了,两,三,个,钟,头,了,。,下,楼,后,，,看,到,母,亲,因,为,惊,慌,而,失,去,血,色,的,脸,，,我,的,心,有,说,不,出,的,难,过,，,家,人,那,一,双,双,又,爱,又,恨,的,目,光,，,再,一,次,的,让,我,无,地,自,容,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-DER,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,R-AS,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-P,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DER,S-NN,S-VA,S-DEV,S-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-BA,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,M-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,S-DEG,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
没,想,到,，,新,来,的,人,来,参,加,我,们,组,，,竟,然,也,给,我,们,添,了,不,少,麻,烦,。,当,只,有,我,们,两,个,人,工,作,时,，,谈,话,做,事,已,经,情,合,意,投,了,，,不,用,太,多,时,间,浪,费,在,解,释,，,工,作,就,可,以,很,顺,利,和,快,捷,的,操,作,。,因,此,刚,三,个,人,一,起,工,作,时,我,们,之,间,出,现,了,很,多,矛,盾,、,争,论,。	C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-AD,C-VE,C-PN,C-PN,C-CD,C-M,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,S-NN,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-AD,W-JJ,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,W-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,C-VA,C-VA,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,W-AD,W-CD,W-M,W-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PN,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,种,的,看,法,很,危,险,，,是,一,种,个,人,主,义,的,想,法,。	C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

因,为,对,人,类,来,说,，,环,境,是,最,重,要,的,，,而,且,由,于,不,断,地,努,力,继,续,发,明,了,环,境,亲,化,的,农,业,法,。,这,终,于,可,能,会,解,决,人,类,的,食,粮,问,题,。	C-P,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-AD,C-AD,R-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
吸,烟,不,但,是,个,人,的,问,题,已,成,了,引,人,关,注,的,话,题,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
人,还,是,以,生,命,为,本,，,给,多,些,人,带,来,粮,食,，,把,那,些,挨,饿,的,人,从,困,境,中,救,出,来,我,们,的,首,先,任,务,。,我,赞,同,生,产,绿,色,食,品,而,对,人,类,带,来,更,好,健,康,生,活,，,不,过,更,赞,同,帮,把,生,存,在,地,球,的,更,多,饥,饿,着,人,类,让,他,们,一,起,享,受,美,妙,的,生,活,，,发,达,国,家,应,以,自,己,发,展,的,高,科,技,来,生,产,的,粮,食,给,未,发,达,国,家,的,人,们,提,供,。,不,管,是,生,活,在,什,么,地,方,，,我,们,都,有,权,享,受,穿,吃,住,的,。	C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,S-AD,S-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-BA,C-DT,C-DT,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-AD,S-AD,S-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-P,S-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-BA,S-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-AD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,M-CS,C-CS,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-VV,M-SP,C-PU
如,果,粗,心,的,父,母,没,有,适,当,的,教,育,孩,子,，,也,许,孩,子,会,犯,错,，,父,母,没,有,予,以,及,时,的,纠,正,，,任,其,发,展,，,孩,子,也,就,像,树,苗,一,样,会,长,歪,，,甚,至,折,断,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-PU,M-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
就,是,七,十,年,代,以,后,，,在,美,国,，,欧,洲,及,日,本,等,发,达,国,家,提,出,的,。,这,告,诉,我,们,很,重,要,的,一,点,，,发,达,国,家,的,国,民,到,七,十,年,代,得,到,经,济,发,展,，,完,全,解,决,吃,饭,的,问,题,，,然,后,他,们,可,能,了,关,注,思,想,，,健,康,、,环,境,等,问,题,。,他,们,之,所,以,感,到,“,绿,色,食,品,”,需,要,，,就,是,因,为,现,在,没,有,吃,饭,的,问,题,，,不,是,因,为,他,们,忘,掉,了,没,有,吃,的,东,西,的,痛,苦,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,R-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-CC,C-NR,C-NR,C-ETC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,在,遇,到,困,难,的,时,候,，,总,是,认,为,“,这,是,我,的,命,运,”,，,并,尽,量,有,向,前,走,的,观,念,。	C-PN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
其,实,，,父,母,教,孩,子,比,学,校,更,重,要,的,事,。,虽,然,老,师,也,教,孩,子,，,但,是,他,们,只,教,孩,子,怎,么,读,书,，,从,来,没,教,孩,子,其,他,的,生,活,方,面,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,W-DT,W-DT,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
“,有,效,阅,读,”,，,首,先,得,选,择,你,所,需,要,的,书,籍,，,这,书,籍,可,能,与,你,的,工,作,有,关,或,与,你,的,兴,趣,有,关,。,带,着,问,题,看,书,，,你,就,会,收,到,事,倍,功,半,的,效,果,。	C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
但,是,，,到,了,产,生,了,中,产,阶,级,的,时,候,，,社,会,的,价,值,就,开,始,改,变,了,。,一,般,的,平,民,和,他,们,的,姐,妹,们,都,开,始,要,求,政,府,提,供,“,普,遍,教,育,”,。,在,英,国,和,中,国,２,０,世,纪,初,期,时,有,些,“,改,进,社,会,”,的,组,织,推,动,贫,穷,的,男,生,和,所,有,的,女,生,去,上,学,。,不,过,，,在,英,国,社,会,还,是,不,接,受,男,女,平,等,，,所,以,女,生,和,男,生,的,学,校,是,分,开,的,。,所,谓,教,育,专,家,主,张,，,要,是,男,女,一,起,上,学,，,他,们,都,不,会,认,真,上,课,，,而,会,在,课,堂,上,谈,恋,爱,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,R-VV,R-VV,R-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-CC,C-NR,C-NR,C-OD,C-OD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-M,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,R-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
其,次,，,公,众,利,益,的,影,响,也,很,大,。,现,在,大,部,分,的,地,区,实,行,公,共,场,所,和,路,上,边,走,边,抽,烟,的,人,将,被,罚,款,，,其,他,的,方,面,也,是,这,样,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-SB,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
我,本,人,是,在,混,合,式,教,育,里,长,大,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VC,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU
对,个,人,来,说,，,只,要,你,抽,几,根,烟,，,就,是,等,于,你,喝,了,二,瓶,毒,水,。,这,不,仅,在,身,体,，,而,且,对,精,神,上,也,有,很,大,的,影,响,。,因,为,这,会,导,致,没,有,烟,不,可,生,活,下,去,的,后,果,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-AD,C-VE,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,常,常,听,到,抽,烟,的,人,的,主,张,。,他,们,也,明,明,白,白,知,道,吸,烟,及,身,体,的,严,重,影,响,。,他,们,的,主,要,意,思,是,，,吸,烟,是,自,己,酿,成,的,习,惯,，,对,自,己,的,身,体,自,己,可,以,负,责,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

不,过,更,重,要,的,是,不,但,影,响,自,己,的,身,体,，,而,且,抽,烟,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VC,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-VV,R-VV,C-PU

比,如,说,，,我,以,前,跟,我,的,父,亲,有,很,大,的,问,题,，,但,是,我,深,思,熟,虑,以,后,跟,父,亲,相,量,我,们,的,事,，,意,外,父,亲,了,解,我,以,后,认,真,帮,助,我,。,那,个,事,情,发,生,以,后,我,有,问,题,的,话,，,先,去,找,我,的,父,亲,以,后,解,决,我,的,问,题,。,再,说,如,果,有,的,人,有,问,题,跟,他,的,父,母,先,应,该,相,量,和,父,母,，,我,不,知,道,什,么,样,的,决,结,出,来,但,是,慢,慢,地,等,着,好,的,决,结,的,话,，,不,知,不,觉,和,他,的,父,母,的,问,题,没,有,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,M-NN,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-PN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-AD,R-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,W-VE,W-NN,W-NN,W-P,W-PN,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,W-AD,W-VV,W-VV,S-AD,S-VV,W-CC,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,W-JJ,W-JJ,W-JJ,W-DEG,W-NN,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-AS,C-VA,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,M-PU

他,们,只,意,给,自,己,挑,水,喝,，,但,是,若,有,人,去,替,自,己,干,，,我,们,就,不,必,受,“,累,”,了,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,S-PN,S-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-PU,C-SP,C-PU

我,喜,欢,流,行,歌,曲,，,我,喜,欢,有,选,择,的,流,行,歌,曲,，,现,下,有,些,绕,舌,念,唱,的,歌,曲,，,节,奏,快,，,咬,字,含,糊,不,清,，,歌,词,内,容,白,话,到,没,有,内,容,了,，,这,样,流,行,歌,曲,我,較,不,能,接,受,。,通,常,流,行,歌,曲,反,应,了,当,时,的,社,会,面,，,所,以,容,易,在,那,一,时,空,广,泛,传,开,，,我,喜,欢,歌,词,有,意,境,，,旋,律,动,人,的,歌,曲,，,我,也,会,偏,爱,几,位,歌,者,的,歌,曲,，,如,蔡,琴,、,费,玉,清,、,张,信,哲,、,刀,郎,的,歌,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-DT,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,S-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NR,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU

其,次,，,影,响,不,是,食,物,上,。,如,果,使,用,农,药,的,话,，,一,部,分,农,药,一,定,渗,入,土,地,的,深,部,分,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VC,M-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
很,多,年,青,人,只,听,流,行,歌,曲,，,而,拜,其,它,形,式,的,歌,曲,一,律,定,为,不,“,酷,”,的,，,因,而,认,识,不,到,古,典,音,乐,的,奥,妙,和,民,间,歌,曲,的,快,感,。,反,过,来,，,相,当,一,部,分,的,中,年,人,和,老,人,因,为,藐,视,流,行,歌,曲,，,错,过,了,进,一,步,了,解,青,年,的,一,个,良,好,方,法,。,我,个,人,的,看,法,是,人,人,应,该,多,听,多,种,音,乐,，,这,样,你,才,会,在,真,真,的,义,意,上,了,解,你,个,人,所,喜,欢,的,音,乐,是,什,么,。	C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,S-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-VA,S-VA,C-DEC,S-NN,S-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU
他,的,这,种,说,法,引,起,了,反,感,。,但,妈,妈,跟,爸,爸,不,一,样,，,她,也,常,常,和,我,谈,话,，,而,告,诉,我,为,什,么,爸,爸,生,气,了,。	C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU

您,您,好,！	C-PN,S-VV,C-VV,C-PU
应,为,，,病,人,的,状,态,特,别,坏,，,而,且,有,痛,苦,的,话,，,过,一,天,也,很,辛,苦,。,那,个,病,不,治,之,症,的,话,，,对,家,人,很,多,负,担,。	S-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,S-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,想,有,几,种,方,法,。	S-PN,C-VV,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

百,闻,不,如,一,见,，,亲,眼,看,到,的,敦,煌,，,远,远,超,越,我,的,想,像,，,真,让,人,感,到,游,在,梦,乡,的,感,觉,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

为,了,解,决,那,个,难,题,，,各,国,家,的,政,府,及,有,关,部,门,已,经,采,取,很,多,措,拖,。,例,如,：,规,定,吸,烟,人,的,年,龄,，,在,人,口,密,集,的,商,业,中,心,不,许,吸,烟,，,提,高,大,家,对,吸,烟,的,知,识,。	C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
以,后,有,一,个,和,尚,打,主,意,那,就,是,每,个,人,都,去,自,己,挑,水,喝,的,办,法,。,但,是,毕,竟,每,个,人,的,心,里,都,让,别,人,抬,水,，,谁,也,不,同,意,这,个,意,见,。,然,后,原,来,在,庙,里,住,的,和,尚,说,“,我,从,一,直,住,在,这,个,庙,里,。	S-AD,S-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,R-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,此,本,人,相,信,自,己,在,贵,公,司,中,不,会,造,成,任,何,人,事,问,题,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
有,一,个,人,是,非,法,的,医,生,，,他,技,术,也,非,常,高,明,，,但,就,是,爱,钱,如,命,，,常,常,给,一,些,人,治,病,时,，,明,明,可,治,的,诚,心,不,治,，,而,让,他,们,家,人,选,择,“,安,乐,死,”,之,路,，,得,利,益,。	C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

总,之,，,人,在,挫,折,中,，,应,好,好,考,虑,，,不,仅,为,本,身,着,想,还,应,为,别,人,、,为,社,会,着,想,。,当,一,个,成,功,人,已,难,，,当,一,个,强,者,更,难,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-P,S-PN,S-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-NN,S-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
可,我,自,己,认,为,，,就,我,本,身,的,性,格,和,爱,好,，,我,非,常,喜,欢,旧,时,和,现,代,的,流,行,歌,曲,，,但,不,是,一,般,年,青,人,喜,欢,吵,杂,的,乐,器,而,是,比,较,柔,情,的,曲,。	C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-CC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU
就,是,说,，,能,活,还,是,只,能,死,亡,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VC,R-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
。,每,天,只,有,四,十,分,就,够,了,。,这,个,四,十,分,内,你,能,找,到,你,的,身,体,健,康,。	C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,S-VE,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,M-DT,C-DT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-LC,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
现,在,许,多,犯,罪,的,年,龄,年,轻,化,现,象,，,这,是,由,于,父,母,都,日,出,而,作,，,日,落,而,息,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-CD,C-CD,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,M-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

此,后,我,决,定,将,去,中,国,留,学,，,在,中,国,交,很,多,朋,友,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
