第,二,，,孩,子,单,一,性,别,的,相,处,，,也,造,成,日,后,他,们,不,晓,得,如,何,与,异,性,相,处,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU

本,人,的,姓,名,是,×,×,×,，,今,年,二,十,九,岁,，,六,年,前,从,著,名,的,狮,岛,大,学,旅,游,系,毕,业,后,招,揽,入,旅,游,局,工,作,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

如,果,还,有,机,会,的,话,，,我,一,定,在,再,拜,访,闻,名,的,黄,金,海,岸,，,以,及,不,要,乱,乘,一,个,航,空,，,可,要,一,个,信,赖,的,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,R-P,C-NN,S-NN,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,M-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
但,是,我,爸,不,管,我,，,继,续,钓,鱼,了,。,那,时,候,我,一,直,看,了,他,的,勇,敢,的,样,子,。,以,后,我,也,喜,欢,上,钓,鱼,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-SP,C-PU,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-AS,C-PN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU

念,完,了,大,学,后,，,我,便,往,娱,乐,主,播,这,方,面,发,展,，,常,常,和,观,众,打,交,道,，,所,以,非,常,了,解,人,民,的,思,想,和,需,求,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

在,很,忙,碌,的,生,活,当,中,，,我,们,受,着,很,多,的,压,力,。,学,生,是,因,为,学,习,，,大,人,而,因,为,工,作,苦,恼,。	C-P,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,S-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,W-MSP,W-P,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
沟,通,是,解,决,“,代,沟,”,的,重,要,步,骤,，,通,过,沟,通,，,你,能,够,了,解,孩,子,的,想,法,，,知,道,他,们,喜,欢,哪,一,种,谈,话,方,式,，,当,孩,子,们,发,现,父,母,们,跟,他,们,有,共,同,语,言,时,，,才,会,向,你,们,吐,露,心,事,，,这,样,你,对,孩,子,今,后,的,教,育,才,能,有,帮,助,。,与,些,同,时,，,你,也,要,将,你,的,想,法,和,要,求,用,讨,论,的,方,式,告,诉,孩,子,，,大,家,一,起,来,讨,论,，,最,后,共,同,做,出,决,定,，,双,方,必,遵,守,此,决,定,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-BA,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
吸,烟,害,于,个,人,的,健,康,。,为,人,所,知,，,人,吸,烟,时,所,呼,吸,的,烟,是,各,种,疾,病,尤,其,是,和,气,管,、,肺,有,关,的,疾,病,的,主,要,原,因,。,据,说,，,吸,烟,的,人,和,他,的,家,人,得,那,种,疾,病,的,频,率,远,远,高,于,不,吸,烟,的,人,和,他,的,家,人,。	C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VC,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-CC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-CC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
由,于,现,在,科,技,的,发,达,电,脑,已,成,为,了,在,各,式,设,计,上,不,可,少,的,工,具,。	R-P,R-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
或,许,有,人,会,认,为,，,男,女,分,班,可,以,避,免,一,些,尴,尬,的,场,面,发,生,，,如,女,欲,从,书,包,中,拿,取,卫,生,棉,时,较,方,便,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

流,行,歌,曲,的,作,词,家,经,常,作,词,时,，,经,常,写,关,于,爱,情,的,，,比,如,有,一,个,人,喜,欢,某,个,人,，,但,他,却,没,有,勇,气,向,她,表,白,，,谈,恋,爱,过,程,中,的,幸,福,，,一,对,恋,人,分,手,后,的,感,觉,什,么,的,我,平,时,听,某,首,歌,，,无,动,于,衷,，,就,喜,欢,歌,手,的,声,音,，,不,过,要,是,我,真,正,遇,到,了,像,歌,词,一,样,情,况,，,眼,泪,就,没,多,久,出,来,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,R-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VC,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU

现,在,“,绿,色,食,品,”,是,世,界,上,很,普,及,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
再,次,，,在,公,共,场,所,设,的,无,烟,地,区,的,措,施,是,已,经,在,发,达,国,家,很,普,遍,的,现,象,。,这,措,施,受,到,公,民,的,支,持,和,欢,迎,。,我,认,为,为,了,成,功,地,举,办,２,０,０,８,年,北,京,奥,林,匹,克,运,动,会,，,政,府,一,定,要,提,倡,人,民,的,文,化,素,质,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,W-VC,W-AD,W-AD,W-P,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,M-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

有,可,能,到,人,生,也,有,很,大,影,响,，,是,因,为,在,爱,好,里,能,交,很,多,的,朋,友,。	C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-AD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-VC,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

总,之,，,现,在,公,共,场,所,内,不,允,许,吸,烟,是,有,道,理,的,现,象,。,我,们,为,了,自,己,和,公,众,的,健,康,遵,守,公,众,规,规,则,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

他,们,的,思,路,还,不,太,成,熟,，,能,够,接,受,所,有,的,事,情,，,很,快,地,增,长,知,识,。,所,以,人,很,小,的,时,候,的,老,师,会,有,最,深,的,影,响,，,很,小,的,时,候,的,老,师,就,是,父,母,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VE,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
第,二,个,利,益,是,朋,友,。,当,时,的,学,生,仍,然,是,我,的,很,好,的,朋,友,，,有,时,候,他,们,来,找,我,，,互,相,得,了,很,多,利,益,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-M,S-NN,S-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,M-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU

这,就,说,明,人,不,是,个,体,的,而,是,全,为,主,体,。,那,怎,解,决,人,与,人,之,间,的,分,工,问,题,呢,？	C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-CC,C-VC,M-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
例,如,，,烟,民,为,了,自,己,心,里,轻,松,吸,烟,，,但,被,吸,烟,者,吸,引,的,烟,雾,比,吸,烟,者,吸,引,的,对,身,体,更,不,好,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,S-LB,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

一,个,吸,了,烟,会,引,起,了,很,多,病,。	C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

吸,烟,会,提,高,肺,癌,的,致,病,率,、,心,脏,病,的,发,生,率,，,而,且,会,损,害,大,脑,系,统,，,尤,其,是,对,在,于,成,长,期,的,青,少,年,来,说,，,其,危,害,更,加,大,了,。,另,外,，,吸,烟,对,皮,肤,美,容,给,负,面,影,响,，,爱,美,的,妇,女,们,也,不,应,该,吸,烟,的,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
最,近,，,我,工,作,的,战,争,纪,念,馆,，,因,为,人,家,接,了,休,假,节,，,劳,动,节,，,像,话,节,等,等,，,所,以,很,多,旅,游,客,来,到,那,儿,很,热,闹,，,中,国,人,也,很,多,，,所,以,我,最,近,比,较,忙,一,些,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU

中,国,的,学,校,现,在,开,始,走,向,男,女,分,班,的,潮,流,，,单,一,单,性,学,校,的,数,目,也,在,增,长,，,许,多,家,长,认,为,这,样,能,避,免,学,生,早,恋,，,可,是,他,们,却,没,有,意,认,到,男,女,之,间,的,交,流,是,必,须,的,。	C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,有,经,验,。	C-PN,C-VE,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
—,上,海,及,江,南,一,带,观,光,旅,游,。	C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-CC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU
第,二,是,，,有,的,家,长,说,男,女,分,班,可,以,避,免,学,生,早,恋,，,但,我,想,这,种,看,法,真,可,笑,。,因,为,我,觉,得,男,女,之,间,的,恋,爱,完,全,是,自,由,的,，,有,什,么,权,利,父,母,不,让,孩,子,谈,恋,爱,呢,？	C-OD,C-OD,C-VC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,W-VE,W-DT,W-DT,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU

我,们,为,什,么,要,增,加,农,作,物,的,产,生,量,？,都,是,为,了,让,人,们,免,于,饿,死,的,危,险,。,但,是,吃,这,样,的,农,产,品,，,虽,然,看,起,来,没,有,饿,死,的,危,险,，,但,是,可,能,有,因,为,化,肥,和,农,药,会,有,害,于,人,的,健,康,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,W-VE,W-P,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-CC,W-NN,W-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
患,者,是,忍,受,着,病,魔,的,侵,害,，,而,他,的,家,人,呢,更,是,受,着,精,神,方,面,的,痛,苦,，,如,果,这,样,的,话,只,有,“,安,乐,死,”,才,能,让,他,们,得,到,安,稳,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

首,先,，,吸,烟,的,话,对,身,体,带,来,不,好,的,影,响,，,特,别,要,强,调,的,是,怀,孕,的,时,候,吸,烟,的,话,对,孩,子,带,来,很,严,重,的,结,果,，,比,如,残,疾,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,R-NN,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

流,行,歌,曲,有,着,非,常,多,的,听,众,这,是,不,争,的,事,实,，,各,个,行,业,、,各,种,年,龄,阶,、,各,种,阶,层,都,有,广,大,的,听,众,，,也,一,直,陪,伴,我,度,过,不,同,的,岁,月,，,也,为,我,增,加,了,不,少,的,欢,笑,，,当,我,听,到,当,年,的,歌,曲,思,绪,久,久,不,能,抚,平,，,毕,竟,有,太,多,的,往,事,是,值,得,回,忆,的,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-AD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
他,们,不,像,过,去,的,青,少,年,那,样,得,到,父,母,的,认,可,，,他,们,很,少,再,与,大,人,们,探,讨,友,谊,和,恋,情,之,间,的,区,别,，,因,为,他,们,认,为,大,人,们,几,乎,不,会,了,解,和,支,持,他,们,的,异,性,交,往,活,动,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

最,近,，,在,日,本,谈,论,起,来,这,个,“,副,流,烟,”,的,问,题,。,如,一,个,人,吸,烟,，,那,股,烟,里,面,含,有,很,多,有,害,物,质,，,所,以,周,围,的,人,不,知,不,觉,吸,引,这,种,有,害,物,质,，,很,可,能,发,生,身,体,上,的,问,题,。,特,别,是,对,婴,儿,、,小,孩,儿,、,老,人,、,孕,妇,的,影,响,大,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-PU,S-JJ,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-VA,C-PU

１,．,吸,烟,对,吸,烟,者,的,身,体,有,很,大,的,健,康,。,据,说,，,肺,癌,症,的,发,生,率,是,爱,吸,烟,者,比,不,吸,烟,者,的,多,几,十,倍,，,特,别,是,每,天,抽,二,十,支,以,上,烟,的,人,，,严,重,损,害,身,体,的,健,康,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-VC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-LC,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,认,为,爱,，,不,管,媒,妁,之,言,，,自,由,恋,爱,，,还,是,无,心,插,柳,的,情,，,都,必,须,付,出,真,心,真,意,，,宁,可,自,己,吃,亏,，,也,不,在,意,让,爱,有,所,损,伤,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-VA,C-VA,C-VV,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,种,层,面,确,实,存,在,：,我,爸,爸,对,篮,球,的,热,爱,毫,无,疑,问,地,渗,透,了,我,自,己,的,思,想,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

吸,烟,对,人,体,健,康,和,公,众,利,益,的,影,响,是,很,大,的,，,首,先,讨,论,对,人,体,健,康,的,问,题,，,根,据,医,学,统,计,已,知,道,烟,对,各,种,器,官,有,影,响,，,特,别,是,与,呼,吸,有,关,的,器,官,，,如,口,腔,、,咽,、,气,管,、,肺,等,，,吸,烟,者,的,这,些,器,官,的,患,病,率,明,显,比,非,吸,烟,者,高,。,而,且,对,吸,烟,者,的,周,围,的,人,也,有,一,定,的,影,响,。,所,以,今,年,来,在,某,市,政,府,出,台,的,规,定,也,是,很,自,然,的,现,象,，,因,为,吸,烟,的,害,不,仅,是,上,述,所,提,出,的,对,人,体,的,影,响,外,它,还,有,很,多,的,危,害,因,素,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-ETC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-NT,S-NT,C-LC,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

你,想,想,，,喜,欢,听,流,行,歌,曲,人,大,多,数,是,青,少,年,，,可,最,近,的,流,行,歌,曲,中,有,很,多,不,良,，,让,听,曲,人,觉,得,很,不,好,意,思,的,内,容,，,唱,歌,的,歌,手,都,要,穿,着,太,色,情,的,衣,服,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,S-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

依,我,看,，,不,论,是,现,代,或,何,代,吸,烟,者,依,然,存,在,，,况,且,不,可,能,消,失,，,因,此,我,们,只,能,使,用,符,合,吸,烟,者,的,行,为,来,对,待,他,们,。	C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-CC,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU

就,以,自,我,为,例,，,母,亲,从,胎,儿,期,间,灌,輸,的,音,乐,欣,赏,，,父,亲,在,我,孩,童,时,鼓,励,的,阅,读,习,惯,等,都,间,接,地,栽,培,了,我,的,文,化,修,养,。	C-AD,C-P,S-PN,S-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,S-NN,S-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,M-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,主,要,说,的,是,这,样,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,W-VV,W-DEC,W-VC,W-VA,W-VA,C-PU
到,南,京,时,，,马,上,感,觉,舒,服,，,因,为,人,比,上,海,少,，,路,比,较,宽,，,绿,化,可,见,已,经,成,功,。	C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

世,界,上,许,多,人,在,公,共,场,所,抽,烟,，,甚,至,有,人,边,走,边,抽,烟,的,行,为,。,大,家,都,知,道,吸,烟,对,人,的,健,康,有,很,大,的,损,失,，,烟,卷,里,含,有,尼,古,丁,等,很,多,不,利,于,身,体,的,成,分,，,它,使,人,的,大,脑,、,神,经,系,统,、,细,等,严,重,的,破,坏,，,影,响,人,类,的,寿,命,人,人,类,的,健,康,。,这,个,不,是,吸,烟,者,一,个,人,的,问,题,，,他,们,的,吸,烟,还,影,响,着,非,吸,烟,者,的,健,康,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,M-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,R-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VA,C-ETC,C-VA,M-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
有,些,老,人,对,流,行,歌,曲,有,反,感,，,尤,其,是,很,快,很,吵,的,那,种,，,可,我,却,得,不,同,的,歌,类,适,合,不,同,的,清,况,，,当,我,运,动,的,时,候,，,听,些,又,快,又,吵,的,歌,曲,使,我,觉,得,十,分,有,精,神,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,M-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

为,了,解,决,这,问,题,，,我,想,必,须,要,丈,夫,的,协,力,，,比,如,丈,夫,在,家,庭,中,的,帮,助,、,在,她,的,精,神,方,面,的,照,顾,等,。	C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-PU
我,一,开,始,犹,沉,静,一,下,，,后,来,我,下,定,决,心,到,北,京,留,学,。,我,对,汉,语,有,极,大,兴,趣,，,并,且,我,发,现,在,学,汉,语,的,过,程,中,越,来,越,有,意,思,。,我,刚,到,北,京,的,时,，,印,尼,人,特,别,少,。,由,此,我,汉,语,进,步,得,快,。,过,了,两,年,因,为,印,尼,发,生,动,乱,，,所,以,从,印,尼,来,的,留,学,生,日,益,增,多,，,有,的,因,为,想,暂,时,离,开,印,尼,，,有,的,人,不,仅,认,为,中,国,的,经,济,发,展,不,断,增,强,，,所,以,人,们,学,汉,语,是,为,了,同,中,国,进,行,贸,易,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-AD,C-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-PN,W-VV,W-VV,W-P,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,W-DEC,W-NN,W-NN,W-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,R-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DER,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-P,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,R-NN,R-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

因,为,当,时,正,好,在,媒,体,上,经,常,接,触,这,件,事,。	C-P,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,R-AD,R-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-PU
我,看,我,家,来,说,吧,。	C-PN,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-SP,C-PU

第,二,，,这,两,个,农,作,物,都,是,由,人,造,成,的,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-DT,C-CD,S-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-SP,C-PU
一,直,以,来,都,有,着,非,常,严,格,的,罚,款,条,例,而,成,功,的,保,持,市,容,美,观,整,洁,。	M-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,S-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
其,实,，,虽,然,我,有,两,个,父,亲,，,但,是,我,到,三,岁,养,的,父,亲,呢,，,我,没,有,记,忆,就,会,说,，,没,有,见,过,他,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,M-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-PU

买,绿,色,食,品,的,人,肯,定,有,一,些,经,济,上,的,稳,定,而,能,吃,的,，,所,以,在,绿,色,食,品,上,附,加,税,之,后,，,这,税,来,援,助,面,临,挨,饿,的,人,们,。,这,样,一,来,，,有,钱,人,一,边,能,吃,绿,色,食,品,、,不,担,心,自,己,的,健,康,，,一,边,能,帮,助,挨,饿,的,人,。,这,并,不,意,味,着,有,钱,人,能,顾,健,康,，,挨,饿,的,人,不,能,顾,健,康,。,现,代,的,市,场,规,模,非,常,大,，,所,以,每,个,产,品,需,要,产,出,与,众,不,同,的,产,品,，,绿,色,食,品,也,是,这,样,一,来,生,产,产,生,的,的,。,而,选,的,是,应,该,消,费,者,。	C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-MSP,C-VV,M-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,M-DT,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,W-AD,W-AD,W-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,R-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-DEC,R-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,W-VV,R-DEC,W-VC,W-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU

每,天,想,家,了,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,R-SP,C-PU

回,到,家,里,我,就,开,始,废,寝,忘,食,地,看,着,，,这,本,书,的,内,容,实,在,是,令,我,爱,不,释,手,得,把,它,看,完,，,故,事,的,情,节,，,是,多,么,地,伤,感,，,一,个,小,小,年,纪,的,孩,子,，,应,该,是,在,父,母,怀,中,的,宝,贝,，,但,她,却,是,个,孤,儿,在,没,有,温,暖,之,下,长,大,的,孩,子,，,原,来,是,那,么,地,坚,强,和,懂,事,，,经,历,了,那,么,多,的,挫,折,，,也,能,够,自,己,完,成,学,业,并,和,帮,助,穷,苦,中,的,孩,子,，,其,实,这,本,书,的,内,容,不,是,写,得,出,色,，,但,这,本,书,的,作,者,却,是,一,个,非,常,了,不,起,的,人,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DER,M-BA,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-DT,W-M,W-NN,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,W-AD,W-VC,C-VV,C-DER,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,S-AD,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU

我,从,小,就,很,喜,欢,流,行,歌,曲,让,我,来,谈,谈,对,于,流,行,歌,曲,兴,趣,开,始,吧,。,首,先,我,很,喜,欢,听,我,大,姐,和,二,姐,唱,流,行,歌,，,姐,姐,喜,欢,教,我,唱,歌,，,所,以,我,从,小,就,很,喜,欢,唱,歌,，,一,直,到,我,青,年,的,时,候,流,行,歌,曲,它,会,带,给,人,一,种,很,享,受,的,娱,乐,，,原,因,是,无,论,它,的,歌,曲,或,者,音,乐,都,能,使,人,精,神,爽,快,在,柔,美,的,歌,声,里,让,人,忘,记,了,烦,恼,和,生,活,的,精,神,压,力,我,不,只,是,喜,欢,听,我,也,喜,欢,唱,呢,！,有,一,段,很,长,的,时,间,里,我,还,时,常,夜,总,会,去,听,听,歌,偶,尔,也,会,上,台,献,歌,呢,！	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,R-VV,R-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-P,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU

有,句,话,叫,“,有,其,父,故,有,其,子,”,，,我,很,赞,同,这,一,句,话,。,一,个,孩,子,如,果,他,父,母,是,个,读,书,人,，,有,文,化,，,有,思,想,，,有,很,多,爱,好,，,喜,欢,看,书,，,家,里,藏,着,很,多,书,，,那,么,成,长,在,这,样,的,家,庭,的,孩,子,就,会,受,他,父,母,的,影,响,，,这,孩,子,多,半,也,会,喜,欢,看,书,，,读,各,种,各,样,的,书,，,长,大,后,肯,定,也,是,个,读,书,人,。	C-VE,C-M,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,C-VE,C-PN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,对,于,流,行,歌,曲,的,看,法,是,很,平,常,的,，,我,不,会,它,是,流,行,歌,曲,我,就,喜,欢,，,最,主,要,的,是,好,听,，,容,易,唱,，,而,且,悦,耳,，,我,也,不,会,因,为,它,是,有,名,的,歌,星,唱,而,喜,欢,这,首,歌,。	C-PN,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,M-PN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VC,C-VE,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-PU
老,师,是,在,上,课,的,时,候,教,育,孩,子,就,可,以,了,。	C-NN,C-NN,R-VC,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
只,这,样,说,：,“,你,这,样,做,的,不,是,那,么,不,好,的,事,，,可,是,你,应,该,记,住,你,是,学,生,，,学,习,是,不,能,忽,视,的,东,西,，,每,天,都,学,习,最,少,一,、,两,个,小,时,。	M-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-JJ,C-CD,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

一,般,来,说,，,很,多,人,都,知,道,杂,音,对,人,体,的,危,害,很,大,，,它,们,给,人,们,很,大,的,影,响,。,按,照,这,个,原,理,来,说,，,我,们,容,易,以,为,静,音,环,境,没,有,对,人,体,的,危,害,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU

他,以,前,要,天,天,挑,水,，,现,在,他,的,负,担,会,减,至,原,来,的,二,分,之,一,，,三,分,之,一,（,其,他,两,个,人,的,负,担,就,增,加,了,）,，,还,不,愿,意,去,挑,水,。	C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-CD,C-M,C-M,C-M,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-PU,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
但,我,一,考,虑,“,安,乐,死,”,就,要,勉,强,地,赞,成,。,如,果,明,知,道,自,己,的,亲,人,以,后,一,点,儿,也,没,有,希,望,治,好,，,十,分,痛,苦,的,情,况,下,，,谁,愿,意,让,他,一,直,受,苦,呢,？,之,所,以,我,赞,成,安,乐,死,，,是,因,为,爱,他,，,为,了,解,脱,他,和,我,们,的,痛,苦,。	C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-VE,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,W-VV,M-PU,M-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
在,这,个,世,界,上,出,现,能,够,解,决,这,两,个,方,面,的,问,题,之,前,，,由,于,食,粮,不,足,而,饿,死,的,人,岂,不,是,无,辜,的,吗,？	C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-SP,C-PU
母,亲,一,直,对,他,人,很,诚,实,，,孩,子,也,一,定,做,到,老,实,的,人,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,R-DEC,R-NN,C-PU
总,的,来,说,，,我,主,张,一,定,要,吃,“,绿,色,食,品,”,而,保,护,环,境,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

别,人,的,兴,趣,爱,好,，,思,想,观,念,，,行,为,举,止,，,无,一,不,是,从,幼,年,就,开,始,在,孩,子,心,目,中,打,下,深,深,的,烙,印,—,—,这,么,一,说,是,有,直,理,的,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-CD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VC,C-VE,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU
如,果,两,人,是,从,小,一,起,长,大,的,玩,伴,，,两,人,早,已,互,相,了,解,，,就,如,脾,气,好,不,好,，,在,平,日,行,为,中,也,可,知,道,；,有,些,人,平,日,不,修,边,幅,，,屋,子,也,不,整,理,，,整,间,屋,子,乱,糟,糟,的,，,但,如,果,带,个,女,朋,友,或,男,朋,友,回,来,，,一,定,会,先,把,屋,子,打,扫,干,净,，,那,又,怎,么,知,道,他,的,本,来,面,目,呢,！,如,果,两,人,是,从,小,一,起,长,大,的,玩,伴,，,那,一,定,常,到,他,家,去,，,也,就,比,较,了,解,的,生,活,习,惯,。,就,算,不,能,完,全,改,变,他,的,习,惯,，,也,许,看,惯,了,也,不,会,太,介,意,了,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-CD,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,M-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-CD,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,M-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
但,人,们,要,知,道,人,不,能,靠,一,个,人,活,下,去,，,我,们,毕,竟,生,存,在,一,个,集,团,社,会,，,我,们,应,要,关,心,其,他,人,的,生,活,。	C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,R-NN,R-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

父,母,是,自,己,的,长,辈,的,人,，,比,自,己,有,更,多,的,经,验,和,智,慧,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEC,R-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-AD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
那,么,，,我,跟,父,母,学,什,么,是,呢,？	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,R-NR,C-SP,C-PU
随,着,经,济,的,发,达,，,人,们,的,需,求,也,提,高,了,。,因,此,，,人,都,要,用,未,经,济,污,染,的,农,产,品,加,工,的,食,品,。,人,不,仅,是,因,为,生,存,，,而,且,享,受,美,满,、,健,康,的,生,活,，,都,要,吃,对,人,无,害,的,食,品,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-AD,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,可,能,来,自,我,自,己,的,学,习,背,景,吧,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
随,着,经,济,的,发,展,，,人,们,对,食,品,的,概,念,也,变,了,。,现,在,流,行,的,“,绿,色,食,品,”,是,这,种,人,们,的,食,品,概,念,的,象,征,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,W-AD,W-AD,W-NN,W-NN,W-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,认,为,这,样,情,况,是,一,言,难,尽,很,难,说,的,问,题,。,因,为,“,安,乐,死,”,的,状,况,、,条,件,是,每,个,人,都,不,一,样,的,，,一,概,不,能,说,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,R-VV,R-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-VV,M-VV,C-PU
这,些,人,有,可,能,对,别,人,不,高,兴,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
好,久,没,写,这,样,给,父,母,的,信,。,现,在,写,起,来,有,点,不,好,意,思,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,W-VV,W-AD,W-AD,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,R-DEC,C-NN,M-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
他,们,关,心,在,歌,手,的,外,貌,，,没,有,关,心,在,歌,曲,里,面,的,真,正,的,意,思,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
不,管,是,什,么,样,的,人,，,接,受,新,的,“,文,化,”,时,，,感,到,不,安,。,传,统,的,混,合,式,教,育,确,是,可,靠,的,，,但,女,子,学,校,也,有,好,处,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-LC,C-PU,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
初,次,他,们,一,直,劝,我,考,英,文,系,。,但,我,对,他,们,说,，,这,是,我,的,专,业,，,我,要,学,汉,语,，,以,后,中,国,可,能,会,更,发,展,，,他,们,听,完,我,的,话,才,承,认,我,的,未,来,和,目,标,。	S-AD,S-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
现,在,重,要,的,并,不,是,学,历,，,就,是,个,人,的,技,术,，,比,如,说,，,会,外,国,语,、,会,电,脑,、,会,设,计,、,有,什,么,技,术,资,格,等,等,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU
因,此,，,父,母,无,法,控,制,孩,子,对,世,界,的,好,奇,心,，,而,好,奇,心,会,导,致,对,孩,子,的,纯,洁,心,灵,不,堪,设,想,的,后,果,。,父,母,对,这,种,坏,影,响,只,能,避,免,孩,子,靠,近,它,的,保,护,他,们,。,像,孟,子,的,母,亲,一,样,，,迁,移,到,合,适,的,地,区,学,习,、,成,长,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-DEG,W-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,S-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,们,只,提,醒,他,们,别,在,公,共,场,所,吸,烟,，,那,么,他,们,听,话,吗,？	C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,M-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
有,一,次,我,家,旁,边,的,运,动,场,上,来,了,几,位,明,星,唱,歌,，,记,得,那,是,周,二,，,仍,然,在,场,上,有,学,生,过,来,看,明,星,、,听,流,行,歌,，,我,一,看,这,场,面,有,点,儿,感,到,遗,憾,，,难,道,他,们,放,弃,学,习,了,吗,？	C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VC,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-AD,W-AD,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-M,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-SP,C-PU
如,果,父,母,不,教,孩,子,这,样,的,事,，,恐,怕,谁,也,不,教,对,孩,子,们,这,样,的,事,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU
迎,接,我,的,姥,姥,、,表,妹,、,姨,妈,、,姨,父,看,见,我,们,都,满,脸,笑,容,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,M-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
从,另,一,方,面,角,度,来,看,，,如,果,一,点,儿,也,不,用,化,肥,和,农,药,的,话,，,农,作,物,的,产,量,又,会,大,大,降,低,，,而,且,农,民,也,没,有,饭,吃,。,因,此,避,免,这,样,的,现,象,政,府,应,该,为,农,民,、,老,百,姓,采,取,一,些,措,施,。	C-P,C-DT,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
况,且,有,男,、,有,女,的,场,合,是,不,应,该,刻,意,的,避,免,。,家,长,们,严,格,禁,止,小,男,生,或,小,女,生,与,异,性,接,触,，,往,往,会,得,到,回,弹,的,效,果,。,一,般,被,禁,止,的,东,西,，,在,十,多,岁,叛,变,力,最,强,时,、,好,奇,心,也,特,强,时,的,男,女,学,生,，,往,往,最,越,想,尝,试,这,“,禁,果,”,的,妙,处,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-SB,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,S-VV,S-VV,S-NN,C-AD,C-VA,R-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
食,饮,是,人,类,生,存,的,最,基,本,条,件,。	S-NN,S-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
近,来,呢,，,甚,至,我,们,找,得,易,吸,烟,的,女,人,，,高,学,生,。,在,这,样,的,严,重,的,环,境,下,，,我,们,一,定,要,知,道,吸,烟,的,影,响,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-DER,S-VA,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,一,见,钟,情,和,青,梅,竹,马,而,结,合,的,更,是,少,之,又,少,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,R-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
对,人,一,定,要,真,诚,，,这,并,不,是,意,味,着,牺,牲,自,己,、,而,且,为,了,自,己,过,得,舒,服,一,点,。,其,他,人,过,得,不,好,的,时,候,，,怎,么,自,己,一,个,人,能,够,过,得,好,呢,。,再,说,，,我,说,的,意,思,也,不,是,表,面,上,的,好,意,而,去,做,善,事,，,乃,是,一,个,个,人,的,自,愿,的,行,为,，,往,往,产,生,极,大,的,作,用,。	C-P,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-DER,C-VA,C-VA,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DER,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-AD,W-AD,W-PN,W-PN,W-CD,W-CD,W-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DER,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,M-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
有,这,样,的,话,“,吸,烟,有,百,害,无,一,利,”,，,这,句,话,意,味,着,吸,烟,有,很,多,弊,，,一,个,好,处,也,没,有,。,但,在,这,儿,我,不,判,断,这,句,话,的,真,理,性,。,不,过,吸,烟,在,很,多,方,面,有,弊,，,这,个,是,没,有,错,儿,。	C-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-CD,C-NN,C-VE,C-CD,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,S-NN,C-PU,S-CD,S-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VC,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,对,男,女,分,班,的,看,法,是,不,同,意,的,，,对,这,个,看,法,有,两,个,原,因,。	C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,R-P,R-DT,R-DT,R-NN,R-NN,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
还,有,应,该,必,要,互,相,了,解,的,努,力,。,父,母,们,要,为,了,理,解,孩,子,们,的,生,活,，,必,要,具,体,的,行,动,样,式,。,经,常,造,成,跟,孩,子,们,一,起,吃,饭,，,一,起,打,游,戏,，,因,此,减,少,他,们,之,间,的,生,活,和,想,法,差,异,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-VA,S-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-VV,R-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
吸,烟,是,有,害,无,益,的,，,而,且,给,社,会,的,影,响,也,不,少,，,所,以,我,们,人,类,都,要,重,视,吸,烟,带,来,的,各,种,各,样,的,事,情,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
假,如,关,于,孩,子,们,的,这,种,情,况,继,续,下,去,，,应,该,日,本,的,前,景,不,太,良,好,。	C-CS,C-CS,R-P,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,W-VV,W-VV,W-NR,W-NR,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

”,就,是,说,母,父,，,孩,子,的,第,一,任,老,师,没,有,好,好,的,教,导,孩,子,。	C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

尤,其,是,中,学,时,期,，,是,一,个,人,由,无,知,到,成,熟,的,生,理,发,育,时,期,，,把,男,、,女,分,开,来,进,行,教,育,，,不,但,阻,止,不,了,家,长,们,所,担,心,的,早,恋,，,反,而,增,加,了,他,们,好,奇,心,，,更,有,可,能,发,展,为,“,向,外,发,展,”,，,迫,使,他,们,到,自,己,学,校,以,外,的,地,方,去,寻,找,答,案,，,到,其,他,学,校,，,甚,至,到,复,杂,的,社,会,上,去,解,决,生,理,上,问,题,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-BA,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-PN,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,的,特,长,除,了,言,文,天,份,外,，,在,口,语,的,表,达,能,力,方,面,也,有,特,殊,的,表,现,。,我,对,人,亲,切,和,蔼,，,尤,其,是,对,待,老,人,，,更,有,另,一,套,手,法,。	C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,S-VV,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,S-VA,S-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
最,近,在,日,本,很,多,香,烟,商,厂,卖,出,少,烟,、,少,臭,的,香,烟,。,这,种,商,品,不,仅,是,对,非,吸,烟,者,有,好,处,，,而,是,对,吸,烟,者,的,身,体,的,毒,害,也,减,少,。,今,后,，,这,种,商,品,越,来,越,多,，,销,路,也,很,好,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,S-VV,S-VV,S-AD,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-AD,R-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-AD,C-VA,C-PU
所,以,他,们,的,缺,点,是,孩,子,的,缺,点,，,没,有,改,善,。,我,认,为,，,父,母,应,该,先,分,析,自,己,，,自,己,的,长,所,、,短,所,究,竟,是,什,么,？	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-MSP,C-PU,S-JJ,S-MSP,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU

如,果,你,想,地,球,那,边,有,一,个,小,孩,正,在,饿,死,了,的,话,，,你,绝,不,能,把,食,品,扔,了,下,去,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-PU

是,他,让,我,在,自,然,的,天,地,里,生,长,。	C-VC,C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU
在,我,们,日,常,生,活,所,接,触,的,资,讯,及,传,播,媒,介,体,，,似,乎,都,看,到,市,政,府,对,人,民,忠,告,：,“,吸,烟,危,害,个,人,健,康,及,对,公,众,利,益,的,影,响,”,。	C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU
我,自,己,觉,得,对,于,一,个,国,家,的,政,府,来,说,，,控,制,吸,烟,者,数,率,最,好,的,办,法,还,是,教,育,。,这,包,括,家,庭,和,社,会,教,育,，,甚,至,政,府,有,关,部,门,安,排,的,广,告,形,式,教,育,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,希,望,尽,快,地,法,律,改,善,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,W-NN,W-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU
如,果,一,个,在,一,个,很,安,静,的,环,境,下,呆,一,下,子,的,话,，,那,就,不,要,紧,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-CD,C-CD,M-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
但,是,，,目,前,在,中,国,由,于,抽,烟,的,国,家,收,入,并,不,少,。,所,以,这,项,规,定,万,一,被,人,们,严,格,地,遵,守,，,抽,烟,的,人,越,来,越,少,起,来,的,话,，,也,会,引,起,不,好,的,影,响,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-P,C-P,S-VV,S-VV,M-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-AD,S-AD,C-LB,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,R-VV,R-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,想,写,一,片,关,于,代,沟,的,问,题,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,R-CD,R-M,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
孩,子,有,意,识,和,无,意,识,地,在,观,察,父,母,，,父,母,的,一,言,一,行,，,为,人,处,世,都,会,在,孩,子,的,心,目,打,下,烙,印,。,有,修,养,，,重,道,德,，,有,知,识,的,父,母,，,他,们,的,孩,子,在,一,个,良,好,生,活,中,成,长,，,并,把,他,们,父,母,辈,所,具,有,的,美,德,发,扬,光,大,。,中,国,是,一,个,具,有,悠,久,历,史,文,化,的,民,族,，,并,在,教,子,育,人,方,面,，,有,许,多,精,典,可,供,我,们,外,国,人,学,习,。,要,做,一,位,成,功,的,父,母,，,首,先,要,不,断,完,善,自,己,，,用,自,己,的,言,传,身,教,来,影,响,我,们,的,下,代,，,把,美,好,品,格,传,给,他,们,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-BA,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,S-NN,S-NN,S-VV,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-DT,M-M,C-PU,C-BA,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU
安,乐,死,，,这,个,问,题,其,实,早,就,大,家,所,提,出,的,一,个,最,难,的,问,题,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-PN,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,认,为,，,父,母,反,对,的,主,要,原,因,是,孩,子,学,习,的,时,候,常,常,听,流,行,歌,越,来,越,走,下,坡,路,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
另,外,，,父,母,作,为,家,长,也,发,挥,了,很,重,要,的,角,色,。,孩,子,长,大,后,，,进,入,社,会,中,有,了,职,业,后,，,社,会,对,个,人,品,格,是,否,好,还,是,坏,最,终,也,都,放,在,父,母,的,教,导,品,质,如,何,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-JJ,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
长,期,以,来,，,过,重,的,负,担,能,使,肺,过,疲,劳,而,引,起,各,种,各,样,的,疾,病,，,其,中,最,恐,惧,的,就,是,肺,癌,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,C-VV,C-NN,S-VV,C-VA,S-VA,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
如,果,谁,对,我,问,，,“,吃,绿,色,食,品,和,不,挨,饿,哪,个,是,第,一,位,的,？	C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,S-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VC,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-SP,C-PU
强,迫,的,方,法,只,能,引,起,复,作,用,。,他,心,里,不,愿,意,，,假,装,外,面,愿,意,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,W-VV,W-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
所,有,热,爱,生,命,的,人,都,应,该,对,市,政,府,新,出,台,的,规,定,感,到,高,兴,。,吸,烟,不,仅,对,吸,的,人,有,害,处,，,而,且,对,周,围,的,人,与,环,境,有,不,良,影,响,。,这,些,影,响,包,括,直,接,和,间,接,影,响,两,种,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-CC,C-P,C-VV,M-DEC,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,M-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,M-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-M,C-PU
我,想,这,三,个,人,都,不,愿,意,为,别,人,做,事,，,这,是,多,么,不,好,的,事,！,人,们,生,活,当,中,也,有,这,样,的,人,，,但,我,不,想,做,这,种,人,。,人,不,是,一,个,人,生,活,，,而,是,互,相,依,靠,而,生,活,，,所,以,如,果,自,己,不,主,动,地,帮,助,别,人,的,话,，,别,人,也,不,可,能,帮,助,我,，,还,受,到,别,人,的,歧,视,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,M-PU,R-NN,R-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,虽,然,已,经,长,大,，,离,开,父,母,能,独,立,生,活,了,，,但,是,有,的,时,候,，,特,别,是,做,决,定,的,时,候,先,考,虑,如,果,是,父,母,的,话,做,如,何,决,定,？,同,时,觉,得,不,管,离,得,多,么,远,，,我,年,纪,多,大,了,，,可,能,会,在,思,想,方,面,一,辈,子,都,受,到,父,母,的,影,响,。	C-PN,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CS,C-CS,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,W-VV,W-AD,W-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-VV,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
结,果,，,我,也,养,成,了,跟,他,同,一,的,爱,好,—,—,看,书,、,弄,电,脑,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-P,C-PN,S-DT,S-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
应,该,全,世,界,承,认,“,安,乐,死,”,，,否,则,的,话,她,丈,夫,那,样,的,人,又,出,现,。	M-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-NN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,S-NN,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
周,围,有,孩,子,，,妇,女,或,者,非,吸,烟,者,的,话,，,找,其,它,的,地,方,吸,烟,，,最,好,在,吸,烟,处,吸,烟,，,也,不,可,以,吸,完,烟,以,后,，,随,便,不,可,以,把,烟,股,扔,在,地,上,，,应,该,遵,守,公,共,规,则,。,最,好,我,们,互,相,考,虑,健,康,的,良,好,习,惯,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,M-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-AD,R-AD,R-AD,C-BA,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-JJ,C-PN,C-PN,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,基,本,上,赞,成,“,安,乐,死,”,这,个,概,念,，,而,想,“,安,乐,死,”,应,该,取,得,社,会,的,理,解,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
二,次,，,各,个,国,家,也,应,该,降,低,化,肥,和,农,药,的,产,品,，,尤,其,是,缺,少,产,生,罐,头,的,食,品,。,因,为,那,些,食,品,在,长,期,用,上,不,仅,对,身,体,能,够,产,生,各,种,各,样,的,病,，,还,对,身,体,一,点,营,养,也,没,有,。	S-CD,S-M,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,R-DT,C-CC,C-CC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
没,有,一,间,公,司,是,只,有,女,性,或,男,性,的,员,工,。	C-VE,C-VE,C-CD,S-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
为,了,互,相,理,解,，,我,们,可,以,用,对,话,的,时,间,。	C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
第,二,：,对,生,孩,子,的,时,候,的,影,响,。,由,于,母,体,跟,子,体,密,切,相,关,，,如,果,母,体,受,到,了,烟,里,的,不,好,的,物,质,，,也,可,能,生,下,来,的,孩,子,是,畸,形,的,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEC,R-NN,R-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-DEC,W-NN,W-NN,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU
所,以,父,母,们,这,种,事,情,很,担,心,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,W-AD,W-AD,W-NN,W-NN,W-AD,W-VV,W-VV,C-PU
所,以,我,想,先,用,化,肥,和,农,药,产,生,农,作,物,，,解,决,人,们,吃,的,问,题,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
人,都,是,从,母,亲,出,生,的,，,所,以,人,永,远,不,能,离,开,父,母,。,所,以,我,们,只,能,接,受,这,样,的,情,况,。	C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-AD,R-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,传,说,的,结,果,是,三,个,和,尚,都,没,有,水,喝,了,，,它,告,诉,现,代,人,要,坚,持,积,极,性,，,否,则,自,己,让,自,己,吃,苦,，,亏,损,呢,！	C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-VV,S-VV,C-SP,C-PU
对,我,来,说,流,行,歌,曲,是,没,有,个,性,的,一,个,文,化,的,产,物,。	C-P,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VE,C-VE,C-M,C-NN,C-DEG,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
首,先,，,母,亲,是,“,感,情,的,老,师,”,，,就,是,母,亲,无,意,无,觉,告,诉,孩,子,爱,情,、,亲,情,、,友,情,等,感,情,的,重,要,性,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,S-VE,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
父,父,！	S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
所,以,，,比,如,身,份,证,上,做,一,个,项,目,：,安,乐,死,用,不,用,？,如,果,大,家,都,知,道,自,己,要,不,要,安,乐,死,，,而,且,家,里,人,或,者,其,他,人,知,道,的,话,，,不,要,帮,助,其,他,人,的,自,杀,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,S-VV,S-AD,S-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-JJ,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
由,于,日,本,的,夏,天,很,热,，,我,开,始,了,冲,波,。	C-P,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,S-VV,S-NN,C-PU
最,近,，,市,政,府,宣,布,将,实,施,对,公,共,场,所,走,边,吸,烟,者,进,行,罚,款,的,措,施,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
安,乐,死,的,坏,处,，,就,是,减,少,我,们,的,生,命,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
最,后,，,医,疗,的,进,步,将,会,得,了,不,治,之,症,的,人,。,现,在,，,医,疗,技,术,越,来,越,发,展,。,虽,然,现,在,他,们,得,了,“,不,治,之,症,”,，,可,是,我,们,也,可,以,说,他,们,的,那,种,病,是,永,远,不,治,之,症,吗,？	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,M-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,R-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,M-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,W-VC,W-JJ,W-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
对,代,沟,问,题,，,我,觉,得,必,要,两,代,人,之,间,的,对,话,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-VA,S-VA,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
第,二,天,，,我,去,参,观,了,七,三,一,部,队,旧,地,以,及,阵,列,馆,。,我,发,现,“,勿,忘,国,耻,”,的,标,语,。,而,且,，,在,本,子,上,中,国,人,写,出,的,责,备,日,本,人,的,文,章,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-CC,S-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
而,且,，,我,还,认,为,，,人,们,如,果,在,社,会,上,，,也,不,能,只,靠,阅,读,去,获,得,更,高,的,学,历,。,我,们,要,都,知,道,，,现,在,电,脑,发,展,可,真,快,，,它,的,容,量,更,大,，,速,度,更,快,，,尤,其,是,配,有,“,因,特,网,”,资,源,访,问,工,具,。,我,觉,得,这,是,在,社,会,上,最,重,要,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,R-CS,R-CS,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,R-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VE,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,W-VC,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-LC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU
狭,义,观,点,来,看,，,吸,烟,是,对,于,个,人,健,康,百,害,无,益,的,。,烟,子,里,有,许,多,个,发,癌,物,质,，,对,于,许,多,个,病,治,方,面,吸,烟,者,的,发,病,率,比,非,吸,烟,者,高,得,好,几,倍,。	M-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-P,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,S-NN,S-NN,C-LC,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,S-VV,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,R-M,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,R-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-PU
请,原,谅,这,不,懂,事,的,女,儿,，,从,离,家,出,走,，,我,自,己,很,明,白,你,们,多,么,疼,我,爱,我,，,却,女,儿,不,乖,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,W-AD,W-NN,W-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
爸,、,妈,，,近,来,还,好,吗,？	R-NN,R-PU,R-NN,R-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
虽,然,吸,烟,者,主,张,吸,烟,的,权,力,，,但,是,政,府,应,扩,大,限,制,吸,烟,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
我,觉,得,，,外,国,不,是,只,有,愉,快,的,相,见,，,也,有,危,险,的,相,见,。,但,是,，,不,应,该,怕,危,险,，,藏,起,来,家,里,。,因,为,，,肯,定,有,个,有,难,忘,的,相,见,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,M-NN,W-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-M,R-VE,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU
我,认,为,这,都,在,于,做,父,母,与,孩,子,间,要,造,成,互,相,了,解,，,有,默,契,有,宽,容,、,包,含,及,谅,解,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
烟,的,价,格,中,上,档,部,分,占,政,府,收,税,。,实,际,上,政,府,的,收,入,中,烟,的,税,率,是,上,当,高,，,所,以,政,府,是,一,直,忽,视,烟,的,有,害,性,。	C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,S-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-AD,S-VV,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,R-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
吃,“,绿,色,食,品,”,是,为,了,保,护,环,境,、,保,持,健,康,的,捷,径,。	C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,R-P,R-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
就,像,我,们,的,耳,朵,虽,然,“,听,”,是,他,的,使,命,，,但,是,所,听,的,声,音,大,小,却,有,一,定,的,限,度,，,对,于,太,大,的,声,音,就,成,了,噪,音,，,使,其,无,法,承,受,，,就,产,生,了,一,种,压,力,也,就,影,响,了,他,的,健,康,，,所,以,我,认,为,噪,音,和,静,音,对,我,们,的,身,体,都,不,适,当,，,应,该,介,于,两,者,之,间,才,是,最,好,的,。	C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CS,C-CS,C-PU,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-MSP,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-AD,C-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-P,R-P,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
我,对,流,行,歌,曲,的,看,法,是,，,不,要,太,迷,试,于,流,行,歌,曲,里,，,偶,尔,也,听,听,对,你,的,身,心,健,康,是,好,的,。	C-PN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VA,S-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
“,父,母,是,孩,子,的,第,一,任,老,师,”,，,我,觉,得,可,能,大,多,数,人,亲,身,实,感,这,一,句,活,的,意,思,。	C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,M-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
第,一,，,有,肺,癌,症,的,可,能,性,。,从,很,久,以,前,，,人,们,已,经,发,现,了,关,于,肺,癌,症,的,可,能,性,，,抽,烟,的,人,的,几,率,比,一,般,人,高,得,多,。,在,电,视,上,常,见,抽,烟,的,人,肺,真,的,黑,色,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-VE,M-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-VA,C-DER,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,M-NN,C-VA,C-DEC,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU
第,二,，,病,人,真,的,希,望,自,杀,，,而,且,亲,口,（,或,者,用,别,的,手,段,来,表,示,病,人,脑,子,很,清,楚,，,知,道,自,己,希,望,什,么,）,说,自,杀,的,愿,望,时,。,第,三,，,有,不,给,病,人,什,么,痛,苦,，,帮,助,自,杀,的,手,段,时,。,如,果,完,全,有,这,三,个,条,件,的,话,，,可,以,帮,助,病,人,自,杀,，,而,且,可,以,将,这,个,行,为,叫,成,“,安,乐,死,”,。,我,知,道,生,命,多,么,尊,贵,，,但,是,生,命,只,给,人,痛,苦,的,话,，,发,生,了,自,杀,权,利,。,虽,然,“,安,乐,死,”,问,题,不,可,以,容,易,下,结,论,，,但,是,医,疗,太,发,展,的,现,代,，,它,也,是,个,生,存,的,手,段,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-VE,S-AD,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-DT,R-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-AD,S-VE,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-BA,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VA,S-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,S-VV,S-VV,S-AS,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
世,界,上,，,很,多,国,家,人,都,很,关,心,“,绿,色,食,品,”,。,可,是,有,些,国,家,—,—,特,别,是,非,洲,国,家,的,人,，,没,有,吃,东,西,，,不,能,吃,饭,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
周,众,所,知,，,抽,烟,不,论,个,人,还,是,周,围,的,人,都,有,害,处,。,抽,烟,的,人,抽,烟,之,前,，,好,好,想,想,由,自,己,抽,烟,对,社,会,带,来,什,么,不,好,的,影,响,。	S-NR,S-NN,S-NN,S-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-CS,C-CS,M-M,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
从,人,家,借,来,钱,，,用,这,钱,来,维,持,他,的,生,命,。	C-P,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-DT,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,们,除,了,去,西,安,以,外,，,去,了,太,原,、,青,岛,和,北,京,但,是,对,我,们,来,说,，,没,什,么,，,我,们,用,这,个,假,期,来,西,安,旅,游,非,常,满,足,了,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-P,R-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,M-VV,C-AS,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-CC,C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
应,该,法,律,上,承,认,安,乐,死,，,这,是,人,道,。,所,以,应,该,这,样,情,况,下,可,取,安,乐,死,。	W-VV,W-VV,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-VV,W-VV,M-JJ,W-JJ,M-NN,W-NN,W-LC,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
上,述,解,决,方,案,最,大,的,问,题,是,国,家,等,公,共,部,门,如,何,正,确,地,调,整,农,产,品,的,需,求,平,衡,和,如,何,实,现,国,际,合,作,；,国,家,要,正,确,地,把,农,产,品,价,格,保,持,在,不,太,低,的,水,平,。,因,为,发,达,国,家,和,城,市,居,民,的,对,食,品,的,需,求,低,了,，,如,果,国,家,不,插,手,调,整,价,格,也,会,大,大,降,价,，,使,农,民,隐,陷,入,困,境,。,剩,下,的,农,产,品,需,要,由,政,府,购,买,，,为,贫,困,地,区,居,民,安,好,。	C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
虽,然,用,农,药,提,高,产,量,，,可,是,损,失,更,大,，,不,利,于,我,们,孩,子,和,自,己,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,M-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU
根,据,这,个,短,消,息,，,这,种,措,施,帮,助,青,少,年,养,成,良,好,的,习,惯,，,但,是,我,不,认,为,这,样,。,对,我,来,说,，,无,论,大,城,市,，,中,国,人,的,吸,烟,率,还,是,高,的,。	C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-PN,W-PN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,M-VA,C-SP,C-PU
如,果,问,我,说,：,“,谁,对,你,影,响,最,大,”,的,话,，,我,的,回,答,是,：,“,一,位,老,师,”,，,一,位,在,我,缅,文,小,学,时,代,中,对,我,影,响,最,大,的,老,师,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,R-DEC,R-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PU,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-P,C-PN,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-P,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
可,是,目,前,世,界,上,有,很,多,人,因,缺,少,粮,食,而,挨,饿,对,他,们,来,说,，,这,不,能,说,食,品,的,质,量,，,能,吃,什,么,就,要,吃,什,么,，,用,化,肥,和,农,药,的,东,西,的,产,量,大,，,所,以,给,他,们,那,些,东,西,也,没,方,法,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,R-PN,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
总,而,言,之,，,这,次,假,期,对,我,来,说,很,有,意,义,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,S-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,R-SP,C-PU
而,且,出,生,在,这,个,世,界,后,，,一,直,给,孩,子,教,育,和,爱,。,这,些,父,母,的,教,育,方,式,或,爱,的,方,式,，,直,接,反,应,父,母,的,思,维,方,式,，,也,影,响,到,对,孩,子,的,思,维,方,式,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,M-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
倾,听,，,有,时,候,是,最,重,要,的,，,尤,其,是,现,代,社,会,上,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-PU

我,个,人,认,为,主,要,有,二,个,方,面,的,内,容,。	C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,S-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,为,我,是,个,不,抽,烟,者,，,所,以,关,于,抽,烟,的,规,定,是,不,会,影,响,我,喜,好,的,。	C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VC,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,M-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
还,有,，,如,果,人,们,更,尊,重,自,然,环,境,的,话,，,在,未,来,的,日,子,里,，,就,不,用,担,心,吃,”,绿,色,食,品,”,和,不,挨,饿,哪,个,是,第,一,位,这,种,问,题,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VC,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-SP,C-PU
我,的,一,个,朋,友,说,他,也,不,要,吸,烟,但,是,不,能,停,止,。,吸,烟,是,一,个,很,不,好,的,习,惯,，,如,吸,烟,者,要,停,止,吸,烟,即,本,人,要,努,力,周,围,的,人,们,也,要,帮,他,。	C-PN,C-DEG,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,S-AD,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU
水,是,在,生,活,中,不,可,缺,少,的,东,西,，,他,们,不,能,不,喝,水,，,因,此,开,始,想,得,水,的,办,法,。	W-NN,W-VC,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DER,M-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

因,为,挨,饿,会,使,人,缺,乏,营,养,，,导,致,有,害,于,身,体,健,康,，,甚,至,于,死,亡,。,我,们,知,道,，,人,的,温,饱,是,最,珍,贵,的,。,当,一,个,身,体,减,弱,时,，,他,人,会,感,到,没,力,气,来,对,待,各,种,问,题,。	C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,S-VA,S-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

据,我,所,知,“,安,乐,死,”,这,种,药,是,几,年,以,来,成,为,医,学,方,面,的,热,门,话,题,。	C-P,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-JJ,R-JJ,R-NN,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,认,为,听,流,行,歌,曲,很,有,好,处,，,当,然,能,够,控,制,自,己,的,时,候,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
从,现,代,社,会,角,度,来,看,，,吸,烟,的,问,题,越,来,越,大,。,这,问,题,可,以,想,对,个,人,健,康,方,面,和,公,众,利,益,方,面,。	C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VA,C-PU,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,W-VV,R-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-CC,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,C-NN,C-PU

但,除,了,带,来,一,些,暂,时,欢,乐,的,感,觉,，,它,什,么,都,没,有,。,它,会,带,来,了,很,多,不,好,的,病,比,如,肺,病,、,癌,病,等,。,吸,烟,的,人,，,大,多,数,都,很,衰,弱,，,容,易,得,病,因,为,体,康,力,不,强,。,总,之,，,吸,烟,对,个,人,的,健,康,没,什,么,好,处,理,解,的,。	C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,M-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-NN,S-NN,C-ETC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-P,S-NN,S-NR,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-SP,C-PU

第,一,，,如,果,我,们,选,择,吃,“,非,绿,色,食,品,”,的,话,，,这,并,不,是,能,解,决,缺,少,粮,食,和,挨,饿,的,问,题,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,R-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

一,九,九,七,年,他,过,世,了,，,我,们,按,他,的,要,求,把,他,的,户,尘,带,回,中,国,，,埋,藏,在,永,定,。,我,来,中,国,一,九,九,八,年,时,，,因,不,认,路,，,所,以,从,没,去,过,外,公,的,家,乡,。,一,直,到,一,九,九,九,年,七,月,份,，,趁,我,亲,戚,来,中,国,要,拜,坟,的,时,候,，,我,跟,着,他,们,去,外,公,的,家,乡,。,外,公,跟,我,的,关,系,很,好,，,虽,然,我,是,他,的,外,孙,女,，,但,他,的,确,疼,我,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-BA,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-PN,W-VV,W-NR,W-NR,W-NT,W-NT,W-NT,W-NT,W-NT,C-LC,C-PU,S-P,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-VC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,S-DEG,S-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU

我,哭,起,来,，,从,此,我,一,直,想,数,学,真,难,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
我,小,时,候,，,爸,爸,经,常,对,我,说,的,一,句,话,是,：,“,首,先,应,该,对,父,母,有,尊,重,。,你,看,一,看,，,东,方,文,化,中,的,父,亲,的,地,位,多,高,，,因,为,东,方,人,知,道,父,母,是,比,你,智,慧,多,，,生,活,经,验,丰,富,。	C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-VC,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-PN,S-NN,S-NN,M-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
不,管,怎,样,，,生,男,生,女,也,是,一,样,，,就,如,妈,所,说,的,，,生,女,好,还,过,生,男,的,，,好,像,我,一,样,，,顽,皮,而,又,不,愿,回,家,，,总,让,你,们,两,位,老,人,家,操,心,，,就,不,好,了,。,上,一,封,提,起,大,哥,要,我,这,大,学,生,想,出,名,字,来,给,他,的,儿,女,，,我,在,想,，,什,么,名,字,最,来,得,恰,当,呢,？,最,后,，,我,决,选,了,如,果,是,男,的,，,就,给,他,一,个,名,字,家,书,，,家,书,抵,万,金,嘛,！	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-VV,C-JJ,W-NN,W-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-DT,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,R-AD,R-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,S-NN,C-AS,C-CS,C-CS,C-VC,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-CD,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

这,种,问,题,可,以,让,人,忽,略,传,统,音,乐,或,者,古,曲,音,乐,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
年,轻,人,喜,欢,的,东,西,，,长,辈,人,不,喜,欢,。,年,轻,女,人,喜,欢,短,裙,子,，,但,是,，,老,人,看,这,样,的,女,人,，,他,们,一,看,就,显,示,不,满,意,的,样,子,。,我,已,经,３,０,岁,了,，,以,前,的,我,不,了,解,长,辈,的,说,话,，,他,们,的,话,好,像,有,书,里,的,话,一,样,，,所,以,我,听,他,们,的,说,话,就,生,气,起,来,。,但,是,，,现,在,的,我,，,都,了,解,他,们,的,说,话,。,沟,通,，,这,个,问,题,是,不,能,解,结,的,问,题,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-SP,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
由,此,可,见,，,人,虽,然,需,要,肚,子,的,饱,满,，,但,更,重,要,的,还,是,健,康,的,活,到,老,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,W-NN,W-DEC,S-VA,S-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
对,于,在,公,共,场,所,不,让,吸,烟,者,吸,烟,的,是,应,该,是,相,当,对,的,措,施,，,因,为,在,公,共,场,所,里,有,的,不,只,是,吸,烟,者,一,人,，,还,有,不,吸,烟,的,人,，,为,了,这,些,人,的,权,力,不,能,只,顾,吸,烟,者,，,同,样,也,得,给,吸,烟,者,准,备,能,吸,烟,的,地,方,，,国,为,吸,烟,的,问,题,是,个,人,各,自,的,自,由,。,他,们,有,权,力,不,影,响,别,人,的,利,益,的,情,况,下,吸,烟,。,有,些,国,家,为,了,让,吸,烟,者,戒,烟,，,天,天,升,高,烟,的,价,，,但,是,人,们,对,这,种,方,法,不,满,意,，,因,为,他,们,觉,得,这,意,思,是,有,钱,人,就,可,以,吸,烟,，,没,有,钱,的,人,就,只,能,戒,烟,。	C-P,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,R-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

“,代,沟,”,的,问,题,，,如,此,一,直,存,在,着,，,为,何,我,们,不,能,把,此,问,题,缩,到,最,小,呢,？	C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-AD,R-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-BA,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU

”,我,想,这,种,环,境,不,但,帮,助,保,持,市,容,整,洁,和,青,少,年,养,成,良,好,的,习,惯,，,而,且,给,吸,烟,的,人,戒,烟,的,一,个,好,机,会,。,我,认,为,随,着,允,许,抽,烟,的,地,方,的,减,少,，,吸,烟,的,人,也,越,来,越,少,。	C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,S-AD,S-AD,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,W-VV,W-VV,W-DEC,W-CD,W-CD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,M-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU

我,认,为,世,界,上,最,可,恶,是,挨,饿,，,更,可,恶,就,是,为,了,金,钱,使,用,不,好,的,化,学,药,品,来,生,产,、,买,食,品,的,人,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,M-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,M-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU

世,界,上,，,每,个,人,有,自,己,看,法,对,流,行,歌,曲,。,有,些,人,特,别,喜,欢,流,行,歌,曲,无,论,不,是,他,的,爱,好,流,行,歌,曲,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,W-VE,W-PN,W-PN,W-NN,W-NN,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-AD,C-AD,C-VC,S-PN,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
再,加,，,大,人,吸,烟,对,青,少,年,养,成,良,好,习,惯,有,负,面,影,响,，,大,人,的,行,为,对,青,少,年,有,潜,移,默,化,的,作,用,地,。,因,此,吸,烟,者,应,该,考,虑,到,下,一,代,的,身,心,健,康,自,觉,得,不,在,公,共,场,所,吸,烟,为,好,。	S-AD,S-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-DER,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-VA,C-PU
我,们,离,不,开,这,些,文,化,活,动,，,但,太,盲,目,的,喜,欢,，,我,个,人,认,为,不,是,很,好,。,总,之,，,我,对,流,行,歌,曲,的,看,法,并,不,是,好,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,S-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-AD,R-VC,C-VA,C-PU
我,认,为,呢,，,人,们,喜,爱,绿,色,食,品,是,理,所,当,然,的,，,人,没,有,身,体,健,康,，,以,后,的,事,情,就,难,以,想,象,的,了,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,C-SP,C-PU

你,们,周,围,还,是,很,多,人,没,有,粮,食,而,死,亡,，,受,得,了,吗,？,我,宁,可,害,我,的,身,体,也,不,想,让,他,们,死,。,死,亡,和,得,病,，,哪,个,更,重,要,呢,？,而,且,吃,用,过,化,肥,和,农,药,的,东,西,不,一,定,得,病,。	S-PN,S-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,M-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-AD,S-VA,S-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

在,相,爱,的,过,程,，,如,果,吵,架,时,，,对,方,不,能,和,解,时,就,会,有,意,无,意,的,分,手,，,就,在,一,气,之,下,做,了,错,的,决,定,。	C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-AD,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

这,短,消,息,中,的,新,规,定,是,沿,世,界,潮,流,的,规,定,，,因,为,现,在,发,达,国,家,中,不,允,许,吸,烟,的,地,方,越,来,越,多,。,去,年,美,国,纽,约,政,府,出,台,公,共,建,筑,内,而,所,有,的,饮,食,店,不,允,许,吸,烟,的,新,规,律,。,如,果,吸,烟,，,就,惩,罚,。	C-PN,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,S-MSP,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU
只,主,张,自,己,的,看,法,一,点,儿,也,没,用,。,先,想,对,方,的,态,度,、,那,么,主,张,的,原,因,。,子,女,当,父,母,的,地,位,，,父,母,当,子,女,的,地,位,。	C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,M-PU
虽,然,难,以,接,受,对,方,的,文,化,，,但,了,解,对,方,的,文,化,是,只,有,关,心,就,可,以,做,到,的,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-AD,S-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
但,是,我,别,放,弃,了,，,因,为,中,国,人,的,朋,友,们,教,我,，,“,学,汉,语,的,最,关,键,就,是,多,听,多,说,”,，,所,以,我,每,天,上,课,时,，,专,心,听,老,师,的,话,，,下,课,后,在,房,间,听,磁,带,、,录,音,机,或,者,看,电,视,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-SP,C-PU,C-P,C-P,S-NR,S-NR,S-NN,S-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
第,三,个,是,，,间,接,吸,烟,上,的,问,题,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-VC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
随,着,社,会,的,发,展,，,越,来,越,多,的,人,对,孩,子,的,教,育,很,有,关,心,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
不,管,是,谁,都,可,以,买,的,话,，,我,以,为,才,好,的,作,物,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,M-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,样,的,我,们,的,式,造,成,我,们,的,文,化,之,内,没,有,共,同,点,就,不,能,交,流,，,其,交,流,的,主,要,共,同,点,之,一,是,流,行,歌,曲,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,S-LC,S-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
我,们,的,奶,奶,也,用,“,安,乐,死,”,的,方,法,回,去,天,堂,了,。,这,也,是,不,是,亲,戚,们,觉,得,把,她,照,顾,很,辛,苦,，,而,是,只,有,存,在,爱,。,除,了,爱,情,以,外,有,什,么,词,呢,？	C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-P,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,R-VC,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-BA,W-PN,W-VV,W-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,R-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,S-NN,S-NN,C-P,C-NN,M-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
所,以,我,们,都,互,相,努,力,了,解,对,方,的,想,法,、,价,值,观,、,生,活,观,等,等,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU

去,年,我,们,学,校,就,发,生,过,跟,这,恋,爱,有,关,的,问,题,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-P,R-DT,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
在,我,个,人,的,经,验,，,父,亲,是,在,我,思,想,和,生,活,习,惯,上,的,老,师,，,母,亲,是,在,爱,情,上,的,老,师,。	S-P,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,R-P,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
他,们,应,该,关,照,非,吸,烟,者,的,保,护,环,境,，,因,为,他,们,也,有,权,利,享,受,好,好,环,境,，,无,论,谁,人,人,都,喜,欢,美,好,环,境,的,现,实,的,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,W-VV,W-VV,W-AD,W-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,R-SP,C-PU
