第,二,，,最,重,要,的,公,共,的,敵,。,不,吸,烟,的,人,也,在,吸,烟,人,的,周,围,中,吸,了,烟,。,听,说,这,样,的,吸,烟,比,直,接,吸,烟,的,更,不,好,影,响,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,M-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,W-DEC,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
因,为,我,刚,才,写,的,一,样,，,有,悲,观,的,性,格,，,所,以,我,崇,拜,苏,东,坡,。	C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,S-VA,S-VA,C-PU,C-VE,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU
总,之,，,孩,子,学,到,的,最,重,要,的,人,生,道,理,和,知,识,，,是,从,父,母,学,到,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU
流,行,歌,曲,是,一,时,走,到,我,们,的,身,边,，,一,时,没,有,的,。,就,是,一,个,时,代,的,环,境,、,跟,失,恋,爱,的,人,一,起,流,下,来,泪,，,跟,我,一,起,想,念,妈,妈,的,脸,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-CD,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-VE,C-VE,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,W-VV,W-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU
对,患,者,本,人,立,场,来,说,，,他,已,经,受,像,死,下,去,的,痛,苦,，,不,想,受,下,去,忍,不,住,的,痛,苦,。,我,觉,得,如,果,可,以,快,点,死,去,的,话,，,那,么,给,他,措,施,“,安,乐,死,”,也,没,问,题,。,但,是,我,们,是,人,，,人,却,带,有,爱,情,。	S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VC,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
这,样,一,来,在,公,共,场,所,是,不,应,该,吸,烟,的,，,而,我,认,为,不,仅,在,法,律,上,作,出,不,准,在,公,共,场,所,吸,烟,的,措,施,，,在,电,视,、,电,影,里,也,不,应,该,出,现,吸,烟,的,场,面,，,为,了,不,引,导,年,青,人,去,学,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
我,觉,得,每,个,人,的,力,量,是,并,不,大,的,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,R-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
当,孩,子,刚,出,生,时,，,什,么,都,不,懂,，,只,能,用,眼,晴,看,过,来,看,他,们,的,会,话,和,行,为,，,慢,慢,就,懂,得,饿,就,要,哭,，,妈,妈,就,过,来,喂,他,吃,，,不,舒,服,也,要,哭,，,妈,妈,会,过,来,解,决,问,题,。,孩,子,会,说,第,一,个,词,汇,也,就,是,从,妈,妈,教,的,，,大,部,分,不,是,“,妈,妈,”,就,“,爸,爸,”,那,也,是,表,现,了,父,母,对,孩,子,的,长,生,有,很,大,的,影,响,。,当,父,母,抱,孩,子,出,去,散,步,的,时,候,经,常,指,手,教,孩,子,“,那,个,是,小,狗,”,、,“,这,个,是,王,舅,舅,，,快,说,您,好,啊,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,R-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,M-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-VC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,M-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,R-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-VE,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VC,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
在,欧,洲,里,，,这,个,问,题,也,不,容,易,。,从,本,文,中,还,提,出,另,外,的,问,题,—,—,法,律,的,限,制,。,当,然,，,我,也,了,解,在,一,种,不,治,之,症,下,，,应,当,允,许,丈,夫,帮,助,他,的,妻,子,。	C-P,C-NR,C-NR,R-LC,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,M-P,R-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,M-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-P,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,M-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
比,如,说,，,有,一,个,明,星,长,的,好,看,，,长,的,漂,亮,，,人,们,就,不,管,他,唱,的,歌,好,听,，,还,是,不,好,听,，,天,天,听,这,明,星,唱,的,歌,。,听,的,就,便,多,了,，,所,以,把,这,明,星,唱,的,歌,曲,当,作,一,个,流,行,的,歌,曲,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,S-DEC,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VA,S-DEC,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,S-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-BA,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
所,以,我,常,常,宁,可,一,个,人,在,家,吃,饭,，,而,不,要,和,朋,友,一,起,去,外,面,吃,饭,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

就,是,，,我,认,为,最,关,键,的,事,在,会,不,会,影,响,别,人,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,S-P,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
世,界,上,对,于,食,物,问,题,的,关,心,越,来,越,高,，,因,为,是,有,的,国,家,的,国,民,吃,的,很,丰,富,，,但,挨,饿,的,国,家,也,增,加,了,一,些,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-P,R-VC,C-VE,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU
心,理,教,育,书,多,得,很,，,使,用,的,答,却,很,少,。,在,德,国,有,的,人,建,议,父,母,开,办,教,育,孩,子,课,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-DER,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,W-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-PU
我,也,想,了,怎,么,办,才,好,呢,？,可,是,想,了,半,天,也,找,不,到,好,办,法,了,。,所,以,我,给,他,一,个,模,型,车,子,，,他,竟,然,高,高,兴,兴,地,向,我,感,谢,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,R-AS,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,R-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-P,M-PN,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEV,C-P,C-PN,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU
社,会,的,快,速,变,化,，,人,们,的,思,维,、,生,活,习,惯,和,所,受,到,的,资,讯,种,类,也,甚,多,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-MSP,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-AD,C-VA,C-PU
尽,管,社,会,水,平,提,高,了,很,多,，,但,是,世,界,上,还,有,几,亿,人,因,为,没,有,粮,食,而,饥,饿,。,我,们,应,该,把,什,么,放,在,第,一,呢,？,当,然,是,“,饥,饿,现,象,”,放,在,第,一,是,对,的,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-CC,C-CC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-BA,C-DT,C-DT,C-VV,C-P,C-OD,C-OD,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,M-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-P,C-OD,C-OD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
当,每,一,个,人,吸,烟,时,，,周,围,的,人,也,都,得,吸,上,那,个,人,所,吐,出,的,烟,味,。	C-P,R-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
如,果,，,父,母,在,红,灯,时,带,孩,子,过,马,路,，,孩,子,是,怎,样,认,为,呢,？,孩,子,会,向,父,母,学,习,，,结,果,成,为,一,种,不,良,习,惯,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,R-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
父,亲,总,是,说,：,“,×,×,，,我,的,你,的,妈,妈,经,常,鼓,励,你,！	C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-PN,S-DEG,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU

他,们,根,本,没,有,准,备,晚,辈,的,想,法,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,为,我,现,在,学,生,，,所,以,没,有,钱,买,给,你,们,礼,物,。,我,已,经,２,６,岁,，,可,是,到,现,在,一,次,也,没,给,你,们,礼,物,。	C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,M-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
第,四,天,，,原,来,我,们,还,想,打,一,次,，,但,其,中,几,个,人,手,和,腿,很,酸,而,不,能,打,。,看,来,像,我,一,运,动,不,足,的,有,很,多,呢,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,M-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-SP,C-PU

如,果,说,出,来,的,话,父,母,一,点,儿,也,不,想,过,子,女,的,想,法,，,就,骂,他,们,“,都,不,行,”,。,这,样,的,话,子,女,产,生,抱,怨,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,R-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

人,们,通,过,电,脑,可,以,上,网,，,在,网,上,我,们,可,以,学,习,有,科,学,性,的,知,识,，,也,可,以,看,新,闻,，,也,可,以,看,情,色,等,等,。,那,么,现,代,的,年,轻,人,在,网,上,看,了,情,色,网,后,，,在,外,面,乱,搞,了,一,通,。,他,们,的,婚,姻,由,自,己,决,定,，,不,可,父,母,插,手,，,结,果,他,们,的,婚,姻,不,美,满,了,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,R-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,W-VV,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU

如,今,，,人,们,都,感,兴,趣,自,己,的,健,康,。,但,此,之,前,应,该,知,道,别,人,因,了,缺,少,粮,食,而,挨,饿,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,M-PN,W-PN,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU,C-AD,M-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
我,最,理,想,的,结,交,方,式,不,但,要,和,对,方,从,朋,友,关,系,发,展,以,外,还,希,望,对,方,比,我,年,长,一,点,，,当,然,年,龄,差,距,也,不,要,太,大,太,小,，,不,然,会,没,有,共,同,语,言,，,两,人,的,恋,爱,也,不,会,持,久,，,因,为,年,长,的,话,，,他,可,以,像,大,哥,哥,一,样,的,照,顾,和,爱,顾,我,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-LC,R-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-VA,C-VA,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,M-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VE,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CD,C-NN,C-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,S-NN,S-VV,C-PN,C-PU

比,如,说,，,男,生,可,能,比,较,对,机,械,性,的,东,西,感,兴,趣,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-P,W-JJ,W-JJ,W-JJ,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,认,为,我,们,要,重,视,“,绿,色,食,品,”,，,因,为,我,们,吃,了,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,的,农,作,物,，,就,会,有,害,于,人,的,健,康,，,我,觉,得,不,如,不,吃,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU

我,们,一,边,聊,天,一,边,看,电,影,，,过,了,很,快,乐,的,时,间,。,对,我,来,说,，,这,个,暑,假,给,我,深,刻,的,印,象,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-VV,C-AS,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
但,还,有,其,他,原,因,会,能,给,那,些,运,动,人,员,这,么,高,的,收,入,，,就,是,他,的,努,力,。	C-AD,C-CC,C-CC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
如,果,每,个,人,追,求,自,己,的,利,益,的,话,，,现,代,社,会,不,可,能,是,好,转,的,。,我,们,应,该,考,虑,世,界,而,地,球,整,体,的,利,益,，,这,样,下,去,，,人,在,地,球,上,才,能,继,续,存,在,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,W-AD,W-VV,W-VV,W-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-MSP,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-VV,R-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

男,女,分,班,的,学,校,，,在,国,外,已,有,办,理,了,很,长,时,间,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-VE,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-AD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

就,下,一,代,而,言,，,他,们,也,应,该,努,力,吸,取,上,一,代,的,教,训,，,又,努,力,尊,重,上,一,代,的,经,验,。	C-AD,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
看,这,种,情,况,的,时,候,我,想,不,只,是,每,个,国,家,、,省,、,市,，,而,而,每,个,区,也,应,该,想,想,还,是,作,出,让,吸,烟,的,人,少,在,公,共,场,所,边,走,边,抽,烟,。,如,像,日,本,政,府,做,的,我,觉,得,他,们,做,的,非,常,好,。	S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,S-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,C-AD,C-VC,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-DEC,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

人,在,生,活,和,工,作,中,，,总,会,遇,到,各,种,各,样,的,困,难,和,挫,折,，,似,骑,自,行,车,总,有,坎,坷,路,一,样,，,一,会,儿,下,坡,，,一,会,儿,上,坡,，,关,键,是,我,们,用,什,么,办,法,为,了,走,过,这,段,坎,坷,路,。	C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VA,C-VA,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,R-P,R-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-M,C-VA,C-VA,C-NN,C-PU
有,时,这,种,差,距,或,见,被,认,为,时,代,、,思,想,发,展,的,结,果,，,然,而,在,某,种,意,见,上,如,更,换,工,作,，,同,居,，,结,婚,等,在,长,辈,们,看,来,现,在,的,年,轻,人,太,开,放,了,，,甚,至,他,们,认,为,年,轻,人,有,问,题,。,有,的,家,庭,里,面,会,发,生,父,母,与,子,女,之,间,由,于,‘,代,沟,’,而,发,生,小,战,争,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-VV,C-SB,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-NN,S-NN,S-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-P,C-P,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

这,一,点,法,院,也,应,该,体,会,到,，,从,而,死,者,丈,夫,不,应,该,受,到,法,律,的,制,裁,。	C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,认,为,想,得,到,自,己,需,要,的,东,西,不,能,全,依,靠,别,人,而,应,该,自,己,去,斗,奋,。,三,个,和,尚,的,吃,亏,就,在,于,他,们,都,想,不,靠,自,己,的,劳,动,沾,光,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,S-DT,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,S-VV,S-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,样,生,活,很,长,了,，,那,就,跟,父,母,产,生,代,沟,问,题,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,R-PN,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
所,以,全,国,不,但,先,进,国,家,，,而,且,落,后,的,国,家,都,进,行,禁,止,吸,烟,而,规,定,在,公,共,场,所,边,走,边,抽,烟,的,人,将,被,罚,款,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,R-VV,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-SB,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

西,边,靠,海,，,东,边,有,山,，,自,然,资,源,十,分,丰,富,，,而,且,名,胜,古,迹,也,很,多,，,历,史,悠,久,的,城,市,。,我,去,那,边,是,四,月,份,初,，,正,好,樱,花,盛,开,的,时,候,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,M-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VC,S-NT,S-NT,S-NT,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

以,前,对,很,多,人,来,说,吃,饱,肚,子,是,最,关,键,的,事,，,因,为,以,前,的,农,业,技,术,不,足,于,生,产,大,量,的,粮,食,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

第,一,是,青,少,年,很,难,买,烟,草,。,在,日,本,，,对,看,起,来,年,轻,人,，,可,以,让,他,提,出,身,份,证,，,而,且,十,一,点,后,不,能,买,。,从,而,对,青,少,年,来,说,，,买,烟,草,的,机,会,非,常,少,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,R-AD,R-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU

我,是,生,产,者,，,这,个,意,识,从,这,个,时,候,起,，,越,来,越,强,。,但,是,三,十,多,天,是,太,短,了,，,我,习,惯,工,作,时,是,我,和,农,村,离,开,的,时,，,我,不,愿,意,离,开,，,但,非,回,家,不,可,。,只,有,三,十,多,天,，,但,是,我,的,人,生,中,，,这,个,三,十,多,天,是,很,重,要,的,经,验,。	C-PN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-NN,R-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-LC,C-VC,C-PN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,S-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-DT,R-DT,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU

我,先,阅,读,的,短,文,中,指,出,“,如,果,不,用,化,肥,和,农,药,，,农,作,物,的,产,量,又,会,大,大,降,低,”,真,的,是,这,样,子,吗,？,我,认,为,问,题,在,于,生,产,者,的,意,识,中,。	C-PN,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-PU
一,般,，,随,着,社,会,的,经,济,越,发,达,人,民,就,关,心,健,康,和,环,境,，,所,以,在,很,多,发,展,中,、,发,达,国,家,为,了,健,康,找,绿,色,食,品,，,而,且,为,保,护,环,境,提,倡,“,不,要,用,农,药,”,可,是,如,果,不,用,化,肥,和,农,药,，,农,作,物,的,产,量,又,会,大,大,降,低,，,而,现,在,世,界,上,还,有,几,亿,人,因,缺,少,粮,食,而,挨,饿,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,R-P,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-P,C-AD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-CC,C-CC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
由,于,是,通,过,朋,友,的,介,绍,，,那,就,可,省,略,对,这,人,的,戒,心,，,对,他,也,会,有,一,定,的,了,解,（,因,友,人,一,定,会,告,知,的,）,。	C-P,C-P,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-P,C-DT,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-PU
在,上,述,的,专,家,和,我,们,老,百,姓,两,个,方,面,上,，,早,一,点,儿,实,现,不,用,化,肥,和,农,药,提,高,生,产,量,，,同,时,我,们,也,不,浪,费,食,物,，,这,些,是,解,决,这,个,问,题,的,关,键,。	S-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,S-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,是,ｘ,ｘ,ｘ,，,看,到,了,贵,公,司,的,招,聘,启,事,，,于,是,写,一,封,求,职,信,。	C-PN,C-VC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,M-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU

现,在,，,我,们,的,社,会,存,在,的,代,沟,问,题,很,深,，,可,是,好,像,大,家,不,太,意,识,到,。,如,果,自,己,的,身,上,发,生,代,沟,问,题,的,话,，,不,要,一,直,愿,望,对,方,，,应,该,想,一,想,怎,样,解,决,这,个,问,题,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-NN,S-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

但,我,再,往,现,代,少,年,的,角,度,来,看,呢,，,就,不,会,觉,得,希,奇,了,。,现,在,的,教,育,，,家,教,等,等,方,面,，,都,是,我,们,今,世,纪,的,模,型,。	C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,S-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-AS,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,S-NT,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,为,吃,污,染,的,农,产,品,加,工,的,食,品,就,是,像,吃,毒,药,一,样,，,终,于,危,害,人,的,健,康,。	C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,代,沟,的,问,题,，,不,仅,是,现,在,而,产,生,的,。,２,１,世,纪,前,就,稍,微,存,在,的,，,而,现,在,科,技,发,达,，,人,们,的,生,活,不,断,提,高,，,年,轻,人,就,不,断,地,追,求,时,代,。	C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NT,C-NT,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,R-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,父,亲,指,向,一,个,小,村,，,告,诉,我,们,说,：,“,那,个,小,村,就,是,我,出,生,的,地,方,。,由,于,当,时,只,有,三,户,家,，,所,以,叫,做,‘,三,家,子,’,我,小,的,时,候,就,常,常,来,到,这,座,山,玩,。,现,在,什,么,都,变,了,，,可,是,回,忆,还,是,那,么,鲜,艳,、,清,楚,。	C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-JJ,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,R-VV,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,S-VA,S-VA,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

我,对,在,公,共,场,所,的,吸,烟,者,很,满,意,，,因,为,吸,烟,者,在,某,些,场,所,吸,烟,时,产,生,的,烟,对,旁,边,的,人,有,害,，,那,些,吸,烟,者,们,无,意,中,给,旁,边,的,人,进,行,身,体,和,精,神,上,的,伤,害,。,对,于,不,吸,烟,的,人,来,说,这,是,对,健,康,非,常,不,利,的,，,所,以,政,府,应,该,在,公,共,场,所,或,在,路,上,边,走,边,抽,烟,的,行,为,严,厉,的,惩,罚,措,施,。,这,也,是,有,助,于,青,少,年,的,，,青,少,年,们,很,容,易,在,上,学,的,路,上,或,者,在,街,上,随,时,都,能,看,到,在,抽,烟,的,人,，,他,们,以,为,能,随,便,吸,烟,就,能,全,面,做,成,年,人,。	C-PN,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PN,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,M-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

青,少,年,在,中,学,时,代,，,正,是,处,在,塑,造,人,格,、,建,立,人,生,观,与,正,确,思,想,的,阶,段,，,在,这,非,常,时,期,，,更,应,该,采,取,开,放,的,态,度,，,让,孩,子,们,往,多,方,面,去,学,习,，,接,触,及,发,展,，,同,时,也,在,与,人,的,交,往,、,沟,通,中,，,学,习,如,何,去,包,容,、,接,纳,不,同,的,看,法,，,不,同,的,生,命,个,体,，,从,中,获,得,成,长,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-DT,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-P,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
如,果,多,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,，,会,造,成,各,种,副,作,用,，,会,引,起,个,人,的,一,生,健,康,。,第,二,开,发,绿,色,食,品,便,于,农,土,保,护,。,过,度,使,用,农,药,以,后,已,经,破,坏,的,农,土,，,很,不,容,易,回,生,以,前,的,样,子,，,在,农,土,里,面,已,经,堆,着,有,害,物,质,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,S-NN,S-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-VV,S-VV,S-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-AS,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
我,认,为,“,安,乐,死,”,是,在,局,限,的,情,况,下,可,以,进,行,的,一,种,医,疗,措,施,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-P,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
按,相,对,的,立,场,想,看,看,他,们,的,意,见,才,了,解,父,母,与,子,女,的,思,想,。,按,照,相,对,的,看,法,谈,一,谈,，,听,父,母,与,子,女,的,话,，,就,这,样,解,决,代,沟,的,问,题,。	S-P,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-CD,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
可,是,，,是,不,是,每,对,父,母,都,知,道,这,一,点,了,？	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VC,C-AD,C-VC,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,S-SP,C-PU
我,觉,得,“,安,乐,死,”,应,该,在,各,个,国,家,的,社,会,情,况,下,被,认,可,。,为,此,我,们,还,需,要,更,加,讲,究,这,个,问,题,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-SB,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-AD,S-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

第,二,天,去,长,城,。,俗,话,说,“,不,到,长,城,非,好,汉,”,，,有,的,朋,友,以,前,开,玩,笑,得,说,“,你,还,没,去,过,长,城,！,哪,你,就,是,非,好,汉,吧,！	C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-VV,M-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,S-AD,C-PN,C-AD,S-VC,S-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
“,三,个,和,尚,没,水,喝,”,—,—,从,这,句,话,我,想,到,的,，,就,是,人,们,大,家,互,相,帮,助,、,共,同,努,力,的,重,要,性,。	C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-CC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-PU,C-P,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,R-NN,R-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

首,先,我,应,该,承,认,我,比,较,欣,赏,听,",Ｓ,Ｈ,Ｅ,",的,歌,。,一,方,面,是,她,们,的,嗓,子,都,很,不,错,，,另,一,方,面,是,她,们,都,很,美,丽,的,女,孩,儿,呀,！	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,M-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

那,个,时,候,的,我,虽,然,一,句,汉,语,也,不,会,说,，,但,是,我,却,把,他,的,这,一,首,歌,背,了,起,来,，,还,叫,一,些,华,人,朋,友,帮,我,翻,译,成,英,语,，,大,家,都,在,集,体,活,动,的,时,候,，,我,却,坐,在,一,旁,听,着,他,的,歌,自,得,其,乐,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-PN,C-CS,C-CS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-BA,C-PN,C-DEG,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

工,作,更,忙,了,，,除,了,要,与,各,班,主,任,联,系,，,了,解,各,班,的,学,习,成,绩,外,，,还,要,派,人,或,亲,自,给,别,班,学,进,行,辅,导,、,举,行,演,讲,比,赛,等,等,。	M-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-AS,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-P,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-CC,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-DT,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU

在,这,种,情,况,下,，,大,家,才,能,互,相,了,解,彼,此,的,优,缺,点,，,渐,渐,的,认,为,对,方,适,合,自,己,的,条,件,，,才,进,一,步,的,发,展,感,情,，,感,情,也,会,比,较,稳,固,。	C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,S-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

如,果,从,年,轻,开,始,的,话,，,更,容,易,上,瘾,抽,烟,，,而,且,容,易,地,上,瘾,违,法,的,药,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,M-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,W-VV,W-VV,M-VV,W-VV,W-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,W-VV,W-VV,M-VV,W-VV,W-DEC,W-NN,C-PU

再,说,，,如,果,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,，,可,以,大,大,提,高,产,量,，,但,不,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,，,产,量,会,大,大,降,低,的,，,从,而,可,以,强,，,为,了,没,钱,买,东,西,的,人,，,要,大,大,增,加,生,产,力,，,给,那,些,穷,的,人,吃,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VE,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU

第,一,，,最,主,要,的,原,因,就,是,社,会,，,现,在,社,会,变,化,很,大,，,生,活,水,平,也,提,高,了,，,在,这,样,的,情,况,下,双,薪,家,庭,越,来,越,多,，,父,母,们,都,匆,匆,忙,忙,地,在,外,边,工,作,很,晚,回,家,没,有,时,间,照,顾,孩,子,并,且,和,孩,子,聊,天,交,流,的,时,间,很,少,，,互,相,不,了,解,那,么,怎,么,交,流,呢,？,尤,其,是,青,春,发,育,期,间,最,需,要,父,母,的,关,怀,，,当,时,没,有,得,到,父,母,的,关,怀,和,爱,情,那,么,孩,子,容,易,走,去,不,好,的,环,境,并,不,想,和,父,母,一,块,生,活,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,S-JJ,S-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
妈,妈,，,最,近,我,要,了,分,家,而,让,您,伤,心,么,，,我,的,确,是,不,太,孝,顺,的,女,儿,吧,。,那,时,我,觉,得,离,家,到,学,校,很,远,，,一,天,在,路,上,费,的,时,间,太,多,，,所,以,我,在,学,校,附,近,租,一,间,房,子,比,较,好,。,那,时,我,只,考,虑,我,的,立,场,没,考,虑,爸,妈,的,意,见,，,真,没,想,到,没,有,孩,子,的,家,庭,对,父,母,觉,得,多,么,寂,寞,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-VV,R-AS,S-VV,S-VV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,R-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,S-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

为,了,劝,说,烟,民,我,们,也,需,要,非,常,了,解,烟,对,人,的,危,害,，,这,样,才,我,们,所,说,的,话,具,有,说,服,力,。,我,的,意,思,是,不,管,在,什,么,地,方,禁,止,吸,烟,，,这,不,仅,涉,及,到,那,些,烟,民,还,涉,及,到,我,们,这,些,被,动,吸,烟,者,。,我,们,如,果,看,到,某,一,个,人,在,禁,止,吸,烟,的,公,众,场,所,吸,烟,的,话,不,能,旁,观,不,去,管,，,而,应,该,有,意,识,地,去,提,醒,他,。	C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-AD,W-PN,W-PN,W-MSP,W-VV,W-DEC,W-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DT,C-DT,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-PN,W-PN,W-CS,W-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU
那,就,是,父,母,和,子,女,之,间,的,对,话,，,这,是,唯,一,的,解,决,方,法,，,通,过,两,者,之,间,的,对,话,才,理,解,互,相,的,心,理,。,父,母,给,子,女,说,他,们,的,要,求,让,子,女,理,解,，,子,女,的,立,场,也,是,一,样,。,每,天,，,还,是,每,周,几,个,小,时,这,样,跟,父,母,，,还,是,跟,子,女,聊,天,儿,吧,，,代,沟,的,问,题,肯,定,消,失,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-CC,S-CC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU

”,叫,了,一,声,回,头,一,看,，,原,来,是,后,边,男,人,抽,的,烟,碰,到,了,我,的,手,。	C-PU,M-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU

你,在,沙,漠,里,，,带,孩,子,，,这,几,天,没,有,吃,饭,。,走,路,找,吃,的,东,西,，,累,得,几,乎,要,命,。	C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VA,C-DER,R-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

我,相,信,我,男,女,混,合,式,教,育,是,很,好,的,。,混,合,教,育,是,可,以,理,解,异,性,的,不,一,样,的,地,方,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,R-PN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU
我,在,廿,五,岁,那,年,，,曾,因,流,肚,子,入,院,一,个,多,月,，,每,天,都,是,以,点,滴,过,活,，,什,么,都,不,能,吃,，,只,能,喝,水,和,吃,药,，,有,时,甚,至,连,药,都,敏,感,。,敏,感,的,程,度,是,：,一,个,人,变,得,硬,硬,的,，,然,发,昏,过,去,，,醒,来,的,时,候,，,整,个,人,好,似,经,过,百,战,，,满,身,都,是,冰,冷,、,软,软,的,，,任,由,医,生,们,推,来,推,去,，,移,过,来,又,移,过,去,。	C-PN,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,S-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-DER,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

例,如,：,一,个,人,因,为,为,了,可,以,拿,到,家,产,，,把,他,的,父,亲,杀,掉,，,然,后,为,了,避,免,法,律,的,制,裁,，,并,用,“,帮,助,他,父,亲,安,乐,死,”,的,话,怎,么,办,？	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,R-P,R-P,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-BA,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

随,着,社,会,的,发,展,，,人,们,水,平,的,提,高,，,歌,曲,也,比,以,前,变,得,多,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,W-AD,W-P,W-NT,W-NT,W-VV,W-DER,C-VA,M-PU
总,结,，,我,认,为,通,过,亲,朋,戚,友,或,婚,姻,介,绍,所,而,结,交,的,男,女,在,一,定,程,度,上,在,双,方,未,见,面,以,前,，,对,彼,此,已,经,有,浅,薄,的,认,识,，,然,后,在,经,结,交,后,，,慢,慢,了,解,，,日,久,生,情,，,方,走,下,婚,姻,殿,堂,，,这,样,双,方,的,感,情,才,会,持,久,如,新,。	S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,R-P,R-JJ,R-JJ,R-NN,R-NN,R-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,R-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
烟,头,可,以,说,很,小,，,因,为,它,只,不,过,三,寸,而,已,可,是,可,以,说,很,大,，,因,为,它,涉,及,到,工,农,商,等,各,各,方,面,。,据,国,民,健,康,有,关,部,门,的,调,查,，,最,近,吸,烟,者,越,来,越,多,，,尤,其,是,年,轻,的,吸,烟,者,，,令,人,吸,惊,的,速,度,来,增,加,了,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,S-DT,S-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-VV,C-NN,S-VV,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,S-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,R-SP,C-PU

我,们,尽,量,要,看,长,期,性,利,益,。,法,律,的,目,的,是,全,国,人,民,的,广,大,利,益,。,有,时,为,了,达,到,大,目,标,要,放,弃,小,东,西,。	C-PN,C-PN,W-AD,W-AD,W-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU

我,认,为,，,中,国,跟,发,达,国,家,相,比,，,对,吸,烟,者,不,够,严,格,，,在,中,国,连,在,飞,机,上,可,抽,烟,，,所,以,政,府,应,该,更,重,视,这,方,面,的,问,题,。,希,望,这,一,次,出,台,的,这,项,规,定,尽,快,施,行,而,提,高,中,国,人,对,吸,烟,的,意,识,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU

有,人,说,不,应,该,允,许,“,安,乐,死,”,，,但,我,觉,得,因,为,我,有,小,时,候,那,么,不,幸,远,的,经,验,，,又,为,了,家,人,又,为,了,病,人,，,应,该,允,许,“,安,乐,死,”,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,R-VA,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU
第,二,个,好,处,是,给,人,们,一,种,乐,趣,。,听,流,行,歌,曲,可,以,作,是,个,爱,好,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VC,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

可,是,如,果,我,接,受,她,的,提,议,，,那,么,给,她,很,大,的,经,济,方,面,的,问,题,吧,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
不,说,我,们,普,通,老,百,姓,，,有,时,连,比,商,人,，,有,名,的,政,治,家,还,高,。	C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
虽,然,时,代,潮,流,冲,击,着,人,们,的,观,念,超,前,的,前,卫,，,我,个,人,的,婚,姻,却,仍,选,择,了,一,条,慢,行,道,。,我,和,我,的,先,生,相,识,在,１,５,年,前,，,彼,此,从,互,相,了,解,、,互,相,认,识,到,共,结,连,理,整,整,经,过,５,年,，,正,是,因,为,这,段,深,厚,的,基,础,，,才,使,得,我,们,婚,后,的,生,活,日,益,美,满,，,尤,其,是,有,了,孩,子,之,后,，,彼,此,更,是,互,相,照,顾,，,那,种,恩,爱,如,初,的,感,觉,一,直,驻,扎,在,我,们,心,中,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-JJ,R-JJ,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-VA,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-CC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-M,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VE,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,主,要,的,问,题,也,许,只,出,现,给,东,方,或,亚,洲,的,社,会,因,为,一,向,以,来,，,性,的,观,念,或,性,教,育,就,不,曾,出,现,在,学,校,所,提,供,的,学,习,过,程,中,。	C-PN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
所,以,，,才,有,不,少,专,家,们,有,这,样,的,观,点,是,：,准,备,当,妈,妈,的,人,应,该,注,意,：,你,别,想,生,了,孩,子,以,后,你,才,教,育,他,，,而,从,他,还,在,你,身,体,里,起,开,始,进,行,教,育,化,才,对,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-VC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
如,果,在,文,章,里,所,说,那,样,家,长,们,的,支,持,男,女,分,班,的,原,因,只,有,避,免,学,生,早,恋,，,我,更,反,对,男,女,分,班,。	C-CS,C-CS,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-MSP,C-VV,M-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
还,所,有,的,父,母,教,自,己,的,儿,童,怎,么,跟,别,人,说,话,。,例,如,，,我,的,父,母,教,了,我,尊,敬,老,人,，,也,不,动,小,人,。,还,父,母,教,我,们,在,所,有,的,情,况,怎,么,办,。,例,如,，,我,的,的,父,母,说,：,如,我,没,有,钱,的,话,，,就,我,不,要,去,偷,什,么,东,西,或,不,要,去,杀,什,么,人,，,我,就,是,要,去,打,工,。,还,为,什,么,父,母,是,孩,子,的,第,一,任,老,师,，,这,因,为,孩,子,从,小,看,自,己,父,母,的,改,况,，,看,父,母,出,什,么,问,题,，,看,他,们,怎,么,解,决,这,些,问,题,。	S-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,R-AS,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,S-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,R-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,W-AD,W-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,S-AD,S-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,M-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,我,肯,定,不,会,因,为,每,个,人,都,有,以,与,众,不,同,的,方,式,来,结,交,朋,友,的,。	R-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,R-P,R-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,R-VE,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

一,到,晚,上,，,我,们,游,客,参,观,民,族,传,统,舞,蹈,与,唱,歌,。	C-CD,C-CC,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU
以,前,我,的,父,母,常,常,给,我,说,：,“,对,长,辈,们,做,不,礼,貌,的,行,为,不,行,。,比,如,坐,公,共,汽,车,时,，,你,先,占,空,位,子,以,后,，,长,或,老,人,来,的,话,，,你,应,该,让,步,你,已,坐,的,位,子,”,。,但,是,在,现,在,的,生,活,当,中,，,做,这,样,的,年,轻,人,见,得,少,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,S-VA,S-PU

这,样,每,一,个,人,都,关,注,节,省,食,物,习,惯,的,问,题,，,可,能,很,快,解,决,挨,饿,问,题,，,而,且,还,能,解,决,其,他,的,外,交,问,题,吧,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-SP,C-PU

如,果,我,做,了,不,好,的,话,，,我,妈,一,定,要,跟,我,说,“,你,不,应,该,这,样,做,！,”,这,时,才,我,的,观,念,被,我,妈,改,变,了,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,W-AD,W-PN,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,C-LB,C-PN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU

而,且,我,，,我,也,是,不,断,地,努,力,以,父,亲,立,场,而,想,。,有,时,候,父,亲,跟,我,对,话,时,，,出,现,一,些,对,立,的,现,象,，,但,我,们,解,决,的,问,题,是,非,常,明,智,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,R-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-AD,C-AD,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-MSP,S-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
可,是,最,重,要,的,是,要,用,平,静,的,态,度,来,跟,父,母,说,。,再,来,就,是,跟,他,们,说,你,朋,友,父,母,对,这,个,问,题,有,什,么,看,法,，,父,母,也,会,对,这,个,问,题,想,一,下,。,这,样,就,能,解,决,代,沟,以,的,问,题,了,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VC,C-VV,C-P,S-VA,S-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,R-VV,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,R-P,W-DT,W-DT,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,W-AD,W-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-P,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

其,实,不,全,是,人,数,的,问,题,，,我,们,相,触,别,人,时,，,要,交,往,时,往,往,忽,视,最,重,要,的,原,则,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,S-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,虽,然,喜,欢,听,流,行,歌,曲,，,但,我,不,太,喜,欢,看,别,人,疯,狂,地,喜,欢,这,些,歌,曲,，,特,别,是,不,喜,欢,人,们,疯,狂,于,那,些,歌,手,。,因,为,很,多,人,只,是,因,为,喜,欢,那,些,歌,手,而,听,，,并,不,是,在,赏,音,乐,。	C-PN,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,R-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

每,天,打,针,，,但,后,来,打,了,针,吃,了,药,以,后,也,控,制,不,了,痛,苦,了,。,他,跟,医,生,说,他,不,想,活,下,去,了,，,反,正,迟,早,会,死,的,，,干,脆,把,他,杀,好,了,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-LC,C-MSP,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,R-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,M-VA,C-AS,C-PU
医,生,说,了,一,个,星,期,以,后,它,就,自,己,死,，,可,是,它,当,时,非,常,痛,苦,，,它,夜,间,哭,，,什,么,都,不,吃,，,连,水,都,不,喝,，,一,直,拉,肚,子,，,出,血,，,看,它,这,个,样,子,，,我,觉,得,更,痛,苦,，,我,就,同,意,了,“,安,乐,死,”,。,手,术,时,我,去,出,到,外,边,，,狗,哭,的,声,音,让,我,受,不,了,，,我,哭,了,。,朋,友,们,说,“,安,乐,死,”,是,更,好,的,办,法,，,否,则,狗,终,于,自,己,死,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,R-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PN,C-AD,R-PN,R-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,S-AD,S-AD,C-PN,C-PN,M-VV,C-PU

我,是,泰,国,华,侨,处,于,大,家,庭,环,境,在,小,时,候,父,母,亲,管,教,很,严,全,部,用,潮,州,人,的,文,化,来,教,诲,子,女,第,一,个,最,重,要,事,项,就,子,女,必,须,孝,顺,长,辈,不,管,是,父,母,还,是,叔,伯,们,都,要,尊,敬,。,我,们,从,小,就,已,习,惯,了,这,种,传,统,教,养,也,觉,得,小,一,辈,的,必,须,尊,敬,长,辈,这,是,我,们,中,国,人,优,美,文,化,。	C-PN,C-VC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-OD,R-OD,R-M,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-NN,S-NN,S-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CS,C-CS,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,S-VA,S-VA,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

”,老,师,听,他,说,很,感,动,。	C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,M-PN,C-VV,M-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

在,人,生,中,谁,都,遭,到,各,种,喜,事,和,坏,事,。,但,我,觉,得,这,些,经,验,对,自,己,好,坏,是,我,结,束,自,己,的,人,生,时,才,能,决,定,的,。,所,以,，,如,果,遭,到,挫,折,也,不,用,叹,气,，,这,不,一,定,是,挫,折,，,也,有,可,能,这,是,让,你,享,受,一,大,幸,福,第,一,端,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PN,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,M-NN,C-VC,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-VC,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,S-OD,S-OD,S-NN,C-PU
最,近,由,几,所,工,作,单,位,开,始,隔,离,吸,烟,者,与,非,吸,烟,者,的,地,方,，,甚,至,不,接,受,吸,烟,者,上,班,以,免,破,坏,环,境,。	C-NT,C-NT,S-P,C-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEC,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
然,后,他,们,上,高,中,的,时,候,，,学,习,不,太,好,，,而,且,那,个,男,同,学,的,成,绩,非,常,不,好,，,结,果,他,考,不,成,大,学,，,做,不,了,好,的,工,作,。,现,在,他,二,十,三,岁,，,现,在,的,他,的,生,活,是,：,挣,点,了,钱,那,么,玩,，,没,有,了,钱,那,么,打,工,，,这,种,的,生,活,。	S-AD,S-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-DT,C-DT,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,R-DEG,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-NN,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-VE,C-VE,R-AS,C-NN,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,M-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,为,那,种,化,肥,和,农,药,成,分,藏,在,我,们,的,身,体,里,可,能,遗,传,到,我,们,未,来,的,后,代,世,代,，,引,起,使,孩,子,们,不,正,常,地,成,长,，,所,以,很,危,险,。	C-P,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,R-NT,R-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
他,的,爸,妈,得,花,很,多,钱,才,能,救,他,活,。	C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-CD,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,W-PN,W-VV,C-PU
这,说,话,有,道,理,。	C-PN,R-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,为,这,会,导,致,将,来,男,生,和,女,生,很,难,融,合,的,现,象,。	C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU

随,着,成,长,孩,子,逐,渐,知,道,不,是,这,回,事,。	C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VC,S-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-PU

我,自,己,认,为,安,乐,死,是,可,以,的,。,如,果,我,知,道,病,人,患,的,病,已,经,治,好,不,了,了,，,我,觉,得,让,他,安,乐,死,比,较,好,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-VV,S-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,R-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU

现,在,有,些,国,家,，,吃,的,比,较,丰,富,的,，,他,们,开,始,注,意,自,己,的,健,康,。,生,活,水,平,提,高,了,，,那,当,然,人,们,的,需,求,也,增,加,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-DER,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,R-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,R-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
我,听,说,在,日,本,为,了,吸,烟,者,造,了,一,个,专,门,吸,烟,者,们,用,的,公,共,吸,烟,车,，,那,里,可,以,自,由,的,抽,烟,，,而,且,不,罚,款,。,我,觉,得,日,本,用,的,这,种,方,法,特,别,好,，,因,为,宁,可,是,共,公,场,所,，,抽,烟,的,人,可,以,进,那,个,车,里,自,由,地,抽,，,当,然,对,不,抽,烟,的,人,来,说,也,是,一,个,不,错,的,方,法,。,所,以,我,非,常,的,希,望,世,界,的,各,国,也,像,日,本,一,样,用,“,吸,烟,车,”,的,方,法,来,解,决,吸,烟,者,和,我,们,的,烦,恼,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,S-P,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-P,S-AD,S-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

那,我,分,为,在,两,个,立,场,上,写,议,论,。	C-AD,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-P,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
有,的,人,吸,不,吸,烟,是,自,己,的,爱,好,，,但,自,己,的,爱,好,对,给,别,人,不,好,的,影,响,的,话,，,吸,烟,的,人,应,该,照,顾,别,人,。,有,的,人,在,汽,车,里,抽,，,车,里,面,甚,至,电,梯,里,面,也,抽,，,不,管,身,体,、,学,习,、,工,作,上,也,有,很,大,的,影,响,，,这,样,的,话,工,作,能,力,和,学,习,能,力,越,来,越,不,好,。,吸,烟,是,对,给,整,个,社,会,不,好,的,影,响,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,M-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-PU,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,R-AD,R-VE,R-AD,R-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,R-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

那,就,妻,子,也,肯,定,很,不,希,望,让,丈,夫,那,么,辛,苦,。,因,此,，,可,以,取,帮,助,她,自,杀,。,不,这,样,做,一,定,遗,憾,。	C-AD,R-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,种,时,候,，,日,本,有,一,个,正,好,的,词,语,，,叫,“,反,面,教,师,”,。,这,个,词,的,意,思,是,不,模,拟,别,人,的,不,好,行,为,。,孩,子,常,常,模,拟,别,人,，,特,别,是,父,母,的,，,父,母,的,说,法,、,行,动,是,孩,子,的,说,法,、,行,动,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,R-AD,R-AD,R-DEV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,R-SP,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU
虽,然,最,近,通,过,基,因,研,究,进,行,解,决,这,个,问,题,，,但,目,前,没,有,找,到,通,过,研,究,证,明,对,身,体,无,害,的,食,品,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,R-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
虽,然,只,是,两,天,，,但,是,觉,得,没,有,可,吃,的,东,西,非,常,难,道,。,过,两,天,后,我,终,于,得,到,了,食,品,。,我,一,边,吃,一,边,想,，,这,世,界,上,没,有,比,吃,饭,还,幸,福,的,事,情,了,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-AD,S-AD,C-PU,C-VV,M-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,C-VE,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

我,个,人,怎,么,说,呢,，,因,为,我,以,前,在,上,海,医,科,大,学,念,过,书,，,所,以,对,这,此,话,题,有,一,点,敏,感,。,听,朋,友,说,，,在,荷,兰,现,在,已,经,在,家,里,人,和,个,人,的,同,意,下,允,许,了,这,些,“,安,乐,死,”,的,东,西,。,还,有,别,的,发,达,国,家,就,现,在,慢,慢,允,许,安,乐,死,的,。,当,然,这,些,国,家,也,有,条,件,，,比,如,说,，,个,人,和,家,属,人,的,同,意,，,还,剩,下,的,生,命,也,不,到,一,个,月,等,等,。	C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,R-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,R-DT,R-DT,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-DEC,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU

我,们,在,街,上,走,，,常,时,会,有,很,多,人,在,我,们,旁,边,抽,烟,，,有,的,很,有,礼,貌,，,有,的,却,非,常,自,私,，,不,顾,别,人,，,自,求,自,己,的,方,便,，,我,觉,得,这,是,不,对,的,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

因,而,老,年,人,可,以,听,到,流,行,歌,曲,，,能,得,到,现,代,年,青,人,所,想,的,。,这,就,是,利,于,年,青,人,与,老,年,人,互,相,了,解,的,通,道,，,结,决,世,代,差,的,大,问,题,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,R-VV,C-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-VV,S-AD,S-NN,S-NN,S-VA,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,的,亲,身,体,会,，,我,读,书,时,期,，,从,小,学,到,高,中,我,喜,欢,唱,具,有,建,设,性,的,流,行,歌,曲,，,如,：,小,学,的,我,老,师,总,在,节,日,佳,节,高,叫,我,唱,歌,舞,蹈,，,我,会,自,己,选,择,《,卖,花,姑,娘,》,歌,中,描,写,那,位,姑,娘,勤,劳,栽,花,把,美,丽,的,各,种,各,样,新,鲜,的,花,朵,，,从,家,乡,清,晨,步,行,卖,到,城,市,爱,花,的,市,民,，,而,那,市,民,还,睡,着,，,她,呢,大,叫,大,喊,大,叫,唤,醒,市,民,。,还,有,我,中,学,时,我,校,校,庆,十,周,年,纪,念,，,我,领,唱,合,唱,上,甘,岭,抗,日,战,争,主,题,影,片,《,我,的,祖,国,》,，,大,家,都,兴,高,采,烈,的,直,喊,好,，,还,有,《,我,的,故,乡,变,了,样,》,，,这,些,都,使,华,侨,爱,祖,国,爱,故,乡,。	C-PN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PU,W-NN,W-NN,W-DEG,W-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,R-VA,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,M-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-BA,W-JJ,W-JJ,W-DEG,W-JJ,W-JJ,W-JJ,W-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,M-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-PN,C-SP,R-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-OD,W-NN,W-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
如,此,，,众,所,周,知,，,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,会,有,好,处,与,坏,处,的,两,个,方,面,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

原,来,食,品,是,帮,助,我,们,人,类,生,命,的,，,但,由,于,在,农,作,物,的,生,长,过,程,中,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,，,它,们,成,为,不,是,帮,助,我,们,生,命,的,，,而,是,危,害,我,们,生,命,的,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
我,还,记,得,，,那,时,候,因,为,我,很,想,画,画,，,看,左,看,右,没,有,看,空,的,纸,，,然,后,我,拿,随,便,的,纸,，,画,好,了,我,才,知,道,，,原,来,那,个,纸,是,我,爸,爸,跟,他,的,工,作,有,关,。,为,了,不,被,我,爸,爸,抓,住,，,我,扔,到,外,面,。,从,工,作,回,的,时,候,，,我,爸,爸,找,不,到,那,件,重,要,的,纸,。,我,不,敢,出,去,，,在,房,间,里,安,安,静,静,。,突,然,我,很,吃,惊,，,我,爸,爸,大,声,地,叫,我,的,名,字,，,他,问,我,关,于,那,个,纸,，,我,还,回,答,说,不,知,道,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-VV,S-NN,S-VV,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,M-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,M-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-VA,C-AS,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,S-DT,C-NN,C-VC,W-PN,W-NN,W-NN,W-P,R-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-P,S-NN,S-NN,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,S-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,W-VV,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-P,C-P,C-DT,S-DT,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

在,当,今,的,社,会,中,，,阅,读,是,个,不,可,缺,少,的,活,动,，,是,一,个,非,常,重,要,事,。	C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-NN,C-PU

另,外,，,学,生,也,可,能,因,为,异,性,的,好,奇,心,与,兴,趣,而,更,向,往,恋,爱,，,更,想,了,解,异,性,。,因,此,，,他,们,可,能,会,到,校,外,交,友,，,或,从,网,络,寻,找,异,性,朋,友,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,M-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,看,那,篇,故,事,，,就,想,到,这,种,情,况,。	C-PN,C-VV,S-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

在,学,校,，,我,看,到,的,是,，,我,爸,爸,对,学,生,多,么,受,欢,迎,！	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VC,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

那,次,旅,游,，,可,以,说,“,接,触,少,数,民,族,之,行,”,，,因,为,我,在,旅,途,中,认,识,了,许,多,少,数,民,族,。	C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
虽,然,吸,烟,者,很,担,心,给,别,人,的,影,响,，,也,应,该,有,。,由,于,烟,，,我,很,容,易,痛,眼,睛,，,而,且,呼,吸,痛,苦,。,可,能,吸,烟,者,已,经,习,惯,烟,的,味,道,和,香,味,，,可,是,在,同,一,个,地,球,上,有,多,少,很,讨,厌,烟,的,人,，,而,且,烟,对,人,的,身,体,不,好,。	R-CS,R-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,W-VA,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-CC,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VE,S-CD,S-CD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU
很,久,以,前,已,经,就,存,在,的,问,题,。,但,是,现,代,社,会,生,活,节,奏,越,来,加,快,，,生,活,方,式,的,变,化,越,来,越,多,，,因,比,这,种,矛,盾,越,来,越,深,该,了,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VA,S-VV,C-AS,C-PU
我,有,一,些,朋,友,上,女,子,大,学,，,在,那,边,里,除,了,男,的,老,师,以,外,没,有,男,人,。,在,日,本,女,学,校,的,学,生,是,很,礼,貌,、,很,善,良,的,印,象,。	C-PN,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,R-PN,C-LC,C-P,C-P,C-JJ,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU

如,“,媒,妁,之,言,”,般,贫,泛,。	C-P,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VA,S-VA,S-VA,C-PU
吸,烟,对,身,体,不,好,是,不,好,，,但,是,对,吸,烟,人,它,是,一,个,爱,好,。,政,府,勉,强,拿,走,他,们,的,爱,好,不,一,定,是,好,的,方,法,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,M-PN,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

这,样,的,讨,论,和,改,革,，,当,然,真,不,容,易,。,可,是,我,想,为,了,获,得,“,安,乐,死,”,的,权,利,和,避,免,痛,苦,地,生,存,状,态,，,这,件,事,情,一,定,要,做,的,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU

每,个,国,家,学,汉,语,是,很,热,门,。,我,希,望,为,了,世,界,贡,献,，,很,多,人,学,习,汉,语,，,因,为,中,国,是,有,前,途,的,国,家,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,R-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VC,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,想,现,在,要,开,发,对,人,体,、,环,境,影,响,非,常,小,的,农,药,而,做,和,绿,色,食,品,同,样,没,有,污,然,的,农,业,方,式,。,世,界,上,的,人,口,在,不,停,的,增,加,，,只,看,中,国,的,公,开,人,口,也,高,达,十,三,亿,，,还,是,很,多,人,没,有,今,天,吃,的,东,西,。,我,们,不,能,只,看,对,身,体,的,影,响,，,一,定,要,考,虑,怎,么,養,人,民,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-CC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-AD,C-VV,S-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-CD,W-NN,W-VE,W-VE,W-NT,W-NT,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
我,觉,得,这,是,因,为,不,仅,各,自,忙,于,自,己,的,事,，,而,且,我,故,意,避,免,面,对,爸,爸,和,妈,妈,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,W-VC,W-P,W-P,W-AD,W-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

我,觉,得,早,恋,没,有,什,么,问,题,，,反,而,有,好,处,才,对,了,。,经,过,恋,爱,，,学,生,们,就,考,虑,一,下,自,己,是,什,么,样,的,人,，,自,己,会,做,什,么,，,自,己,有,什,么,样,的,理,想,，,等,等,。,这,样,子,他,们,会,想,一,下,对,他,们,的,未,来,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-VE,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,R-VA,R-AS,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,R-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,说,明,是,“,绿,色,食,品,”,和,“,饥,饿,”,根,本,没,有,关,系,的,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,W-VC,W-PU,W-JJ,W-JJ,W-NN,W-NN,W-PU,W-CC,W-PU,W-NN,W-NN,W-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU
儿,女,们,小,时,候,，,完,全,倚,靠,父,母,的,道,理,、,指,导,，,现,在,他,们,长,大,了,，,有,学,问,，,应,让,他,们,把,学,问,实,行,出,来,，,让,他,们,把,理,论,化,为,实,际,行,动,，,也,就,是,说,我,们,应,当,理,解,他,们,、,接,受,他,们,、,尊,重,他,们,，,若,能,够,这,样,做,的,话,他,们,将,觉,得,父,母,是,多,么,爱,护,他,们,、,理,解,他,们,、,接,受,他,们,。,那,么,，,他,们,就,能,坦,然,的,把,心,里,话,说,出,，,父,母,儿,女,如,同,好,朋,友,一,样,坐,在,一,起,，,天,与,地,无,所,不,谈,了,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU
有,者,说,男,女,同,校,，,会,造,成,早,恋,、,早,孕,及,早,婚,。	C-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

上,述,了,我,认,为,每,个,人,都,自,己,决,定,生,死,的,自,由,。,所,以,，,如,果,法,庭,判,了,有,罪,的,判,决,，,等,于,它,犯,了,人,民,的,自,由,。,可,是,，,我,可,以,了,解,为,什,么,法,庭,判,了,丈,夫,的,有,罪,。	S-JJ,S-JJ,C-AS,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,M-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-VE,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,S-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-VE,C-NN,C-PU
人,们,常,常,说,：,“,抽,烟,是,百,害,无,利,的,”,特,别,对,青,少,年,、,怀,孕,的,人,不,好,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,W-AD,W-AD,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-PU,W-VV,W-VV,W-DEC,W-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU
从,日,本,来,到,中,国,的,我,来,说,，,已,经,是,出,国,的,状,态,，,但,是,大,多,数,的,同,事,来,说,，,出,国,是,第,一,次,的,事,。,所,以,很,多,同,事,问,我,“,出,国,事,应,该,怎,么,办,，,准,备,那,些,东,西,”,等,等,很,多,问,题,。,到,了,泰,国,以,后,也,问,我,“,泰,国,比,日,本,怎,么,样,，,泰,铢,和,日,元,的,换,率,是,多,少,”,等,等,关,于,日,本,的,事,也,很,多,次,问,我,。,我,在,泰,国,过,假,期,，,但,是,对,泰,国,的,理,解,比,出,发,前,并,没,有,深,，,反,而,对,自,己,国,家,的,理,解,越,来,越,深,，,例,：,日,本,总,面,积,是,三,十,七,万,平,方,米,，,日,本,某,一,个,县,的,人,口,和,泰,国,的,某,一,个,县,是,友,好,城,市,等,知,识,。,已,到,他,国,还,到,他,国,去,的,经,验,是,第,一,次,，,但,是,我,感,觉,是,我,还,是,从,日,本,来,的,游,客,，,而,中,国,旅,游,团,一,起,吃,饭,、,一,起,住,在,宾,馆,，,和,同,事,用,汉,语,来,交,谈,，,但,泰,国,的,导,游,第,一,个,问,我,“,你,是,中,国,人,吗,？	M-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEC,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,W-VV,W-VV,W-VC,W-OD,W-OD,W-M,R-DEG,R-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,S-DT,S-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,C-NR,C-NR,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,S-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NR,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-VV,S-NN,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-P,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-VV,M-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,W-P,W-VV,W-VV,W-LC,W-AD,W-VE,W-VE,S-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,S-NN,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-M,S-M,C-PU,C-NR,C-NR,C-DT,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,C-CC,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-DT,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,R-VC,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-CC,M-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU

我,看,以,后,重,要,的,是,取,除,痛,苦,的,医,疗,办,法,。,国,家,和,专,家,应,该,研,究,这,方,面,的,医,疗,，,让,人,们,放,心,地,迎,接,自,己,的,临,终,。,再,不,要,象,那,个,夫,妻,在,很,悲,惨,的,情,况,中,，,让,选,择,很,惨,的,办,法,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VC,S-VV,S-P,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-DT,S-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

但,是,从,真,正,的,更,自,然,的,角,度,来,说,，,人,类,的,基,因,上,也,没,有,自,然,而,然,地,组,织,家,庭,的,“,程,序,”,。,所,以,对,于,还,没,受,到,十,分,教,育,的,孩,子,来,说,，,社,会,上,的,父,母,还,只,是,自,己,的,“,前,辈,”,而,已,。,人,是,首,先,以,跟,自,己,一,样,的,身,份,的,镜,头,为,看,待,别,人,的,，,所,以,对,他,们,来,说,父,母,只,是,形,式,性,的,概,念,罢,了,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-LC,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-AD,S-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-SP,C-PU

这,是,对,我,来,说,一,种,很,宝,贵,的,东,西,。,如,果,将,来,我,自,己,有,了,孩,子,的,话,，,我,也,要,按,照,妈,妈,一,样,做,。	W-PN,W-VC,W-P,W-PN,W-LC,C-LC,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,S-P,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU

烟,里,的,尼,古,丁,衡,量,很,多,，,所,以,长,期,时,间,吸,烟,的,人,们,很,容,易,得,了,气,管,炎,、,肺,炎,等,等,。,还,有,，,吸,烟,给,公,众,利,益,的,影,响,也,不,少,，,那,就,是,被,动,吸,烟,者,的,问,题,。	C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,R-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-VV,R-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

从,这,个,角,度,来,说,，,为,了,保,护,身,体,健,康,忽,略,大,家,的,生,存,只,重,视,绿,色,食,品,是,不,太,正,确,的,解,决,问,题,。,因,为,要,是,只,做,绿,色,食,品,的,话,，,产,生,量,会,降,低,，,会,供,不,应,求,，,像,这,样,的,情,况,下,一,般,的,市,场,经,济,道,理,来,讲,，,只,有,有,钱,人,会,享,受,到,这,些,好,处,。,每,个,人,都,有,平,等,地,可,以,生,存,的,能,力,，,如,果,没,有,这,样,子,就,不,公,平,。,我,认,为,农,药,和,化,肥,也,可,以,水,洗,得,干,净,，,有,些,地,方,只,要,有,每,个,人,的,注,意,就,能,解,决,，,只,要,有,钱,就,能,活,下,去,是,不,应,该,的,，,因,为,如,此,，,我,认,为,不,挨,饿,是,比,吃,绿,色,食,品,还,更,重,要,的,，,特,别,是,像,中,国,这,么,人,口,多,的,国,家,人,人,活,下,去,很,难,以,做,的,，,为,了,特,定,的,人,的,健,康,，,不,该,忽,视,大,家,的,生,存,权,利,。	C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,M-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,S-VE,S-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-VV,R-DER,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VE,C-DT,R-DT,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VE,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-P,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,W-AD,W-AD,W-NN,W-NN,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,M-DEC,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

是,因,为,吸,烟,不,仅,仅,对,吸,烟,者,有,害,而,且,给,公,众,有,一,些,不,良,的,后,果,。	M-VC,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,C-CC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
吃,绿,色,食,品,的,行,为,里,含,有,自,然,主,义,和,平,和,主,义,的,理,想,，,不,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,是,个,为,了,做,成,绿,色,食,品,的,基,本,要,求,，,因,此,“,多,吃,绿,色,食,品,”,的,运,动,一,定,继,续,做,下,去,。	C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-M,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
在,这,种,情,况,下,，,我,对,选,择,“,安,乐,死,”,相,当,踌,躇,不,前,。	C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-PU
我,认,为,所,有,的,公,共,场,所,不,应,该,吸,烟,，,比,如,饭,店,、,学,校,、,厕,所,包,括,街,上,什,么,的,。,因,为,吸,烟,对,周,围,的,非,吸,烟,的,印,象,不,好,得,很,。,比,如,在,某,饭,店,吃,饭,的,时,候,，,如,果,周,围,有,吸,烟,者,，,而,且,他,吸,的,烟,来,我,这,儿,的,话,，,我,受,不,得,吃,饭,，,赶,紧,换,个,坐,位,，,要,不,很,不,舒,服,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,S-NN,S-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-MSP,M-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,S-AD,S-AD,S-VV,S-VV,S-PU,C-AD,M-AD,C-VV,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

２,０,０,０,１,年,夏,天,，,我,一,放,暑,假,就,去,了,韩,国,旅,游,。	S-CD,S-CD,S-CD,S-CD,S-CD,C-M,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

人,们,的,对,医,疗,的,看,法,变,得,怎,么,样,的,？,如,果,自,己,的,亲,人,得,了,一,种,不,治,之,症,，,那,么,，,有,可,能,有,人,希,望,让,亲,人,或,家,人,解,决,痛,苦,、,放,他,（,她,）,自,由,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DER,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,R-SP,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
现,在,在,我,们,世,界,上,每,天,越,来,越,多,发,生,犯,罪,。,如,果,每,个,父,母,对,孩,子,有,好,的,关,系,，,我,以,为,在,世,界,上,人,们,的,罪,恶,也,能,越,来,越,少,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,M-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-VA,W-VV,W-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-JJ,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU
得,种,种,害,处,。	S-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
而,且,因,为,有,学,校,的,规,则,，,他,们,的,教,育,内,容,有,可,能,限,制,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU
在,烟,盒,上,也,明,明,写,着,“,吸,烟,害,健,康,”,。,因,为,自,己,的,家,人,是,严,重,的,吸,烟,者,，,跟,着,家,人,也,得,了,病,的,情,况,也,往,往,发,生,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

我,认,为,父,母,和,孩,子,之,间,的,关,系,是,对,孩,子,的,成,长,进,程,最,有,影,响,的,。,因,为,如,此,，,孩,子,的,最,根,本,的,需,求,是,一,个,安,宁,的,家,庭,情,况,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
我,认,为,吸,烟,这,个,习,惯,是,必,须,禁,止,的,，,特,别,是,在,公,共,场,所,上,，,因,为,吸,烟,对,每,一,个,人,的,身,体,健,康,有,巨,大,的,坏,处,。,抽,烟,的,人,不,仅,仅,损,害,自,己,的,身,体,，,而,且,他,抽,的,烟,会,流,进,别,人,的,肺,炎,，,严,重,地,损,害,别,人,的,健,康,。,此,外,，,吸,烟,会,提,高,使,天,气,污,染,的,一,些,有,毒,的,材,料,度,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,C-PU
总,而,言,之,，,我,认,为,现,在,绿,色,食,品,是,社,会,发,展,的,应,当,的,需,要,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,R-VV,R-VV,R-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
到,现,在,挨,饿,是,不,再,重,要,的,问,题,。	C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,W-VC,W-AD,W-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,个,故,事,表,示,自,己,中,心,的,思,想,的,后,果,。,自,己,都,好,就,好,，,这,样,的,利,己,主,义,出,产,不,好,的,结,果,。,和,尚,应,该,具,有,高,尚,的,思,想,，,可,是,这,三,位,和,尚,不,利,别,人,，,为,了,自,己,方,便,不,愿,意,去,山,下,抬,水,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,M-PN,C-PN,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-CC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU
其,次,那,么,我,们,对,于,这,问,题,应,该,怎,么,解,决,呢,？,因,为,饥,饿,的,问,题,并,不,一,定,使,用,农,药,产,生,大,量,的,产,物,来,解,决,。	R-AD,R-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
因,为,它,的,思,考,里,有,“,第,一,次,看,到,的,是,我,的,母,亲,”,这,想,法,。	C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-LC,C-VE,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
人,家,都,知,道,吸,烟,引,起,所,有,的,疾,病,，,而,且,不,吸,烟,的,人,在,吸,烟,的,人,身,边,也,就,会,引,起,各,种,疾,病,。,于,是,在,韩,国,一,般,地,区,几,乎,不,能,吸,烟,，,这,都,是,为,了,不,吸,烟,的,健,康,于,公,众,利,益,的,影,响,。,比,如,如,果,有,人,没,有,按,居,这,个,规,定,吸,了,烟,那,就,一,个,犯,罪,了,。,这,么,严,重,的,规,定,之,下,还,是,吸,烟,的,人,增,加,。,这,个,原,因,是,从,小,孩,没,有,教,育,过,对,吸,烟,的,百,害,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,R-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-P,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,R-AD,R-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,S-P,S-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-PN,M-AD,R-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PU,M-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,W-AD,W-VC,W-VV,W-VV,W-DEC,W-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,W-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,R-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-CD,C-NN,C-PU
“,父,母,是,孩,子,的,第,一,任,老,师,”,，,这,样,的,想,法,跟,我,的,没,有,差,异,。,孩,子,出,生,时,第,一,认,识,的,人,就,是,他,的,父,亲,和,母,亲,，,也,别,忘,孩,子,还,没,出,生,已,经,跟,他,妈,妈,有,一,个,特,别,的,关,系,。	C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-VE,C-VE,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-OD,C-OD,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU
他,们,应,该,想,得,这,一,点,，,不,是,只,想,今,天,还,是,今,年,，,但,是,要,想,五,年,后,还,是,十,年,后,世,界,有,所,改,变,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-DER,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-VC,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,S-AD,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
第,三,，,我,们,老,百,姓,也,改,变,意,识,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
现,在,很,多,人,主,张,“,绿,色,食,品,”,，,我,听,到,这,个,词,的,时,候,，,想,到,我,小,的,时,候,吃,的,柿,子,，,这,个,柿,子,是,一,点,也,没,有,化,学,物,质,，,在,我,家,的,小,田,里,自,然,地,结,实,的,，,这,个,柿,子,对,我,来,说,，,是,我,吃,过,的,柿,子,当,中,最,好,吃,的,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VA,R-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-VC,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
这,次,考,试,比,上,次,多,难,一,些,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-AD,C-AD,R-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-PU
当,时,Ｈ,Ｏ,Ｔ,是,我,国,的,女,同,学,们,来,说,一,个,神,一,样,，,当,地,最,出,名,的,集,团,，,他,们,的,歌,迷,员,快,达,到,１,０,万,人,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,S-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,M-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,M-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,M-PU

但,是,为,了,个,人,的,身,体,健,康,和,保,护,自,然,环,境,，,我,们,努,力,戒,烟,。,还,有,女,人,抽,烟,的,危,害,比,男,的,还,强,。,女,人,抽,烟,，,她,生,孩,子,的,时,候,，,会,给,孩,子,很,严,重,的,影,响,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,M-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-AD,S-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
他,也,会,细,心,的,教,我,。,到,我,长,大,后,，,我,才,知,道,我,的,爸,爸,不,是,大,画,家,，,而,是,有,着,画,画,爱,好,，,所,以,也,不,是,画,得,很,好,，,但,在,孩,子,的,心,目,中,父,母,是,最,伟,大,的,。,当,年,他,细,心,的,教,我,，,那,种,柔,轻,感,觉,我,也,学,到,回,来,，,影,响,到,我,现,在,也,有,细,心,地,教,小,朋,友,画,画,的,周,末,工,作,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,S-DEV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-VE,C-VE,C-VV,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-DEG,C-NN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-VA,S-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-VE,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

去,年,，,我,毕,业,于,南,洋,理,工,学,院,，,主,修,是,大,众,传,播,和,广,告,设,计,。,我,从,小,就,对,广,告,设,计,非,常,感,兴,趣,，,在,大,专,学,涯,里,，,我,经,常,和,几,位,志,同,道,合,的,同,学,一,起,参,加,校,内,的,活,动,，,诸,如,：,时,装,秀,，,大,型,联,欢,晚,会,等,。,我,们,一,起,讨,论,，,一,起,研,究,和,观,摩,，,自,我,提,升,和,学,习,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,R-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,R-NN,R-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-PN,S-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

爸,爸,，,我,现,在,清,洲,大,学,学,习,汉,语,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,M-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
现,代,农,业,技,术,越,来,越,发,展,。,意,思,就,是,说,，,“,绿,色,食,品,”,不,能,表,示,产,量,会,大,大,降,低,。,比,如,说,农,民,利,用,对,人,有,益,的,—,—,就,是,益,虫,来,提,高,农,产,量,。	C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU

现,代,社,会,的,人,们,对,“,绿,色,食,品,”,有,很,大,的,关,心,，,是,因,为,意,识,到,了,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,产,出,来,的,农,作,物,被,污,染,的,很,严,重,，,而,且,这,些,农,作,物,不,利,于,健,康,。	C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-P,C-P,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-SB,C-VV,C-VV,S-DER,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
