这,就,说,明,了,吸,烟,是,个,不,容,易,扔,掉,的,一,种,习,惯,。	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,R-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
不,能,再,忽,视,在,世,界,上,发,生,了,什,么,污,染,，,因,为,所,有,的,污,染,都,是,我,们,亲,手,造,成,的,。	C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,S-AS,S-DT,S-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU
代,沟,问,题,的,产,生,往,往,是,因,双,方,都,不,了,解,对,方,，,而,使,彼,此,产,生,了,距,离,，,不,信,任,，,甚,至,猜,疑,对,方,。,其,实,想,要,打,破,这,个,局,面,，,只,要,双,方,心,平,气,和,，,多,给,对,方,付,出,多,一,点,关,怀,，,多,花,一,点,时,间,彼,此,对,谈,，,起,初,可,以,先,谈,谈,彼,此,的,近,况,，,未,来,的,展,望,，,让,彼,此,都,明,白,其,实,我,是,在,乎,你,的,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,R-PN,R-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-CD,R-M,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,S-AD,S-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-SP,C-PU

我,记,得,小,时,候,在,吃,饭,时,，,如,果,不,拿,着,饭,碗,吃,的,话,，,被,妈,妈,骂,一,顿,，,还,有,一,边,吃,饭,一,边,看,电,视,都,不,行,。,但,是,虽,然,我,在,家,里,从,小,就,接,受,这,样,的,严,肃,的,教,育,，,可,是,我,一,直,到,长,大,从,来,没,想,过,我,家,的,教,育,方,式,比,别,人,家,严,点,儿,。,我,在,高,一,时,去,同,学,家,玩,儿,，,在,那,儿,吃,饭,了,，,看,到,同,学,站,着,吃,饭,，,看,着,电,视,吃,饭,都,她,妈,妈,不,说,什,么,，,这,个,情,景,让,我,口,呆,母,瞪,了,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,M-LB,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,S-AD,S-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,W-AD,W-PN,W-NN,W-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,S-NN,S-VV,S-NN,S-VV,C-AS,C-PU

我,想,早,就,说,我,爱,你,们,。,可,是,这,句,话,说,也,从,嘴,里,不,出,来,，,要,怎,么,说,也,说,不,出,来,，,可,能,是,我,很,像,爸,爸,。	C-PN,W-VV,W-AD,W-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,W-VV,W-AD,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-PN,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

首,先,，,战,后,出,生,的,人,没,有,体,会,到,贪,因,生,活,不,知,道,晚,辈,一,直,以,来,如,何,付,出,努,力,使,国,家,发,展,起,来,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
所,以,，,解,决,挨,饿,问,题,的,唯,一,办,法,是,人,家,援,助,为,他,们,能,做,独,立,生,活,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,R-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,首,歌,，,不,但,要,我,们,以,乐,观,的,心,情,来,改,造,我,们,所,遇,的,不,愉,快,的,事,情,，,还,要,我,们,容,易,的,把,伤,感,的,事,当,着,无,发,生,过,的,一,回,事,。,世,上,的,人,个,个,都,有,难,免,的,经,，,也,就,是,说,个,人,都,有,很,难,避,免,的,经,历,，,就,像,我,，,婚,姻,的,失,败,，,家,庭,的,改,变,，,使,我,烦,恼,，,每,天,我,都,在,痛,苦,中,生,活,，,孩,子,们,还,小,我,又,没,有,亲,戚,在,身,，,但,每,当,我,听,了,那,首,歌,时,它,给,我,一,种,力,量,，,使,我,从,中,产,生,了,一,种,继,续,活,下,去,的,意,思,，,于,是,我,继,续,先,忍,吞,那,些,人,的,咀,骂,，,好,好,的,计,划,未,来,。	C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-DEC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEV,C-BA,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-P,S-P,S-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-DEC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VE,C-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-M,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-PN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,R-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-VV,R-AS,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-LC,C-PN,C-VV,C-PN,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU

不,过,，,我,所,去,的,地,方,都,不,如,我,最,后,一,天,流,达,的,杜,甫,草,堂,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-CD,C-M,S-NN,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU

汉,城,市,政,府,规,定,在,公,共,场,所,，,如,飞,机,场,、,火,车,站,等,场,所,中,不,准,吸,烟,，,而,且,规,定,在,校,内,吸,烟,的,中,高,学,生,会,被,严,重,处,罚,。,政,府,这,样,规,定,的,原,因,是,，,因,为,吸,烟,不,仅,对,人,的,健,康,不,利,而,且,吸,烟,者,旁,边,的,无,吸,烟,者,也,会,受,到,不,利,。,吸,烟,会,引,起,很,多,的,病,，,如,癌,症,等,。	C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,S-JJ,S-JJ,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-SB,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-VA,S-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-CD,R-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-PU
它,的,内,容,大,概,都,是,恋,爱,，,被,爱,情,悲,痛,的,情,况,来,描,写,，,为,了,青,年,男,女,受,欢,迎,，,制,作,儿,童,歌,曲,也,有,但,不,太,多,。,歌,星,是,青,年,人,当,作,他,们,的,榜,样,，,所,以,这,些,流,行,歌,曲,的,歌,星,做,什,么,，,都,被,歌,迷,喜,欢,而,跟,他,们,一,样,做,，,无,论,是,穿,的,衣,服,、,头,发,、,爱,好,等,等,，,可,以,说,他,们,的,形,象,对,青,年,人,有,很,大,的,影,响,。,所,以,我,希,望,流,行,歌,曲,内,容,应,该,有,利,于,培,养,青,年,人,，,应,用,些,道,德,来,引,导,他,们,走,向,前,影,。	C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,S-LB,C-NN,C-NN,S-VA,S-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VE,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,R-VV,R-PN,R-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-LB,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-MSP,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-ETC,M-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-JJ,S-NN,C-PU

其,实,，,父,母,与,孩,子,的,关,系,仍,然,不,变,，,改,变,的,是,：,父,母,与,儿,女,们,对,事,情,的,看,法,不,同,，,也,就,是,说,两,代,人,之,间,在,行,为,方,式,、,生,活,态,度,以,及,价,值,观,念,方,面,存,在,着,差,异,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-VA,R-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,旅,游,之,间,，,在,都,市,出,发,到,另,一,个,地,方,时,，,令,人,感,到,新,鲜,，,而,且,愉,快,。,自,然,发,生,心,情,娱,乐,，,也,自,然,父,母,与,子,女,的,谈,话,。,我,来,讲,我,的,事,时,，,我,跟,父,母,亲,，,没,有,代,沟,，,因,为,我,常,跟,父,母,吃,饭,，,而,且,常,一,起,去,旅,游,或,看,电,视,。	C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,S-LC,S-LC,C-PU,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,W-NN,W-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-NN,W-NN,W-CC,W-NN,W-NN,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,R-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
但,是,这,个,想,法,里,有,一,定,的,生,活,条,件,，,这,就,是,，,已,经,满,足,衣,食,住,方,面,。,这,样,阶,层,的,人,才,可,以,选,取,吃,什,么,安,全,不,安,全,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,R-LC,M-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

我,希,望,听,很,多,流,行,歌,曲,以,后,也,受,人,们,的,欢,迎,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,M-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
第,一,，,父,母,不,必,与,孩,子,保,持,距,离,，,有,的,父,母,在,教,育,孩,子,方,面,太,严,格,，,孩,子,想,做,什,么,都,父,母,要,决,定,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU
每,次,我,在,电,台,收,听,到,这,些,流,行,歌,曲,后,，,心,情,特,别,愉,快,，,我,知,道,，,除,了,那,些,小,年,青,人,喜,爱,，,我,也,不,例,外,，,虽,然,我,已,进,中,年,，,但,我,常,常,会,被,两,只,蝴,蝶,中,的,歌,词,受,感,染,，,歌,词,这,么,写,的,：,亲,爱,的,，,你,慢,慢,飞,，,小,心,前,面,带,刺,的,玫,瑰,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-SB,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
吃,“,绿,色,食,品,”,是,人,类,首,先,的,第,一,位,。,首,先,，,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,时,，,各,个,方,面,来,说,，,对,空,气,，,农,作,物,，,人,体,等,都,会,产,生,一,定,的,影,响,。,其,次,，,人,出,生,到,这,个,世,界,只,能,活,一,次,，,要,是,不,能,自,由,的,吃,东,西,，,控,制,到,不,挨,饿,，,是,一,件,非,常,痛,苦,的,事,情,。	C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,R-AD,C-DEV,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,M-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,M-PU,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
随,着,环,境,的,污,染,，,人,们,对,健,康,的,关,心,也,越,来,越,大,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,R-P,C-NN,C-NN,R-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,R-VA,C-PU

我,除,了,在,学,校,上,课,时,以,外,从,来,没,受,过,专,业,音,乐,培,训,，,不,过,我,的,音,感,是,不,那,么,差,的,。,当,然,我,那,时,听,音,乐,，,对,现,在,的,我,剩,下,了,很,大,的,影,响,。	C-PN,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,W-VC,W-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-AD,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
所,以,决,定,不,写,信,给,父,母,。,然,后,到,了,我,在,中,国,进,修,汉,语,的,时,期,，,我,重,新,开,始,向,母,亲,写,信,，,问,问,她,的,生,活,如,何,，,心,情,又,如,何,！,在,中,国,的,一,段,时,间,里,我,向,母,亲,写,了,相,当,多,的,信,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PN,C-P,S-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU
现,在,的,华,文,老,师,已,鲜,少,介,绍,这,本,好,书,于,小,读,者,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU
虽,然,希,望,能,活,下,去,，,但,看,到,病,人,在,这,么,的,痛,苦,应,该,尊,重,他,的,想,法,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
可,是,，,当,他,们,在,公,共,场,所,吸,烟,时,，,侵,害,非,吸,烟,者,的,自,由,。,这,也,是,不,合,理,的,矛,盾,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-PU,M-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU
听,说,在,黄,山,上,一,年,三,百,６,５,天,中,大,约,０,０,天,阴,天,或,者,下,雪,没,有,好,运,气,是,看,不,到,晴,天,的,黄,山,的,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-CD,S-CD,S-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,S-CD,S-CD,C-M,C-VA,C-VA,C-CC,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,M-DEG,C-NR,C-NR,C-SP,C-PU
随,着,社,会,、,经,济,、,工,业,发,展,，,保,境,污,染,问,题,很,严,重,，,现,在,农,作,物,的,生,长,过,程,中,，,无,可,奈,何,用,化,肥,和,农,药,，,但,对,人,们,身,体,也,带,来,不,少,问,题,，,所,以,，,我,想,现,在,科,学,发,达,角,度,来,讲,，,可,以,解,决,这,个,问,题,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-NN,S-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,M-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,R-VA,R-VA,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

当,然,这,些,方,法,不,能,说,完,全,没,有,负,面,影,响,，,某,一,程,度,有,可,能,损,坏,人,的,健,康,。,但,是,一,方,面,增,加,粮,食,产,生,，,另,一,方,面,解,决,这,些,负,面,影,响,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-VE,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,M-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
培,养,好,父,母,是,造,成,文,明,社,会,最,重,要,的,任,务,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-VV,S-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
在,于,吸,烟,者,来,看,，,这,危,害,是,他,们,自,己,挑,选,的,，,不,过,对,于,被,害,的,非,吸,烟,者,来,说,，,此,情,况,竟,是,被,夺,自,己,的,权,力,。	S-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,C-AD,S-LB,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
所,以,我,喜,欢,流,行,歌,曲,，,不,过,年,老,我,也,可,以,不,太,喜,欢,流,行,歌,曲,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,M-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
每,件,事,不,利,于,用,客,观,的,去,判,断,。	C-DT,C-M,C-NN,S-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,R-DEG,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
在,现,代,社,会,上,，,“,自,己,的,健,康,自,己,负,责,”,的,观,念,传,播,的,越,来,越,广,，,引,起,许,多,人,戒,烟,的,良,好,结,果,。	C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-DEC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,S-VV,S-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
由,于,烟,含,有,尼,古,丁,成,份,，,故,长,期,或,吸,过,多,的,吸,烟,者,，,会,患,上,严,重,肺,病,及,并,发,症,等,…,同,时,在,公,众,吸,烟,者,，,不,仅,污,染,公,共,场,所,，,而,且,还,导,致,他,人,间,接,吸,入,浓,烟,俗,称,“,二,手,烟,”,。	C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,R-VV,C-AS,C-VA,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU
绿,色,食,品,由,于,是,纯,天,然,的,，,所,以,对,人,的,健,康,非,常,的,益,。	C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-P,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-DEG,C-NN,C-PU
一,九,四,九,年,春,，,我,们,全,家,南,来,印,尼,，,我,便,开,始,进,入,此,间,的,华,侨,小,学,读,书,。,我,受,的,华,文,教,育,，,受,到,中,国,传,统,文,化,的,熏,陶,，,使,我,对,自,己,的,民,族,有,着,浓,厚,的,感,情,，,我,希,望,在,我,有,生,之,年,，,能,有,发,扬,中,印,友,谊,，,发,扬,中,华,文,化,，,当,好,一,个,中,文,老,師,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,S-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,M-NR,C-NR,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,R-VE,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,此,，,我,认,为,只,考,虑,“,绿,色,食,品,”,和,“,饥,饿,现,象,”,是,不,能,达,到,饥,饿,问,题,的,根,本,性,解,决,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VC,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU
而,是,希,望,不,让,我,吸,到,从,他,们,口,中,排,出,来,的,烟,。	C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,S-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU
那,么,，,这,种,现,象,为,什,么,发,生,呢,？,我,觉,得,这,都,是,由,两,者,观,念,的,不,同,而,发,生,的,。,因,为,父,母,和,孩,子,长,大,的,社,会,条,件,、,教,育,情,况,、,大,众,文,化,等,的,成,长,因,素,基,本,上,不,一,样,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,S-VV,S-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-ETC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
植,物,人,处,于,没,有,意,识,，,只,心,脏,动,的,状,态,。,如,果,恢,复,有,意,识,状,态,的,可,能,性,完,全,没,有,，,而,且,没,有,帮,助,让,他,活,着,的,机,械,的,话,，,他,无,法,活,下,去,的,情,况,下,，,取,掉,那,台,机,械,让,他,死,，,我,认,为,这,不,是,不,好,事,，,而,是,非,常,自,然,的,事,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-AS,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-M,S-NN,S-NN,C-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-AD,C-NN,M-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU
第,一,个,看,法,是,，,对,吸,烟,者,最,为,严,厉,的,惩,罚,措,施,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
刚,开,始,这,种,生,活,的,时,候,，,没,有,问,题,，,可,是,过,了,一,周,、,两,周,，,我,发,现,了,自,己,的,表,情,比,以,前,在,外,边,活,动,的,时,候,少,得,多,了,。,过,了,三,周,，,再,发,现,自,己,不,想,做,什,么,了,。	C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-DER,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-SP,C-PU
母,亲,的,态,度,让,我,了,解,自,己,的,错,。,还,有,一,次,我,取,得,了,９,９,分,的,时,候,，,我,爸,爸,说,“,９,９,分,跟,８,０,分,差,不,多,，,１,０,０,分,跟,９,９,分,的,差,却,很,大,”,。,我,的,爸,爸,是,跟,这,话,一,样,对,什,么,都,努,力,得,最,大,的,人,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-CD,C-M,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-VA,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-DEG,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-PU,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-P,C-AD,M-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,R-DER,R-AD,R-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU
几,年,前,在,日,本,发,生,了,一,件,事,—,—,得,了,癌,症,的,母,亲,希,望,要,死,，,儿,子,知,道,她,的,病,状,，,给,了,毒,药,杀,了,她,。	C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,M-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-PU
去,年,美,国,纽,约,政,府,出,台,公,共,建,筑,内,而,所,有,的,饮,食,店,不,允,许,吸,烟,的,新,规,律,。,如,果,吸,烟,，,就,惩,罚,。,随,着,这,个,规,定,对,人,口,深,透,，,吸,烟,者,越,来,越,少,了,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,S-MSP,C-DT,C-DT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,S-P,S-NN,S-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
听,说,在,世,界,上,每,天,几,千,个,儿,童,，,由,于,饥,饿,造,成,的,不,好,环,境,下,死,掉,。,人,的,生,命,比,什,么,都,重,要,，,所,以,为,了,解,决,饥,饿,问,题,，,我,们,应,该,适,合,使,用,化,肥,和,农,药,，,而,提,高,农,作,物,的,产,量,。,可,是,化,肥,和,农,药,的,使,用,不,应,该,是,过,分,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-VC,S-VV,S-VV,C-PU

吸,烟,者,越,年,轻,对,身,体,的,恶,影,响,越,大,。,我,常,常,看,到,不,达,成,年,的,人,吸,烟,，,现,代,谁,也,易,于,得,到,烟,。,过,分,的,吸,烟,导,致,肺,的,病,，,气,管,的,病,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,M-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-AD,S-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-PN,S-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU

是,为,什,么,呢,？,其,实,每,个,人,喜,不,喜,欢,的,原,因,大,多,不,一,样,，,但,是,对,我,的,原,因,来,说,，,第,一,，,流,行,歌,曲,绝,大,部,分,是,爱,情,方,面,的,音,乐,—,—,跟,恋,人,分,手,，,想,哭,什,么,等,再,说,，,爱,情,歌,曲,的,内,容,差,不,多,都,是,悲,观,的,。	R-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-P,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU

第,一,，,如,果,为,了,避,免,人,类,的,饥,饿,，,从,农,产,品,的,生,产,力,上,着,重,的,话,，,那,我,们,肯,定,面,临,环,境,污,染,的,问,题,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
所,以,我,的,想,法,是,，,世,界,上,的,粮,食,生,产,应,该,针,对,两,种,地,区,而,生,产,：,第,一,地,区,是,发,达,国,家,，,这,些,国,家,可,以,享,受,绿,色,食,品,的,恩,惠,；,第,二,地,区,就,是,上,述,的,未,发,达,国,家,，,在,这,些,地,区,应,该,首,先,解,决,吃,饱,问,题,，,如,果,将,来,能,解,决,这,个,问,题,，,在,那,个,时,候,可,以,开,始,生,产,或,进,口,绿,色,食,品,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,M-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-NN,M-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,M-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

三,、,四,十,年,前,泰,国,的,中,学,大,部,分,是,男,女,分,班,，,男,校,的,学,生,容,易,吵,架,弄,事,；,女,校,的,女,生,又,过,分,害,羞,。,男,女,分,校,毕,业,出,来,的,学,生,，,在,进,入,不,同,于,以,前,校,园,的,生,活,模,式,的,大,学,及,社,会,时,，,有,些,人,会,无,所,适,从,，,需,花,一,段,时,间,来,调,适,自,己,。	C-CD,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-NR,C-NR,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-VC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,M-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,R-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-P,C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU
比,如,说,，,外,向,的,父,母,就,会,和,自,己,的,孩,子,进,行,情,感,、,语,言,上,的,交,流,，,而,且,他,们,的,关,系,也,会,因,此,变,的,比,较,和,睦,。,生,长,在,这,样,环,境,下,的,孩,子,，,无,论,是,心,理,而,是,身,理,上,都,比,那,些,生,活,在,内,向,父,母,家,庭,里,的,孩,子,健,康,。,同,样,的,，,这,些,健,康,心,理,的,孩,子,长,大,后,有,了,自,己,的,家,庭,和,孩,子,时,，,也,会,延,续,自,己,父,母,对,自,己,的,教,育,方,式,去,教,育,自,己,的,孩,子,。,又,比,如,说,，,一,个,年,幼,的,小,孩,看,着,自,己,的,父,母,在,公,共,场,合,下,随,地,乱,扔,垃,圾,，,这,个,小,孩,也,会,学,着,他,的,父,母,的,样,子,随,地,扔,垃,圾,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-P,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,M-VV,S-DER,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,S-CC,S-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-VA,C-VA,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-LC,C-VE,C-AS,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
要,是,我,一,次,也,没,有,帮,助,她,的,话,，,现,在,也,还,不,知,道,这,样,的,感,觉,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,M-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
总,之,，,代,沟,问,题,是,我,们,的,社,会,各,种,问,题,的,当,务,之,急,，,万,万,不,能,轻,心,大,意,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

你,们,已,经,相,信,着,我,吧,？,我,要,说,我,也,下,决,心,了,不,让,你,们,失,望,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-AS,C-NN,M-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,M-AD,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
说,实,话,，,能,听,懂,现,代,流,行,歌,曲,的,歌,词,经,常,并,不,是,一,件,好,事,。,歌,词,不,讲,爱,情,，,就,是,讲,失,恋,，,比,较,特,别,的,歌,词,很,少,见,。,那,么,我,最,近,又,开,始,了,听,另,一,种,外,语,的,流,行,音,乐,，,那,就,是,日,本,语,的,歌,曲,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,R-AD,R-AD,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
几,天,前,是,父,母,节,，,但,我,没,回,家,看,你,们,，,当,时,我,有,课,，,而,且,有,很,多,的,作,业,，,我,觉,得,太,对,不,起,，,你,们,了,解,吧,。,到,今,让,我,这,么,长,得,好,，,真,感,谢,。	C-CD,C-M,C-LC,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-NT,C-NT,C-PN,C-VE,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-SP,C-PU,C-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DER,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

但,，,我,当,时,喜,欢,的,流,行,歌,曲,现,在,不,太,喜,欢,，,因,为,听,起,来,有,点,儿,不,舒,服,，,有,点,儿,土,还,有,音,乐,的,速,度,太,快,，,所,以,我,觉,得,有,点,儿,别,扭,。	C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-NT,C-NT,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-M,C-M,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VE,C-M,C-M,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-M,C-M,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

这,些,看,法,是,也,有,道,理,的,。,不,过,我,不,知,道,吸,烟,者,曾,考,虑,过,自,己,损,害,被,动,吸,烟,者,的,健,康,。	C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,W-VC,W-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

政,府,实,行,吸,烟,者,不,便,的,措,施,，,使,他,们,打,算,戒,烟,的,计,划,。,要,不,然,，,他,们,不,知,不,觉,更,毒,吸,了,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,S-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-DEC,R-NN,R-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-AD,R-VV,C-VV,M-SP,C-PU

第,一,，,“,慢,慢,一,步,一,步,来,”,。,记,得,我,小,时,候,，,学,走,路,的,时,候,常,常,倒,在,地,上,，,每,次,就,要,大,哭,一,声,，,妈,妈,爸,爸,就,会,抱,着,我,说,：,“,慢,慢,一,步,一,步,来,，,别,着,急,。,这,句,话,虽,然,显,得,很,简,单,，,但,它,在,我,困,难,坚,持,不,下,去,的,时,候,，,给,我,巨,大,的,勇,气,。	C-OD,C-OD,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-CD,C-M,C-CD,C-M,C-MSP,C-PU,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-NT,C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,M-CD,C-M,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,M-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,M-PN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

暑,假,，,我,跟,他,从,厦,门,到,成,都,乘,火,车,三,天,三,夜,，,早,朝,到,了,成,都,。,到,了,以,后,马,上,乘,公,共,汽,车,坐,三,个,小,时,到,他,的,家,乡,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,M-PU,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-VV,C-AS,C-LC,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,M-CD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,M-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,们,应,该,还,要,考,虑,，,因,为,得,了,一,种,重,病,的,，,可,能,不,会,适,当,的,判,断,，,虽,然,病,情,很,严,重,，,还,是,应,该,等,待,自,己,的,末,期,。,因,为,我,们,的,生,命,不,是,自,己,做,出,来,的,，,所,以,不,应,该,放,弃,自,己,的,生,命,；,还,有,如,果,认,可,“,安,乐,死,”,的,话,，,会,不,会,引,起,故,意,的,“,安,乐,死,”,杀,人,罪,？,每,个,家,庭,有,不,同,的,烦,恼,，,有,的,家,庭,已,经,不,是,“,家,庭,”,了,，,这,样,的,情,况,下,可,以,选,择,“,安,乐,死,”,的,话,，,可,能,发,生,很,多,“,安,乐,死,”,的,犯,罪,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-VV,C-AS,C-CD,C-M,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VA,M-VA,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,S-PN,S-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,S-VV,C-MSP,C-SP,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CC,C-CC,C-CS,C-CS,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,S-PU,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,M-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-SP,C-PU,C-PN,M-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-VV,S-AD,C-CD,C-PU,M-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

广,告,写,的,是,歌,手,们,来,住,我,的,地,方,。,歌,手,是,什,么,，,地,方,是,什,么,，,都,告,诉,我,们,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-DEC,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,W-VV,W-PN,W-DEG,W-NN,W-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,S-PN,S-PN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU
虽,然,是,这,样,而,言,，,父,亲,不,一,定,能,影,响,孩,子,的,兴,趣,爱,好,。,比,如,说,，,我,父,母,亲,喜,欢,唱,歌,，,他,们,参,加,教,堂,的,唱,诗,班,，,也,常,常,邀,请,我,跟,他,们,一,起,唱,诗,班,，,但,是,，,因,为,对,圣,歌,没,有,任,何,兴,趣,，,我,一,直,拒,绝,他,们,的,邀,请,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,R-LC,R-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

爸,爸,，,请,别,望,您,能,给,儿,的,最,大,礼,物,，,就,是,您,的,健,康,长,寿,！	C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-AD,S-VV,M-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

打,好,了,基,础,以,后,，,在,求,知,识,的,过,程,就,更,为,容,易,了,。	C-VV,C-VA,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,M-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU
我,在,绍,兴,访,问,了,名,胜,古,迹,，,其,中,最,印,象,的,还,是,鲁,迅,纪,念,馆,。	C-PN,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,S-VV,S-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-AD,C-VC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
还,有,不,一,定,“,绿,色,食,品,”,是,最,好,的,食,品,。	C-AD,C-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-AD,W-PU,W-JJ,W-JJ,W-NN,W-NN,W-PU,C-VC,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,和,中,国,人,交,流,的,机,会,日,益,增,多,，,越,交,流,失,望,越,大,。	C-PN,C-CC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,S-AD,S-VA,C-PU
另,外,，,父,母,在,生,活,中,，,通,过,父,母,的,生,活,习,惯,，,还,培,养,孩,子,的,社,会,性,。,因,为,孩,子,进,入,更,大,的,正,真,的,社,会,之,前,必,须,学,到,那,些,社,会,与,其,他,人,产,生,关,系,的,最,基,本,的,基,础,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,S-AD,S-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,W-NN,W-NN,W-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-AD,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
问,题,只,关,乎,各,人,的,环,境,意,识,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
对,抽,烟,者,这,样,说,的,话,，,他,们,一,定,说,“,我,们,没,有,自,由,”,当,然,有,自,由,，,但,是,同,时,有,做,法,。	C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-AD,C-AD,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
他,人,的,想,法,未,必,一,定,是,对,的,，,而,且,只,要,自,己,认,为,判,断,正,真,就,好,了,。,以,我,之,见,，,男,女,分,班,可,行,亦,可,不,可,行,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,S-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-AS,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
这,不,但,影,响,了,市,容,，,更,影,响,到,了,公,众,的,利,益,，,造,使,空,气,受,到,污,染,，,也,使,周,围,不,吸,烟,的,人,感,到,不,愉,。,扔,烟,头,体,现,出,了,没,有,素,质,的,一,方,面,，,不,但,污,染,了,环,境,卫,生,，,又,破,坏,了,个,人,形,象,。,也,许,有,些,会,说,：,“,假,如,我,不,扔,，,岂,不,是,很,多,清,洁,工,都,找,不,到,工,作,？	C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,R-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,S-AD,S-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-VE,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
泰,国,有,些,学,校,从,小,学,到,高,中,都,实,行,男,女,分,班,，,原,因,就,是,避,免,学,生,早,恋,而,造,生,各,种,各,样,的,不,良,后,果,。,在,报,纸,上,有,时,候,也,可,以,看,到,这,种,预,料,不,到,新,闻,，,令,人,伤,感,。	C-NR,C-NR,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-MSP,S-VV,S-VV,M-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
关,于,你,们,最,关,心,的,汉,语,学,习,来,说,，,我,在,我,们,班,当,班,长,。,作,为,一,个,班,长,即,在,学,习,方,面,，,又,在,生,活,方,面,，,都,爱,照,顾,从,韩,国,来,的,留,学,生,。,有,的,年,龄,比,较,少,的,留,学,生,不,适,应,这,里,的,生,活,，,常,常,不,来,上,课,，,结,果,不,仅,没,学,好,汉,语,，,还,浪,费,了,时,间,。	S-P,S-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-PN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,S-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-AD,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,S-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,知,道,吃,绿,色,食,品,的,话,会,身,体,不,好,，,但,现,在,的,食,品,一,般,都,用,农,药,来,做,，,这,是,没,办,法,的,。,用,化,肥,和,农,药,的,时,候,用,一,点,就,应,该,没,问,题,的,，,如,果,不,用,农,药,的,话,就,等,于,界,世,的,食,品,就,降,低,那,挨,饿,的,人,越,来,越,多,，,农,产,品,降,低,那,产,品,的,价,格,也,会,升,高,，,这,样,的,话,对,不,能,做,农,产,品,的,国,家,来,说,非,常,大,的,问,题,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,W-VV,W-NN,W-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-MSP,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-VC,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-CD,C-M,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,C-NN,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-P,C-AD,C-VV,S-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,M-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,身,边,的,年,青,人,差,不,多,这,个,样,。	C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,M-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-PU

那,么,非,吸,烟,者,也,是,尊,重,吸,烟,者,的,权,务,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,S-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
现,在,，,越,来,越,进,行,全,球,化,的,控,制,吸,烟,活,动,。,有,的,大,企,业,在,公,司,里,不,许,可,吸,烟,。,可,是,，,还,有,很,多,不,管,道,德,、,规,则,随,地,吸,烟,的,人,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,S-NN,S-NN,S-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-JJ,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-AD,S-VV,S-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CD,C-CD,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,S-NN,S-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU
我,对,安,乐,死,的,想,法,是,肯,定,的,。,是,因,为,死,者,能,够,解,脱,痛,苦,，,家,人,也,可,以,如,此,。,但,是,试,卷,上,的,事,情,那,样,受,到,法,律,的,制,裁,，,我,认,为,是,应,该,的,虽,然,我,赞,同,安,乐,死,。	C-PN,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,S-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-PU,R-VC,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,R-P,R-PN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-CS,C-CS,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
现,在,全,世,界,有,“,安,乐,死,”,的,问,题,，,我,国,日,本,也,不,是,以,外,的,。,这,篇,文,章,的,事,情,每,个,人,不,能,说,不,可,能,的,事,，,我,非,常,理,解,这,位,女,人,的,心,理,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NR,C-NR,C-AD,C-AD,R-VC,S-P,C-NN,C-SP,C-PU,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,M-DT,C-DT,C-NN,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,M-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
二,是,听,或,唱,歌,本,身,有,一,种,让,人,愉,快,的,功,能,，,舒,服,一,点,。,心,情,愉,快,的,时,候,让,它,更,愉,快,。	C-CD,C-VC,C-VV,C-CC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-VE,C-CD,C-M,C-VV,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,M-VA,C-VA,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU

最,近,很,多,人,自,愿,地,进,行,戒,烟,运,动,，,可,是,我,以,为,没,有,什,么,法,律,上,的,制,限,下,，,这,样,的,运,动,是,有,限,的,。,为,了,社,会,的,进,一,步,吸,烟,是,要,快,一,点,解,决,的,问,题,。,解,决,的,努,力,就,是,我,们,的,义,务,。	C-NT,C-NT,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,S-VV,S-VV,M-VE,C-VE,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-VA,C-VA,C-SP,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,S-NN,S-NN,W-VC,W-VV,W-VA,W-AD,W-AD,W-VV,W-VV,S-DEC,W-NN,W-NN,W-PU,W-VV,W-VV,S-DEC,W-NN,W-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
有,一,些,孩,子,都,认,为,父,母,的,思,想,观,念,和,他,们,不,一,样,，,觉,得,父,母,的,观,念,太,传,统,。	C-VE,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU
因,此,政,府,应,该,保,护,这,样,不,能,吸,烟,人,。,还,有,每,年,青,少,年,的,吸,烟,率,越,来,越,增,加,。,他,们,吸,烟,原,因,很,多,。,他,们,的,想,法,是,还,不,完,整,，,所,以,那,时,候,老,师,或,者,父,母,给,他,们,主,意,。,如,果,那,时,候,不,能,控,制,他,们,的,话,，,以,后,他,们,一,直,吸,烟,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,S-AD,S-AD,C-AD,R-VV,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,R-AD,R-AD,R-AD,M-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,M-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VA,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,S-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-P,C-PN,C-PN,M-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,S-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU

妈,，,抽,空,时,间,来,汉,城,玩,几,天,吧,。	C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,R-NN,R-NN,C-VV,C-NR,C-NR,C-VV,C-CD,C-M,C-SP,C-PU
可,是,这,方,面,的,观,念,，,因,为,父,母,我,已,经,难,以,改,变,。	C-AD,C-AD,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,M-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU
他,们,烟,也,伤,害,不,抽,烟,的,人,，,政,府,应,该,早,点,措,施,这,个,规,定,。	C-PN,C-PN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-DEC,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,S-NN,S-NN,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
对,这,些,人,来,说,，,如,果,医,生,放,弃,治,疗,，,用,“,安,乐,死,”,的,措,施,，,医,生,的,行,为,就,是,忽,视,自,己,的,责,任,，,背,反,遗,属,的,期,待,。,还,有,，,现,在,藏,器,移,植,的,技,术,发,展,，,很,多,医,生,把,无,法,可,救,的,病,人,看,作,“,移,植,藏,器,的,对,象,”,。,在,这,个,情,况,下,，,对,一,些,很,难,治,疗,的,病,人,，,医,生,放,弃,一,些,治,疗,，,为,了,成,就,“,移,植,藏,器,”,的,目,的,，,他,们,会,故,意,选,择,“,安,乐,死,”,措,施,。	C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-P,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,S-VV,S-NN,S-NN,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PU,C-NT,M-NT,C-NN,S-NN,S-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,R-NN,C-NN,C-NN,M-NN,C-PU,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-BA,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,S-NN,S-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PU,C-P,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-PU,C-P,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-P,C-NN,S-NN,S-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,S-NN,S-PU,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-PN,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
一,到,内,蒙,古,，,极,为,美,丽,的,风,景,呈,现,在,我,眼,前,。,广,阔,、,无,限,的,草,原,远,远,超,过,我,的,想,像,。	C-CD,C-CC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,M-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-PN,C-NN,C-NN,M-PU,C-VA,C-VA,C-PU,S-VA,S-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
这,除,了,环,境,污,染,之,外,，,还,给,青,少,年,会,带,来,一,个,很,不,好,的,印,象,。	C-DT,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-AD,W-P,W-NN,W-NN,W-NN,W-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-AD,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
如,果,每,个,吸,烟,者,能,做,到,这,一,点,，,那,将,带,来,许,许,多,多,的,利,处,。	C-CS,C-CS,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-PN,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-CD,C-DEG,S-NN,S-NN,C-PU
工,作,经,验,：,从,事,旅,游,行,业,超,过,二,十,年,，,第,一,份,工,作,为,在,×,×,旅,游,公,司,作,导,游,，,因,工,作,表,现,优,越,，,及,对,行,政,工,作,有,浓,厚,之,兴,趣,，,于,×,×,年,被,提,升,为,公,司,行,政,主,任,。	C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-CD,C-CD,C-M,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NR,C-NR,C-NR,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-PU,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,S-VA,S-VA,C-PU,C-CC,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VE,C-VA,C-VA,C-DEC,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-OD,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-SB,C-VV,C-VV,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
觉,得,有,很,多,烦,恼,事,情,中,解,脱,了,自,己,，,释,放,自,己,的,感,觉,。	C-VV,C-VV,C-VE,M-CD,C-CD,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-AS,C-PN,C-PN,C-PU,C-VV,C-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
因,为,在,生,活,过,程,当,中,，,孩,子,会,跟,着,父,母,看,到,他,们,怎,么,做,事,情,，,所,以,我,觉,得,父,母,是,孩,子,的,第,一,任,老,师,。	C-P,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-LC,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-P,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,S-VV,S-VV,C-PN,C-PN,C-AD,C-AD,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-OD,C-OD,C-M,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU
我,认,为,现,在,的,法,律,的,状,况,下,安,乐,死,还,是,一,种,的,杀,人,。,所,以,虽,然,文,章,中,的,丈,夫,是,妻,子,的,要,求,下,进,行,的,，,但,是,他,免,不,了,受,到,法,律,的,制,裁,。	C-PN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NT,C-NT,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-AD,C-VC,C-CD,C-M,R-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-CS,C-CS,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-VC,M-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-LC,C-VV,C-VV,C-DEC,C-PU,C-AD,C-AD,C-PN,C-VV,C-AD,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-DEG,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU

为,了,全,面,性,解,决,此,难,题,，,学,校,应,设,辅,异,老,师,或,邀,请,心,理,医,生,举,办,讲,座,会,来,为,青,少,年,们,解,开,这,个,谜,。	C-P,C-P,C-JJ,C-JJ,C-JJ,M-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-NN,C-NN,C-PU,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-CC,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-NN,C-NN,R-VV,C-VV,C-P,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-NN,C-VV,C-VV,C-DT,C-DT,C-NN,C-PU
